1b1(rgyud): na du rna//
1b2(rgyud): rgyu//d+hA DU gyun/m+b+ha /
1b3(rgyud): wagu rgyal 'khri na bud+d+ha ai san+d+he/l-i 'udu mawats+tsha/
1b4(rgyud): ladra kyi lu la kha pa khri kra/zla tha su mu su nyu ra hU~M hA ji ma ga[à¤½]
2a1(rgyud): po dang po//sangs rgyus dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//
2a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'dus pa dang po la bdud bye ba pham par
2a3(rgyud): mdzad/dpyod pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /gcer bu pa thams cad dang /mu stegs can gzhan rnams
2a4(rgyud): kyang btul nus pham par mdzad do/'khor ba'i skyon 'khor ba'i chu bo'i pha rol tu gshegaso//gang gi tshe
2a5(rgyud): bdud kyi sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma g.yog bdud kyi sde phrag dkrigs pa can dag gis 'dzam bu'i
2b1(rgyud): gling bkang ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sa rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/sems can de dag gi 'jigs shing 'jig su rung ba'i
2b2(rgyud): smre yang mya thos shing mtsho ni cha'i char de dag thams cad kyang me tog sna tshogasu bab par gyur to//rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer gyi
2b3(rgyud): sum mdo'i dbus de'i sa de yang rdol nas/rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma mdab mo stong pa rtsa ba ni 'dzom bu chu bo'i gas re/sdong bu
2b4(rgyud): nai bai DUR+Ya/snying po ni dze m+bu chu de'i gser/ze ba ni rje'i snying gi//srid ni chungs pa'i 'jig rten gyi byar du thug pa/'o
2b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/pad+ma de byung nas phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byaso//de nas pad+ma daM las nor bu rdo rje mchog ldan
2b6(rgyud): zhes bye ba'i gzungs kyi bskul ba'i sgra 'di byung ngo //phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang lags pa
3a1(rgyud): thams cad la phyug 'tshala'o//oM maN+Di bAng+ka d+hi ya bAd+d+hAm+bA rI si n+ti bi d+yA nA~M/hA n+yA tA na/dzAd
3a2(rgyud): trA sa ya trAM sA ya/sar+b+ba mA rU ba be na no hU~M hUM/saM d+d+ha sa d+hA ra/br-id+d+ha me tra~M sar+b+ba tAd+h+r-i ga tA/badz+ra~M kalpA A d+hISh+TA~M te swA hA//pad+mod
3a3(rgyud): las yang ldeg so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag ste/des stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di smras bkod nas
3a4(rgyud): shAkya thub pa srid pa'i dgon pa las ni brgal/bdud ni bcom//nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni spangs/mi rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs
3a5(rgyud): ni dri la/chos kyi sgron ma chen po ni sbar te grang gi phyi re gzungs 'di'i mthus sa rdo rje raM byin gyis brlabs nas bdud 'di bcom
3a6(rgyud): pa legs leg so//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spu zing zhes byed cing //lus 'dar nas bcom ldan 'das
3b1(rgyud): kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rigs sngags chen mo 'di 'dus pa dang po la
3b2(rgyud): dzedzaMm+bu'i gling du byung lags/bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'di 'jig rten du sngon byung bar mthos lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i
3b3(rgyud): bdarig po lag ni rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje nor bu chenu po rgyas pa'i grwazhilnga ming khung shin tu rab tu gnas phye/gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
3b4(rgyud): yod de/de'i mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen du'i 'jig rten gyi khoms 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/mtshon tshwa'i char 'bab po 'di yang mi
3b5(rgyud): trotog sna tshogasu gyur te 'bab bo//gzungs 'dri'i mthus bdud kyi 'khor bcom nus srog chags bye ba 'dul to//'di'i mthus sum mdo'i dbus pad+ma
3b6(rgyud): 'di byung bar gyur to//lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di med par mngon rdzo byang chub par mi nus/bdud bye ba pham par ma yin/nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mi
3b7(rgyud): skemam par mi yin te/chos kyi sgron ma sbar bar mi nuso//lagon rdo rje ngas dka' ba bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du ma spyad na/ji spyod gzungs
4a1(rgyud): 'di mnyan pa dang /mngon par brtson pas brtson 'grus ma byas kyi bar du//ngas sangs rgyus nyid thob par ma nus kyi/phyis
4a2(rgyud): dus sangs rgyas nyid thob bo//lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon tsho ba yino//lag na rdo rje 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
4a3(rgyud): kyi chos nyid do kho na nyid yang dag par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu sgrub pa yino//lag na rdo rje 'di'i ming bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
4a4(rgyud): cad kyi mtshan bzung bar 'gyur ro//brjod cing bzlas pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur ba dang /
4a5(rgyud): zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes me tog sna tshogs dang /dri dang //
4a6(rgyud): bdug pa sgo tshi gos kyis mchod nas/bcom ldan 'das la len glo sume bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan
4a7(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jog rten gyi khams de na yon tan gyi khyad pa ci 'dra ba dag gda' ba bstan du gsil
4b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa'i sku yang dag pa'i chos kyi gzhi 'di dag las gzhan pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyi tshogs
4b2(rgyud): byasags par mi bgyi lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsong ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje sems can dri dag ni
4b3(rgyud): snyoms lasa? can/brtson 'grus dmun pa/gti mug gis rmongs pa/'dod pa'i dregs pas rmongs pa/yid ches par dka' ba/phar mi 'dzin pa
4b4(rgyud): mir mi 'dzin pa/dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa/rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ste//des ni gzung 'di lag tu 'ong bar mi
4b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing /bsod na mos chung ba/skal ba chung ba/blo zhan pa rnams kyis kyang nyan par mi 'gyur/'chad par mi 'gyur zhing /sdig pa thams cad
4b6(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzugs 'di la drad pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde
4b7(rgyud): dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu nga ni 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing ched med pa gang gi'i klung rga
5a1(rgyud): ma drang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'dus pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i sgron ma nos bya ba grong khyer gyi khor/
5a2(rgyud): khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'i rab rin po che sna bdun lus byas pa/rgyas pa/bde ba/nyams dga' ba/lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/
5a3(rgyud): skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyid snang zhing nor bu dang /gser 'bar ba'i mgo
5a4(rgyud): rgyan sna tshogs kyis mgo brgyan pa/lha'i gzugs can mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa/shes nyan thams cad dang ldan pa/rig pa'i gnas rtogs
5a5(rgyud): par khong du chud pa snang bar yod par 'gro'o//'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal bI nor bu sna tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/blon po bye ba phrag brgyad nus
5a6(rgyud): yongasu bskor ci /btsun mo dam pa gsal byed ma zhes bya ba bud med N+DI lI'i 'kho can lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi lus la 'gran pa zhig yod//'jig rten gyi khams
5a7(rgyud): de na yang me tog gi shing dang /'bru'i shing dang /trang chu'i shing dang /dri'i shing gang yin pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin//chu las skyes pa'i
5b1(rgyud): me tog glang yin+da pa de dag thams cad kyang /rin po rgyu sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin//thang lus skyes pa'i me tog gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni dzam+b+ha chu bo'i gser gyi rang /
5b2(rgyud): bzhin yin+do//mI rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri thub ste thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun la mngon
5b3(rgyud): par dad pa yin//rgyal po de yang chos dang 'thun pas rgyul srid skyong bar byed kyi chos dang mi mthun pas ni ma yin te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa can yin/
5b4(rgyud): no//'jig rten gyi khams de na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba/rab gnas gtsang ma
5b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor cing /rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang pos yongasu bskor nas spangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de
5b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de ni gser gyi kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byed bzang po brgyad du mnga' ba/'od 'dom gang gis kun nas bskor ba/'od rin
5b7(rgyud): po che sna bdun ltar shin tu dpa' ba yin//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi lus 'od 'phro ba/mtshan dang ldan pa/rin po che sna
6a1(rgyud): //rgyun dun pa ba/rnamasan du sunas pa ma dang/rnams su na nas /rnyog zhan
6a2(rgyud): rtogs par khong du chud pas 'di lta ste/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sems shing gzungs de nyid kyi
6a3(rgyud): mthus yon tan gyi khyad par 'di byung bar gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de yang gzungs 'di sems can thams cad la rab tu ston to//sems can de rnams kyang gzungs
6a4(rgyud): 'di'i mthus bde ba nyamasu myong ba ste/sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha ma
6a5(rgyud): yin gyi ras rnams las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro//ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyang bcad par 'gyur to//mtho ris kyi sgo rnams phye'o//bde 'gro'i sku thams cad phye ste/
6a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugaso//'jig rten gyi khams de na
6a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis gnas te/'di lta ste chu dang /'o ma gcig tu gyur pa bzhi no//de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang sngon byang chub sems
6b1(rgyud): dbar gyur pa na/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba 'di sgrub pa na/smon lam 'dri skad ces/bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye
6b2(rgyud): byar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur ci//ces smon lam btob
6b3(rgyud): po//gang dag gzungs 'di nyan pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /skom pa dang /'don pa dang /sems dpa' dang /sgrib par byed pa
6b4(rgyud): dang /chung ngu na ming nyan par byed dam/lag pas reg gam/lus la 'chang ngam/mig gis mthong ba tsam 'am/glegs bam la bris pa 'am/ras la bris pa
6b5(rgyud): 'am/rtsig pa la bris pa mthong na/mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/'phags pa la bskur pa btab
6b6(rgyud): pa 'am/shun pa 'am/gdol pa 'am/rngon pa 'am/bya ba 'am/long ba 'am/'on pa 'am/sha bat+sa can nam/bkren pa 'am/zhar ba 'am/srung po 'am/
6b7(rgyud): smad pa dang /sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pa'i sgrib pa can nam/myong bar gyur par ma nges pa'am/bdud kyis zhags pas bcings pa'am/lta ba ngan par lhung ba /
7a1(rgyud): log 'dron gyis zin pa'am/rgyuskar dang /gza' gnod par byas pa de dag thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7a2(rgyud): las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur//chung ngun dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang /bye dang /sbrang bu mchu rings dang /sha sbrang dang /byi ba dang /srog sbur rnams dang
7a3(rgyud): gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/mngal nas skyes pa 'am/drod ga sher las skyes pa 'am/brdzus te skyes pa la sogs te/
7a4(rgyud): de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//de nas bcom
7a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'khor de dag ma cad dga' zhing ba spu'i khung bu rnams g.yos par gyur to//lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang
7a6(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po dang /man dA ra ba dang /man dA ba chen po'i char yang rab tu bab po//lce'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin no//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad
7a7(rgyud): rang rang gi lus las 'od zer byung bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa rtsog ma bkra ba/lta na sdug pa/shin tu rnam par bya
7b1(rgyud): ba/nyams dpa' ba/kA b+hA baSh+Ti zug pa/sgo bzhi bstod pa/them skas bya zhi dang ldan pa/'od 'byur ba/zla bzhir nor bu rin po che chen po bzhi nyi mu ltar 'od 'brar ba/nor
7b2(rgyud): bu dang /rin po che dang /mu ti bA gi dri ba dum sbyangs pa/dril bu mang nges mdzes par byas pa/der gyi ba dren med ngos kun nas brgyan pa/me tog sna tshogs du ma'i chun pos
7b3(rgyud): mdzes par byas pa zhig byung ngo //sa 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te 'gul ldeg la sgra 'byin cing mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to//lha'i gnas thams cad kyang 'od
7b4(rgyud): kyis snang bar byas te lha'i gnas na gnas pa thams cad bskul to//rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bskul to//rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad kyang bskul te/lha'i
7b5(rgyud): gnas thams cad kyang 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'byar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang bar chad byed pa'i log 'dren thams cad spangs skrag ste cho nges 'debs shing phyogs
7b6(rgyud): bcur byero//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar byas shing
7b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams bskul nas slar dbu'i gtsug tu nub po//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
8a1(rgyud): de rnams kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la legaso shes bya ba byin
8a2(rgyud): te/bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so//bcom ldan 'das khyod de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bgro ba rab gnas gtsang ma de gzigs pa dang /
8a3(rgyud): phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bzhud pa'i dus la bab kyis bzhud la/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bgyi
8a4(rgyud): bo'i gzungs de yang rgyas par gson cig/bcom ldan 'das gzungs de ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lagaso//gzungs de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
8a5(rgyud): rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags te/gang la la zhig nyan tam/chung ngu na ming ngam/lag pas reg na yang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /bla na
8a6(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
8a7(rgyud): cad nas gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsol ba btab par thugasu chud nas/yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bkye ste/
8b1(rgyud): ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de la bos nas/'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/de bzhin gshegs pa'i brda byung ba ni 'di yino//de nas
8b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan las bzhengs pa dang /khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbusu rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri byung nas/khri do'i steng du rin po che'i pad+ma bkra ba/blta
8b3(rgyud): na sdug pa/yid du 'ong ba/sdong po ni gser/pad+ma'i snying po ni mu tig dmar po can zhig byung ste/de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugaso//bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
8b4(rgyud): ma thag tu sa chen po 'di che thang du g.yos par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyang nor bu chen po dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'khor thams
8b5(rgyud): cad dbugs phyung nas/steng gi namakha'i dkyil du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khod de 'khor mang po dang /'khod pa chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
8b6(rgyud): brlabs chen po dang /rnam par sprul pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i 'khor dang /lha drang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /
8b7(rgyud): na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po dang /rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag mang po'i 'khor dang /gsang ba'i
9a1(rgyud): bdag po la na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /rgyal po chen po ngan
9a2(rgyud): dang gshegs so//de dag thams cad shAr phyigs legs dong ba dang /chud mdo pa'i byang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang many+tsa ma po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
9a3(rgyud): 'dras nas nor bu sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu phyin par mthong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis
9a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to//'jig rten gyi khams dor byon ma thag tu/na mkha' las babs nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang
9a5(rgyud): po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas gtsang ma de'i drung du gsheg so//der gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/bskyod pa yang ngam/bde ba la
9a6(rgyud): reg par gnas sam zhes gsungs nas/rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma mdab ma stong pa zhig byino//dA nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na/'khor dang
9a7(rgyud): bcas pa bzhugs pa dang /des phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/zab cing zab pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
9b1(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa de yang dag par dgyes par mdzad/khang pa brtseg ma de nyid du bzhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi chos
9b2(rgyud): kyis 'khor lo legs par bskor lags sam/khyod kyis bdud dpung dang gzhon par bcas pa bcom lags sam/khyod kyis chos kyi sgron ma sbar lags sam/
9b3(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbrengasA lags sam/chos kyi rnga brdungs lags sam/chos kyi dung rab tu bus lags sam/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis 'jig rten du sangs
9b4(rgyud): rgyas 'byung /bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/mkhyen par bgyis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis deng 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo chos kyi
9b5(rgyud): gter lan gnyi su bskor mdzod cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rnam pa drug
9b6(rgyud): tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/
9b7(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/chem chem rab tu chem chem/kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang snang
10a1(rgyud): skyes spyan rnams klu ma d+hA la pU sgyu 'as/stong gin mkha'o bur snang gi sbya bu rnams kyang / sa d+hAn ga yod du
10a2(rgyud): yan lag lnga pa dag dal ba byud/klu chen po nyid dan min po de dag snyoms cid kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi DU ral/bas par byed/ ts+tsho ma
10a3(rgyud): dang /tsan drin gyi chu sna tshogs kyi rgyur yid 'dribs par byed/gos sna tshogs dang /rgyun dang /lhab sgrub sna tshogs kyi chu larab tu 'bebs par byed/lha'i mu
10a4(rgyud): hrI dmyur po dang /thig dang /nor bu rin po rje chen po rnam par snad byed dang /nor bu rin po che chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang /chu shes dang /me shes dang /
10a5(rgyud): snying po'i char yad ral tu khebs byer byed/'i m+me to//ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ng+ga dang /bad+ma dkar ba dang /mAn dadAr ba dang /mnu dar ba chen pa
10a6(rgyud): yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser lo sa byung ba'i me tog dang /lha'i dngul las byung ba'i me tog gi char yang rab tu 'bebs par byed/
10a7(rgyud): me tog ga zung ba'i char yo rab tu 'babs por byed/rnam pa'i dkyil na gnas pa'i 'i rnams kyang sa sil nas skye sbyin par 'byin cing dbyangs kyang rdzo
10b1(rgyud): sa na /dus spyad smra su na smra /dag sgyu na na rdzun tu tu/
10b2(rgyud): na ts+tshas rnam man 'jom pa myong du ga pa dade/Sh+NI ste/ 'i rgyas pa'i gnas shin tu sa pa ge sang ba'i sbyis
10b3(rgyud): sems dus/sangs rgyas na nga na mang dugyi rnams sa
10b4(rgyud): ma su ma 'i byung ma/slong ma nas/ rdzu na ni sa khri 'i skyes nas sma
11a1(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugaso//de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
11a2(rgyud): dag thams cad rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad nas/tshad med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas
11a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gshegs nas/so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs ma dag sprul nas khang pa brtsegs po'i
11a4(rgyud): nang du/dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri dgra byung ba de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad rang rang gi 'khor dang /khang pa brtsegs ma'i
11a5(rgyud): nang du bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab granas gtsang mas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
11a6(rgyud): yang dag par dgyes pAr mdzade/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos legs par mchod rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la bzhug so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
11a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang ma/keng na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
11b1(rgyud): gas la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po yang rab tu gad/byang chub sems
11b2(rgyud): dpe'i 'dus pa chen po dang /lha dang /kle dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha mu yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma lags
11b3(rgyud): pa'i 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyang rab tu gdang /rig sngogs 'chang gi tshogs 'dus pa chen po yang lhags nas 'di lta ste/lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems
11b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyang lags/bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po yang gda' lags pas/bcom ldan 'das nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal
11b5(rgyud): med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba rab tu bstan pa'i dus ni 'di lagaso//tshod ni 'di lagaso zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang /de nas
11b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab gnas gtsang mas byang chub sems
11b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu song la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shAkya
12a1(rgyud): thub pa la gsol ba thob shig dang /des khyod la rab tu ston par 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpya' sems dpa' chen bya nor bu'i nga
12a2(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa zhing na 'der song ste phyin nas/ma lda dus
12a3(rgyud): la lhan gsum basbyor ba byas tAM spyan sngar 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i skyong di skad ces gsol to//
12a4(rgyud): btsum+b+ha ldan 'das nor du rgyun pa rgyas pa'i glen la mdu khang shin tu rab tu gnas bya gsang ba 'di sems can thams cad la thugs 'i snod rje
12a5(rgyud): gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsol ba btab par thug su chud nas/gsang bri pa'i bdag po legri na rdo rje lci ba ka
12a6(rgyud): smam hA/gas ga pa'i bdage ba sang la lab me pa 'di dbus kyi sa~M phyog su rdo rjes sa la bstan /de nus gsung ba pa'i bdan po lag na rdod+hi/bcom ldan
12a7(rgyud): 'dis kyi sa 'a stsal pa mnyan nas/'khor gyisa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus gang na ba deng songanas saM phyenas de la rdorjes bskyen te/si mi bdun ma thag hU~M
12b1(rgyud): nus gru bzhir bas so//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu gso so//g.yos ma thag tu sa phyogs der rin po che sna bdun
12b2(rgyud): gyi khang pa rtse ga ma/gru bzhi pa/ka ba bzhi zug pa/sgo bzhi btod pa/mnyam pa/nyams dga' ba/shin tu rnam par phye ba/chas mdzes par byas pa/bikra ba/
12b3(rgyud): blta na sdug pa/'od 'brar ba/them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/'phang du dpag tshad gsum yod pa/rgyar dpag tshad lnga yod pa zhig byung ngo //khang pa rtsog ma'i dbus drer
12b4(rgyud): yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byung ba'i mchod rten nor bu dang /rin po che dang /mu tig gi dra ba du mos rgyan pa/rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
12b5(rgyud): bAs g.yogs pa/dril bu du ma 'phyang du bcug pa/dar gyi chun po du mas mdzes par byas pa/me tog gi chun po du mas mngon par rgyan pa zhig byung ngo //mchod rten
12b6(rgyud): de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku bzhugaso//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis khang pa brtsegs ma de la mchod pa mdzadade/
12b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de yang /khang pa rtseg pa de dang /mchod rten la mchod par byed/rjed par byed/me tog dang /gdug pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /
13a1(rgyud): byug pa dang /gdun sa dang /rgyal mtshon dang /bdun dang /rolam+bu dang /thal mau spyang bA dang /phyag 'tshal bar pyod do//de nas lha dang /
13a2(rgyud): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang za dang /lha m+b+ha yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /sgyu'i bye chen po dang /mi dang mi mo yin pa'i 'khor mang po de dag
13a3(rgyud): mtshur skyes te/ya mtshan du gyur/spro bar gyur nas khang pa brtsigs ma dang /mchod rten 'od ci'i phyir byung bar gyur zhes/ce co dang gzha'i sgra mthon por
13a4(rgyud): 'byin cing /mchod rten dang khang po rtseg ma de la bskyor ba byed/mchod par byed/rjed par byed/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /
13a5(rgyud): sil stan sna tshogs dang /pheg rdob pa dag gis mchod par byed//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang thal mo
13a6(rgyud): sbyar nas 'khod de/phyag 'tshal bar byed//de nas khang pa brtsegs ma de las sku byung ba/kye 'khor ma po dge bar s+yAd la NI snang smyos shig/smros shig/de nas
13a7(rgyud): ji ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bar snang la bltas te/bltas ma thag tu bai DUr+ya dang /nor bu rin po che chen po las byung ba'i sprin gyi phung po chen
13b1(rgyud): po zhig byung ngo //de nas sprin gyi phung po'i steng du nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yi ge gsor gyi kha
13b2(rgyud): dog tu bris pa mthong //ni mkha'i dkyil de nyid nas sgra byung po/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu
13b3(rgyud): gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs klag tu gsol klag tu gsol/sgra byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar smin gyi phung po la bris pa byung nas/'di
13b4(rgyud): skad ces kyang dbyangasu sgrog so//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tsha lo//phyag 'tshalo//mchod rten mchogro 'di sgro phye shig/mchod rten de'i dbu su ni de
13b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi sku gzhug ste/de'i mthus cho 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i khyad par chen po 'di snang zhing de kho na'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
13b6(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang /nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang rig sngags
13b7(rgyud): dang /cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad dang bcas pa mtha' dag rdzogs shing rgyas par 'khor gyi dbusu legs par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ro//de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i
14a1(rgyud): sangs rgya sku bcom ldan 'das de dag byams cad kyi sku/de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14a2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungaso//bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rin po che 'di dang /'di na bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
14a3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs bya'i sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal po me tog rgyal mtshan dang /nor bu rnam par bkra ba dang /rdo rje 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de dag bstan
14a4(rgyud): pa'i skabs dbye bar mdzod cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shUn+ya thub pas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos/khang pa sgyogs ma'i mchod
14a5(rgyud): rten grang na ba dor bzhud/phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis rgyan po brkyang nas/mchod rten mchog de'i sgo'i sgo 'phar phye ste/
14a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams bstan to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/shAkya
14a7(rgyud): thub pa legaso leg so//dang khyod kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskoro//bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs shig/de nas
14b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshogs pA shAkya thub ba mchod rten gyi nang du khri de nyid la bzhugasaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes
14b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag khang pa brtsegs me'i mchod rten gyi nang du ci'i phyir byung /gang nas ni gshegs
14b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje/sngon byung ba bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/tshad med pa/dpag tu med pa/gzhal du med pa/gzhal
14b4(rgyud): gyis mi ldang ba/tshad gzung du med pa/tshes grangs med pa na/gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /lo legs pa dang /nyams dga'
14b5(rgyud): ba dang /skye bo dang mi mang pos gang zhing ma rmos pa/ma btu bA pA'i 'byas sa lu byung ste/bdag gi ba med cing yongasu bzung ba med de/'jig rten thams cad bde
14b6(rgyud): ba dang ldan po de'i tshe/dzam+bu'i gling na sangs rgyas medado//de'i tshe ri'i rgya la po rin po tshwa ri bo zhes bya ba de la drang srong grasum zhig gnas te/gcig gi ming ni nor bu'i
14b7(rgyud): gtsug tor/gnyis pa'i ming ni gser gyi gtsug tor/gsum po'i ming ni rdo rje'i gtsug tor zhes bya ste/de rnams bdag cag ji ltar sems can thams cad
15a1(rgyud): bskul ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/'jig rten bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur snyam+b+ha zhing /
15a2(rgyud): gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byed/chos yid la byed/dge 'dun yid la byed/de nas drang srong de rnams de snyam du bsams nas yud tsam zhig cang m+b+hi smra bar
15a3(rgyud): gyur cing sems pa na/de rnams kyis sems can thams cad mngon par dgo' ba'i byams pa/rnam par bkra ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob cing //
15a4(rgyud): lho'i mig skyes pa nas ji tsam ni steng du bltas na/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bor snang la sgra 'byin pa/skyes bu pa dag leg so leg so//khyed 'di lta ste/
15a5(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni leg so//kye skyes bu dam pa dag nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu
15a6(rgyud): gnas par gsang ba sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du gsungs bya zos pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa nas/
15a7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar thob par 'gyur/chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur/bdud thams
15b1(rgyud): cad ltos rgyal bar 'gyur/chu sa thams cad kyi sgron ma skor bar 'gyur/dge ba'u rtsa ba thams cad mngon du 'gyur/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par
15b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul dang /lha ma yin gyi chos rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyur//
15b3(rgyud): skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /skye sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las
15b4(rgyud): yongasu thar bar 'gyur ba thob nas phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gleng 'di na sems can gang dag par mi 'dzin pa dang /mar mi 'dzin pa dang /dge sbyong du mi
15b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang /bram zer mi 'dzin po dang /mi dge ba dang /dam pa'i chos stong ba dang /'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa dang /mnar med par gzhol ba dang //
15b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la slu ba dang /dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /bram ze gsod pa dang /bu yang gsod/
15b7(rgyud): pa dang /chom rkun byed pa dang /g.yon can dang /sho kam dgugs pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas log par spyod pa dang /
16a1(rgyud): phram sgru ba dang /gzhal ba la rgyu byed pa dang /gawA b+hUgs lnga sgra spyod pa dang /srang la sgra byed pa dang /gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang
16a2(rgyud): gtams pa bsdog pa dang /shes pa la 'khu ba dang /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pas zin po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag thams cad gzungs 'dir mthus
16a3(rgyud): thos pa tsam 'ami/bklag pa tsam 'am/kun chub par byas pa 'am/lus la thogs sam/bris nas 'chang ngam/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 'dogs sam
16a4(rgyud): glegs bam du byed dam/ras la bris pa 'am/dar lo bris pa 'am/rtsig pa la bris pa 'am/ra bra la bris pa'am/chung ngu na sgra nyan pa 'am/lag pas
16a5(rgyud): rig byam/grIb mas phog dam/sems can gzhan gyis reg na yang /de dag thams cad gdon mi za bar phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/bla na med pa yang dag
16a6(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/tshe 'di nyid la yang yon tan brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyuraro//sdig pa thams
16a7(rgyud): cad dbrel bar 'gyur/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/bdud thams cad mthar byed par 'gyur/'jig rten thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/sems
16b1(rgyud): narnams pa mchod du 'gyur/rgyul po dang /rgyul bu dang /smyon pa dang /brlon pa lang dang bcas pa rnam sna dag 'byur 'gyur/da
16b2(rgyud): ma kyi sa da 'gyu /rkyen na sa / la ni N+Di rlu
16b3(rgyud): An pa mi gyur/d+hInIb+hU bal nyams myong bar mi 'ab+hUhU~M/sbrul dug gis mi chog sa d+hi/rkyen gyi su ma na/mau skyes ma
16b4(rgyud): nasu ma yin/de lha gcan ni che ba'i 'a gas pasdu mtshugs te/mdzod kyi gas sgyu yin/dran mos sa se ma yin/
16b5(rgyud): smra pas ma yin/lam dang lham grol ba'i 'jigs pas mA yan/na sbyin gyi 'jigs pas ma yin/'byung po'i 'ad+higs pas ma yin/sbyin
16b6(rgyud): blo'i 'jigs pus ma sbyin+ta/ ba'i 'jigs pasna ma yin/mkha' ma'i dzigs pas myi yin te/ jigs pa mi 'byung /lus
17a1(rgyud): sa smras la ma rdugs blur 'gyur+ya/mog gi sma nad mi laste/rna na mu yan+da/sna ma man/rgyu'on ma yin///
17a2(rgyud): nad ma yin/so'i nad ma yin+te/mdzu da ma yin/man pa'i nad ma yin/rna ba ga pa ma yin+d+ra/lek+Sha pa'i nad mi yin/ zhin du ma yin/
17a3(rgyud): nini mi smin/gzhung 'brum khyen ma yin/gnan+dan ma yin/'gyu ba'i nad ma yin/shA ba'i nad ma yin/bdi'i nadu ma yin/b+hi pa'i nang ma yin//
17a4(rgyud): rnyed pa'i nad ma yin+tu/nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo //'di lta ste/bas lhags dang /lkog pa dang /me dpal dang /ljon pa dang /g.yan pa dang
17a5(rgyud): bol mib dang /khyi rngo dang /mdze dang /rkang shu lA sogs bya thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung /klad bra na pa ma yin/bzhog phyed na pa ma yin
17a6(rgyud): spong bar mi 'gyur/zha bur ma yin/myur po ma yin/pha rol gyi mthus 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ljon par mi 'gyur/sha bad+ma can du mi 'gyur/brnas
17a7(rgyud): shing gnas par mi 'gyur te/yon tan gyi khyang par 'di dag chos dang ldan par 'thung bar 'gyur//'chi ba'i tsher yang spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur/ser mo
17b1(rgyud): 'khrugs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur/de bzhin gla shegs pa thams cad zhal mngon sum du dastan nas dbugs 'byin pa mdzad par 'gyur/lus la byang dang /
17b2(rgyud): ga yengs byed kyis mi tshugs/lus la sngags kyi sbyor bas mi tshugs/bde bar bla nyid kyis ldog para'agyur/bde byar sad par 'gyur/rmi lam na yang
17b3(rgyud): snangs rgyas brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/gsang ba'i gzungs
17b4(rgyud): gyi mthus yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu 'byung zhes smra ba mthong ngo //de nas drang srong de rnams chos kyi dga' ba snying la reg cing spro ba thob nas/mar gsar gyi
17b5(rgyud): gong bu bzhu ba bzhin du lus zhig nas/zhu ba'i khu ba de sra'i nang du thi mo//de nas sa gzhi de las sgyug ma'i mde'u gser gyi kha dog can+da rtsa ba rin po che sna bdun
17b6(rgyud): lngas byas pa/lo mai gse ltas byas pa/rna mo mu tig las byis pa/bkra ba bltan sdug dang /stobs dang ldan pa/gzi brjid dang ldan pa/dri zhim pa
17b7(rgyud): shin tu yid du 'ong ba gsum skyeso//skyog ma'i mde'u de rnams zla ba bcu lon pa dang gas te/de rnams kyi dbus nas khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/blta na sdug
18a1(rgyud): pa kha dag rgyus bya/mchog dang ldan pa gsum byung ngo //de nas khyo'u de rnams phyogs de nyid du de'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas te sgom shing 'khod/
18a2(rgyud): do//ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te gser gyi kho dog gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
18a3(rgyud): dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus smras pa/'od 'dom gang gis kun nas rgyan par gyur to//sgyug ma'i mde'u de rnams kyang khang pa rtseg mar gyur to//nor bu chen po/
18a4(rgyud): rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang na mkho' la gser gyi yi ger snang ngo //rgyal po chen po bzhi yang steng na gdug
18a5(rgyud): 'dzin cing me tog gi gtor te/'di skad ces 'jig rten du sangs rgyas byung ngo //zhes dbyangasu sgrog cing /'di lta ste/klu'i bdag po rgyal po chen po gtsug go
18a6(rgyud): nor bu zhes bya ba dang /grul bum gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba dang /brang 'gro'i bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba dang /gnad
18a7(rgyud): sbyin gyi bdag po rgyal po chen po nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang /bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa byed//sa phyogs de yang rin
18b1(rgyud): ba tsho sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to//me tog gi shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur to//lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus k+Sh+me nAM/drang srong smyug ma'i mngochu
18b2(rgyud): rnams las byung ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa de dag gzhan zhig yAn+da snyam na de ltar me blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phagra na rdo rje de
18b3(rgyud): dag ni khang pa bairtse gos mo'i mchod rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag yino//sa phyogs kyang 'di yino//'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'od yin//smyug ma'i mdo'u
18b4(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs ma yang 'di yin//byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa yang 'di yino//de rnams drang srong du gyur pa na gzungs 'di thos pa tsam 'am/snying
18b5(rgyud): sems la bsgoms pa tsam gyis drang srong gi lus spangs nas/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso//lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus kyi na mkha'i dkyil na gnas
18b6(rgyud): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bla gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi rgyu skye bu gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga nyid dri'i tshe de'i
18b7(rgyud): dus na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar gyur to//lag ni rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba gang gis drang srong de rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
19a1(rgyud): de rnams la bkur sti dang /rim blo byas pa gang yin pa de bzhan zhig yin snyam na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
19a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu bzang po rnam par bkra ba rab tu gnas pa 'di gnas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i
19a3(rgyud): rim gro par gyur pa na/de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan to//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/de bzhin
19a4(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa lpags so zhes bya ba byin to//shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di 'dra bas sngon
19a5(rgyud): gyi sbyor ba gsungs shing de bzhin gshegros pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs 'di yang dag par bstan te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gzungs
19a6(rgyud): 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor
19a7(rgyud): lo bskor/de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa'i gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri la
19b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi gsang ba/de bzhin ga shogs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug
19b2(rgyud): yong su rdzogs pa'i gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
19b3(rgyud): rig pa'i gnas kyi gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
19b4(rgyud): gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bye ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i gsang ba/
19b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems
19b6(rgyud): dpa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun gyi gsang ba/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa bams cad la rab tu 'god pa'i gsang bya/de bzhin gshegs
19b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rtogs par thugasu chud pa'i gsang ba/sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba 'di gsungs pa leg so leg so//de nas de
20a1(rgyud): /bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/
20a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gzigs nas/'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /
20a3(rgyud): dkar po dang /la brgan dang /shel dang /dngul gyi mdog dag bkye ste/de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnamasu dong nas sangs rgyas
20a4(rgyud): kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul nas/slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das la lani gsum bskor ba byas nas/
20a5(rgyud): dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhug s+ho//'od zer de dag zhugs mA thag tu/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs chen pos bkang nas/rig
20a6(rgyud): sngags chen po 'di gsungaso//oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta ma Ni sha tA dIp+ta/dzA la dz+wA la/d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA//bcom
20a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu ri dang tshal dang nags tshal du bcas pa'i sa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
20b1(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyis kyang legaso shes bya ba byin te/shAkya thub pa khyod kyis mchog tu gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs te legaso legaso//bcom ldan 'das la
20b2(rgyud): mchod pa'i lus kyi phyir dza m+bu'i chu bo'i gsor los byung ba'i sprin chen po na mkha'i dkyil du chags//phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi char bab po//tsin du na sprul
20b3(rgyud): gyi snying po'i phye ma'i tshor yang bab bo//u dumA ba re'i me tog gi char yang bab bo//bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i lus kyi phyir/gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs
20b4(rgyud): pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /dri dad ldang ba dang /man da ra ba dang /man+dA ra ba chen po dang /me tog mdog mdzes pa dang /mdog mdzes pa chen po
20b5(rgyud): dang /many+dzu sha kra dang /miny+dzu sha ka chen po dang /yid 'ong dang /pa ri sha ka dang /me tog tsam pa ka'i char dag bab po//bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu 'byar
20b6(rgyud): bar gyur te bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad skrag cing sngangs par gyur to//bgegs dang /log 'dren thams cad kyi lus rdul cing lus dri mi zhim par gyur nas phyogs
20b7(rgyud): bcur rab tu 'bros par brtsam so//sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang dag yin pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin
21a1(rgyud): dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams
21a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phu lo//de nas nor bu rab snang sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nor bu dang rin
21a3(rgyud): po che sna tshogs thogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su mchod pa byed//de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba bye baM khrag khrig brgya
21a4(rgyud): stong phrag du ma ras bcos bu'i gos brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do//rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong
21a5(rgyud): phrag du ma me tog sna tshogs dang bdug po dang /dri dang phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
21a6(rgyud): drugra thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed//tshangs pa la sogs te tshangasau ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtswa gsum
21a7(rgyud): gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson par byed//de bzhin du sred med kyi bu dang /dbang phyug chen po dang
21b1(rgyud): nor bu bzang po dang /gang po bzang po dang /stobs kyi lha la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed//lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba yang na mkha'i dkyil nas
21b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed//dpal lha mo chen mo dang /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang /lha mo tshon mo dung can ma dang /gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma
21b3(rgyud): yang 'khor brgya stong dang /lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma dang /rdo rje nag mo dang /me tog so dang /lha mo chen mo pho nya mo dag kyang rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams
21b4(rgyud): kyis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed//dri zo'i ris kyi lha'i bu du ma drug kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa brgya stong bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las
21b5(rgyud): kyi phyir brtson pas dkrol bar byed//klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus pa 'di lta ste/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nye dga' bo dang /chu lha
21b6(rgyud): dang /shin tu rab gnas dang /gtsug na nor bu dang /klu'i rgyal po rnam pa kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'od dag kyang rin po che nor bu skar 'od sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan
21b7(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa byed//'khor chen po yang 'dus par gyur to//'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po de yang blon po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor
22a1(rgyud): dang /btsun mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas shing /bu stong du gcig gis mtshung bsdu yongasu bskor te mdun gyis bltaso//
22a2(rgyud): swa de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur to//de nas 'khor chen po de nyid kyi dbus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la rtol nas rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab mu stong pa
22a3(rgyud): zhig byung ste/pad+ma de'i steng du 'dzam bu chu bo'i gasder las byas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/mu khyud dang bcas pa/lte ba dang bcus pa/lhag pa'i 'od 'phro
22a4(rgyud): ba nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba zhig byung ngo //de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas/'khor lo de'i lte ba'i nang nas sgra byung
22a5(rgyud): bshAkya thub pa gang 'di 'dra ba'i gzungs kyi gsang ba rnams gsung ba ni leg sngo ldeg so//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/byang chub
22a6(rgyud): chen po'i snying por gshegs pa'i rig sngags de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig sngags kyi snying po/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dgra pa'i tshul gyi
22a7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi snying po 'di/bcom ldan 'das yang gsungs shig/nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba zhes bya bar
22b1(rgyud): gzungs shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gsungs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul cing /'khor
22b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gsung ba'i dus ni 'di lagaso//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid smra
22b3(rgyud): pa'i rtsa ba/sdig pa thams cad sel ba/sdug bsngal thams cad kyi mtsho skems pa/'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las nges par 'byin pa legs/'di ni chu bo chen
22b4(rgyud): po las sgrol ba lags te/gzungs 'di ma mchis par sangs rgyas nyid sgrub par rngo mi thogs lag so//'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi sa bon lags/'di ni chos
22b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lags/'di ni chos kyi sgron ma spor ba lpags/'di ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba lags/'di ni chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa lugs/'di
22b6(rgyud): ni chos kyi rnga rdung ba lags/'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la mchis pa 'grus te/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig
22b7(rgyud): dang dkyil 'khor cho ga dang bcas pa/gsang ba dang bcas pa/phyag rgya'i le'u dang bcas pa/ras bcos bu zung dang bcas pa/yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho ga legs
23a1(rgyud): par rgyas par gsus sh+log/de na su l+yA dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nA mkha' lding dang /
23a2(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams ya mtshan du gyur/spro bar gyur nas/thams cad kyis bcom ldan
23a3(rgyud): 'das la phyag bya ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta zhing 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba yang dag pa 'di dang /gsol bye btab
23a4(rgyud): pa gsun nas rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal to//bskul ba'i le'u ste cho ga dang po'o////'phags pa nor bu
23a5(rgyud): chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gronas pa'i gsang ba dam pa'i tshi ga zhib mo'i rgyal po//bam po gnyis pa////de nas sdig
23a6(rgyud): pa kun ni sel byed pa'i//rig sngags lus kyi dri ma med byed pa//sangs rgyas byang chub bla nA mod pa yi//tshe ga zhib mo'i rgyal po dge sda bshad/de bzhin gshegasde pa
23a7(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//oM bi pu la gar+b+he/ma Ni pr-i b+he/ta thA ga ta ni rdo sha na/mai Ni ma Ni/su pra b+he/bi ma le swA ga ra gam+b+hI re/hUM hU~M dz+wA la dzA la/bud+d+ha bi 'o/
23b1(rgyud): kat+ta/shuH a d+h+yeSh+To t+yA gats+tsha swA hA/de nas bcoMm+b+ha ldan 'das kyis nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal mau 'dra shin tu rab tu gnus pa gsung ba dam pa'i gzungs 'di bka'/
23b2(rgyud): stsol pa na/sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo so//rin po che'i char chen po bab par gyur to//me tog gi char chen po bab po//'khor thams cad kyang 'dus te
23b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis ca co da /ga zha'i sgra phyung nas thams cad sa bcu la gnas par gyur to/thams cad dge ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to//de nas sangs rgyas bcom
23b4(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/shAkya thub po gang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i gzungs 'di lta bu gsungs pa legaso leg so///
23b5(rgyud): thos pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang /ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs par 'gyuraro//gzungs 'di dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lnga lha'i na bza' dang /bdug/
23b6(rgyud): pa dang /me tog dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang byug pas mchod par 'gyur ro//bklags pa ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par
23b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa bskal pa 'am/bskal
24a1(rgyud): pa brgya dum/bskal pA stong dam/bskul pa brgya stong du yang brjod par mi spyod de/de ltar gzungs phan yon che ba lagaso//
24a2(rgyud): bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyi bar chad bye bar mi nus tAM/bgegs kyis bya bIr ma yin/phyir rgol bas ma yin/mi mdze' bas mya yin/'byung pos
24a3(rgyud): ma yin/gdon gyis ma yin/gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/srin pos ma yin/mi dang mi ma yin pas bklags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro//de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
24a4(rgyud): mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/len bu rjig dron pa tsam gyis kyang de ltar yon tan gyi phan yon mang por 'gyur na/shin tu bya ba mang po byed pa lta smos kyang ci
24a5(rgyud): dgos/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagu na rdo rje dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/bcom ldan 'dis la
24a6(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas 'dri skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sems can de rnams srung bar bgyi'o//yongasu bskyang byar bgyi'o//skyo bar
24a7(rgyud): bgyi'o//rtog tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /skye bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can brgyang
24b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag nas/rgyal po chen po bzhi po de rnams la dbugs phyung ste/ngas gzungs 'di batra//sems
24b2(rgyud): con de yang btad do//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di dang /sems n+dan yongasu brkyang ba'i slad du yongasu gzung lag so//de nas
24b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi snying po bka' stsal pa/oM me Ni badz+re hUM/'di ni snying po'o//oM ma Ni d+ha ri hUM phaT tsA ba'i snying po'o//rtse ba'i rig sngags kyi cho ga ni/
24b4(rgyud): tshes grangs ma yin rgyu skar min//sbyang ba yang ni bya mi dgos//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam//mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i//drung du bzlas
24b5(rgyud): brjod dba' zhig khri byas nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la shin tu khrus byas te/gos gtsang ma bgos nas mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa'i drung du ci 'byor pas
24b6(rgyud): mchod pa byas te/mar me bzhi dbul bar bya/dri dang me tog la sogs pa yang dbul bar bya'o//zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o//mchod rten la bskor ba brgya
24b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad byo'o//rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nyid kyi drung du nyal na/nam langs kyi dus tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa
25a1(rgyud): lagan nam ma thod par 'gyur//bsam pa thams spyad sto su rdzog sa pU b+h+ya//glang 'dod gyur//zla
25a2(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa zhig yin na me ngas dus gsum du bsgrubs na klad ni m+b+hi za ba de mdzod byur 'ahU~M /sam nyid nge me 'i nyis skyed pa pa ts+tsharmA/
25a3(rgyud): na snang langs hUM bas brjod pa rgya brgyad byis na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//de'i la sbrul drug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/sbyar ba de pas blo min
25a4(rgyud): chu yis ma yin/me yis mA yin+d+ra/tsho makun gyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur te/wasbrul nad kyis rmugs par mi 'gyur/dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur/
25a5(rgyud): de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ste/mig nad mU yon/ldan ma yin khyen ma sbyirna pa'i nad ma yin/so nad ma yin/klung nAd ma yin/yan lag dang nying lag gi nad
25a6(rgyud): ma smin/rim snga ma yin te/zhag gcig pa 'ume/zhag gnyis pa 'am/zhag gsum pa 'am+b+ha/zhag bzhi pas lus la tshugs par mi 'gyur///
25a7(rgyud): kyi 'jigs pa ma yin zhing /gzhan zan khro ba'i 'jigs pas ma yin/lus la byad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur//gzungs 'di na yan tan de lta bu dang ldan pa yin
25b1(rgyud): te/'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa yin/yon tan thams cad grub par byed pa yin/pha
25b2(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid grub par byed pa yin te/gzungs 'dri ni bklags pas grub pa ste las thams
25b3(rgyud): cad byed//ri khar 'dzegs te bzlas brjod byas na mig gis gang du bltas pa der sems can rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal pa
25b4(rgyud): thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro//lha khang du zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na lha thams cad des ci bosgo ba
25b5(rgyud): bzhin byed par 'gyuraro//klu'i gan su zhugs te bzlas brjod byas na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro//nyi mya la kha bltas te bzlas brjod byas na nyi ma mngon su du babs nas
25b6(rgyud): mdun ni 'dug cing mchog ci smras pade sbyin par byed//lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na mchog thams cad ster cing mthong bar yang 'gyuraro//shu dag la
25b7(rgyud): sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de zos nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyuraro//ci smras pa de sbyin par byed//
26a1(rgyud): na le sham gyi 'bru la lan bdun bzlas te khar bcug na ci smras pa ster bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro//yungs kar la yan stong rtsa brgyad
26a2(rgyud): bzlas te na mkha' la gtor na rlung dang ser ba thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro//lan tsha la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bram ze rnams la byin na/gang dang gang gi ldan tshwa
26a3(rgyud): zos pa de dang de kho na dbang du 'gyur//rgyal rigs dbang du bya na/yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg bya'o//gu gul la sngags stong rtswa brgyad bzlas te/gang dang gang gri gdon
26a4(rgyud): la bdugs na de dang de nyid la 'bar bar 'gyur ro//bdugs nA gdon thams cad las thor bar 'gyuraro//tshwa rA mI 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gzugs byas te gnas gru bzhi byas/
26a5(rgyud): la/ba ser mo'i lci bas klu mgo gsum pa byas la/snying khar gser gyis glan par bya'o//lus ni li khris byug par bya'o//gnas kyi gzhi ni sngon pos bsku bar
26a6(rgyud): bya'o//gnas gru bzhi ni shing pa lnga shA ltar kha dog sngon par bya'o//bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o//pog por bzhi bzhag par bya'o//bume pa bzhi bzhag
26a7(rgyud): par bya ste/gcig ni 'o ma/gcig ni zho/gcig ni 'o thug/gcig ni zhun mar bu ram cano//ba'i lci bas gling bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o//grwa bzhi ru
26b1(rgyud): n+yamra prad+d+ho bri bar bya'o//mda' bzhi btsugs la tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya'o//tshon sna lnga'i bu dan gdags par bya'o//bdug pa bzhi po gu bul dang /
26b2(rgyud): dpyog dang /tsan dAn dang /du ru ka bsreg par bya'o//sa bin+da bdun gtor bar bya'o//kha dog lde'i gtor ma bzhag par bya'o//'bras bu dang /mye tog bzhag par
26b3(rgyud): bya'o//rig pa 'dzin pa kha shor phyogasu bltas te 'dug nas rig sngags stong rtsi brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas spyi bor brdeg par bya'o//stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar
26b4(rgyud): bzlas na/de rnas klu rnams char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed//klu thams cadra de'i dbang du 'gyuraro//yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te klu'i mtshe'u ru gtor na/char
26b5(rgyud): gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do//seng sdang gi phur pa la bzlas brjod byas te klu'i gan su btsugs na rlung dang ser ba thams cad btsongs par 'gyuraro//yungs kar la
26b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te log 'dren gyi klad par btab na log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro//'o mas bkrus na phyis sos par 'gyuraro//las gang
26b7(rgyud): dang gang kho na bya ba'i las de dang de dag 'grub par 'gyuraro//gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/'di ni rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyi cho ga'i tshul yino//gnyis
27a1(rgyud): bya'o//da ni snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/bzlas brjod 'bum byas na de bzhin gshe kha bad mthong bar 'gyuraro//nyis 'bum byas na sangs
27a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//sum 'bum byas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro//gsang sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro//bzhi
27a3(rgyud): 'bum byas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro//lnga 'bum byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur//klu'i gnas thams cad 'byed par
27a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro//drug 'bum byasta nA gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro//bzlas brjod bdun 'bum byas na tshe rabs thams cad dran par 'gyuraro//bzlas brjod brgyad 'bum byas
27a5(rgyud): na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro//bzlas brjod dgu 'bum byas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa thams cad
27a6(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro//bzlas brjod sa ya byas na de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par
27a7(rgyud): 'gyur te/de la sogs pa gong nas gong du yon tan khyad par thob par 'gyur ro//mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/'phags pa la bskur pa btab pa 'am/dam
27b1(rgyud): pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/mnar med par gzhol ba yang rung /de dag thams cad kyis bzlas brjod 'bum byas na/lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur
27b2(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/skye ba dran par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro//myig rnam par dag pa dang /rno ba rnam par dag pa
27b3(rgyud): dang sna rnam par dag pa dang /lce rnam par dag pa dang /dbang po yongasasu dag pa thob par 'gyur te/de ltar gong nas gong du yon tan gyi khyad par dang /gong
27b4(rgyud): nas gong du lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi dngos grub tu bya ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro//de kho na grub pa bla na med pa ldong ros la
27b5(rgyud): bsgrub pa bshad//shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgrosla pa/zos dkar gsum bza' bas ldong ros blangs te zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag nas/sangs rgyas
27b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshes bcu gsum nus tshes bco lnga'i bar du bzlas brjod 'bum byas nA/de nas rnam pa gsum 'grub par rig par bya ste/gal te nag
27b7(rgyud): por gyur na dpral ba lo thig le bya'o//des ni mi snang ba 'grub par 'gyur te/lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/gnas thams cad du 'jug par
28a1(rgyud): 'gyur/gang 'dod pa byed par 'gyur ro//gal te dud pa byung na des mig bsku bar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad
28a2(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/lag na rdo rje'i gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/nor dang 'bru thams cad rnyed par 'gyur te gang du 'dod pa dar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//gal te 'bar
28a3(rgyud): bar gyur na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/'bar ba'i sgron mA zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/lha'i gnasu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad
28a4(rgyud): kyi dpon por 'gyur/gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te bzlas brjod 'bum byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor 'gyur/gang 'dod pa
28a5(rgyud): de byed par 'gyur/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyuraro//mtshor zhugs te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya sa na klu thams cad mthong
28a6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//yungs kar blangs nas stegs stong rtse brgyad bzlas nas na mkha' la gtor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur/klu thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro//
28a7(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyuraro//bum pa chus bkang ste ha ba shang tshe'u dang /shing pa la sha dang /yungs kar dang /gur bum dang
28b1(rgyud): tsan dan rnams lhan cig bum pa der thugs la bzlas brjod khri byas pas nad chen po thebs pa bkrus na nad thams cad med par 'gyur/nadu thams cad dang bral bar
28b2(rgyud): 'gyur/de'i sdig pa thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur/byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//mdze'i nang thams cad kyis
28b3(rgyud): thebs pa bkrus na/mdze nad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro//sha bkra'i nad kyis thebs pa yang bkrus na sha bkra'i nad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ro//bud med bu
28b4(rgyud): 'dod pa rnams des khrus byas na/bu rnyed par 'gyuraro//dngos grub med pa khrus byas na dngos grub chen po thob par byed//de la sogs pa gong nas gong du 'jig rten
28b5(rgyud): gyi dngos grub tu bya ba rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro//gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro//nye ba'i snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/bzlas brjod 'bum byas na//
28b6(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rkang pa la gtugs nas/kye rig pa 'dzin pa bdag cag skyobs shig/bdag cag gi srog chud ma gas na cig dong /bka' ci
28b7(rgyud): sprul pa de dgyi'o zhes brjod par 'gyuraro//bzlas brjod nyi khri chig stong byas na lha thams cad dang /klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur/rig sngags thams cad kyi
29a1(rgyud): 'dug por 'gyur/cibasgo ba de byed par 'gyur/bzlas brjod mkha~M \u0f7fsa na 'byung po dang /gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dbang du
29a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//bzlas brjod lnga khri byas na gang dgug pa de khrugs par 'gyur te/lha 'am/klu'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za mo/na mkha' lding ngam/mi 'am
29a3(rgyud): ci dang rnga lha ma yin dang /rig 'dzin nam/bud med dam/bram ze 'am/rgyal rigs sam/sa bdag gam/blon po 'am/btsun mo 'am/khrom gyi ru
29a4(rgyud): pa 'am/mdun na 'don nam/gzhun yung sems can sna tshogs khugs par 'gyur ro//gu gul dang /nyungs kar gyi sbyin sreg drug khri byas na dri ma med pa'i
29a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur//bdun khris ni rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//brgyad khris ni lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa mdun na sdod par
29a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dgu khris ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'gyuraro//'bum tshang bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur te/
29a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu khyod gsang sngags thams cad dang bstan bcos thams cad 'grub kyis gang 'dod pa der song shig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
29b1(rgyud): rlungs pas phyir mi ldog cing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nisgyu gnang gis/
29b2(rgyud): 'jig rten pa 'om 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dges pa gzhan dag kyang ci 'dod pa bzhin khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig ces ston par 'gyuraro//oM m+b+ha d+h+wi kAr+N+Na la
29b3(rgyud): hUMhU~M phaT swAhA/gdan gyi sngag so//oM ma NAM bi dzi ye d+hAn+nad+d+hi phaT swAhA/dkyil 'khor gyi sngags te/yungs ka rA la ldan bdun bzlas paso//oM dz+wa la ta ma
29b4(rgyud): ru tsi ri gr-i NI hUM hUM phaT/yungs kar dang dri chub skyes pa laM l-i nI brgya hU~M brgyad bzlas te/phyogs banir bcing ngo //oM ma ti pra b+hA ba ti hrI na h+ya na hU~M phaT swA hA/thal
29b5(rgyud): bA dang chu la len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas log 'dren bcing ngo //oM badz+ra mu Ni tISh+Thi tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/lan bdun bzlas te gtsug tor bcing ngo //oM ma NaM bi pu le
29b6(rgyud): di r-i di ri hU~M phaT/gos kyi sdig so//oM bi du ma ti hA re ha rA ma Ni hUM hUM phaT+Ta/nye reg gi sngags so//oM su ni rme lA pA tI hA rA hr-i ra pA paM mI li mi li hUM hUM phaT+Ta swA hA/
29b7(rgyud): yungs ka ri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrus bya'o//oM ma Ni d+hi ri hU~M hU~M phaT/gseng gtor gyi sngags//oM di ri di ri bi ma le ka ri hUM hUM phaT/mchod phyir
30a1(rgyud): thogs kyi sngagaso//oM sAr+b+ba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa ma r+N+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/mye tog+ma gi sngagaso//oM swar+b+bA tA thA ga ta gau d+ha ma NI s+pha ra NA hUM hU~M phyaT/dri'i
30a2(rgyud): sngagaso//oM dz+wa li ta ma Ni a pra ba ra kU Ta gA ra swa ra Na bi go twe hUM/bdug pa'i s+t+r-igr-I so//oM dz+wa li ta shi kha ri ta pa li hUM hUM phaT/mar me'i sngagaso//au pra bar
30a3(rgyud): grI ba li sa ra sa ra hUM hU/gtor ma'i sngags//oM ma hA ma Ni pU ra ya d+ha ra d+hA ra hUM hUM phaT/mchod yon gyi sngagaso//oM ma hA bi ma le hUM hUM ba ra ba ra hUM/lha
30a4(rgyud): bshos kyi sdug so//oM dz+wA la s+thir dag gan pra tA raNi/sbyin sreg gi sdigs//oM ru tsi ra ma tI pre bar+t+ta yahUM/bzang phreng gi sdig so//sngags
30a5(rgyud): lan bdun bgrang phreng la btab ste bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i grasang sngags de dag thams cad bzlas par 'gyur zhing
30a6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma yeng bzlas par yang 'gyu ro//oM badz+ra ma Ni kA ra kau ka ri hUM hUM phaT/skyil mo krung gi sngagaso//oM su pra bar+t+ti ta be ge ma Ni mya
30a7(rgyud): Ni swA hA/bzlas brjod kyi sdigaso//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta thA yu dza be ta ra ta ra hUM ma ni ka na nai swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul ba'i sngag so//oM
30b1(rgyud): su bi bu la ba raM du ru du ru hwA hU/spyan drang ba'i sngags//oM sar+b+ba tAthA ga tA a b+hin+da na tsi t+ya sa ra rAk+Sha na \u0f7fdz+had+hA/gsol ba gdab pa'i sngag so//oM su bri bu la pra da na
30b2(rgyud): ha ra ha ra hUM/byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la gsol ba gdab pa'i steg so//oM e b+hi sa ma ye badz+ra d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM hUM/lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad bod pa'i
30b3(rgyud): sngagaso//oM mA Ni be ga ba ti hUM/rgyal po chen po bzhi bod pa'i sngagaso//oM shu pa ma ni hu lu hu lu hUM/slob ma'i sngagaso//oM sarba ta thA pra ta hri da yA badz+ri Ni d+ha ra d+ha ra
30b4(rgyud): hUM hUM/'jug pa'i sngagaso//oM bI rA bI ra dze ga ga na be hi ni la hu lu hu lu hUM hrI/thams cad mkhyen par bya ba'i sdigaso//oM ma NI sum+b+he ni be ga ba ti/bdag dang
30b5(rgyud): che ge mo la bsrungs shig hUM/srung ba'i sngagaso//oM sar+b+ba tA thA gra ta ku l-i ti ti sma rA Ni ba ga te/dzA la dzA la hUM swA hA/slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngagaso//
30b6(rgyud): thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//snying po 'di rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag thams cad yin te dpag tu medo//thams cad du yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
30b7(rgyud): byas te/de na so dgos pa brtsam par bya'o//'di bton pas ni thams cad 'grub//'dis ni dbro ba'i sdid kun sel//sdig pa de ni zad byed cing //sdug bsngal
31a1(rgyud): kun las rnam par sgrol//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' da//lung ston 'gyur te b+h+ya tshom+b+ha med//glang gis snga mAr sdig par
31a2(rgyud): las/dmang po byas pa 'jig par 'gyur//reg pa bla myed su 'dzin pa//de dag myur du sangs rgyas 'grub//chos kyi 'khor lo zla med pa'o//byang chub
31a3(rgyud): rtogs par sla ba dang //ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyed kyi//bsod nams dpag tu med 'thob po//rig sngags rgyas par bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/chog gony+tsis
31a4(rgyud): pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o//sngon du sa yongasu brtags nus phyi nas las brtsam par bya'o//dri'i snod gtsang mar
31a5(rgyud): blugs pa'i tshon+da sna lta'i phye mas dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi pa b+hi'o// nad dkyil 'khor gyi dbus tsan dran gyis byugs t+ye gur gum gyis mchod par bya'i//dbus kyi
31a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ched ni khru gnyis pa'o//phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni grwa bzhi pa ra'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'o//dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi
31a7(rgyud): gnal med khang dang /sangs rgyas kyi pad+ma'i gdan bkra zhing tshon sde bdun dang ldan par bya'o//pad+ma'i snying po'i steng du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa mu khyud
31b1(rgyud): rludang bu dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba tsun te/yu ba ni bon+d+han+ya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi stong po lakun nas 'khyor dang ldan par b+h+yar+m+ma/shAr+ya la sogs pa'i sgra
31b2(rgyud): ni khru'i ched tsam gyi gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /chen sna lnga'i rgyangag gi gos zung gis brgyan par bya'o//g.yon du leg ni rdo rje bsdigs pa'i gzugs can rnga yed
31b3(rgyud): dang mtshon cha thogs shing bzhugs pa'o//g.yA su byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa g.yas pa na nor bu dang /rnga yab thogs nas
31b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa'o//zur bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bro bar bya ste/go cha dang chem chem bgros shing lag na mtshon cha thogs pa/rgyan thams cad dang /ral pa'i cod
31b5(rgyud): pan dang ldan pa drag po'i gzugs can bri bar bya'o//mtshoms bzhir spros chus gang ba'i gser gyi snod bzhi bzhag par bya'o//gal te gser gyi snod med na rdza'i bum
31b6(rgyud): pa ched mi chung ba la gser ga yogs nas bya'o//de lta bu'i spyod mi 'jug par 'o mas gang bar byas nas phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi g.yos
31b7(rgyud): log su sgyu mo dpal chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//g.yon du lha mo chen mo dung can ma bzhugs pa bri'o//sgo'i dbusu lha mo chen mo rdo rje po nyam
32a1(rgyud): phyag brgyad pa lag na man chu gas pa/rgyun pam /rgyun rkyo bzhugs pa zlo// sa gas danang/
32a2(rgyud): dur sngon po 'phyang ba dang /bcud sna tshogs dang /tshul sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o//bum pa ga ba bzhi dang /myur mi sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /'bras bu dang ma
32a3(rgyud): tog sde tshobras rnams bzhug par bya'o//sangs rgyas bcomi ldan 'das kyi ni gser byas grub pa'i bum pa bzhag go/so sor du ru ka bsregs par bya'o//dkyil
32a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi snying pir dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi bum po bzhag go/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdug sposo//nor bu 'dzin pa'i du ru ka dang /tsan dan dang /mA hA rA dzAM dang /kun
32a5(rgyud): du ru dang /kA kA bi dze dang /spos dkarI gyi bdug pa'o//dpral lha mo'i tsin+da dan no//dung tsan+da ma'i gu gu'o//pho nya mo'i sha la'i bdug spos te so sor
32a6(rgyud): dwasreg par bya'o//gat+tor ma yang sbyin no//dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i bya ba'o//phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni sgo ba'i rnam par 'byes shing rgyu mdzes pa bkra shis
32a7(rgyud): bzhi gnas pa bya'o//shar gyi sgor khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa'o//lhor dbang phyug chen po'o//nub tu me tog so zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin mo'o//byang du
32b1(rgyud): 'jigs byed mA zhes bya ba'i lha mo ngo tsha dang bcas pa bya ste/nu chung bdun dang byacas bya'o//de nas phur bu sum cu so gnyis gdab pA byas+ya la kha dog lnga'i skud pas
32b2(rgyud): pur bu btsong ngo //zur bzhi mnyam par kha dog lha'i ba dan gyis rgyano//me tog sna tshogs dgem pa dang /glotor ma dang /me tog sna tshogs rnams me 'khrugs pa
32b3(rgyud): mnyam par bya'o//bcud sna tshogs 'phrog pa'i snod bdun bzhag/rdza'i snod sum+b+ha cu rtsa gnyis dang /phye ma'i snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis
32b4(rgyud): dang /mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag par bya'o//phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang /dri yis gang ba sna tshogs bzhog pari bya'o//bdug pa dang kun du ru sna tshogs sreg+ho/dri nus
32b5(rgyud): sgo nas 'jug pa lA dri yis grang ba'i bum pa gnyis bzhag la/ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma byin ni sa ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug pa'i cho ga la spyod la/de nas oM maN+Di bi
32b6(rgyud): pu laM pra tiSh+Thi te sid+d+he A b+hi Shiny+tsa ya maM sar+b+ba ta thA taka ta a b+hi She kaid+ha ra d+ha ra saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
32b7(rgyud): cad kyis dbugs 'byin pa dang /thams cad 'grub pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa yang mngon du 'gyur//gang bsams pa'i don de de bzhin du 'gyuraro//de bzhin
33a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rje su 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyus zab mo la bzod pa 'thob cing rje su rtogs
33a2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyuraro//de lta bu lnga sogs pa yun tan gyi khyad par rnams 'thob ste/ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
33a3(rgyud): chub kyi lam ma rdzogs kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u ste/cho ga gsum pa'o///de nas phyag rgya'i
33a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o//snying po chen po bzhi'i phyag rgya la sbyar ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi lA sbyar ba dang /ljags na rdo rje'i snying po bzhi'i phyags
33a5(rgyud): rgya btus pa rnams dang /dkyil 'khor gyi gdan gyi phyag rgya dang /phyag rgya gzhan yang brtsam par bya'o//'dir de bzhino gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya la sbyar ba'i
33a6(rgyud): tshi ga dang /phyi rol gyi phyag rgya bzung bar bya'o//thams cad du phyag rgya gzhan rnams ji ltar bde bar brjod de//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sbyar ba ni//
33a7(rgyud): oM sar+b+be ta thA go ta hri da ya ma Ni dz+wa la ni oM be sha ya hUM/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya'o//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pra ba ra grA ma ni hUM/de bzhin gshai
33b1(rgyud): myASh+Tod mchog gi byAsh+ma n+ya'o//oM sarbat+ta thA gra t+yA ya bo si d+ha d+hA na dadz+dza hUt+su/d+ha bzhin gshegs pa'i dbug+masa? du byung ba'i byug rgyu'o//oM s+yArba ta thA ga d+hA ar+d+haSh+Ta n+yA p+paN+Datra
33b2(rgyud): Ni hu~M hUM phaT/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i//oM sarba ta thA ga tA pra ba ra mi Ni tsA r-i hU~M hUM phaT/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i byi
33b3(rgyud): rgyu'o//oM sarba tathA ga ta bi pu la saM b+hA ba~M hUM hUM phaT/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o//oM sarba taM thA ga ta sa ma ya ma Ni badz+ra hUM hUM/chos kyi 'kho
33b4(rgyud): lo'i phyag rgya'o//oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta dzA ya oM pa rA dzi tA badz+ra hUM hUM/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+har+m+ma d+hA tu ma hA ma Ni shaM khaM re ha ra ha ra hUM hUM
33b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya'o//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti ma hA badz+rI hA ya d+hA ro d+ha ra hUM phaT/'phags pa lAg naM rdo rjes bzung ba'i phyag rgya'o//oM du ru
33b6(rgyud): du ru maN+Di ma NI ha bi tu ta ma Ni swA hA/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste 'phags pa nor bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//oM l+yo kA pA li t+te dza ya dza ya hUM hUM/rgyal po chen po
33b7(rgyud): bzhi rnams kyi phyag rgya bzung bar bya'o//oM bi bu la bri pa ti saM b+ha ra hU~M/dpal lha me'i phyag rgya bzung bar bya'o//oM daMSh+Ti ni saM hUM/dung can mo'i sdig pa'i phyag rgya'o//
34a1(rgyud): na rna pa ltar mamakhyen chu seM sa/ sa ba ng+ge ts+tshi mau sa/ sa thams da kyiste/sbyin pa pad+d+hi
34a2(rgyud): cing ba nas pa/ ts+tshi sa su /dri ma la hrIn+de ts+tshim+me p+na/sten kA'i 'dim bu ma'i rgyu
34a3(rgyud): 'di nga khrog skye bste/ram pa'i de tshugs kyis bzhag gi/rgyun thams gyis brgyan de/dz+dza smai na skyil mthung
34b1(rgyud): 'dug par bya'o//glayon phyogasu yang byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rdo rje zhes bya ba gdong bzhi pa ldag pa bcu drug pa byA ste/lag pa g.yas na yod bzhin rtswa nor du
34b2(rgyud): thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul ba/lag pa g.yon na pad+ma thogaso bya/lhag pa gcig gis dbugs 'byin pa/lag pa gnyis ni thal mo sbyar bar bya'o//
34b3(rgyud): lag pa gzhan ni tshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya ste/rtse gsum pa dang /'khor lo dang /rdo rje dang /ral gri dang /me tog gi phur mA dang /bgrang phreng dang /ril
34b4(rgyud): pa spyi blugs dang /ral gri dang /glegs bamo dang /mchod rten dang /ri rab po/gdong dang po ni zhi ba'o//gI dang byayas pa nI nag po chen po dang 'dra ba'o//gdong
34b5(rgyud): g.yon pa ni mi'i seng ge'i dbyibs shing pA la sha'i kha dog lta bu'o//gdong gong ma ni bzhin sgyur ba pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug par bya'o//de'i 'og tu dung
34b6(rgyud): can ma bri ste/lag pa brgyad pa dbus myo btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i lus la mngon par brtson par bya'o//lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu dpal lha myo tshun
34b7(rgyud): mo dbus mi btsugs nas nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul bar bya'o//dpal lha mo chen mo'i rgyab tu/pho nyam
35a1(rgyud): na 'dzum pa/lag pa bzhi pa/rgyun sna tshogs kyi sna brgyan pa/mtshanan sna tshogs 'dzin par bya'o//drung can ma'i rgyub tu ts+tshad+han
35a2(rgyud): gos dkar po gyon pa me tog thogs nus bcom ldan 'das la gyon du blta bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngararo rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog can bya
35a3(rgyud): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/snying po ni gser las byas pa bya'o//de'i steng du 'dzum bu chu bo'i gser gyi 'khor lo shin tu rnam par phye ba lte ba dang bcas
35a4(rgyud): pa kun nas 'bar du/shin tu rnam pa bkra ba bri bar bya'o//pad+ma de'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi yu lIng dang /go cha dang /tsham che mi bgos bya/rgyun thams
35a5(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o//pad+ma de'i drung du rdzing bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa bya'o//rdzing bu de'i 'gram du rig pa 'dzin pa lag pa na pog phor dang /me tog
35a6(rgyud): gi mgo ljogs thogs la/lag pa gcig shos na nga grang phreng thogs te dbus mo btsugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa gyen du lta bar bya'o//khang pa brtsegs mo'i
35a7(rgyud): gan du/tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa na mkha'i dkyil na bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byed pa bya'o//de la
35b1(rgyud): sogs pa sku gzugs kyi cho ga rnams bya'o//de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dos dkar pr-i bgos te/zas dkar gsum za bas chos brgyad nas tsho sna btso lnga nya'i bar du sku
35b2(rgyud): gzugs kyi mdun du bzlas brjod 'bum tshang bar bya'o//de nas sku gzugs 'gul zhing bdag nyid 'byar bar mthong bar 'gyur/sgrib pa med pa'i mig thob par 'gyur/no
35b3(rgyud): bu rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob por 'gyur/rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar
35b4(rgyud): 'gyur/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar par 'gyur/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug la sogs
35b5(rgyud): pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ser sna'i dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/bsod nams thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/
35b6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
35b7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/lha thams cad kyis yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur/gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /
36a1(rgyud): b+hU ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang myi ma yin pa thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur//
36a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du mchod pa'i ngosu 'gyur/'jig rten thams cad la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/yon tan dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu
36a3(rgyud): gzung bar 'gyur/de la sogs pa yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/mthong ba tsam 'am/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam mam/bklags pa tsam gyis
36a4(rgyud): yon tan dang phan yon 'di dag yongasu gzung bar 'gyur na/cho ga lhag par mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/gang zhig klog par byed pa dang /'don par
36a5(rgyud): byed pa dang /bzlas brjod la mngon par brtson par byed pa dang /sgrub par byed pa dang /phyag rgya'i tshogs sgrub par byed pa dang /rig sngags sgrub par byed
36a6(rgyud): po dang /rwas zung sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de ni de bzhin gshegasra pa kho nor brjod par bya ste/mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
36a7(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya ba'i 'o su 'gyur/sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par blta bar bya/shes par bya/de bzhin gshegs
36b1(rgyud): pA thams cad kyi lung bstan pa gnang bas/sems can de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu blas la bar lung bstan pa yin
36b2(rgyud): phyin chad ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur/'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar shes par bya'o//phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa
36b3(rgyud): rnams drung 'bral bar mi 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/gang dang gang du skyes pa de thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang pad par
36b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing /byang chub kyi snying po'i bor du mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur//sku gzugs rgyas pa chen po'i le'u ste chog lnga pa'o///don kun sgrub par
36b5(rgyud): byed pa yi//sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya//sems can kun gyi bde thob pa//zhi bya yi no las brtsa mo//rig pa 'dzin pas gsang bya ste//nges par tshangs par spyod pa
36b6(rgyud): yin//sems can thams cad yid dga' ba'i//de nas sbyin sreg dag bya'o//oM sra ha pa ti b+hU b+hu ba hU~M hUM phaT swA hA//sngags 'di til dang yungs kar dang myur la sbyin
