36b7(rgyud): sreg byas na reg sngags 'chang thams cad grub par 'gyur//bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad tshor bcid par 'gyur//sdig pa thams cad dang /gnod pa thams
37a1(rgyud): cad dang /phyir rgol ba dang /mi mdzu ba thams cad rmugs par byas par 'gyur/rengs par byas par 'gyur//rmongs par byas par/
37a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//rmi lam ngan pa dang lhas dran po thams cad med par 'gyur//gu gul dang nyungs kar ma ro la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gdon thams cad kyi klad po 'gas
37a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//'byung po thams cad kyi gnod pa byas pa las yong su thar bar 'gyur/rims nad la sogs pa thams cad zhi bor 'gyur/nad thams cad dang bral
37a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//mar dang yungs kAr las sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro//sa bon bdug pa dang /mar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na bdud
37a5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i bdug pas 'jigs skrag pa dang /pha rol gyi dam phra tshogs la sogs pa 'jig par 'gyur ro//sgron shing dang mar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad
37a6(rgyud): byas na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyuraro//ci 'dod pa de byed do//gang dang gang blangs pa de dang dri 'thob po//ri ka ra sra rtsi brog dang /yungs
37a7(rgyud): kar dang /mar las sbyin sreg byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur/rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyuraro//yungs dkar dang /til mar dang /
37b1(rgyud): nA ga ge sbyar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na glu thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro//ci bsgo ba byed//du su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed//phyin chad ser ba'i 'jigs pa
37b2(rgyud): mi 'byung //kha zaso la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/'bru stong du 'phel zhing mang por 'gyuraro//lan che la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byos na gnod sbyin mo thams cad lhags
37b3(rgyud): nas rje btsan srog dang mi dbral cig dang /bka' ci stsal pa de bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la gtug par 'gyuraro//'bras dang mar las sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad byas na dpal chen po thob
37b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//nyi ma la khe bltas te na le sham la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na de la lha thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chod par srung ba dang /skyob pa dang sbed pa byed par
37b5(rgyud): 'gyur/dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur/dpol lha mo mdun du til dang yungs kar las sbyin sreg byas na/nor mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro//shing arga'i yi sreg
37b6(rgyud): shring drang mar las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul bar 'gyur ro//sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/
37b7(rgyud): 'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad mngon du 'gyur/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/dgra thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/
38a1(rgyud): 'jug rten drug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar myo 'gyur/rog sbubs 'das mthus bde pa thams cad 'asgrub par 'gyur/rmo lam dunapa
38a2(rgyud): dang sgras ngan pa thams cad med pa gyur/byed rnams cad dang /bcings pa thams cad /gnod pa thams cad nam yang mi'i byung bar 'gyuraro//de la sogs
38a3(rgyud): na srag gi las rnams kyis mchog tu zhi bar byed//bde ba dang rab N+Da sbyin par byed/nor thob par byed/don 'grub par byed cing lta ba ngan par ltung bya'i sems can
38a4(rgyud): sa cad nyams par bye// sgye zlab+hU bAn+d+hasna pa'i Sh+mab+hU tshig drug 'o/de nas btsom+bu sbyin 'dus kyis gsang paba'i 'dage bo la na rdo rjel
38a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/lan na rdo rje 'di ni tshig zhib mo'i rgyal po yin/'di ni yon tan khyad par chen pon+dan yin/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
38a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum yin/'dri ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
38a7(rgyud): cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa yin/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa yin/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
38b1(rgyud): mas cad chos du rab rtu d+hA ba san+ta/'dun du na du gas pa thams pa 'i dad na yin/'don dang na ga shugs pa thams cad kyi bdud rnam pa
38b2(rgyud): cad pham par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin/hrI na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyud kyi gsang 'dam bu yin/'di ni de bzhin/shegs pa bams
38b3(rgyud): gsung chen smin/yam+ba nA rdo rje 'don lda ma thu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba yin/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa
38b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa yin/'di ni 'dzum pa'i b+h+ring gi sems rten thams cad kyi dmyal ba thams cad skems pa yin/yi dgas kyi 'jig rten bzlog pa yin/rlud 'bru'i
38b5(rgyud): gnas las thar bar byed pa yin//'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can+da gyi skye bla dang /rba ba da/na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang skye sngags 'don pa dang
38b6(rgyud): sdu bsngal ba dang /yod mi badre ba dang /'khrug pa rnams sems par byed pa yin//la ded rdo rje rkyen kyang bsod nams kyi phung po 'byung bya lta'i mig gyis blta ba 'am/
38b7(rgyud): bzhin gyi shegs pa'i thugs kyis kyang badz+ra kyis mo long s+t+wa~M/yon tan gyi khyad pa de ltar rgya che zhing de sbyang bab pa~M/rang mtsha kyi rnam pa la sogs pa de ltar gong nas
39a1(rgyud): gang du rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i khyad par 'phags pa yi no//nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i
39a2(rgyud): gzungs kyi cho go zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di ni sems can skal ba chung ngu ba rnams kyi lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/thos par mi 'gyur/bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur//
39a3(rgyud): 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro//gang gis gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba de'i lhag tu mchog tu gsang ba 'di 'ong ba 'am/nyan pa
39a4(rgyud): 'am nga bsnyen bkur byed pa 'am/'dzin pa lta ga lo 'gyur/lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gting dpag dka' ste/lag na rdo rje gang gis
39a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang ga'i klung bi bye ma khrag khrig brgyad stong gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams la/bskal pa brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad na bza' dang /bsod
39a6(rgyud): snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang /bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /zhal zas dang /btung ba dang /bcibs pa dang /pho brang
39a7(rgyud): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyi mo re la 'bul zhing /de bzhin du me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
39b1(rgyud): dang ra ba dan gyis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /gang byis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis
39b2(rgyud): byung bur bkang ste/nyi ma re re sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/lag na rdo rje gang gis de bzhin gshegasi pa'i gsang
39b3(rgyud): ba 'di lan pacig bzlas brjod byas na bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo //grang
39b4(rgyud): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di lan gcig dran par gyur na ni de gong du bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par yongasu bsgrags pas/de bzhin
39b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur/mkho ba'i yo byad khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la de ltar nyin
39b6(rgyud): gcig bzhin mchod par 'gyuraro//de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /
39b7(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis/a la la zhes ca tsa dang /ga zha'i sgra char bton nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la gtugs te
40a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lha 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma'o sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mtshungs par mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying /
40a2(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag lagaso//de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la legaso zhes bya ba byi nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
40a3(rgyud): rnamasu gshegs//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gshes so//
40a4(rgyud): 'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ste bdun pa'o////rdzog so//
40a5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /lots+tsha ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur ba/rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs
40a6(rgyud): kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/bo d+hi gaur+b+hA lad+hA ra lak+Sha d+hA ra Ni/bod skad du/byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/sangs
40a7(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti/bi pu la ba de kany+tsa nod k+Shim+b+ha/pr-i b+hA sa kaM tu mud+b+ha ye/ta b+ho ga tA ya/ar+ha ti sa myak+saM bud+d+ha
40b1(rgyud): ya/na mo b+ha ga ba te shUk+Sha mu na ya/ta thA ga ta ya/ar+d+ha ta/sam+bar+thaM bud+d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/prar+N+Na pra r+d+ha/bo d+h+ya ni bo d+ha nAM/sarba ta thA ga ta gau tsa re/d+hA ru d+ha rA/ha ra ha ra/
40b2(rgyud): pra hA ra pra ha rAM/ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+ha re/tsu l+r-i tsu lu/sha tau rasmai sats+tsha r-i ta/sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi ShI ka te/gu No gu Na ba te/sarba bud+d+ha gu NA ba b+hA se/mi li mi li/ga ga na
40b3(rgyud): tA le/pra tISh+Thi te/sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Ti taM/na b+hasta le/sha ma sha mA/pra sha me pra sha mye/sarba pA paM pre sha ma ne/sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/hu lu hu lu hAM/ma hA bo/
40b4(rgyud): d+hi mArba saM pra tISh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga ta su pra tiSh+Thi ti shud+d+he swA hA/mU la man+ta/oM sarba tA thA ga ta bya ba lo ki twe/dza ya dza ya swA hA/hr-i drA yaM/oM hu ru hu ru/dza ya mu khi swA hA/
40b5(rgyud): u pa hr-i da ya~M/oM badz+ra A yuSh+pe swAt+ma/dge slong de myi dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge basbyin ma 'am/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang la
40b6(rgyud): zhig gzungs 'di bris te/mchod rten byas la/mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na des mchod rten cig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro//lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
40b7(rgyud): dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye mo dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/mchod rten 'ba'
41a1(rgyud): /namad pa ma ldan /smras m+b+has //namachob dang /chos da/ mchog dang /dbe ldan /na ma na rnam sa yang pa
41a2(rgyud): bla de dag gis mchod par 'gyuraro//dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang /ma dud pa dang /lte bu mig pa dang /thetshom za ba dang /rgyu rmA
41a3(rgyud): maude ni byed pa dang /rdo lung bdang /sems can dmya bu dang /skyem song dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang 'tshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can+da de//bye na
41a4(rgyud): bzungs 'di bshad//dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang /dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang /mchod par mi byed pa rnams
41a5(rgyud): ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngalnga bar ba shod pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyuraro//de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan pas
41a6(rgyud): mchod rten gcig byas ni chos kyis rgyun pa brgyad khri bzhi spyong rnams kying+ge mchod pa 'gyuraro//gzhan yang byas de rnams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur//
41a7(rgyud): ngos rkyen pa bklagaso shing kha ton du byis par 'gyur//'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du ying zhugs par 'gyur//byang chub kyi snying pa ni
41b1(rgyud): rgyun ma byas bzlas pa/ma rmya sadz+nyAnas//rgyun ga du/Am+b+has rgyu d+hU mA \u0f89\u0fa4g+sa tu m+b+ham+banaHm+b+har+thA pa~M maSh+TA
41b2(rgyud): nos+thutra/bod skad du/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi sa bo rlung kyi snyid po gsang ba rnying bkrol gyi ze me rtag ces bya ba'i gzung sa/theg pa chen po
41b3(rgyud): mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na dri ma med pa'i kun
41b4(rgyud): druga'i ra ba dang /rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin da /
41b5(rgyud): dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /namakhar lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang /yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyi
41b6(rgyud): yongasu bskor cing /mdun du byas nas thebs gcig tu bzhug s+ho//de nas 'khod kyi nad de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lte bu mkhas bya/mdzangs pa/gsal bi/yid
41b7(rgyud): gsungs pa/mthong na dka' bo/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yong su bzung ba/dri med le gas snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de yang da//na mchog gsum la dad cing bus la
42a1(rgyud): phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/zhib mo brtabs pa/sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/nor che ga longs
42a2(rgyud): spyod che ba/phyug pa/rdzas mang ba/yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin//de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas//
42a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod do//na bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang gsol/bcom
42a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/bcom
42a5(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/de'i slad du
42a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangos par thugasu chud nas//
42a7(rgyud): ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur par gnang ngo //de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/des rings pa
42b1(rgyud): rnyings par rang gi khyim du song ste/de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /zhal zas dang /yo byad dang /zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shes
42b2(rgyud): kyi gzhal med chen po dang /gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang /me tog dang bdug pa khyer te 'khor mang po dong /sil snyun dang /pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das
42b3(rgyud): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la dusi la bab par gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol
42b4(rgyud): to/bcom ldan 'das 'dre ni de bzhin ga shegs pa'i dus lags te/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus tshod la bab na/bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang
42b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas/nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad dang
42b6(rgyud): don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur shog/de nas bcomi ldan 'das dad na de las bzhengs nas/bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thug tu/bcom ldan
42b7(rgyud): 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams
43a1(rgyud): cad lasna yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par sheso//de nas bram ze chen po legs snang gi mchod pa dang /bkur sti chen pos
43a2(rgyud): mchod cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas//'khor mang po dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nu mkha'/
43a3(rgyud): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /sred med kyi bu dang /rgyal po chen po bzhis
43a4(rgyud): kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/skyed mos/
43a5(rgyud): tshal de'i nang na/mchod rten rnying po chen po zhig yod de/zhig pa/tsher mas gang bya/rtswa dang shing dang gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod de/de nas
43a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang /mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bor ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo //
43a7(rgyud): phyag dar gyi phung po de las kyang leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa leg so leg so//deng ni gshegs pa'i ltos bzang po'o//bram ze chen
43b1(rgyud): po de bzhin+do ga sho byas pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyed logaso//deng khyed lnga don chen po mdzad par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying nga
43b2(rgyud): phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu do la/yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas/nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol to//bcom
43b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de
43b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil nu bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs//de bzhin gshegs
43b5(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po chen po der bzhug so//de nas 'khor mngo po 'dus pa de ya mtshan chen por gyur te/yi chad de
43b6(rgyud): 'khod par gyur to//de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar zhing snying ni 'bul/rdo rje ni gsor zhing /rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
43b7(rgyud): der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bshum
44a1(rgyud): pA'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba glang gis na/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang ba'i lnga ltas gda' ba/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/
44a2(rgyud): ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gan /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po leg na rdo rje la 'di
44a3(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to//lag nA rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten/de bzhin gshegs pa bye bo til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i
44a4(rgyud): gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba
44a5(rgyud): til gyi gang bu ji snyed gnas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa khAr yAs/khar yas shes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnaso//chos kyi phung po brgyad
44a6(rgyud): khri bzhi stong gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi bo yang de bzhin du gran so//lag na rdo rje ga na
44a7(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to//lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu
44b1(rgyud): ba yin//lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che bya yin//lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam blangs 'di ni/bkra shrIs thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin//de nas
44b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos rnaMs chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/de nas nye ba'i
44b3(rgyud): nyon mongs pA dang bru lo//kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po//kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thog/khe cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o//kha
44b4(rgyud): cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnaso//kha cig gis ni byang chub tu
44b5(rgyud): lung bstan po tho'o//kha cig gis ni su dang po'o//kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o//kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o//kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o//kha cig gis ni sa
44b6(rgyud): lnga pa'o//kha cig gis ni sra drug pa'o//kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o//kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o//kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o//kha cig glis ni sa bcu pa la
44b7(rgyud): gnas par gyur to//kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogaso//bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang /
45a1(rgyud): ser sna dang phrag dog drang bral bar gyur to//gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la gan rdo rje chu 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung
45a2(rgyud): bachen por gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang ban yon gyi brgyan pa 'di lta bu
45a3(rgyud): na/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phud dang bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong
45a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lnga pa/lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong mu 'am/
45a5(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bor byed na/lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu
45a6(rgyud): snyed dbye bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rje su bzung bar 'gyuraro//
45a7(rgyud): gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyuraro//gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
45b1(rgyud): lta bu 'dzin pa de dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi glang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
45b2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing /nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro//gong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa
45b3(rgyud): byed pa dang /khong du chud par byed pa dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /me tog phreng rgyu dang /byug pa dang /na bza' dang /lha'i lhub dang /rgyan gyis mchod//
45b4(rgyud): pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma des/phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
45b5(rgyud): tIl gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /bdug pa dang /dri dang /me tog phyung rgyu dang /byug pa dang /na bza' dang /lhab lhub dang /rgyan
45b6(rgyud): gyis mchod par 'gyur ro//phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam
45b7(rgyud): gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /sto
46a1(rgyud): lce chen po dang /mi drA m+b+hi mu yin pad+ma rnams dang /semasan du rgyu tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya maN+Dan du gyur nas gcig la gtsug
46a2(rgyud): 'di spya du/mchod rten rnying pa phyeg der dang /mau phung po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab sa nas/'di ni rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba sbyin
46a3(rgyud): zhes zer//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di susaM phyag dar gyi phung por
46a4(rgyud): ba las rin po che'i mcho de rten du gdA ba bgyis/bcoMm ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/lag na rdo rje 'di phyeg dar gyi phreng ba mo yAn gyi/'di ni
46a5(rgyud): rin pa che sgra snad+man las smras pa/ni b+h+rUM rgyu'i ma tshud na chen po yin//lag d+hA dz+nyAn rgyun kyang sems can rnams kyi laso kyi 'bras bu rnam parad+ma smin pa stong pa
46a6(rgyud): m+WA /sma rgyu sgra rnams du bzhin ga shegs pa'i rad/sgyul gyi byung ba'i mamyod rten nam ni 'jig pa'am/gyis par mi 'gyur te/
46a7(rgyud): bzhin ga shegs pa'i 'i snying po'i sku ji ster 'i rgyas par 'gyur/'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'dres bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par
46b1(rgyud): gyur te/lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang /sdig pa can dang /dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar
46b2(rgyud): 'gyur/sangs rgyas ma yin/chos ma yin/dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byed rgyu de dang /rkyen des dam pa'i chos
46b3(rgyud): nub po//lag nA rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo //dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu
46b4(rgyud): ni nub par gyur gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro//de nas
46b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri bris te mchod
46b6(rgyud): rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/leg na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/mchod
46b7(rgyud): rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs
47a1(rgyud): /kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod/
47a2(rgyud): rten du 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang /spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//gang zhig snying ste rgyas kyi gang+gA
47a3(rgyud): brnyan nim/mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bAd+hAn rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par
47a4(rgyud): 'gyur//'khor lo'i 'phreng ba dang /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar spel ba dang bcas pa dang /bkra shisaM dang /cha rI kab kyi gzugs dang /dril bu bcas pa
47a5(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang /byin gyis
47a6(rgyud): brlabs dang /bden pa dang /dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro//sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phra
47a7(rgyud): dud dang /sti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro///
47b1(rgyud): phyadra 'tshal ba gtsogra dang /bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa lnga thug gi bar la sogs pa rnams las yong su thar bar 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
47b2(rgyud): pA'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro//gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
47b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro//phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/gnas der srog chags mi sron
47b4(rgyud): paM dang /gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/gcan zan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/bya mi srun pa dang /ne tso dperi skegs dang /byi ba dang /se mo dang /
47b5(rgyud): sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /byi ba dang /sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang /mchu rings dang /rta bla'i 'jigs pa yang myi 'byung bar 'gyur/sbrul gdug pas kyang
47b6(rgyud): mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//phyogs der yams kyi nad dang /nad 'go ba dang /'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'byung po dang /
47b7(rgyud): yi dgas dang /'dre dang /brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs por 'gyur/rims thams cad kyis kyang
48a1(rgyud): mi tshugs par 'gyur/nad thams cad dang /'brus dang /sgrol mig dang /ldog pa dang /mtshan par rdol ba dang /rkang shu dang /
48a2(rgyud): g.yan pa dang /mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing /mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro//phyogs der ba lang ge nAd dang /phyugs
48a3(rgyud): nad dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par
48a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dus myi yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/dug gis ma yin mtshon gyis ma yin zhing mye dang chus kyang mi tshugs par
48a5(rgyud): 'gyur/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi
48a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyuraro//rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chud par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/yongasu skyong bar byed//gnod sbyin gyi
48a7(rgyud): dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtog tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /skyob pa dang /sbed pa byed par 'gyur//rgyu skor nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /zla ba dang
48b1(rgyud): ma dang /mdzub rings chen po yang nyon mtshan 'thun par byed par 'gyuraro//klu'o rgyal ba thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mo 'argyud par mdang samyi 'phrog cing /leg+sas pa
48b2(rgyud): kho na chard gyi rgyun 'bebyas par 'gyur//lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de yi phyog 'tshal ba dang /bkur sti bye ba dang /mchod pa bye ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis
48b3(rgyud): nas dus gsum du dong //yul du gnas p+ta thams cad kyang mchod rten dang /gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo //bstod par byed/bskor ba bying por 'gyuraro//
48b4(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang /spu'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi chod rten nam/gzugs brnyan dro'i drung du nyin mtshon dus gsum
48b5(rgyud): du'ong ste/phyag 'tshal ba dang /mchod pa la 'ong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang /byin gyis rlob cing bzhug s+ho//mchod rten dang
48b6(rgyud): glezugs ban+d+han dzi lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa 'am/'i ma/shing gi 'am/dngul gyi 'am/gser gyi 'am/zangs kyir byed pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ying
48b7(rgyud): bris te/de'i nang du bzhag na/bzhig ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur//byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur//'phang dang /bem skas dang /
49a1(rgyud): kha stan dang /'khor lho'i phreng ba dang /bAkra shis dang /gdugs dang /drol bu 'phyang ba dang /ba dan dang /dril bu bA yU ra ka'i drab thams
49a2(rgyud): cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuraro//phyogs bzhi'i kun nu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa
49a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang /sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang /mchod gan su 'gyuraro//sku gzu
49a4(rgyud): dang mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongasu bskyang ba dang /mchod pas yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
49a5(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur/bcom ldano 'das kyis
49a6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za mya tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te lag nA rdo rje des na
49a7(rgyud): mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin//rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za me tog
49b1(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje ljon cig/de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /
49b2(rgyud): ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /gang dag yong su mya ngan las 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ste/chos
49b3(rgyud): kyi sgo dang ljongs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi zam tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam
49b4(rgyud): grangs sbyin//na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi krA nA naM/sar+b+ba ta thA gtA nAn/oM d+b+ha bi b+ha na bA ra ba tsa re/tsu lun+d+ha lu/d+ha ra d+hi re/sar+b+bA tIthA grad+hA/d+hA tud+hi re/
49b5(rgyud): pad+ma ma b+hUt+ti/dzA ya bA re/a tsu le/smA r+yA tAM thA grA t+taM/d+harmA tsaH/prA bar+t+ta naM byAd+da/bo d+hi mar+d+ha ai lAM k+Sha ra/a l-I kr-i tAM/sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA/Ud+hISh+Ti/bo d+hi m-i
49b6(rgyud): yI/bo d+ha ni b+ho d+hA ni/bud+d+ha d+hA d+hA/saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+hA ya/tsA la ts+tsha la/tsa len+tu sar+b+ba A bi ra NA ni/sar+b+ba pA pa bi gA twe/hu ru hr-i ru/san+ni sho ka~M bi ga te/sarba ta thA ga/
49b7(rgyud): t+ya hr-id ya/dz+haiM /saM b+h+rUM dza sa~M b+hA ba/ta d+h+r-i gi te s+'uN+yai/d+hAr Ni mA dz+re/puts+tshe ts+tsha/su~M br-id+d+he/sarba ta thA ga tA yad+hish+tsi te/hU~M ts+tshagar+b+he swA hU~M/sa ma ya ad+hiSh+Ti
50a1(rgyud): saHtaSh+ThagatA d+h+r-i /d+hAd+hAmyA d+he s+yAt+ma/su b+hU tISh+Thit+ta/sku bai tAH bAt+tA uhrIhUM//oM sa twA dz+nyA ga ta uts+tshiShan tu
50a2(rgyud): \u0f7f/sarbatwAthAg nAskr-its+tsha hU~M b+h+r-iN+Ti Shit+ta yats+tshaSh+T+r-i)/ rang ba sa rnam tog gi byug N+Da rgyas 'di bya
50a3(rgyud): zin tu/phyogs bcu dang /phyogase re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'drim blug bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu byed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcom ldan
50a4(rgyud): 'das shAm+bI thub pa la shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzum bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gte re bzhug pa dang /ring ba snas
50a5(rgyud): gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa l+yeg so leg so zhes bya ba byi no//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyis brlabs pa yino//
50a6(rgyud): gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/de bzhin
50a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtog tu rgyun mi 'chad par rje su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur//thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlangs
50b1(rgyud): sa sbyin byos bzlas par 'gyur//de nas gzungs pa shud pa dang /tsamA na mchod rten stong pa b+ha g+ha dAm+b+hi phung po lta bu de rin po rgyu sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
50b2(rgyud): mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing /'phang dang /legs par rnam par 'phyes pa dang /'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /kra shis dang bcos par gyur to/
50b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /b+hu dang /grwa dang /gnod sbyin/
50b4(rgyud): dang /dr-i na dang /nAm mkha'i nga dang /mi bad+hi dang / chen po de dag dang /skye dang ming bzlas pa'i 'jog rten bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
50b5(rgyud): la yI rangs te/mngon par bstod do//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cud kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za me tog rjes bye ba'i gzungs theg pa
50b6(rgyud): chen po'i mdo rdzog so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'd-ika ri pra b+ha dang /zhu chen gyi si ts+tsha ba~M byin de rtsangs de ben dr-i sh+tsi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
50b7(rgyud): rgya bar skad du/Ar+ya bi sh+'u le zab sham hA mU rban/da skad du/'phags pa sangs po'i gro byer du 'jug pa'i mad chen po/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
51a1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/gzings pa'o
51a2(rgyud): 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la bar 'drong ngo //
51a3(rgyud): btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/de nas bcom ldan 'dadus yul bri dzi ra rgyu zhing gshe
51a4(rgyud): teyangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a spu srung ba'i tshe la na bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
51a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song lnga phyi nas sgo'i thim pa la rkang pa zhog ste/gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang /tshig su bcad pa 'di
51a6(rgyud): dge smos shig/bi sa ra ta/bi sa ra ta/bi sa rA ta/bi sa ra ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas thams
51a7(rgyud): cad kyis dgongs pa/rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/
51b1(rgyud): nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams bya/bden pa'i cho gro dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/chos kyis bsams pa/tshangs pas bsams pa/
51b2(rgyud): tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/'dod pa'i dbang phyug gisra bsems pa/dbang pos bsams pa/lhas bsams pa/lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams
51b3(rgyud): pa/lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/bi sA ra ta/bi sa
51b4(rgyud): rat+na/bi sa rA te/bri sa ra ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/muny+tsu ta/muny+tsa tA/ma 'dug shig yams kyi nad rnam par
51b5(rgyud): bzhi par gyur cig/nirgats+tsha ta/nirgats+tsha ta/nirga ts+tsha ta/nirgats+tsha ta/sangs rgyas lha chen po/lha'i yang lha/lce'i bla ma gshegs shing /dbang po dang
51b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /'jig
51b7(rgyud): rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /bcom ldan
52a1(rgyud): 'das pa mngon par dud pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/de dag khyed rnams la
52a2(rgyud): gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/nIrbAts+tsha ta/nirgats+tsha tAM/nirgats+tshe tA/nrirgats+tsha ta/myur du byer cig/khyed cag las glang sdung ba'i sems dang ldan pa
52a3(rgyud): de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/lus la yang
52a4(rgyud): 'jug par gyis shig/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/su mu su mu su mu su mu/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/
52a5(rgyud): su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/ri mi/ri mi/r-i mau/ri mi/
52a6(rgyud): ri mai/rI mI/r-i mi/rI mi/ri mi/rU mU ri mi/mu ru ri mai/mu ru ri mi/mu ru ri mr-i/mu ru ri mi/mu ru rA mI/mu ru rI mI/mu ru ri mri/
52a7(rgyud): mu ru ri mi/mu ru ri mi/mu ru ri mi/mu ru ri mau/mu rU R+Shi ti/ri ri tsi re ri ri/rI rI r-I r-I rI rI/ti mi ri/mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri/mi ra ta
52b1(rgyud): hwA sau mi r-i tAM/sir+Yat+ta/ma tI/saM sa?/sam+b+ha/koka ra/kaM ko ra ta/ko ka rA/ko ka rAH/k+Sha kAR+Sha/k+Sho ka R+ShA/ko kaR+ShA/kok+ShA d+hA/k+Sho kaR+Sha/kr-ikrArnA/
52b2(rgyud): kr-ikAR+Sha/kr-ikrAn+tu/kai krAR+Sha/kaka ru/kuM kaR+Sha/kAM ka ra/kr-i kAn+d+ha/kaM kaR+Sha/kikarA/kAM ka R+Shot+ti ti/ku ri shokl-i ka rA/kaMkA ri shrI/kaM kA ri shi/ri re r-i rA
52b3(rgyud): r-i raM/tIR+Ya ti pra s+thA/ri p+'u phu/raM pu ri buM/r-I pra ri puM/ri bu ri buM/n+yAH/nUn+na b+hU tha/ri pra phu/nA thA tha/nin s+yAM ta/ri pu ri phu/nirgats+tsha te/b+hA la sa
52b4(rgyud): tad ri phu ri phu/paM la ya ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/byams pa la
52b5(rgyud): gnas pa/thugs rje dang ldan pa/dga' ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/k+Shi phran ni ra gats+tsha ta swA hA/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog
52b6(rgyud): dang chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o//tshig su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o//
52b7(rgyud): gang la ser sna rnams chags pa//rnam joms dri ma med mdzad cing //thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//'dren pa gang
53a1(rgyud): zhig 'gro ba rnams//byar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing //chos rnams thams cad ston pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//
53a2(rgyud): sbron pa drug pa rnams sad+d+he/sems na rgan dz+nyAn g+he hrI/gang gis 'di 'i mda' mdzod//sbyi la bde legs mi da per 'o gyu/slob pa gang zhig byam sna
53a3(rgyud): thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun//bu gcig bzhin du rtag bsgyangs te//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi//
53a4(rgyud): sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing //gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de//khyad lo bde logs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur//gtsang zhing slu ba mi
53a5(rgyud): mnga' la//gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa//phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing //
53a6(rgyud): don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang gis skyes pas sa rnams ni//nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing //sems
53a7(rgyud): can thams cad rab dga' de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//byang chub snying por gshegs pa na//sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing //bdud yid mi
53b1(rgyud): 'dor gyur pa do//khyod la bde lcags mdzad par 'gyur//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba//bub pa'i snun pa gang byung to//khyod la
53b2(rgyud): bde legs byed par 'gyur//yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed//thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing //tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa do//khyed la bde legs
53b3(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur//sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad//brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang //'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni//khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/
53b4(rgyud): sangs chas bsod nams mthu ngag dang //lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis//khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa//don de di ring grub gyur cig/rkang gnyis khyed cag
53b5(rgyud): bde legs shog/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde
53b6(rgyud): legs//nyi ma'i gung la bde logs shing //khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis//yongasu bskor te
53b7(rgyud): gshegs mdzad kyis//sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod//sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //dgra bcom slob pa'i
54a1(rgyud): /bden tshig gis//'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams//grong khyer 'di ni stongs gyur cig/sems can kun dang srog chags kun//'byung ba
54a2(rgyud): kun dang khyed cag kun//bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/thams cad nad rnams med par shog/kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/gang yang sdig par ma gyur
54a3(rgyud): cig 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te//sa dang bar snang dag ni gnas pa rnams//skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/nyin dang mtshan du chos
54a4(rgyud): kyang spyod gyur cig/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan
54a5(rgyud): nas/yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang /tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smraso//bi sa
54a6(rgyud): ra ta bi sa ra ta/b+hi sa ra ta/bi sa ra ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/
54a7(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/nyan thos thams cad kyis
54b1(rgyud): bsams pa/bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/chos kyis bsams pa/tshangs pas bsams pa/tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/'dod
54b2(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/dbang pos bsams pa/lhas bsams pa/lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsdams pa/
54b3(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/bI sa ra ta/bri sa rA tra/bi sa rA ta/bi sa rA ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
54b4(rgyud): thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsa la to//muny+tsA ta/muny+tsa ta/yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/nirgats+tsha ta/nirgats+tsha ta/nirgats+tsha ta/nirgats+tsha ta/sangs
54b5(rgyud): rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/lha'i bla ma gshegs shing /dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /dbang bdag dang bcas pa
54b6(rgyud): rnams dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /lha stong phrag du ma dag dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/
54b7(rgyud): lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /bcom ldan 'das la mngon por dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/
55a1(rgyud): de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ni nats+tsha ta/nirbots+tsha ta/nir+m+ma ts+tsha tA/nirgats+tshe tA/myur du byer cig/khyed cag
55a2(rgyud): las gang dag snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phyung bar gyur cig/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/srung bar 'jug par 'dod
55a3(rgyud): pa de dag ni 'khod cig/lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/su mu su mu/su mu su mya/
55a4(rgyud): su mU su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/su mu ru/mu ru/mA rA/mu ru/mu ru/mu ru/mu ruM/mU ru/mai rI/mi ri/mi rI/mi re/
55a5(rgyud): mi ri/mri ri/mi rI/mu ru mi rI/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mI ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri/mu ru mi ri
55a6(rgyud): mA nu d+hi ti/ri rI ri ri/rI rI n+de rI/di nI ri dI/mi ri mi ri/mI ri mi ri/mi ri mi rI ti/ha sI mi nI hi/mi ri si sIm+b+hi/kaMkA ra/kaM kA ra ta/kAM ka ra/kau ka tsa/kaM ka
55a7(rgyud): tsakaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/ko ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/kaM ka rA/
55b1(rgyud): ka/rgyu na/kar+Na/kr-ikA shaM/ /ti/ri da? s+yA/r-iT/raisa? rasa?/ripa?/rai ng+ra/r-i pra/ri phu/r-I pra/nAnaH/nAn+d+haH/radrA rba
55b2(rgyud): phu/nA nA d+ha/nirbats+tsha ta/ri phu ri phu/ninats+tsha ta/pa la ya ta/ri phu ri phu/pa la ya ta/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/sems can thams
55b3(rgyud): nAd la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/byams pa la gnas pa/thugs rje dang ldan pa/dga' ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/
55b4(rgyud): k+Shi phrena? ni ra gats+tsha taM swA hA/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang /chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' su lnga pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di/
55b5(rgyud): dag ni grub pa'o//tshigasu bcad po 'di dag ni grub po//gang la ser sna rnam chags pa//rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing //thugs zhi gnod pa mi meda' de//khyed pa
55b6(rgyud): bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams//thar pA'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing //chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/khyed la bde legs mdzad
55b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//skyob pa gang zhig
56a1(rgyud): byams pa yis//thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun//bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyungs te//khyed la bde logs mdzad par 'gyur//gang
56a2(rgyud): zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi//sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing //gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de//khyod la bde logs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig chos kun
56a3(rgyud): mngon sum 'gyur//gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la//gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa//
56a4(rgyud): phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing//don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//gang zhig skyes pas sku rnams ni//nags tshal bcas/
56a5(rgyud): par rab g.yos shing //sems can thams cad rab dga' de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//byang chub snying por gang zhig gis//sa dag rnam drug g.yos
56a6(rgyud): gyur cing //bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na//'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba//thub
56a7(rgyud): pa'i snyan pa gang byung de//khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed//thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing //tshogs kun dbang
56b1(rgyud): spyas+yA da//rlos do gas pang nga rgyapa//ngas rgyas spyod pa ba ga gas //rgyu rgyur ba sa pang khyog su dang//rgyu shAnan myu du gas no//rgyud pa
56b2(rgyud): /sadus rgyas so na mo sa thu ga dang //sbyin mas kyis ni bsams pa skyes//khyed kyis don 'du ga min pa//don de de nga zla na
56b3(rgyud): da skye sa shoSh+ma/ 'i mas sa shog/byed cug lam 'gro de log smra/ dang gled ba legs shig/nyinam
56b4(rgyud): sa mnanA 'di sags sring 'di de migs shing /ciganag tu di la zlas ga/ tshig rdzog pa mar cig/sangs rgyas sgyu rnam
56b5(rgyud): stong dag gis//yongasu bskur tA shegs medzod cing //srang sems lhun pa rnams khyer tshig/snying rje'i bdag nyid rkyen rnams 'khod//sangs rgyas rlung sangs
56b6(rgyud): rgyas rnams dang //dpyi bcom slob pa'i bdun tshig sa//'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams//gling khyer 'dzin gtod gyur cig/sems can kun dang skrag chags
56b7(rgyud): na 'byu kun da byu cig ma//'di 'i na ni ldan phyog/thams cad ni rnams mi por shog/kun gyis bzang rnams mthing spyir cig/gang yang /
57a1(rgyud): upa ma gyu tsha//nga gang dang da nin+d+ra Ar+dz+dza \u0f7f/nga shA d+ma /lhaganas pa rnams//sto rnams pa
57a2(rgyud): /na dang margyun du chosaH maud myur tshig/'dugs pa yangs pa'i grong byed du 'jug pa'i mdo rtog//rgyu rgyur gyi mkhan bsgo
57a3(rgyud): bid+hi dang /thu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba~M ban d+hi mi shes sdes bsgyur cing zhum+b+ha te/gtAn la phab //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rje
57a4(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas shA thaM phul phyum 'tsham///oMm+ban sa m-i mAn na/wAn gar+b+ha zlas pa sbyin bskyil pa bye ba brgya ba rgya
57a5(rgyud): bar du rdeg po byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur//'jigs pa shA sgrub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzog s+ho/////rnam
57a6(rgyud): gA m+b+ha la phyug 'tsha'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la bya
57a7(rgyud): 'chi mo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la phyaga'i tshalo//tad+ya thA/kA la ka la/kI li ki li/bi ri bai ri/tsu ru hu ru/
57b1(rgyud): nar shrI sar+b+ba da ta A gar+b+ha/Ar+tha AkA sha gar+b+ha mar+k+ka/ru krA ThA ra ya h+ma shwAm+ba d+hA rA ya brAd+b+ha bish+tsa yAn/n+ya ra tsa ra/tsarats+tsha riswAhA//bton pas 'grub ste/mtshon
57b2(rgyud): dang /me dang /chu dang /dug dang /drug sbyar mi dang /byad snyoms rnams kyis mi tshugs//rgyal po dang choms rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnye //gang
57b3(rgyud): du bris te bzhag pa der/yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa dang /'go ba'i nad thams cad mi 'byung bar 'gyu ro//dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang thob par
57b4(rgyud): 'gyu ro//'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying za zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so///sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
57b5(rgyud): lo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs/
57b6(rgyud): sngags kyi gzho 'di gang gis gzung bas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur//me khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyuraro//tshe rabs thams cad du yang byi
57b7(rgyud): sbyin de la srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba bar byed la de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa medo//s+yAd ye the dan/bud+d+he bud+d+he/dza yot+ta ra/bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/saM bo d+hA/
58a1(rgyud): ma hA sau bid+hi/a d+h+yai ba bod+hA ni/ha la hA la hA la/ la hi lits+tshi li/hu lu ku lu hu lu/sarba rbad+d+hA/d+hArma a ba b+ho d+hI ni/s+thA Ta s+yAT
58a2(rgyud): s+phu Ta ni/sarba pA pa ni/bud+d+ha/a d+hi/nIn swAhA//'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzog so////sangs rgyas la phyug 'tshalo//chos
58a3(rgyud): phyag 'tsha lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshalo//de rnams la
58a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/tad ya thA/hA na ha nA sA ne/na ba swA ne/dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/tsa la tsa la ni/pUr+tha
58a5(rgyud): yo gA ma nu sma ra phaT/ma hA hastA ya swA hA/gang gis rig pa 'di blags pa de tshe rabs brgyad stong du skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde
58a6(rgyud): ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogaso///na moHsarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/a nu ga te/oM ku ruM gI ni swA hA//'di
58a7(rgyud): len gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rje su dran pa
58b1(rgyud): rdzogaso////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya bud+d+ha hri da yo nA ma d+hA ra Ni d+hArmA paR+YA yA/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos
58b2(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsho lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
58b3(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul/chos kyi dbyings dgon pa/rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ye shes kyi rnam par spyad pa/sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa
58b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/rnam pa thams cod kyi mchog dang ldan pa/chos thams cad mnyam pa
58b5(rgyud): nyid kyi rje su spyod pa/kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzangs dbus na/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad
58b6(rgyud): pa nas lung bsten pa/rnams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sgras/thams cad
58b7(rgyud): kyang gzungs dang /ting 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to//de nas bcom
59a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'byor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag skye blo mang po lnga phan pa dang /skye bo mang po
59a2(rgyud): la bde ba dang /'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
59a3(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do//
59a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/'dzin ta ma/klog gam/kun
59a5(rgyud): chub par byed dam/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tA ma/dad dram/lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/de bla na med pa yang dag par
59a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral
59a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/dge 'dun la rim gro
59b1(rgyud): spyod pa dang mo 'phrul bur 'gyur/bskyal pa snod du 'khor bu'i snyid pa na mA sbyor rnam par 'gyur//na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub na par rdzogs par/
59b2(rgyud): skyongs rgyas kyi bar du tshor bas dran par wAHhU~M/myu b+ha me pa rlo mngon par gas ra 'a / r+ya k+She nA/rlo 'i bya'i tshogs pas
59b3(rgyud): sma ltung bar 'gyur/wA dang /klu dang /kun de sbyin dang / dang /ma yin dang /rna kha'i spyod dang / madz+haiM dang / chen po dang /midang mim
59b4(rgyud): n+ti pi thams cad dga' bar gyur/de sus n+tad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/rlu ba sbyang ba
59b5(rgyud): rma chen cha sbyangs pa dang /dug gzhil bsaSh+Ta che ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/de la bdud sdig can gyis blugs rnyed par mi 'gyur/bdud kyi dris kyi lha rnams
59b6(rgyud): sa sgrubs rnyed pAr m+bi lA9/nga du yid la bya der 'dud su lce ng+ge dag khri mas ca rgyu nga /ngas la sbyangs par 'gyur zhing phyogs bain+d+ha
59b7(rgyud): thos par gyi //de sa 'di dzin ni mongs rgyas kyi tshig/sangs rgyas kyi chen po'i//sangs rgyas kyi na pa'i che chen po'o//sangs rgyas
60a1(rgyud): na/ tsun ga shogs pa thams cad na tshig ldan ///m+b+has /d+d+haHr+m+mab+h+yaH/dzats+tshaSh+Ta/ nAd+hA
60a2(rgyud): brad+d+ha ma ti bud+d+he/sarba bud+d+ha/a nu ma hai/sar+b+ba bud+d+he/a nu dz+nyA nA te/brAd+d+haM/brAd+d+ha/bud+d+ha/duMSh+Ta/buMd+d+he/bud+d+ha/br-id+d+ha/bud+d+he/shud+d+ha/dud+d+ha/sangs rgyas
60a3(rgyud): yul mtha' yas te/chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na chos sgom pa'o//gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la
60a4(rgyud): thigs partse ba'i byed/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsu saM p+na s+thA/chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin//twAt+t+waH/shrIdad+he/suM shud d+d+he/suM da
60a5(rgyud): shod+d+ha ni/saM shwo d+hA ni/nir+m+ma lo mA la a pa ga tAM/ga tI sa mA d+hi tr-i ti/grA me s+yA ma sa re/sa rA sa ra pa ri a sho ka/bai shI ka/shonya sha ma ni/nI ti/u
60a6(rgyud): pa shr-I ti/pa shr-I ti/a bi d+hA swe/sar+b+ba puN+ye pU ri mi ta te/sir+b+ba d+har+m+ma prA taM mAr+b+hit+te/hA ra hA r+ya/ma lA hA ra/tsa ra tsa ra/saM tsa ra/tsu la tsa la saM tsu la/tAl
60a7(rgyud): ta la ma ta la/sa ma ta la/ri Ni ri No/su ri Ne/sa ma riNi/ri No ma to loka d+ha ri/loka d+hA ri No/d+ha ra d+ha ra/Dar Da ra/ro d+ha ro d+ha/mahA bi dza ya/ShA hi ni/
60b1(rgyud): hAn hA na/sar+b+ba bud+d+ha/he pre shiHsti/sAHd+hU pa dze/sar+b+badz+nyA pa ma te/ma hA pra tI thA na/saM ban+de/sa man+ta/a la kaM bud+d+ha/g+h+ri yai/bud+d+ha/prA tIm+ba Di te/b+hA ga
60b2(rgyud): bad+d+he sa ra sa ra/pr-i sa ru pra sa ra/bi sa ra bi sa ra/pra sa ra sin+ta sho ka u ba gu tA~M swA tAM//bcom ldan 'dasakyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
60b3(rgyud): 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas bcas pa dang /tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos/rab tu g.yo so//
60b4(rgyud): kun tu rab tu g.yos//rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugaso//ri'i rgyal po ri rob kyang ldag cing 'gul to//bdud kyi gnas thams
60b5(rgyud): cad kyang skrag nas bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams dang /bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal zhing /yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go/sems can gang dag sa
60b6(rgyud): chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa
60b7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod//lho gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag
61a1(rgyud): nas/sgyu'i me tog mAn+du dAr ba dang /man dur brten pas bcom ldan 'das la gtar mngon par btor nas/gang dag sangs rgyas la sbyangs/
61a2(rgyud): su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dka' ba skyeso//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/shUk+Sh+Na seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi//sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la//
61a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi//gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yis//skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug gas+ho so//rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing ba
61a4(rgyud): rmyi gnas kun byung //rab tu gasmos nas bdud kyi rigs rnams ni//lha dag rab tu sngags shing 'khrugs par 'gyur//bdudu yid me 'de sdug bsngas mya ngan no //
61a5(rgyud): de tshe lce rnams ngo mtshar rabaM thos nas//'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir//namakhar gnas nas me tog man da 'thor//gang dgi sangs rgyas mngon
61a6(rgyud): gzhan rnams kyis//se mo do dang sho shal spos rnams dang //phye ma dag drang byug pa gos rnams dang //rgyun dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul//brgyad po de'i
61a7(rgyud): dag ni de'i yon tan gyi ran yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o//bachad dang zhe na 'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rkyen dang /thos pa thams cad yongasu rgya
61b1(rgyud): bas ma ngoms pa'i rgyan dang /chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'drebya bar 'byung ba'i rgyun dang /sems car thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /mcho ga ma yin
61b2(rgyud): par shes pa'i rgyan dang /ji ltar thos pa dang /ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing spyod pa'i rgyan dang /sems can yongasu smin par
61b3(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rkyen dang /rkyen de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang /gzungs thob pa'i rgyan
61b4(rgyud): te/brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phar yon gyi rgyan du 'gyuraro//gzungs 'di ni rtag tu rgyun tu yid la bya'o//sangs rgyas rje su dran po bsgom par bya'o//gzungs kyi
61b5(rgyud): gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro//pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang thob po//nad thams cad dang /
61b6(rgyud): na ba thams cad la lag pas khyab par bya'o//bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med pa bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ceso bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
61b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan
62a1(rgyud): 'das bsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa sangs rgyas sto ba nas rgyu ba 'ogazungs chos nam grangs rdzogs//
62a2(rgyud): rgyu bar skad du/Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha aM ga ba tin+t+ra mad+hA rA Ni/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas
62a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das gang gi'i klu chen po'i 'gram na/'jig rten
62a4(rgyud): spyong po bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi lnga 'di skad ces bku' stsal to//rgyal
62a5(rgyud): po chen po dag skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung //bzhi gang zhe na/'dri lta ste/rga ba dang /
62a6(rgyud): na ba dang /chung po dang /'chi ba'o//de la yang 'dzegs pa chen po blacig ste/'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/brtsam pa med pa/gnyen po med
62a7(rgyud): pa drug tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o//rgyal po chen po dag de la/'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
62b1(rgyud): rgyal 'dzin po nas 'das d+margyas gsol to//sam ldan 'das gang gi slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu su la dus sgro dgu su gzung ba 'di ni//dang dag
62b2(rgyud): cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed//de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogasu thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/so gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
62b3(rgyud): bskul te/'di skad ces/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/bla
62b4(rgyud): nA meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig/des ni bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
62b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o//sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo
62b6(rgyud): gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o//zhes gsung //de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /steng dang /'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/
62b7(rgyud): 'di skad ces/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du/bla ni med pa
63a1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag gi phrogs mdzod cig ces gsungango //dri bzhin du bya//
63a2(rgyud): mtshams rnamasu yang 'di skad ces/gang gi phyir 'di dag tsho dang /stobs dang /khwa dog dang ldan pa yong su grub cing /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung
63a3(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur bar/sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung //de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar
63a4(rgyud): gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jog rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/de dag bri de shin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal
63a5(rgyud): gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsu ngo //tAd+yA thA/tsa la tsa lo tsa la/bi nA ti/s+thas+thi ke/tsakra a ga ti/pra sha maM du
63a6(rgyud): sarba ro ga a na te/kuNAM kuN+De/ma hA kur+the/tsa rI tsa re re/he ma gI ri/he ma gau r-i/he ma ni shun+ti/he ma si sr-i/kau ra be kor ba be/he ku ra re/ku ra re/
63a7(rgyud): ku ma ti/bi Sha sa pa Ni/shau'u b+hi/tsa li tsi la/bi tsa le/mA bi laM ba hu mu hu mu swA hA//gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang /de bzhin gshegs
63b1(rgyud): pa thams cad dang nyo bar 'dug nas/de dag gis smras bA/hA hU~M sau so swA hA/de skad nus bka' sprul pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to//
63b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs
63b3(rgyud): kyis srung bar bgyi'o//dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/shwe tAM shwe te shwe te/le li li/'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa/mA
63b4(rgyud): taM ge mA taM gre/mA taM gi ni/shU mA shU mA/yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/tsa re tsa ro re swA hA/mrig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ba liM pa ba/bcom
63b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'di swa dang ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po gang la la zhigs ngas rmyas thar/sa tsud kyi gzigs pa'i rig sragasos 'di nyin re la lan re 'don nA
63b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'om rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//'dis sems
63b7(rgyud): can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyuraro//gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don tu nyin cig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang /gang yang 'di klog pa
64a1(rgyud): de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mdo//de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur//chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/
64a2(rgyud): mes ma yin/mtshon gyis ma yin/dub gis ma yin/lce 'bab pas ma yin//gang la la rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas
64a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs parar+ya rig par bya'o//yi ger 'dri ba 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim
64a4(rgyud): gro bye ba thams cad kyi sti stang byas par 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin//zhes de bzhin
64a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyiraro//su zhig gis 'dri bris nas yan lag la btagasnga na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrungs par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan
64a6(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas rgyalnga po chen po bzhi dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i
64a7(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
64b1(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs//rgyu bar gyi mkhan po dzi na mo d+ha dang /d+hA na shI la dang /zhwa tshon gyi la skyo ba ban de ye shes spos bsgyur cing nas te skad gsar
64b2(rgyud): tshad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya d+hAd sha bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa spangs rgyas
64b3(rgyud): bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom
64b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/dge slong stong nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'
64b5(rgyud): mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
64b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrigs
64b7(rgyud): 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod do/de na de bzhin
65a1(rgyud): gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od
65a2(rgyud): me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/sku rnam par spras shing legs par brtan pa/
65a3(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa/rab sbrul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags
65a4(rgyud): med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'chi zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to//su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i
65a5(rgyud): gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/de ni
65a6(rgyud): dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi pad+ma bai DUR+Ya'i 'od
65a7(rgyud): zer rin po che'i gzugs lte bu'i sku dang ldan pa/spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa/gtsug tor gyi gtsug
65b1(rgyud): nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rabaskal bkar bya chen po rjes kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal ba du yongasu
65b2(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma zag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gsha
65b3(rgyud): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/
65b4(rgyud): za na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu zla gzhon nu/nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad+ma groser sdug na mkha' lta bu'i sku rnam
65b5(rgyud): par snang mdzad drod zer rab rgyun thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs ban+d+har 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal
65b6(rgyud): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgro ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dri med
65b7(rgyud): 'od ces bya ba'i mtshon kyang gzung ngo //tshig 'don to//phyag bya'o//lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
66a1(rgyud): na/sl-i sa bASh+T+rIn+d+ham+b+hal dngas pA&m+b+haSh+Ta mats+tshar rgyu da// lA d+hu// b+h+yasak+Sh+mI bzhin pa shegs pad+ma med nA d+hA N+ya//
66a2(rgyud): gi rgyal blo grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshon kyang gzung //phyag bya'o//byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan
66a3(rgyud): kyang gzung //phyag bye'o//shir lho'i phyogs mtshoms kyi de bzhin po shigs pa'odri mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo //phyag bya'o//lho nub kyi phyogs
66a4(rgyud): mams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin+da chen mchog gi rtog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i man kyang go zung ngo //phyag bya'o//rlung byu gi phyogs mchims kyi
66a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam par gzigs shes bya bo'i markyen kyang bzung //phyag bya'o//byad shud gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs
66a6(rgyud): bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung //phyag bya'o//'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhi ni gshegs pa seng ge bgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya
66a7(rgyud): ba'i mtshan kyang gzung //phyag bya'o//steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung /
66b1(rgyud): phyang bya'o//byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
66b2(rgyud): bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la/nyi ma bcur rdzog pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshegs par bya/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rje su yi rang bya//sangs
66b3(rgyud): rgyu sa thams cad le bskul ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa bo thams cad chos kyi dbyingasu yongasu bsngo bas yongasu
66b4(rgyud): bsngo bar bya'o//'on ting sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro//las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam byar byung bar 'gyuraro//de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
66b5(rgyud): byarked pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /myi 'jigs pa phun snyam tshogs pa dang /mtshan phun sum rgyo glos pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum
66b6(rgyud): tshogs pa dang /gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang thob pa//tinge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yod tho'o//bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa
66b7(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa yang myur du yongasu 'dzin to//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par
67a1(rgyud): du nad sums pa yang sa // nan pa nan tu marlos pa dang /smra spya na
67a2(rgyud): nas pa hA/rA smra su mjig pa dang /skye na du rmus pa dang /sa na smram gas nga /byinag snyed rnaM sa hU~M
67a3(rgyud): //Sh+TaM na na 'i dang// k+She d+ma // nas gas
67b1(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gasdang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na//phyogs bcu dag na gang
67b2(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i//bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams//de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur//skye ba dag ni kun tu yang //dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur//chung zad
67b3(rgyud): dge ba gang yin pa//don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur//pad+ma'i snying por byazhugs pa yi//sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon du mthong //gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin
67b4(rgyud): byed pa//mkhas pa dpal ldan brdzus te skye//dran dang blo gros brtag po dang //mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel//thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur//thos pa/
67b5(rgyud): rnams kyis yongs mI nyams//'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/mtshan rnams su zhig brjod byed pa//ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni//bzang 'gror myur bar 'gro
67b6(rgyud): bIr 'gyur//ting 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog/de dag de la mngon du 'gyuraru//byang chub rab tu de 'chang rgya//zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag/gser gyis bkang ste sbyin
67b7(rgyud): byin pa so//gang zhig de bzhin gi shegs rnams kyis//mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi//bsod nams phung po de ches mang //rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/
68a1(rgyud): byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe//mi 'am thams cad rnam spangs te//sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes te//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
68a2(rgyud): mnyes par byed//dang po bla na med pa thab//sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing //mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de//mthong
68a3(rgyud): nas ston la rab tu dad//'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni//mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//bskal pa bye ba grangs
68a4(rgyud): med do//'khor ba rnam par spangs nas//byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya//nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni//mtshan rnams 'od dag 'dzin byed na//gang gis
68a5(rgyud): 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i//rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur//'jig rten mgon pa de dag gi/mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed na//skye ba gang dang
68a6(rgyud): gang skyes par//de ni phyag bya'i 'o su 'gyur//motshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//bskal pa bya bA bsam ya su//bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur//
68a7(rgyud): 'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//de la bskal pa du mar ni//lha rnams sti stang byed par 'gyur//byang chub myur
68b1(rgyud): du 'tshang yang rgya//mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur//g.yo dang skya ni rnam par spangs//rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams
68b2(rgyud): kyang mthong //mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//lha dang dri za klu dang d+ma dang //mkha' lding khyu min gsang ba bo//rtag tu de la srung bar byed//gzugs dang mtshan
68b3(rgyud): ni phun sum chags//nair rje khyim du skye bar 'gyur//sems can kun la sbyin par byed//dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med//bskal pa bye ba brgyu mang bar//lha yi
68b4(rgyud): tsan dan dmar po dang //shin tu dri zhom spos kun gyis//spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung //mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa//bskol pa bye bar sgra skad ni//
68b5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur//rtag tu tshes rgyal tshul dang ldan//mtshan rnams 'di dge 'dzin byed pa//rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i mdag/bye ba stong
68b6(rgyud): phrag mang yod las//'byor chen de ste lha gzugs ldan//mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//de ni pha mo spun sdug dang //skye bo dag gi tshugs rnams dang /
68b7(rgyud): 'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo //drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshani//bud med kyis ni bzung byas na//rud med lus la ma chags nas//skyes pa blo gros ldan pa
69a1(rgyud): ts+tsha/mA y-i smyan n+da nAs//bla m+be m+b+ha nub smug gyur //chos so khong sa bskor nas//'dod pa dzin+dan
69a2(rgyud): mya ngan 'a'o//mtshan rnams 'di dge smra dzin /de mi smras la mtshon dad ni//sa dang ma da rgyal ba dang //g.yon ldan rnams kyis mi rmugs
69a3(rgyud): mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa//de yi sems la num kyang ni//dpung dang bzhin par bcas pa so//bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur//'di dag de na
69a4(rgyud): mtshan gyi rnams//mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de//zhing ni bya ba bsam yas par//namakha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas//
69a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu//de dag dri yis bsam mkhyen nas//rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur//spangs rgyas mgon po de dag las//lung bstan pa ni
69a6(rgyud): thob gyur nus//de ni shin tu yi rang ste//rgyal ba'i bston lnga the tshom med//mtshan rnams 'a dag 'dzin byed pa//'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni//
69a7(rgyud): zang mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te//thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur//de nas pha rol phyin pa dang //mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang //mtshan
69b1(rgyud): dang dpe byad bzang po rnams//ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni//glang gi zhing du 'dong 'gyur ba//der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs//
69b2(rgyud): byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//skyes pa 'am ni bud med gang //mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi//yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag kyang //sangs rgyas
69b3(rgyud): bskal par rgyun du gsungs//bgro yod ldan par gyur nas ni//yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa//de dag mtshan rnams
69b4(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po//sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog/'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gos//mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang //
69b5(rgyud): gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyon cing //thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba//de dang de dag shes rab che//rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur//drang srong chen po de
69b6(rgyud): ngag gis//'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas//bag yong ldan zhing mkhas gyur la//shes rab ldan mi su mi 'dzin//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
69b7(rgyud): stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
70a1(rgyud): nad / su da na chu tu / yang sa na rkun na smras dun cur chad/
70a2(rgyud): do/'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /dA na shI la dang
70a3(rgyud): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya
70a4(rgyud): sop+ta bud+d+ha kan nI ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
70a5(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'od skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das te se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi
70a6(rgyud): ring ba zhig na/dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
70a7(rgyud): chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po dang /kun tu bzang po dang /mtha' yas me tog dang /kun nas me tog
70b1(rgyud): dang dri dag la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa shra stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod do nyid na/
70b2(rgyud): dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nos rdol zhing gcar bu gos med laM lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i
70b3(rgyud): snying pas/blags phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lce nga saM la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
70b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i dkyil na gyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /dge slong bcer bu gos mo mchis la/la
70b5(rgyud): pabastod pa TIg gos 'dri yad su zhig lags/de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
70b6(rgyud): na mkha'i snying po 'dri ni nad kyis btab pa yino//cig shos 'di yid nad kyis btab pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
70b7(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to//nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /'byung po bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol
