71a1(rgyud): bka' sprul du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprulnga pa mdzad/de nas na mkha' la de bzhin gra shogs pa drug byung ngo //
71a2(rgyud): bdun pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/
71a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal
71a4(rgyud): tonan mo bud+d+hA ya/na mo d+har+m+ma yA/na maHsaM b+hU ya/tad+ya thA/au ha la ha la/hi li hi lA ya/na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ne mo na maHswA hA/de nas de
71a5(rgyud): bzhin gsheg sa pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkhwa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i snying po gang la
71a6(rgyud): la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chung ngam+ba/klog gam kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/chu dang /sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed
71a7(rgyud): par mi 'gyuraro//dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur//de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro//zas deng skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod
71b1(rgyud): sa te s+thAnA/pa ras kyi gnad pam+b+hi 'ang do//nad rnams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur//rlung du rgyu ra 'gyur//thos pa dzin par 'gyur//de bzhin pa zlasa?/
71b2(rgyud): ba bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyuraro//mtshan bteb pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas l-I sgyu ma'i mar sbyino//mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la/sna ma'i
71b3(rgyud): mar dang /ut+pa la sngon po dang /shu ti dang /nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'o mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur//las thams cad la yang sbyar bur
71b4(rgyud): bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi
71b5(rgyud): bor bya ba dang /'byung po thams cud bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bkra' stsal to//na mo bud+d+hA ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/na maHsaM g+ha ya/oM pa tsa pa na
71b6(rgyud): pA tsA ya pa nA ya/sarba b+hU tA nAM/tsi ta ya/kI lA ya/pa ra bed+ha nAM swA hA/na mkha'i snying po sems can+da thams cad la phran pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu
71b7(rgyud): zhi bar bya ba dang /'go ma nyes pa dang /rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
72a1(rgyud): phran du masak+Sh+ma sa? s+ya shing /das kya nga snang ba shAng bu spyod pa du rung na/rnam pa'i spyod po gang la la zhog pa snang na tan
72a2(rgyud): lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyuraro//
72a3(rgyud): gshis ngan du 'tsho bor mi 'gyuraro//'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur//de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan
72a4(rgyud): ni/nad thams cad la skud pa bcing bar bya'o//'dus pa lngas gyur pa l+la ni sgyu mya'i mer le blazlas brjod byas te sbyin//chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o//sku
72a5(rgyud): byis padage sbyong //byes pa rnams kyi gdan dag la sred pa ston pa gdags//mtshan btab pa'i rna bar len bdun po zlas brjod byo'o//gnan dag la yang ring na
72a6(rgyud): zlos sbyar bar bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnyed skyob steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phyin pa'i don dang /nad thams
72a7(rgyud): kyi tun bor bya ba dang /byung ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gos sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to//nam bud+d+ha ya/nA mo r+t+ya ng+ge ya/ne meHsa~M hrI ya
72b1(rgyud): k+Sha lak+Shad+hA/ka la~M ko lo/ku waT+Tas/'das dan/garus ga N+DiswAt+ma/rnam par ltung ba gsang sngags khyod ni 'di dag na bsgral byu bzang ba
72b2(rgyud): na gshegs pa 'dus pa dang /seMSh+NIn+d+ra pa dang /de/byung ba sems nyid kyis bskyengs shing /ngas kyad de lta ba skyed/nem khe'i snang ba khyud kyis gasmra
72b3(rgyud): dug pang shAg/ su y-i zhig tu / kAm+b+ha/sman rgyu pa da na/du lus la masbyin gyis ma rdzogs/ gis mi tshugs/
72b4(rgyud): ga gis mchigs/mas nad kris myi 'debs shing chung snya ma yin pa de'i rgyu bangadang/shis dran du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/sngon kyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams
72b5(rgyud): nim gtogs//dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge basbyin ma gang lnga la zhig ni par langs nas mgo bkru sa d+d+hi de bzhin gshegs pa'i

72b7(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'i nga gyu /'gas pa thams cad kyi rlong du med sa rgya ba pa dang ma dang /rjod pa pe byed pa thams cad du
73a1(rgyud): byung ba 'dus//mad rlu sha shAm nanas pa rna sa//ma sa pa snod pa brdzun smang /
73a2(rgyud): rmi la bsgrugs pa'i 'bras mas lan cu rtswa brgyad sbyini sreg rgyur//rA na na d+hU m+me tA mo b+hU shi DU ra d+ha nA mi nA/'o ma can gyi shing go ster shing gis mye bus
73a3(rgyud): ga sa dag sbyin snong sbyin ba sreg gyu'o//dado ni dang sems can rnams rnye kyi pa thams rnyed de/sdig pa smras shing dbu mtshan po dang /nor gyi zung
73a4(rgyud): chen po sgrub par 'dod ni/mkhyen gyi shing sa phye shing gis mo bus la bsreg hU~M tIl dag lan stong sbyin pasreg bya'o//sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyangs par
73a5(rgyud): 'dod pa dang /rig sngags thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa dang /bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang /na lad dang /khri dang /shi ri sha dang /rgyo spos dang /
73a6(rgyud): glur gum dang /tha steng dang /in+d+ra baR+Sha dang /byang chub kyi shing dang /a mra'i mdo thegs dang /'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/sangs rgyas kyi spyan sbyar
73a7(rgyud): nyon zhig gi cig bsrung ba bye zhing bum pa zhes rab pozhig ste/TI bi nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyani sder skyong ba la ni byung rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus kyi /
73b1(rgyud): dud myo gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas s+ho sman sngar sad ljang gi phur ma skye bor blugs la brgya rtsa brgyad mong nas smros te sbyin stog byas na dugu mo gdug par
73b2(rgyud): 'gyur//gdon dang /srung ba dang /'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
73b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa lags par dang sel steng gi ni mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bye ba dang /
73b4(rgyud): 'byung ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gas sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gA/Sh+Ta swAm+b+ha to//nA ma~M b+had+hA ya/nA mar+d+har+dz+dza ya/nA maHsaM nA yA/nA mA d+hak+sha Tats+tsha na d+hu ya/
73b5(rgyud): thA gA t+yA y+ya/an+d+ra te sam+b+ha budz+nyAm/A~M kai Te kAH/\u0f7fkaShe/kauTo kr-i Ti/kai Ni kin+ti~M/k+Shen+de pa yu~M nA maHswAhA//ni mkha'i snying pA d-i dzin na/gas
73b6(rgyud): bye dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu gis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba'i stong po 'di
73b7(rgyud): khyod kyis zung shig/blangs shing bzung ste/kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /dge slong mo dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshego
74a1(rgyud): mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spros dag gi mchod pa byas nas
74a2(rgyud): gra sang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te/tshe rab sa bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyuraro//yang nu
74a3(rgyud): mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro//yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi
74a4(rgyud): khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro//thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//zas dang skom gyi
74a5(rgyud): rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur//ji ste sgom zhi bar 'dod na/bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis
74a6(rgyud): bikru bar bya'o//lkog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o//'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /bcings pa byams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya
74a7(rgyud): sterdo rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/bgags dang lag 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur//ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des
74b1(rgyud): phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor slar dkyil 'khor bslus la A ga ru sA bdugs te/lan stong tu brgyud bzlas brjod byas la/de'i drung du sngas shar
74b2(rgyud): phyogasu bstan te nyal ni/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro//yid la ci smos pa thams cad ston to//tshe 'amyi stobs som 'pham rgyal thams cad kyang sten
74b3(rgyud): tau rje de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi rA mkha' la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
74b4(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to//nA mo bud+d+hA yA/nA mo d+har+m+ma ya/na maHsaM b+ha ya/na maHka na ka mu na ye/ta thA ga
74b5(rgyud): tA ya/ar+ha he sa myakr-i bud+d+hA ya/tad+ye thA/oM sa ra sa ra/sa ra sA ra/si re si ri/si ri si rI/s+t+ri rA ya/d+ha ma d+ha ma/d+hu mu d+ha ma/d+hu ma nu ma/d+hu me d+hu ma/d+hu ma?
74b6(rgyud): ye/na mo nA maHka ne ka mr-i na ya/ta thA ga tA yA/ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha yA swA hA/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa na mkho
74b7(rgyud): snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha'i snying po gang la li zhog snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /
75a1(rgyud): mo dung /chu dang /lce 'bab pus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/dus ma yin
75a2(rgyud): par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/tshe ring por 'gyur/longs spyod che bar 'gyur/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs
75a3(rgyud): pa dang ldan par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//dus gsum du bzlas brjod byos na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar
75a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro//ci ste pha rol nad las bar bar byed par 'dod na ci nu su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/a ga rus bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o//mdze
75a5(rgyud): dang skrangs nad dang mchin skan la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la
75a6(rgyud): bkus na mdze rang thams cad sos par 'gyuraro//zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtse brgyad
75a7(rgyud): bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur//mtshon btab pa'i rna bor bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las bar bar 'gyuraro//
75b1(rgyud): lus hrul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug/de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed/las thams cad pa zhes bya'o//de nas de bzhin/
75b2(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi na mkha' lo bzhugs te sems can thams cad la phyin pa'i don dang /nId thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /'byung po thams cad
75b3(rgyud): bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsa la to//nu mo bud d+hA ya/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/nA maHsaM g+hA ya/oM ha rA ha ra/ha ru ha ra/ha ha hA/nam
75b4(rgyud): k+Shi sh+yA b+hU ya/tA b+hu gA tA ya/ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/sid+d+han+tu mAn+t+ra pA dA swA hA/daM nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa'/
75b5(rgyud): chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lnga to//na mkha'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed drag gis
75b6(rgyud): gsungs pa ste/na mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig/kun chub par gyis shig/gang la la zhig 'dzin ta ma/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/
75b7(rgyud): nyin mo 'am mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byed na/mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro//de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang
76a1(rgyud): byang bar 'gyur te/sngon gyi las ni ma gtogaso//las thams cad la yang sbyar byar bya'o//mdze dang sha kar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas
76a2(rgyud): la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sder lan stong rung brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro//klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i
76a3(rgyud): me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtse brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o//de nas bcom
76a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi na mkha'o la bzhugs te/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal
76a5(rgyud): toHna mo bud d+hA yA/na mo d+har+m+ma ya/nu maHsAM g+hA yA/tad+ya thA/g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/ma hA b+hU me/ta le tA la/ma hA ta le/tsi le tsa laM/ma hA tsa le/d+hu re
76a6(rgyud): d+hu re/ma hA d+hu re/ti ri tI ri/me hA ti ri/ki li kau lI/ma hA ki lI/tsu ruM tsu ru/ma hA nu ru/mi li mi li/ma hA mi li/ti li ti li/ma hA ti li/d+hu me
76a7(rgyud): d+hu me/ma hA d+hu me/tsa le tsa le/ma hA tsa la/khi ri khi ri/ma hI khi ri/tsi li tsi li/me hA tsau le swA hA/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/byang chub
76b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o//sprin bzlog na shong
76b2(rgyud): ra byi ra'i lcug mas bya'o//dug spon chus bya'o//las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o//khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o//cho ga thams cad dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o//
76b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkho'i snying po yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs
76b4(rgyud): pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso////bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de
76b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i songs rgya swa la phyag 'tshalo//tad+ya thA/a mi ta/a mi tod b+ha be/a me ta saM b+ha be/a mi ta/
76b6(rgyud): bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/ga ga na k+Shi rA ti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri s+yAt+su//gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa/
76b7(rgyud): byas ni/de rnams zad par rig par bya'o//nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas stong la dge
77a1(rgyud): ba'i rgyu bskrun par snang //s+yAng shAm yAsmA r+m+madz+nyAnA pa dzAHs+ho/tha du bzhin ga sh+tses pa da shAmA pra
77a2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//tid+yA thA/tsin+d+he tsan+de/suts+tshin+taM/mye ti tsAn+tu/tsan+ta ka ra Na/si ri si re/bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi twe/kai li ki li/
77a3(rgyud): d+har+m+ma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ki li ki li/sa~M b+hA A d+hISh+Thi twe swA hA/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nung par langs te/zla ba'o 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i
77a4(rgyud): mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskul paM ba zhi khri'i tshe rabs dran+ya pAr 'gyur te/de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyuraro//zla ba'i 'ang mi mtshan rnaM su dran pas yon tan dra
77a5(rgyud): rnams thob par 'gyuraro//zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rje su dran pa rdzog so///sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo//na mo rat+na shi khi
77a6(rgyud): nita thA ga tA ya/ar+ha te samyakr-i bud d+hA ya/tad+ya thA/rat+ne rat+ne rat+na shi khe ne swA hA/'tsho ba'i tshe dra nA na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/
77a7(rgyud): 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o//sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rje su dran pa rdzog so////rgya gar skad du/
77b1(rgyud): Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+ha ra Ni/bod skad du/'phags pa dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad
77b2(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na byi rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
77b3(rgyud): rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/blo gros rnam par dag pa/tshul khrims yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dge go/blo gros rnam par dag pa/ting nge 'dzin
77b4(rgyud): yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongasu dag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go/blo gros rnam par
77b5(rgyud): dag pa/phan pa'i dngos po yongasu dag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pas/byams pa yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa
77b6(rgyud): yongasu dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pas/snying rje yongasu dag pa dang /dga' ba yongasu dag pa dang /btang snyoms yongasu dag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa
77b7(rgyud): yongasu dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa/rnam par grol ba yongasu dag pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongasu dag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa
78a1(rgyud): yong su dag go/blo gyos rnam par dag pa dang /stobs yong su dag pa dang /mi 'jigs pa yong su rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
78a2(rgyud): yongasu dag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go//blo gros rnam par dag pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu dag pas/de bzhin gshegs
78a3(rgyud): pa yong su dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag pa la/su zhig me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /gdugs dang /
78a4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /byug pa rnams kyi sti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/de'i mtha' ni
78a5(rgyud): thog pa gsum po lus theg pa gang yang rung bas/mya ngan lngas 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par/bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad
78a6(rgyud): par mi nuso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros rnam par dag pa/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med po de bzhin du/de
78a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med//mtha' ya so//bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mtshungs pa med//grangs medo//dpag gis mi lang //brjod
78b1(rgyud): du //blo blos rnam par dag pa/su TIg de bzhin gshogs pa da ltar bzhugaswA to/'tsho zhing gzhus pa la ste stang du byed pa dang /rgyu myur pyod pa dang /ri mor byed
78b2(rgyud): pa dang /mchod pa dang /rjed pa dang /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring posil yungs 'bru tsam
78b3(rgyud): sti stang byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /ri mor byed pa dang /mchod pa dang /rjed pa dang /yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed
78b4(rgyud): pas phyag 'tshal ba dang /phyag byed pa dang /bsti steng byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /ri mor byed pa dang /rjed par byed pa dang /mchod pa dang /gsol ba dang /
78b5(rgyud): bsngags pa dang /bskor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/lnga sde zhe na/dran pa d+ma ldan pa 'gyur ba dang /rtor pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba d+ha/ngo tsha shes shing khral yod pa dang ldan
78b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang /myur du bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /mthong nas kyang dad pa bskyed par 'gyur bya ste/phan yon lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o//de nas
78b7(rgyud): gzhan yang chos bzhir shes par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas bstan po'i tshigs so sor 'dzin pa dang /de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa de bzhin
79a1(rgyud): dum+b+ha pU dang /s+yAng+yas na smra bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bur 'gyur ba dang /sgyur dusangs rgyas kyi ning b+h+yo/smA g+sa p+tA skye bar 'gyur dwa n+tu/
79a2(rgyud): rnaMsde bzhi po da dag yong su 'dzin par 'gyur//ma thos rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpya' chis bzhi dang ldan na bdud dum bdud kyi si~M shrI m+b+hi'i bu rnams
79a3(rgyud): mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/rigs che ba dang /btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang /phyi ma'i dus nu dam pa'i chos
79a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/blo gros rnam par
79a5(rgyud): dag pa/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/bdud dum/bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur//blo gros rnam par dag pa/
79a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas/dad pa bskyed de/dbus mo gnyis ka'i skye
79a7(rgyud): ngos ma bcugs nas phyag 'tshal te/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku legs par rgyan pa de ci 'dre bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i
79b1(rgyud): /lus thob par gyur cig/ces de ltar myos pa bskyod na blo gros rnam par drag pa/bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/bla na med pa yang dag par
79b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir//bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/brgya byin nyid dma?/tshangs pa nyid dam/nyan thos nyid dam+ba/rang
79b3(rgyud): sengs rgyas nyid dam+ba/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi/zad par byur mi nuso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros rnam par dag pa/rigs kyi bu
79b4(rgyud): 'am rigs kyi bu mo des/bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung ba yin te/blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste/dper na/de bzhin
79b5(rgyud): gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong du 'jug gam/gtsug lag khang ngam/grong khyer du 'jug
79b6(rgyud): kyang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung /'chag kyang rung /'greng yang rung /'dug kyang rung /chos ston kyang rung /stong gsum gyi stong
79b7(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can lha 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/dri za 'am/lha ma yin nam/na mkha'i lding ngam/mi 'am ce'am/lho
80a1(rgyud): 'ap+sA rgyan pa 'am/mo 'am/mi ma yin pa 'am/shing dAma?/ri 'am/khung bu 'am+b+ha/byA sgribs kyang rmya ste/thams cad de bzhin
80a2(rgyud): gshegs pa ga la ba de log su 'dud pa dang /rab tu 'dud pa dang /kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
80a3(rgyud): dang ldan par byed pa de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong brdal lam/yul 'khor ram/pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la
80a4(rgyud): sems can rnams 'dud/rab tu 'dud/kun tu 'dud par 'gyu ro//bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo//a mi tA ma te pra b+he/ma hA pra b+he/pra b+ha ba ti/
80a5(rgyud): pra b+ha ba ti/pra b+ha ba ti/pra b+ha ba te/pra b+ha ba tI/prA b+ha pi tA/prA b+ha ba ti/pra b+ha ba ti/pra b+hu ba ti/bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gastsol/bcom ldan
80a6(rgyud): 'das mthusa? bstan du gso lA/tad+ya thA/ma ti ma ti/ma ti ma ti/ma ti ma ti/mA tri ma ti/mA ti ma ti/smr-i ti/smr-i ti/skr-i ti/smr-i ti/smr-i ti/smA te/
80a7(rgyud): smr-i ti/smr-i te/smr-i ta/smr-i ti/ma hA smr-i ti/ma hA smr-i ti/ma hA smr-i ti/chags pa mi mnga' ba gti mug bsal du gsol/so ma/so maM/sa me/so me/
80b1(rgyud): sau mo/sau ma/sau me/so ma/sau mo/sa ma/so ma na s+yA mu pya na ya/sau man s+yA mu pya na ya/so ma na s+ya mu d+yA na ya/sau ma na s+ya mu bA na y+ra/som na?
80b2(rgyud): s+ya mu pa na ya/sau ma nu s+ya mu pA na yu/sau ma rA s+ya mu pa na yA/sau ma nu s+ya mu pa na ya/sau mA na s+ya mu pa na yaM/sau ma na s+ya mu pa na yau/shi khi shi khi/shi Shi
80b3(rgyud): shi khi/shI khi shri khi/shi khi shri khi/shri khi shI khaM/zhi bar gyur cig/nad med par gyur cig/bgegs med par gyur cig/pra b+ha ba ti/ma hA mra t+ye
80b4(rgyud): rash+mi/rA shrI/rAsh+mi/ra sh+mi/ra shrI/rashrI/ra shrI/ra sh+mi/rash+li/ra shrI/rash+mi/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang gzung bar bya zhing phyag
80b5(rgyud): bya'o//'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang /bcom ldan 'das rin tshon nyi ma dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang /bcom ldan
80b6(rgyud): 'ongs rin chen mkhregs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen me tog dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang /
80b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rin chen mi 'khrugs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das 'di dpag med dang /bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dang /bcom ldan 'das thub
81a1(rgyud): da/ dwang /bcom ldan 'das grags pa ma par yas dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od dang //com ldan 'das bde chen brnyes
81a2(rgyud): dang /bcom ldan 'das skur ma'i 'od dang /bcom ldan 'das bden dbyang sa dang /bcom ldan 'das rnyed kyi dri ma bral ba dang /bcom ldan 'das zla ba dkor
81a3(rgyud): dang /bcom ldan 'das dri med 'od dang /bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang /bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang /bcom
81a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang /bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i sgron ma
81a5(rgyud): dang /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sgra dang /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchog dang /bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog
81a6(rgyud): dang /bcom ldan 'das gsor 'od dang /bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang /bcom
81a7(rgyud): ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang /bcom ldan 'das klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das me tog dang /bcom ldan 'das spos thams cad kyi
81b1(rgyud): dbang phyug rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das phreng bya'i rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das dpa' brtan pa'i sde dang /bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha spong dang /bcom ldan
81b2(rgyud): 'as dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin po che dang /bcom ldan 'das dpag med rtogs 'od dang /bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang /bcom ldan 'das seng ge dbang phyug rgyal
81b3(rgyud): po dang /bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang /bcom ldan 'das snying pos zil gnon dang /decom ldan 'das rnga sgra'i rgyal po dang /bcom
81b4(rgyud): ldan 'das zla ba mchog dang /bcom ldan 'das pad zil gnon dang /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang /bcom ldan 'das me dang /bcom ldan 'das skrag
81b5(rgyud): byed dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang /bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang /bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang /bcom ldan 'das
81b6(rgyud): rin chen dpag med sbrul 'od dang /bcom ldan 'das ri rab ltar rnam par gnon pa dang /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rin chen mchog dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen
81b7(rgyud): 'dus pa'i dpal dang /bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi dpal dang /bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa
82a1(rgyud): brnyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma dang /bcom ldan 'das lhun po dang /bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang /bcom ldan 'das
82a2(rgyud): ri rab dang /bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang /bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu'o//tad+ya thA/pa ta pa ta/da ma da me/g+ha mai b+haM ma swA hA//shar phyogs logs
82a3(rgyud): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo//de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang
82a4(rgyud): bcas pa la nad med pa dang /zhi bar mngon du srung du gsol/lho phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag
82a5(rgyud): 'tshalo//de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /zhi bar srung du gsol/nub phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de
82a6(rgyud): dag la phyag 'tsha lo//de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /zhi bar srung du gsol/byang phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa
82a7(rgyud): 'dron pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo//de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /zhi bar srung du gsol/'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
82b1(rgyud): bzhugs pa 'dren po de dag la phyag 'tshalo//de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /zhi bar srung du gsol/steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
82b2(rgyud): gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo//de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /zhi bar srung du gsol/phyogs mtshams logs na sangs rgyas bcom
82b3(rgyud): ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo//de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang /zhi bar srung du gsol/tad+ya thA/bi ma le bi ma lA/ka re
82b4(rgyud): bi ma la saM b+ha be swA hA/bi mA le/bi ma le/bi ma la/bi mA le/bi ma le/bi ma le/bi ma le/bi ma le/bi ma lA kA re/bi ma lA ka re/bi ma lA ka re/bI ma
82b5(rgyud): lA ka re/k+Shi ma lAM ka re/bi ma lA ka re/bi ma lA kA re/bi ma lA ka re/bi ma lU sa mung+gi te/bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/bri ma lA mung+ga te/bi ma lA sa mud+ga te/bi ma
82b6(rgyud): lA sa mud+b+ha twe/bi ma lA sa mud+b+ha te/bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/bi ma lA sa mung+ga te/bi mA lA sa mung+ga te/rig sngags 'di ni rig sngags che//lha rnams kyis ni brjod pa
82b7(rgyud): yin/'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na//nad rnams la ni yongasu thar//mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang //sdig pa gang dge sbyor byas sgrol//de dag dran pa brjed mi
83a1(rgyud): /'gyur//gzung ba rnams kyang chud mi za//de dag skye ba rnam sa yang //rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bru lta mi 'gyur//s+yA zhog drim med pa'o b+hUr+m+mas/
83a2(rgyud): 'di ni dga' bas 'dzin par byed//zhing rnams kun tu rgyu ba na//dpal ljon pad+ma'i snying por 'byung //mtshan rnams kyi ni legs par brgyan//yan lag 'od zer dra ba
83a3(rgyud): 'byung //tad+ya thA/ku Ti ku Ti/kuta tsA lo/e la e laM/mut+ta/ko de thA l-i/e ri ri/ra mr-i ti swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo skad ces bka' stsal nas/
83a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs twa/bcom ldan
83a5(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya bAM sha ba tin+t+ra ma
83a6(rgyud): d+hA ra Ni/bdi skad du/'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag kyi
83a7(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba chos nyi shu la/yul phug ron can na/grong khyer sin tso zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag
83b1(rgyud): khang na bzhugs te/de'i cha dge sbyong che brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir/grong khyer gan so zhes bya bar sang ste/dgra slong de mi yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag
83b2(rgyud): tshad brgya'i lam du phyin pa dang /dge slong des/bar der mi lus chen po khrun tu 'doms sum cu yod pa/bzhin 'dam bzhi pa zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
83b3(rgyud): mthong nas kyang dge slong tshe brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du ngeso snyam nas/
83b4(rgyud): des dbus mo gnyis ka'i lha de sa la btsugs te/mi lus chen po ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smraso//ci khyod
83b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de/'dir 'khod dam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/dge slong de de bzhino//dge slong des smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di
83b6(rgyud): nra gda'/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can+da rnams la rlung rnam pa snga tshogs pa 'byung ste/gnod sbyin dpe b+ha ma
83b7(rgyud): yin lda ni kha' lding dang /dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnaso//des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/nyi mi dang /zla ba dang /gzo' dang /rgyu skar rnams kyang
84a1(rgyud): na mkha' byar skabs na mi snang //de'i tshe lha dang lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed/g.yul bkye ba dang /lha rnams ni 'pham/lha mya yin
84a2(rgyud): rnams ni rgyal te/de'i tshe 'byung po dang /yi dgasde rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la nad gtong ste/'di lta ste/lkog ma'i lha gor dang /
84a3(rgyud): 'brum phran dang /me dpal dang /lto ba na ba dang /rims nyin gcig pa dang /nyin gnyis pa dang /nyin gsum pa dang /nyin pozhi pa dang /rlung las gyur pa dang /
84a4(rgyud): 'khris pa las gyur pa dang /byad kain+da las gyur pa dang /'dus pa las gyur pa dang /klad pa na de dang /bal mig dang /g.yan pa dang /chung pa dang /mig
84a5(rgyud): nad la sogs pa nye bar sgrub bo//'di lta ste/char ches pa dang /than pa dang /dus mA yin pa'i cher gyis lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i 'di 'phrog/sems
84a6(rgyud): can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/tshe dang stobs dang /mdog dang gzugs 'phrog ste/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can thams cad nad sna tshogs kyis ljongasu
84a7(rgyud): nyen to//gtum po seng ge dang /sbyang ki dang /stag dang /sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog ste/'dzam bu'i gling gi
84b1(rgyud): sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud za ba nye bar gnas pas/sems can rnams nAd las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rkun
84b2(rgyud): pa dang /bar ma dang /gzhon pa dag las bkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bur 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir/nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyis/khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi
84b3(rgyud): sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig/da ci'i phyir zhe na/'dzamo bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni/'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar
84b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyiraro//de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs te/sems
84b5(rgyud): can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ran tan gyis shig/dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu rgyun du dad par gyis shig/lha brjod cig/de bzhin gshe
84b6(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten rnams sam/sku gzugs rnams la spos dang me tog dang bdug pa rnams kyis mchong par gyis shig/khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig/
84b7(rgyud): ma bdun ya ni lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i gas skyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs zab mo 'brug bsgrags
85a1(rgyud): rgyal po la byu 'tshalo//'di lta s+thA/tar+tha bA/bI bu la gar+Na te/bi s+phu la skA ra/bi pu la ya ni she/a na? sa la/an lA sad+ha
85a2(rgyud): be/a na lA te/sha taM ka ra/b+he dza li ne s+yA hA/dza ma b+ha ni/sam+p+ra naM/mo tA re swA hA/bon+na ta ri ka ying swAh+ma/ho me d+har+m+ma/d+har+m+ma tsi tA ye swA hA/d+ha re b+ha d+ha ra
85a3(rgyud): swAh+ma/ka la bi ka ru ta ya swA hA/shrI te pen nAM nirbaM pa n+ya swAt+tha/d+hu ru d+hu ruM/bi du ru d+hi yai swAh+ma/bi la ma pa tsun d+hi ya swAhA/a ba l-i ki ta bi lo ki tI ye swA hA/adz+nyA
85a4(rgyud): na bi d+ha ma n+ye swA hA/pad+ma swa re/pad+ma saM b+ha re/ki kra re/he taM ka ri ye swA hA/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di lta ste/
85a5(rgyud): tsan+d+ra prab+h+yAM/tsan+dan gar+b+he/tsan+d+ra tsur+N+NaM/ke la sa pa ti/sarba bud+d+ha/a daMSh+Ti ta a nu mo de ti swA hA/byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo//
85a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/tad+yA thA/dza yo dza ye/dza ya la ba d+he/dza ya ma hA ma he swA hA/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanA ras gzigs dbang phyug
85a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//'di lta ste/tad+ya thA/ga ga na ar+ye/gi ga na sa mudag te/ga ga na bi krAn ta/bi krAn te/e dze me dzI pad mo dzi swA hA/byang chub sems/
85b1(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang po lA phyag 'tshalo//'di l+yA ste/tad+ya thA/hau b+ha dre/ma hA b+ha dwe/a ti b+hU d+l-i/sa man+ta b+ha dr-i/bog ta rA dza me/mahA bi gA tA rA dza saM/sa ga
85b2(rgyud): tid ga hi swA hA/de bzhi no gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba le phyag 'tshal lo//'di lta ste/he ma he ma ha ma hA ma swA hA//de bzhin gshegs pa
85b3(rgyud): 'od dpag med la phyag 'tsha lo//'di lta ste/a mi tod b+hA bA/a mi ta saM b+ha be/a mi ta bi krAn+te/a mi taM bi krAn+te gA rA/a mi ta gA ga nI kArti ka re swa hA/de bzhin/
85b4(rgyud): gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshalo//'di lta ste/gu gA na a ka re/ga ga nAM saM b+hA baM/gA ga ni k+Shin+ti ka re swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas
85b5(rgyud): spos mchog la phyag 'tshalo//'di lta ste/sa ma sa me swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan stsol gyi 'brug bsgrags gshegs
85b6(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tsha po//a sa ma a sa me swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshaldo//'di lta ste/mA nA bi shu d+ha/pad+ma shwa re/pad+ma saM b+ha re/king
85b7(rgyud): ka re/hi tang ka re ye swA hA/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yid dag par rdzogs pa'i
86a1(rgyud): sum+b+ha/byang chubasems ba sa smra ra la pal phyag//'as m+b+ha mas kyi
86b1(rgyud): tAm+me smAH/ak+Sha shri g+hA s+yAd+hA/ya shrI bA ye swAt+ma/b+hU taR+tha swAt+ma/as+yAr+d+ha ta ya~M swAn+ta/sUt+maduHp+tA sha mad+hanA/radu gnon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshag
86b2(rgyud): /tsa d+ha pa b+h+rU~M/suMm hrIn+ta/prad+d+ha a~M ka/pra d+hi ka/pra d+ha rbatrA~M/ba d+hi/karma bi shAb+hU'i tu ma~M swAn/cha badz+ra dgong la la zhin
86b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'dis nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du bya ba byas na/de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dge slong bdun la zas sbyin no//
86b4(rgyud): me las me spel bar bya/mtshan mo mer me thogs te mchod rten la ste stang byas la bskor ba byer//dam pa'i chos bri ba dang /bklag pa la brtson pa bya'o/
86b5(rgyud): gal te yams kyi nad tshor byung nas/khyim nas khyim dang /grong nus grong dang /grong khyer nas grong khyer du/khu ba dang /bdug pa dang /gtar ma dang /lha bshos
86b6(rgyud): kyis mchod pa bya'o//nad pa gang yin pa des kyang /cho ga 'di bzhin du byas na/dau myur du nad los thar bar 'gyur ro//de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
86b7(rgyud): dge slong che brjod la 'di skad ces smras//dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tamaklog gam/yi ge re phreM ma/
87a1(rgyud): gor 'drir 'jug gam+b+ha/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
87a2(rgyud): ldog par 'gyuraro//yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rno lam du
87a3(rgyud): grag par 'gyur bar yul nas yul dang /grong khyer nas grong khyer dang /grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o//yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe
87a4(rgyud): brjod la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe brjod rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro//
87a5(rgyud): su se lan gnyis bklags na de lta bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro//sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo dang bcas te thar bar
87a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro//sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor thams cad thar bar 'gyur ro//susA lan lnga bklagasnga na de nyen 'khor gyi rgyal po dang thar bar 'gyur ro//
87a7(rgyud): yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dog tu bskur bar bya ste/der yang
87b1(rgyud): yon tan 'di drug 'byung bar 'gyuraro//tshe badz+rod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri thos la mi 'dzin tam/mu byug gam/yi bor mo 'dri'am/yi gor 'ad+mor mi 'jug gam
87b2(rgyud): kun chub par mi byed dam/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag phyir rab tu mi ston na/yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/sems can thams cad dang thun mang du byas
87b3(rgyud): mi nyan tam/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu mi bsngo na 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste
87b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o//yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe brjod su zhig 'di
87b5(rgyud): tshad mar byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par bya ba yino//ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/nga rI'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/
87b6(rgyud): lha dang dri za rnams la rje su bstan pa dang 'thun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o//de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi snang bar gyur to//dge
87b7(rgyud): slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras po la mngon par bstod bzung nas song ngo //'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so//
88a1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/Ar+yA an+d+ra maN+Da la ka nA ma mahA yA na sUtA/ba skad du/'phags pa dkyil 'khyor brgyad pa zhes bya ba/theg pa chen
88a2(rgyud): po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/'phags
88a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
88a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po/rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/chos
88a5(rgyud): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btu de/bcom ldan 'das
88a6(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
88a7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
88b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba/khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i
88b2(rgyud): lung bstan pas/khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/bcom ldan
88b3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na/des ji ltar bgyi//
88b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can
88b5(rgyud): rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir/rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/leg so leg so//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa
88b6(rgyud): tsam gyis/mtshams med pa lnga 'byung zhing /dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig/oM mu ne hUM ma hA bI ra swA hA/
88b7(rgyud): snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchodado//oM hU~M hUM pad+ma pri ya swA hA/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o//oM me ha ra Na swA hUM/byams pa'i/
89a1(rgyud): snying po'o//oM a gar+b+ha ya swAhA/na mkha'i snying po'o//oM ma s+yA hI rA dzA ya swA hA/kun tu bzang ba'i snying po'o//oM ku ru ban ra h+ya swA hA/lcag
89a2(rgyud): nA rdo rje'i snying po'o//oM shrI ai raMg swAhA/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o//oM ni swa raM ba swAhA/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sil ba'i snying po rma/oM
89a3(rgyud): TI tI t+ya ra dzA swA hA/sna'i snying po'i snying po'o//byang chub sems dpa' brgyud kyi snying po'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la
89a4(rgyud): la zhig gis/dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan gcig brjod na/de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
89a5(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/
89a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso////rgya gar
89a7(rgyud): gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /dA na shI la dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
89b1(rgyud): g+hur skad du/Ar+yA sprul pa ak+Shar+yA prAdz+nyA pa nA mi t+tAnA ma ma hA yA na s+yAtra/da skad du/'phagrus bya shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin+ya pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen
89b2(rgyud): po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khyab na/bya rgod
89b3(rgyud): phung po'i ri la/dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
89b4(rgyud): /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/dpal gyi snying po'i seng
89b5(rgyud): ge'i khri la bzhug so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
89b6(rgyud): gzar nas/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha bya sa la gtsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga lnga ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/'dzum skul te/bcom ldan
89b7(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad
90a1(rgyud): kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub la nges byar gzhol bar 'gyur ba/gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brdzun
90a2(rgyud): pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags sgrub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
90a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs zhes bya ba byin te/rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legaso//de yi
90a4(rgyud): phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can
90a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med
90a6(rgyud): par sngags 'grub byar 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das
90a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to//sems can thams cad la srin po'i slad du bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba
90b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//mnyam par gzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/'od zer de dag gis
90b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to//sems can brang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad
90b3(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu gas so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan
90b4(rgyud): dan gyi phye ma'i char yang phab po//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam po'i sems
90b5(rgyud): dang rna byams pa'i sems dang /byas pa gzo ba dang /sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i semasu bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o///
90b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomAM pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyog 'tshalo//tad+ya thA/oM mu nai mu ne ma hA mu ne ye swA hA/ngas
90b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po//sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs
91a1(rgyud): pu shAkya thub pa chen po las/khyod kyis 'di nyid thub pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu
91a2(rgyud): gyur to//khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur
91a3(rgyud): zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to//gang dag khyod kyi ming nyen pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /glegs
91a4(rgyud): bam du bris nus mchod pa byud pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuraro//tad+ya thA/aM dza ya dza yA/pad mA b+hi/a ba me sa ra
91a5(rgyud): sa ra Ni/d+hi ri d+hi ri/d+he ri d+hi ri/dwe ba tA/a nu bA la ni/bud d+ho tA tA ra Ni/pu ra ya pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/sarba A shAM ma ma pA ri pU ra ya sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba
91a6(rgyud): satwa nAny+tsa/sarba karma A ba ra NA nI bi sho d+ha ya bi sha d+ha yA bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Ta ne na swA hA/dron dam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/sangs rgyas thams cad
91a7(rgyud): bskyed pa/byang chub sems dpa'i yum/'phral tu sdig pa 'phrog pa/byang chub sbyin par byed pa 'di lta ste/bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams
91b1(rgyud): cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus//'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro//gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur//de nas
91b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i/
91b3(rgyud): slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thabs sre ba'i phyir te/sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes
91b4(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drer 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas/byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur
91b5(rgyud): te/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzir
91b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /sems can bsod nams
91b7(rgyud): chung ngu rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//
92a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
92a2(rgyud): dang dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lho dang /mi dang /lA ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan
92a3(rgyud): 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso///
92a4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/b+ha ga ba ti prAdz+nyA pU ra mi tA hri da ya/bod skad du/bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po//bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi
92a5(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun
92a6(rgyud): chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
92a7(rgyud): kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
92b1(rgyud): byin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/tshe dang ldan pa shA
92b2(rgyud): ri'i bus/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
92b3(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des/ji ltar bslab par bya/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha
92b4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso//shA ri'i bu/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol
92b5(rgyud): tu phyin pa zang mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des/'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par yang dag par rje su blta'o//
92b6(rgyud): gzugs stong pa'o//stong pa nyid gzugaso//gzugs lasastong pa nyid gzhan ma yino//stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yino//de bzhin du tshor
92b7(rgyud): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/chos thams cad stong pa nyid/mtshan nyid
93a1(rgyud): med pa/mya skyes pa/ma na/sa bu/dri ma med pa/rlo m+b+ha dang bral ba ma ba/zlab mod /grang ba med du'o//shA ro bu dro stangs/
93a2(rgyud): na/stong pa nyid la gzugs med/tshero ba med/'du shes med/'du byed rnams med/rnam pa shes pa med/mig med/rtsu ba myed/sku med/ste meng
93a3(rgyud): lus med/yid med/gzugs med/sgra myed/dri myed/ro med/reg bya med/chos med//mig gis khams med pa nas/yid kyi khams med/yid
93a4(rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang medo//ma rig bya med/ma rig po zad pa med/rga shi med/rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang mdo//sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung
93a5(rgyud): bri dang /'gog pa dang /lam med/ye shes med/thob pa med/ma thob pa yang mdo//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i
93a6(rgyud): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te/sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las
93a7(rgyud): ngas pa'i mthar phyin to//dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten nas/bla na med pa yang dag par
93b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyaso//de lta bas nA/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/rig pa chen po'i sngags/bla na med pa'i sngags/mi mnyam
93b2(rgyud): pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
93b3(rgyud): sngags smras pa/tad+ya thA/oM ga te ge te pA ra ga te/pA ra saM ga te/bo d+hi swA hA/shU ri'i bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/de ltar
93b4(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha
93b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legaso zhes bya ba byin nas/lagaso legs//rigs kyi bu de de bzhino//rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin/
93b6(rgyud): dushes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyod por bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rje su yi rang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
93b7(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang ///lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /
94a1(rgyud): dri zur bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bsta//bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha
94a2(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog so////sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sdigs dang bcas pa/sangs
94a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i tsan dan
94a4(rgyud): zhim po'i spos chus byugs pa'i sku/zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par
94a5(rgyud): mdzad pa/ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/gzugs mdzes pa/mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/
94a6(rgyud): dpe byad kyis rgyan pa/yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshalo//pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags
94a7(rgyud): bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing /snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/dpo' zhing gsal ba la nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i
94b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo//lud do//oM b+h+r-i/d+d+ha/A U/NAM/shi ba shi ga/nA ta to//
94b2(rgyud): sha ma shA ma? sha mu pa ya/tA thA ga ta/a nu ga tA/swa b+hA ba/a b+hU ba/sa mud tA ya/a sa ma bA la/a bi r-i la bA la/a mi ti ba la/a ti ba la/haM b+h+yAM g+h+rA/
94b3(rgyud): b+h+yod+d+ho/b+h+yob+h+yo/d+h+yedud+d+he d+ha/d+hIt+te/b+hU byA d+h+waM/b+hU b+h+r-i d+hAk+Sha sI ra tA d+d+ho g+h+ra m+bi t+tha/ts+tshati kir/pra ba kik+ko ShAn+d+ha sh+lA ka s+yAd+ha/de nas dpe byud mtshan gsal bas//yin
94b4(rgyud): thams cad rab brgyan cing //nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba'o//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mnga' ba//grags shing dri mi rab spangs la//dri med skyon bal chos kyi blo//khyab
94b5(rgyud): bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan//rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po//rin chen sa gzhi chen po la//pho brang rtse mo rdo rje rtse//rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa//nor bu
94b6(rgyud): du ma rab 'phro zhing //'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na//thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la//seng ge'i khri rten yangs la bzhugs//nor
94b7(rgyud): bu'i dbyig gi sa gzhi dang //khri chen rab dpa' de nyid la//de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyi//phun sum tshogs pa brgyan bkod lta//thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od//
95a1(rgyud): na ga/ na/sbyin du rgyu sa na //dos na/sgyu smra nas la ldan
95a2(rgyud): klas pa rgyus pa g-i k+Sha~M/ di khye skye ni/min po na sa/la 'khor chen po zhugs pa s+ho// rjecan dag /
95a3(rgyud): yin de kun dog byas nas//dkyi lakhor dri myed bskor bar byed//ngan song de ma tshig rlom pan+ta//leg+nas pAr shin tu dag pas//srid gsum dkyil
95a4(rgyud): rnam pa dri mi 'dog smra/blo dang myi m+bu sa pa//da nas bde chen rnan//rdo rjeras kyi bo g+sas pa / ma basmos nad du zhugs//du
95a5(rgyud): sa pa'i rgyu TIg/ ni thog sbyar 'gyu//klu snronas nas sgrags pa ga//de rje nas skye sa ng+ge sa
95a6(rgyud): kyis rnam par rten//jishA m+med mi n+da no myur cing //dz+nyAn las langs te steg 'dzilda nas//sregus par mchod b+h+yas skr-i s+yA d+hAn+tu// ma skye ba'i rgyus
95a7(rgyud): shing der bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sol//rin sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa//bub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungaso//de gzigs dge 'dum ban+tis//sangs
95b1(rgyud): rgyas blo gros rgyus par gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che//bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang //rgyud mar sbyangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing //spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi//yon/
95b2(rgyud): tron+da 'di yi sgo spros ldan 'di//thob pas spro bar mi nuso//longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po tsan//byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du//rgyal mtshig rnams kyis dbang bskur/
95b3(rgyud): ba'i/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos chen ldan//'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis//sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams//ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni//blo gros dri ma med par
95b4(rgyud): 'gyur//zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la//rdul med rgyan te zhi bar byed//dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel//sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms//dbang byed gsang
95b5(rgyud): sngags dam pa ste//sa stengs sdig pa thams cad sel//ma slad 'bras bu nges par sbyin//bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul//nyes pa byas pa sel ba yi//gzungs
95b6(rgyud): 'di gang gis thos gyur des//sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang //ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur//sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing //khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel
95b7(rgyud): bdagang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa//gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis//kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni//lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob//rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po
96a1(rgyud): yang //'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur//'jig rten kun la lham me ba//bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyi//dkyil 'khor dam pa
96a2(rgyud): gting med pa//'di ni ji srid ma gsun par//rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi//rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te//rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas//gsan ma thag
96a3(rgyud): tu rnam par dag/de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang //legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya//gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas//thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa//
96a4(rgyud): 'khor ba 'di ni nam du yang //bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang //mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa//gzungs la gnas pas 'thob par 'gyur//gnas kyi dmA pa thos
96a5(rgyud): nas kyang //thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo//gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i//bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur//legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni//tshig
96a6(rgyud): gi mdo 'di mnyan par bgyis//nyon mongs zad par bya ba la//rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'dis chog/sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang //sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab
96a7(rgyud): 'jungs pa//gang gis thos nas des spong ba//nga yis mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur//sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing //snga ma rnams kyang bshegs par bya//
96b1(rgyud): gzungs mchog gi nI mthu stobs kyis//sdig pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur//tshe rabs bzhan ni sbyong dag dang //tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang //sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa//
96b2(rgyud): dag 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//yar gyi ngo ma ches brgyad dang //de bzhin rje ni bco lnga la//sten gnas legs par sbyar blangs te//cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod//de nas
96b3(rgyud): rmongs pa med par yang //nyon mongs dgra ni rabya 'joms shing //shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa//nyes pa bzlog pa'i gzungs brjod na//thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/
96b4(rgyud): 'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur//de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yid //rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur//'od dpyad med la mnga' ba yi//yon tan mtha' yas ra
96b5(rgyud): rgyan pa//bskal pa bye ba stong du yang //mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje 'chang gi tshig/dkyil 'khor drug na gnas rnams kyis//thos nus rgyun rnams
96b6(rgyud): sna tshogs pa//bcom ldan 'dres la dbul bar byed//rdo rje ril bu la sogs pa//lha bdag gsal ba thams cang dang //ri bo ti se rI ra ba la//gnas pa'i rig sngags
96b7(rgyud): 'ching rnams dang //de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na//yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang //ma la ya ya~M ri zo la//gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang //khya
97a1(rgyud): 'jug lha chen la sogs pa//m+b+ha yi bdag po rnams dang ni//lug na rdo rje la sogs pa//byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams//
97a2(rgyud): nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang //rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus//rab tu bskyed langs nas ni//sdig brel mnga' bdug rgyu lA~M pA la//phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/
97a3(rgyud): kun gyi sa yi dbang phyug go/thub mchog dam pa de la ni//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod//mnyem nyid chos de de bzhin nyid//shin tu rtogs pa la mo mye ba//
97a4(rgyud): dul ba bstan pa dri ma sel//dri ma med pa skyon bral ba//thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi//'jig rten mgron po skye dgu'i bdag/de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul//
97a5(rgyud): de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba//ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste//sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral//'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa//dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang
97a6(rgyud): sras nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa//ston pa po de dri ma silnga//spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang po//zab pa rnam phyir gnon pa brtan//btsun po thugs brtse
97a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyal//mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa//zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral//bcings pa las grol nges par grol//'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa//
97b1(rgyud): byadag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med//nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan//dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa//mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa//khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams
97b2(rgyud): spong rnar khengs pa med pa dman pa med//mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam//snang ba mnyes pa sna byed med//'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa//sgrib pa thams cad
97b3(rgyud): spangs pa ste//'jig rten kun la phan par brtson//dpa' bo zhi bzhi mdzad pa//nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad//mnga' bdag thebs mkhyen thabs che ba//sems
97b4(rgyud): can kun gyi 'khrus lags//don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan//rdo rje dkyil 'khor thub par dka'//skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste//de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin
97b5(rgyud): pa dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med//gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba//chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags//dpe
97b6(rgyud): byad bzang po bkod pa'i sa//sbas pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston//dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po//de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa//mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba//bdud bzhi'i
97b7(rgyud): stobs rnams sel mdzad pa//brtson chen spro ba che ba ste//dgyes pa chen po stobs po che//mthu brnyes bstan pa chen po ste//gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags//
98a1(rgyud): gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa//dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal//rab tu zhi ba mun pa med//blo gros chen po chos 'dzin te//phun sum tshogs
98a2(rgyud): ldan sa chen brnyes//'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa//dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan//dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyas//bcom ldan legs bag pa go
98a3(rgyud): bar mdzad//gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas//mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa//mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag medo//rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal///
98a4(rgyud): gzhi bcas sel ba mnyam pa ljags//blo dang blo ldan dri ma spangs//gnas chen brtan pa ldan pa ste//rgyal ba longs spyod dri ma med//thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba//
98a5(rgyud): bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs//de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel//dri med skyon bral longs spyod can//sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes//sku
98a6(rgyud): bzang dag pa rig pa'i mchog/thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba//mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags//chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas//rjed 'os mchog gnas
98a7(rgyud): loyongs spyod che//na mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo//ran chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis po//khyu mchog che spyan brdzi ma//rgyal bskyon bsal shes rab can//shes rab
98b1(rgyud): thabs dang ldan pa ste//'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das//dag par longs spyod brtan pa dang //sa dang skyobs dang ye shes bzod//pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'//ting 'dzin
98b2(rgyud): mnyam par longs spyad pa//rnam par bgo lo mngon sum pa//stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mAny+tsam//chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags//thams cad mkhyen pa yul
98b3(rgyud): las 'das//spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba//byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal//dmA pa'i don te tshul che ba//shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la//sgrib pa med
98b4(rgyud): par 'char ba brnyes//rIn chen 'thun par skyes pa ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas//khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes//mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun
98b5(rgyud): dang mnyam//don chen shin tu mthar phyin po//nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'//dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa//gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin//blo rgya che ba thams
98b6(rgyud): tsAd mkhyen//thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan//dkon pa bde bar 'thob 'gyur ba//mo nyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan//'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon//
98b7(rgyud): zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'//bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul//dpe med pa ste dper bya ba//'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan//legs gsung blo yi//
99a1(rgyud): stobs kyis 'byung //mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa//rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can//gsung ba chen po ye shes che//gnas chen
99a2(rgyud): bkra shis chen po ste//mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das//bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po//sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste//shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba//kun
99a3(rgyud): mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can//'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba//kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste//thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs ljon po//rdzu 'phrul rol
99a4(rgyud): pa'i thabs dang ldan//chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po//rab ston yon tan bsgyur mdzad pa//spyod pa ma lus 'dud par mdzad//yongasu rdzogs pa rnam par dag/
99a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas//babye bras med ma legs byed pa bcom//bdud kyi dregasro pa sel byar mdzad//g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes//dpa'
99a6(rgyud): po chen po thub med stobs//theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs//blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi//nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs//theg pa chen po'i tshul
99a7(rgyud): la gnas//theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa//nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can//rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste//sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras bu gnas//gang
99b1(rgyud): mam than thamamams mamashams mtha.am thas naHsamams mas mal mam ca ga mas/ga.as yang a tha las ca mam tham
99b2(rgyud): nas gong du khyad par mkhyen//khyod ni na mkha'i gnas na bya zhubs//badre 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi//mtsho cheR+Ya dag pa longs par spyod//sangs rgyas dpyang po rgyas pa la/
99b3(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas//de la lha tshogs tshogs rnams kyis//phyeg byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod//de nas dkyil 'khor chen pon//gnas pa ma lus
99b4(rgyud): chem mer 'khod//zod du rdo rje'i bod 'ching zhing //langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos//dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du//skad ber chen por yongs bka nas//nor
99b5(rgyud): bu'i rgyan+da ni rnam g.yo zhing //ha ha drag pa'i sgra sgrogs te//kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che//bskal pa grangs med gsum bas gras pa//byang chub sems sogs mchog
99b6(rgyud): rnams kyis//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod//kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang //gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod//'bras bu
99b7(rgyud): chen po 'grub par 'gyur//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsdigs bcas pa//bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na no//sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang //sdig pa thams cad dag
99b8(rgyud): pa 'thob/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na//sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing //nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs//shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur//
100a1(rgyud): /don longs spyod rten po dang //bad ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur//de ni ni rabs thams cad du//tho ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur//donas pa/
100a2(rgyud): thod 'ching bya//yon tan mtha' yas sras de la//bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis//mngon sum gtigs nas dka' stsal pa//rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/
100a3(rgyud): dmyal ma tshags kyin mdus rloms//'dren rten pade bsnyen las 'dus//de bzhin gshegs di mngon du gas//bzhon gyim tshugs pa rgyus de ni/
100a4(rgyud): mtshon brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa//de dag rnam dag bdag nyid do//sems can kun la bde 'dod pa//lan+da cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang //de dag sa chen 'bras bur
100a5(rgyud): 'gyur//ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na//'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos//de phyir rtag tu rab sgrims lnga//gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis//yon tan rgyu
100a6(rgyud): mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs//mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya//gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod//bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni//de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la//
100a7(rgyud): gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur//'di ni yon tan kun gyi snad//dge pa phun sum tshogs sbyin pa//kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchog/bde 'byung thob par byed pa
100b1(rgyud): yin//'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung //thob par myi 'gyur dogs pa med//kun mkhyen bro 'brang thob gyur nas//dpe me gan su 'gro bar 'gyur//'di ni dge zhing 'bras bur/
100b2(rgyud): stan/rasangs rgyas so yi 'bras bu sbyin//yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan//snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa//'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo//'jig rten kun gnas dga' bya ste/
100b3(rgyud): 'jig rten kun gyi bde 'byung ba//'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med//ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs
100b4(rgyud): so/rgya gur skad du/Ar+ya mAny+dzu shrI mU la tin+t+ra/bod skad du/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtswa ba'i rgyud/spangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
100b5(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi na mkha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa'
100b6(rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dad pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom
100b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag khyed cag nyon cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
101a1(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /
101a2(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/tshe dang /nad med pa dang /dbang phyug
101a3(rgyud): dang rtswa yid la bsams pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dgra sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/de shin tu legs par nyon la
101a4(rgyud): zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te/
101a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ti de 'dzin gyi khyad par dang /sa chen po thob par bya ba dang /rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang /bdud gdul ba dang /chos kyi
101a6(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang /lha rnams dang /mi rnam su skye bar bya ba dang /sdug bsngal dang /
101a7(rgyud): dbul ba dang /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa/longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi
101b1(rgyud): byud pa/re ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu myong bar byed pa ma yin pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis byams/
101b2(rgyud): po'i thugs dang /phan pa'i thugs dang /bdag dang sems can thams cad thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan
101b3(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/yul rnam
101b4(rgyud): par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang /byang chub/
101b5(rgyud): sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/'od bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum
101b6(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu song nas/byang shar phyogasu brgya stong gi gang ga'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig
101b7(rgyud): rten gyi kham su rje su zhugs te/gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro//der yang 'jam dpal gzhon
102a1(rgyud): nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig pa nas par gyur te//
102a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/rgyal
102a3(rgyud): ba'i sras dag 'od di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smraso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
102a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas 'od gang na ba de logasu mngon du bltas nas 'dug/de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog
102a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum
102a6(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

102b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas pus ma g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
102b2(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni btsam

102b6(rgyud): 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs po la gsol pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na
102b7(rgyud): phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang /'og dang /thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur

103b1(rgyud): thugs kyis sngags gsungaso//na maHsarba bud+ya d+hA nAM oM maM/'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur

103b3(rgyud): mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/mi mjed
103b4(rgyud): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chus te song ba dang /steng gi na mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang mA'i ris kyi lho rnams gnasu chas te/gnas gtsang
103b5(rgyud): ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ban+de bya bI ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//'jam dpal
103b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs mu thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /rin po che'i gdugs dang /dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya
103b7(rgyud): che ba'i lha'i gos dang /dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jom dpal gzhon
104a1(rgyud): nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/'on kyang nga'i bkrus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/nyam da nga chung
104a2(rgyud): ngamabaskyod pa yang ngam/bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin
104a3(rgyud): gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhan yang gzhon nu gang ga'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa

104b3(rgyud): shes na song shig/shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro//yang gsungs pa/na maHsarba ta thA ga/

108b1(rgyud): dag rab tu byed pa/ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde stong pal phyo rgya bskul pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam 'di ngas kyang rje su gnang zhing /
108b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/sems can dag pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyi chos kyi mdzod skye bo mang po la phan po dang /skye bo mang pa la bde ba
108b3(rgyud): dang /lha dang /mi rnams dang /sems can thams cad kyi don du bstan pa'i phyir//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cod kyi byin gyis brlabs
108b4(rgyud): pa 'od kyi snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od kyi snang
108b5(rgyud): bas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar dang /myanar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar du khyab par
108b6(rgyud): byas te/sems can gang mu dog shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar gyur to//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub
108b7(rgyud): sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas/'od yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to//
109a1(rgyud): 'dir gang dug shAr phyobs na rnam par byan sa pa'i sngangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'od zer rlung gang kyil 'jar gyi rig pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas bcom
109a2(rgyud): ldan 'das yang dag par bskul te/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai nur+ya'i 'od dang /de
109a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sa lami
109a4(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ye shes rnam par nges
109a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes
109a6(rgyud): bya ba dang /de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba mtha' yas mi med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
109a7(rgyud): dog nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag la/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
109b1(rgyud): nas gtsang ma khong bdang sun de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus shAn+d+ha thub pa dang /'angam dal bzhin nur gyur pa snu
109b2(rgyud): cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang /sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam ston te/de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang gi phyogs dang /phyogs
109b3(rgyud): mtshams dang /steng dang /'og dang /thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zheng snang bar byas te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdud kyi gnas thams
109b4(rgyud): cad dpa' bskong bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongasu bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun gyis bltas te/gnas gtsang
109b5(rgyud): ma'i gnasu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po blta bar 'dod pa dang /sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang /
109b6(rgyud): le'u'i tshogs dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa gsal bar 'dod pas chas pa ni 'di lta ste/lag bzang dang /rin chen bzang po dang /brtul
109b7(rgyud): zhugs bzang po dang /spyan mdzes dang /bzang dga' dang /chos bzang dang /don thams cad grub pa dang /thams cad du 'phags pa dang /chos 'phags dang /
