110a2(rgyud): dpal dang /don thams cad kyi dpal dang /thams cad phyag na rin po che dang /phyag na gtsub bI rin po che dang /phyag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /rnam par snang
110a3(rgyud): mdzad snying po dang /rin chen snying po dang /ye shes snying po dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don gyi snying po dang /chos 'phags kyi snying po dang /rgyal mtshan bye tog
110a4(rgyud): dang /trog bzang dang //mtha' yas tog dang /dri ma med pa'i tog dang /mtha' dag gi tog dang /na mkha'i tog dang /rin po che'i tog dang /'brug sgra dang /

110a7(rgyud): rgyal po dang /rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyal po dang /nges par g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang /nyi ma'i rgyal po dang /dngos po med pa yang dag par

110b3(rgyud): par dka' ba dang /las med dang /'og min dang /dri med dang /me dang /'od dang /blo dang /rtogs pa dang /bde ba dang /bde ba'i mu khyud dang /mu khyud tog dang /

112a7(rgyud): don/'jig rten sgrub pa'i don/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la dgod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i reg pa'i tshig dang /

122b6(rgyud): na maSh+Ta sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a b+hU bi swa b+hA ba mung+ga tA nAM/na maHpra t+yaM ka bud d+hA Ar+ya shrA ba kA nAM/na mo bo d+hi sa twA nAM/da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Ti te shwa rA NAM/bo d+hi sa twA nAM/mu hA
122b7(rgyud): sa tra nAM/tad+ya bA/oM kha khi khA hi khI hi/duSh+pe sa tra da ma ka a saM mu se la pa ra shu pA sha haste/tsa tur+N+Na dzaM/tsa tur+m+ma khaM/Sha Ta tsi ra Na/gen+d+haM gats+tsha/sarba paMg+h+na big+h+r-i te/
123a1(rgyud): d+ha/ nAn+da/sa sh+lokad+hA/ na no hU~M/ nasan/klu na/sna/ m+b+ha/sna /
123a2(rgyud): shr-I p+tA/par mud d+hA.AkarA ya I kai r+tha y+Ya/sa b+hUt+thAn/nirmA ba ni mi pa/san puM na//pra be+e sha ya za bo shi mamaH b+h+yAM/ba bi sa Sh+radzi bi tAn
123a3(rgyud): s+yAr+Shukr-i ru ma ma saHk+ShAn+yaM/daM he dat+ta/pats+tsha pra tsa/mAM ba~M lam+ba m+bA bi lamAM/samA ya mi nu sma ra/hUM hUM phaT/s+tho Ta yA s+pho na ya/sanA sha pu ri thA /
123a4(rgyud): kaun+yai rU ya sim+b+ha ma saHrba sA d+ha ya//'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khri'i chen po g+ha shAn rje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te/gshin
123a5(rgyud): rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang /'gugs par byed pa yin na sems can gzhan lta skyes kyang ci dgos/khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngogs 'di smras me

123a7(rgyud): 'gas par 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/skyob pa gzhan med/

123b2(rgyud): pa dang /mngal nas skyes pa dang /sgo nga las skyes pa dang /drod gsher las skyes pa dang /brdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gyi grangasu gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
123b3(rgyud): mtha' yas pa dag na rnam par gnas pa steng dang /'og dang /bad ka dang /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang /yud tsam de la gab cing gnas pa
123b4(rgyud): dag skad cig de nyid la khro bo'i rgyal po chen po 'di nyid bkug par gyur to//khro bo rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ci'i
123b5(rgyud): phyir na/de yang 'chi bar 'gyur pa 'am/skam par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/sku gdung dong bcas pa'i
123b6(rgyud): mchod rten nAm/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bzlas par bya'o//yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjod par bya ste/gang de dang de dag tu ni
123b7(rgyud): brjod par mi bya ste/ci'i phyir zhe na/ltas ngan chen po dang /mya ngan chen po dang /bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir//thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i/
124a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kho na'i spyod pa rjesu
124a2(rgyud): sgrub cing bstan pa dang /sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /chos kyi tshul yang dag pA gan par bya ba dang sems can gyi khams mtha' dag mya ngan las 'das
124a3(rgyud): pa yang dag par thob par bya ba dang /bstan pa med pa dag tu bstan pa dang /lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi go dung mi bcad pa
124a4(rgyud): dang /sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang /thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu mthun pa'i thugs kyis bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa dang /bgegs chen po rnam

130a1(rgyud): dang /sna tshogs mag ldan ma dang /rdzogs byed ma dang /bzang po ma dang /sa rags bzang po ma dang /dra ltar sgru ba dang /'grus rgya/
130a2(rgyud): ma dang /mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang /rgyal ma dang /rnam pa rgya la mA dang /nam zlu ma dang /sgra gcan ma dang /sgra mthar byed ma dang /rlung ma dang /yid 'phrog mo
130a3(rgyud): dang /yid ldan me da/mai tog ldan ma dang /me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang /s+yAd sgyu ma dang /'phrog ma dang /dpal ldan ma dang /da' mo pa/
130a4(rgyud): dpe'i b.rang mi dang /shin tu mi bzad me dang /mi bzad ldan me dang /lha mdzes ma dang /ro bzod ma dang /gsang ba dam pa ma dang /shing la mu la gnas ma dang /
130a5(rgyud): mya ngan med ma dang /mun par mdzes ma dang /snang bar mdzes ma dang /'di ldan ma dang /lhag par ldan ma dung /gzugs mdzes ma dang /gur myed pa nga/
130a6(rgyud): zhi ba mye /phyugs mtshams m+b+ha dang /skud pa dang /dpe byed ma dang /ba'i dga' byed ma dang /'jig rten las 'das ma ste/nod sbyin po chen
130a7(rgyud): dag ga rjid sbyin ma po rgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyong ring ba nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAn+ya thub pa 'i phyag 'tshal na
130b1(rgyud): khod par gyur te/glang yang shA Tam dag shA TA moM ban+d+ha stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor rgyud kyim 'khor rkyen po dang rgyung ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das
130b2(rgyud): thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/sdud mi dang /phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang /shA za drag mo dang /sha za mo sker mda' ma dang /sha zam
130b3(rgyud): b.rA ma dang /thal ba za ma dang /sha za ma dang /dug ma dang /bung ba ma dang /rmongs byed ma dang /bsdigs mdzub ma dang /dmar ldan ma dang /gleng dmar ma dang /
130b4(rgyud): 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang /thal bar nye gnas ma dang /shing bI lu dang /ldan ma dang /mang ldan mi dang /mang ma dang /gdul 'a ma dang /oM lam+b+ha dang /mtshan
130b5(rgyud): byed mya dang /du ba lnga gnas ma dang /dub ma ste/sheza mo chen mye 'di dag she za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
130b6(rgyud): chen po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to//gang yang ma mo dang /ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rje su rnam par stod cing sems can rnams la 'tsho bar byed
130b7(rgyud): cing gtor ma dang /me tog de man ma la spyod par byed pa dge la 'di lta ste/tshangs pa ma dang /dbang phyug cheni po ma dang /khyab 'jug ma dang /gzhon nu ma dang /
131a1(rgyud): rgan byung ma dang /phag mo dang /dbang mo dang /gshin rje mo dang /me phyogs ma dang /nyi ma'i bu mo dang /'jig rten mthar byed ma
131a2(rgyud): dang /chu lce me dang /dbang ldan mo dang /rlung phyogs ma dang /gzhan gyi skyog 'phro bla me dang /mgo bregs ma dang /bya ma dang /bye ma chen mo dang /srul mo dang /
131a3(rgyud): lus srul mo dang /skem byed ma ste/mu mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der/
131a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod par gyur to//de bzhin du mi dang /mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang /sems can
131a5(rgyud): dang /sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po man+dar med pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir na mkha' dkyil du snang bar gyur to//
131a6(rgyud): sems can gyi ris na srog chags su la yang phan tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
131a7(rgyud): rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to//de nas
131b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi sde rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkal
131b2(rgyud): stsal pa/dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang /ting 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i
131b3(rgyud): dus la bab par sems ne shod cig/de nas 'dzum dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjesu gnang bar mdzad pa na mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje mthug
131b4(rgyud): cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal
131b5(rgyud): med khang de dpag tshad brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to//gang du gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /dri za dang /rlung lha dang /sha za
131b6(rgyud): de dag dang /mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur te/der
131b7(rgyud): rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang phan tshun rnam par 'tsho bar byed pa medado//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par
132a1(rgyud): gyur par shes nus khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa/kye khro ba chen po spangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
132a2(rgyud): kyi rje su nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig srungs shig/dbang du gyis shig/ma rungs
132a3(rgyud): pa gdul bar gyis shig/sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig/sems can thams cad dad par gyis shig/ji srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rje su
132a4(rgyud): sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu song la srung ba gyis
132a5(rgyud): shig/de skad ces smras pa dang /khro bo'i rgyal po chen po so bka' mnyan nas khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rje su srung ba dang /rje su bstan
132a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang /steng dang /'og dang /thad
132a7(rgyud): ka ngag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to//de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang /yid dang /sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur to//
132b1(rgyud): bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to//'di lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te/gang dam chu ba 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de dag ni ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo
132b2(rgyud): tshal pa brgya ru 'gas par 'gyur te/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yi no//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i
132b3(rgyud): don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/gcig po gang
132b4(rgyud): zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjesu mthong ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na
132b5(rgyud): sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/gnyis pa gang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang /sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o//chos gsum
132b6(rgyud): dang ldan+da na sngags kyi spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/gsum po gang zhe na/sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
132b7(rgyud): tshul khrims kyi sdom po srung ba dang /rang gi sngags yongasu mi gtong ba nyid//chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
133a1(rgyud): sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/bzhi pa gang zhe nA/rang gi sngabs yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang /gzhan gyi sngags rje su gcad pa med
133a2(rgyud): pa nyid dang //sems can+da thams cad li byams pas gnas pa nyid dang /snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid//chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
133a3(rgyud): nadang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyuraro//chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa
133a4(rgyud): grub pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/lnga po gang zhe na/rnam par dben pa'i phyogasra yang dag par bsten pa nyid dang /bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid//
133a5(rgyud): sems can gzhan ldan stong med pa nyid dang /'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid

133a7(rgyud): par 'gyur te/drug po gang zhe na/dkon mchog gsum la dang po rjesu mi gcod pa nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa' la dang ba rje su mi gcod pa nyid dang /'jig rten dang
133b1(rgyud): rig N+Din las 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings thos pa myed pa la lta ba nyid dang /thab pa chen po'i mdo ste zazla ma'i tshig go don mi spong
133b2(rgyud): ra skye ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /sdigs kyi stong pa yongasu btsas bya dang /rige pa'i phyi bus yangasu mi ga cod pa nyid do/chos drug pa 'di ga dang ldan nA rig pa
133b3(rgyud): sbyong pa dang sngags 'brub cing meng dag par bsgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro//tshwas bdun dang ldan no rig pa sgrub de'i dus kyi thobs thob par 'gyur zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la rdzas
133b4(rgyud): spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/bdun po gang zhe na/theg pa nitso mo shes rab kyi pha rim+b+ha tu phyin pa nyid rnams pa dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /'don du 'jug pa dang /

133b7(rgyud): dang zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang /rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang /snying rje chen po dang /byams pa

134b1(rgyud): nyid dang thugs pa mthu drug dang bralnga pa d+hidr-i d+ma ts+tsha yod 'grus rlom la/sangs rgyas dang byang chub po myas dpa' la bdag nyid dum bar spyod pa nyid dang /myang/

135a1(rgyud): bsgrub pAr bya ba ma yin//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rang sangs rgyas dang //

135a5(rgyud): la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang /'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /yid lo byed par 'gyur ba'am/g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa

135b6(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bya

136a2(rgyud): gyur pa la smras pa/sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rje su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byam gyi spyod pa sgrub pa sems can thams cid
136a3(rgyud): kyi thun mong du gyur pa/khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten los 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa

136a5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smraso//rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par

136b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshod kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang /dpa' bo gcig pa dang /spyan drang ba dang /gshog su

136b6(rgyud): po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis smras te/bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste khro bo'i
136b7(rgyud): spyi bor bzhag pa byoso//'di skad du yang smras te/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongasu gsol/gang su dag

137a2(rgyud): tshige la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur to//khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad

137a4(rgyud): par gyur nas/chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/gnas ji lta ba bzhin gnas par byas nas sems can

137a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de la yang blta ste nus sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa
137a7(rgyud): bcod par 'gyur te/gang gi phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub
137b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid lu zung shizla dang bshad par bya'o//oM AH
137b2(rgyud): na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/oM ru ra sma re a pra tI ha ta shA sa na/ku mA ra rU pe d+hA ri Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/grogs po drag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yin te/'phags pa
137b3(rgyud): 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yino//phyag rgya ni gtsug pud lnga pa zhes glags te/de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad pa zhes bya'o//
137b4(rgyud): snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin te/oM bA kye daM nA maH'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum zhes bya ba yin te/longs spyod
137b5(rgyud): thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o//'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/bA kye hU~M/'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pud gsum pa zhes grags pa yi ni
137b6(rgyud): twe/sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yino//'dir snying po mchog tu 'gyur ba ni maM/'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa
137b7(rgyud): yin te/sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o//gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod/dpal mchog tu byed
138a1(rgyud): dag byed chen po/srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ngan 'gro thams cad bzlogs par byed pa/zhi ba thams cad byed pa/
138a2(rgyud): las/thams cad byed pa/mya ngan lus 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/byang chub sems dpa'
138a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa/re ba thams
138a4(rgyud): cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga yang yongasu sbyor bar byed na bzlas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de yang gang zhe na/
138a5(rgyud): oM A bI ra hU~M khe tsa ra/grogs po dag 'di ni yi ge brgyad po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid yin te/sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu
138a6(rgyud): nye bar gnas pa yino//mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang me nus te/'dir
138a7(rgyud): phyag rgya yang stobs po che zhes rnam par grags pa/re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'o//spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/oM he he ku mA ra bi shwa rU pi Ni/sarba pA la
138b1(rgyud): b+hU shi Ta pra bo d+ha ne/uM h+ye hi bA ga bAn/e h+ye hi ku mA ra/kr-I Da nut+pa la d+hu ri Na maN+Da la ma d+h+ye tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA na hAM/mA bi lo ba
138b2(rgyud): ku ru phiT swA hA//'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngagaso//sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /rang sangs
138b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dro za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mI 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
138b4(rgyud): chen po dang /sha za dang /srin po dang /'byung po thams cad kyi nga yin//con den gyi chur byas te/lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhi dang /steng dang /'og
138b5(rgyud): dang thams cad du gtor na sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /'jig
138b6(rgyud): rten dang 'jig rten lngas 'das pa thams cad dang /sngags dang /de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang /sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro//na maHsarba
138b7(rgyud): bud d+hA nAn/oM pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/oM d+hud+hA ra d+hu ra d+hA ma bA sa ni/d+hu ma raiHshi hU~M tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu s+tha ra swA hA/bdug pa'i sdig so//tsan dan dang /gdung
139a1(rgyud): dang /gur gum gcig tu byas te/bdug pas bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /sems
139a2(rgyud): n+dan thams cad bdug pasna tshim zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyuraro//'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni//pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa//thams cad 'gugs byed
139a3(rgyud): zhi ba yin//spyan drang ba yi sngags la yang //pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po zhes//bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /sem
139a4(rgyud): can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar byi ste/gA pur dang /tsAn dan dang /gur gum chu dang sbyar nas me trog su mA dang /mA li kA dang /dbyar gyi me tog
139a5(rgyud): dang dme tog pu na ka dang /me tog pa ku la dang /me tog pir+t+ti ta ga ru 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog grom/dus ji lta ba'i me tog dri zhim po bcug ste/sngags
139a6(rgyud): 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o//na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/tAd+ya thA/he he muhA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni/Arga pra tIts+tsha pa ya/
139a7(rgyud): sa ma ya ma nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be shaM pra be sha/sarba d+hU tA nu kaM pa kaM gr-ih+Na hU~M/oM pa ra bi ts+tshi ri Ne swA hA/'dir yang phyag rgya ni gang bi zhes bya bar
139b1(rgyud): grags pa sems can thams cad rjes ldathun nong brtan pa'o//'dor yang de'i sdug smra 'gyur ba ni/na madz+dzas man+ta dzududu na/na maHsa ma na u zlas smra sa//
139b2(rgyud): katA ya/tad+haD+D+h+ya/kanan+d+hekani d+hI kad+hi ng+ge/ts+tshin mo rati/pred+hIts+tshi b+h+rUM d+hIm+b+hi ma~M/kaud+d+hi sa med+hats+tshi N+Di swA/ phyug rgyur 'gyurahU~M nas
139b3(rgyud): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o//'dir me tog gi sngags 'gyu r-I dI nI/ni maHsam+b+han+ta bud d+hA nA~M/oM br-i ti hatashwAs+t+ra nAn+taM/nA ma sa~M kra sa mI tai rA dza skye
139b4(rgyud): ta thA ga ta s+ye/tad+ya thA/ku su ma ku su me ku sa ma d+ho/ku su ma b+hA rab+hA si ni/ku su ma bu ti swA hU~M/bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang /gong du bstan pa'i bdug pos
139b5(rgyud): bdug par bya'o//skye ni rmeng byung bsam mr-i khyab//sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal to//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gasbyangs pa yi//gau tor ma'i sngags ni bshad
139b6(rgyud): pa bya//no maHsarba bud+yAd+hA nA~M/u pra tits+tshaHshwA sanA nA/tad+ya b+hU/he b+h+yo gar+b+he/ma dz+nyA sa twe sar+b+bA ba oMk+Sho ta oM maM ba liM gr-ih+NA pa swa gr-ih+NA pA ya hU~M hrI/sarba dI Sh+Tha
139b7(rgyud): rar rdo rje phaT swA hA/'dis ni bshos dbul bar bya ste/'byung ba thams cad kyi gtor me yang bya'o//'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni mdu nga zhes bya 'i ma rungs pa
140a1(rgyud): /thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o//na mar+d+hasA man+ta bud d+hAnAM/a pra tI h+yA tA shA sA nA nAM/sar+b+ba ta mon d+ha krU rA bi dz+nye swA nAM/na mAn+tasu mAn+ta rdzu
140a2(rgyud): ti gran+d+harbe b+hA sa shri ye/ta thA ga ta ya/ted+h+ya thA/hwe he b+ha ga bAM/dz+yo ti rash+mi sha taM sa ha sra bra tI mr-iN+Di ta sha rI ra bi kur+tha bi kurba ma hA bo d+hi sa traM sa man+ta dz+nyA yod d+yo tir+t+ta
140a3(rgyud): murti l+r-i rdi khur+d+ra/a ba lo ka yau/a bo lo kA ya mau/maM sarba/sa twAM nAny+tsa swA hA/mar me'i sngags te/'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o//khi bye ba zhes bya
140a4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya ni sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o//naM mAHsa mAn+ta bud d+hAn+ti/oM pra ti hA tra shA si nA nAM/tad+ya thA/dz+wA la dz+wA la/dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya/hUM bi b+h+r-i da
140a5(rgyud): ka ha ri kr-iSh+Na ping+ga la swA hA/me'i bya ba byed pa'i sngagaso//'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni//sems can kun la 'od gisal byed//kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten
140a6(rgyud): grags//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyir//thub pa mchog gis sngon bshad pa'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag
140a7(rgyud): na rdo rje la smras pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang bar bya ba yin te/khyod bu 'jig rten rnam grags
140b1(rgyud): pa'o//ru mi bzud pa ni gang yin pa//sngags rnams dag ni thams cad kyis//mkhas pa rnams kyis sgrub pa ste//spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa//rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs
140b2(rgyud): kyang yin//de ni rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir//rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod//na muHsa min+ta bud+d+hadz+haiM/a pra tit+tadz+nyo shA sa nA nA~M/oM ka ra ka ra/kur+ya ke ra~M/ma ma
140b3(rgyud): k+ShAr+yaM b+hany+dzab+hany+dza/sarba big+h+nA da ha da sarba bodz+nyA bi nA ya k+ShaM mur+d+ha kaT dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ma hA bi kri ta rU paM d+hA raM NaM/pa tsa~M pa tsaM sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ma hA ga na pa ti dzi bi tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha
140b4(rgyud): ban d+ha sarba gr-i hAn/ShA NamU khA Sha Da b+hu dza/Sha Ta tsi ra Na ru dra me nA yaM/biSh+Nu ma nA ya/brah+ma d+ya de ba ma nA ya mA bi li br-i/la hu la hu maN+Da la ma d+h+yaM pra be sha yaM/
140b5(rgyud): sa ma ya ma nu smA re hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa
140b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba yin te/khro ba'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa ste/'di brjod pa tsam gyis sku bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
140b7(rgyud): dpa' yang 'jigs par byed pa yin na bgegs ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/'di brjed pa tsam nyid kyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro//'dir ying phyag
141a1(rgyud): rgyur 'gyur bya na//nan pa rtson gas bya ba // gyums rnams thams cadun byung na nad du na pa rdzun
141a2(rgyud): nAn sa shAd+d+hon+ta shAm+b+ha s+t+wa~M la phan phaT sU hA/sngags 'di rjod pas na thams ca de zlog gi r+ya chen po dang /rlud chen po dang
141a3(rgyud): rims kyi sna'i sa par 'gyuro//rtug tu dbye' ba med pa dang /byams pa med pa dang /skyed rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/dA zlas zin gyi bar du grol
141a4(rgyud): bar / rdzog rmyil zhin byed shA gas 'i sems nga du nan g-i rnam yid/hU~Md+hA nI ts+tsha
141a5(rgyud): na po nas byu ba sgyur ba rgyu/ hU~M snying po 'gyur sa ba d+hI swAt+ma/ nI TI gsumachen nas
141a6(rgyud): ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyuraro//s+t+rIng blo mchog sangs rgyus thams cad kyi byin gyis brla bsdu pa yi ge gcig pa rnaMs dz+ha
141a7(rgyud): 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o//phyag rgya yang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o//phung tshul thams cad 'azlog par byed pa/'thung po bams
141b1(rgyud): dbang du byed pa ste/mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dusu khyad par du 'phags
141b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//'dir gshegasu gsol ba'i sngagasu 'gyur ba ni/na maHsarba bud d+han+tu/oM pra ti ha ta shrI sa~M na nAM/tAd+yo thA/dzi ya dza ya su dza ya/mahA kA r+yA Ni ka
141b3(rgyud): bi shra rU pi Ni gAts+tsha sarba bud d+hA sh+tsa bi saR+Sha ya se ba bi bA ri swa b+hA ba nAM tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma rA sar+b+ban+tash+tsa mi/sid d+h+yan+na man+ta pU dA ma no ra thaM tsa/me pi ri pU ra
141b4(rgyud): yan+t+ra swA hA/'di ni ga shegasuM gsol ba'i sngags te/las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o//phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin te/'dis gdan la yang
141b5(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o//yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegasu gsolo//'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /sngags dang /
141b6(rgyud): sngags 'grub pa dag dang /dam tshig dang /bzlas pa dang /dus dang /nges par sdom pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas
141b7(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang /rang gi reg pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam smra so//na maHsa man+ta
142a1(rgyud): dudad+hAn+ta/A pra tit+ta ta b+hUd+d+hidz+dza/oM r-i Ti ni swAhA/'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjesu 'brang ba sgra can mA zhes bya ba'i rig pa la su thams ca/
142a2(rgyud): byed pA/phyag rgya chen po gtsug br-id lnga zhes bya ba dug gi las thams cad li sbyar bar bya'o//nA maHsarbi bud d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/oM ni ti/'di ni
142a3(rgyud): nye ba'i sgra can mo zhes bya ba'i rig pu yinA te/las thams cad byed pa'o//phyog rgyu ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba gza'i thams cad kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o//na maHsa
142a4(rgyud): man+ta bud d+hA naM/a pra ti ha ta ga tI nI lo n+d+ri/rig pa 'di ni pad+ma cano zhes bya ste/las thams cad byed cing dge ba'o//phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan
142a5(rgyud): pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par byi'o//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a tsi t+yAd b+hu ta ru pI NAM/oM Sh+TaM Sh+TaM swA hA//phyag rgya mdung ni bsdams pa yis//mkha'
142a6(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed//sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis//thams cad gzugs can rab sdigs pa//rig pa thod can zhes bya ba//'jam pa'i
142a7(rgyud): dbyings kyis bshad pa yin//na maHsa mon+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pa ti ha taHrIn+ni/tad+ya thA/oM ba re de swAhUM//phyag rgya gtsug pud gsum nyid ni//dpal sbyin byed
142b1(rgyud): pas sbyar bar bya//gzugs mnga' 'chang ba lha mo ni//myur du longs spyod grub byed pa'o//na maHsa mAn+ta bud d+hA nAM/a tsi t+yad b+hu ta rU pi N+Do/oM b+hu ri swA hA/phyag rgya
142b2(rgyud): mdung rtsi yid da sgyur//rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig smin//na madz+dzas main+ta byA d+hA trA~M/hrIt+t+ra oM //dag pad+ma shi rin zhes b+h+yo
142b3(rgyud): las rnams kun lo rab tu bsngags//phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pA yis//bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin//ne mAHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/oM tsi t+yad b+hU ta rU pA NAM/tad+ya
142b4(rgyud): bA/oM bi lo ki ni swA hA/rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba//'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed//bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa//gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya//nA maH
142b5(rgyud): se man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a tsin+nad b+hu ta rU pI NAM/tad+ya thA/au bi shwe bi shwe saM b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka hA A be sha A be sho sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Ta skr-i hA/rig pa rinra/
142b6(rgyud): po stobs tshe ni 'di//'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste//mche ba'i phyag rgya ldan byas te//sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/'byung po kun la mchog sbyin/
142b7(rgyud): pa thams cad ces ri yang dag bsgrags//na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/a tsi t+yod b+hu ta rU bI NAM/oM shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/rma bya'i gdon gyi phyag rgya yis/
143a1(rgyud): rnam dgod las ni thams cad byed//dkar mo tshon mo zhes bya bya//rmad byung ba skum ma du gzugs can to//'jig rten rnams kyi skul ldan byed //
143a2(rgyud): skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur//nu mUHsa mAn+ta bud d+hAnA~M/a tsi t+yAd b+hU tAR+ShA b+h+yor+N+Na/tid+ya b+h+rUM/oM/gi bi rai kho ri b+haM khu ri sarba shi d+d+ha staM b+hI ya dza b+hA ya mi hA
143a3(rgyud): bo sha mA na ye swA hA//rig pa 'di ni rig chen po//rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bas+thAn+da//phyog rgya gdong gsum sbyar byas na//ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed/
143a4(rgyud): nA maHsa man+ta d+h+r-i d+hI/oM b+hU tI ha tA shA/tI pra tsur-I NAM/tad+ya thA/oM shwAH/ripo 'don dpal chen mo//jig rten mgon gyis bsnun pa s+t+wa~M//phyug
143a5(rgyud): skAr sbyar byas nas//rgyul srid chen basbyin byed de'i//na maHsa man+ta ts+tshan+tu/swArbasatwAb+hI ye prad+d+ha yai nA~M/oM a dza~M t+tikAm+bu ra d+hU pa~M ni i hUM hU~M yU hrIts+tsho mom
143a6(rgyud): nr-i s+phor+yA s+t+wa~MH//rgyal byed ma zhes rnam gragaso s+ho//gzhon nu bdud N+DI las byung ba//rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis//dgra rnams thams cad bzlog par byed//
143a7(rgyud): byed ni mi sa man+ta dud+d+honA~M/a tsi n+yA ts+tshehong+ku d+hI NA/tad+ya thA/oM dza ye swAny+dza/a dza te swAhA/a be rA dzi te swAhA//sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa
143b1(rgyud): byang chub snyoms dpa'i rjes 'gro ba//sku rnams thams cad kun 'gro zhing //ku lA rdosu 'dzin byung ba'o//mang po gtum bu ru zhes grags//'di dag gi ni rdosu 'brang //
143b2(rgyud): gro yi bzhon phu la zhon nes//rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin//khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed//na maHsi min br-id+d+hA nA
143b3(rgyud): lok+Sha grA d+hi pa tInAM/tAd+yA thA/oM ku m+bA ra ma hA ku mA rA ki Ta ki Ta/shaM mu kha bo d+hi satwa nu dz+nyA ta/ma yu rA sa na/shak+no d+he te prA nI/rak+taM ga rak+ShAM gr-i d+hA nu le pa naM pra I
143b4(rgyud): yA/khA khA khI hI khA hi hUM nr-id t+ya/rak+te puSh+ka tsi ta murti sa ma ye ma nu sma ra/b+hU ma b+h+ra me/b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/la hu la hu mA bi laM ba sarba k+Shar+ya Ni mai ku ru ku ru/bai tsid
143b5(rgyud): tra rU pa d+hA ri NI/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M sarba bud d+hA nr-i d+hA taM swA hA//skyob pa byang chubi semase dpa' ni//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pen//sa rnams ma lus rnam drug tu/
143b6(rgyud): kun+da nas yongasu rab tu g.yos//sems can kun gyi don phyir dang //mA ru ngas sems can bzlog pa'i phyir//mi bzang dbang phyug bu'i gzugs//gdul ba'i don du
143b7(rgyud): 'dir skyes te//skem byed dang ni mig dmar gyi//phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste//snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yi//'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa
144a1(rgyud): yin//sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid cha//sa pa rnams la phyin byung dang //sems can spyod phyirar+ya brtson pa ni//'gro ba kun la
144a2(rgyud): spyod//phyag rgyamadu tu ldan pa yis/ltu gi nyid rten pas na//tshangs pa sogs pa d+ma 'bugs bye b+h+rUM/mi rnams lan smras ci dashes/
144a3(rgyud): gzhon nu'i sem su mtha' dag ni//bsdus nas yongasu bshad par bya//smin drug pu dang 'jam dpal gyi//sngag su na yang dag bstan//sems can rjes
144a4(rgyud): gzung ba'i phyir//byang chub sems dper 'dir ston to//yid gsum zhes bya stong po ni//'di yi sngags brjod pa yin//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/
144a5(rgyud): sa spyang d+hanA b+ha mchog de yin//phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa sa// du nI las ra byung ba yin/oMd+hI dz+dza/snrugs ni 'di ru smr-i b+h+yAs na//mi
144a6(rgyud): rnams ci ni don byed//na maHsa man+ta bu dz+nyA nAM/sa man+ta d+h+ri t+yai/tamud+d+hin+tu/ma~M b+hi k+Shi ta \u0f7f da~M ts+tsha phaT swAhA//'di med nye ba'i skyeng po ste//de bzhin phyag rgya mdung
144a7(rgyud): ldan pas//'byu po thams cad 'gugs byed cing //de bzhin gze'i dang ma mor bcas//phyag rje kun gyis phyang rgyal//bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur
144b1(rgyud): 'byung po rnams ni sngangs byed cing //ma rungs 'jug pa bzlog par byang //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu na
144b2(rgyud): rje su 'brang ba ste/las thams cad byed pa ste/bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//'byung po thams cad sngangs par byed pa dang /skrag par
144b3(rgyud): byed pa dang /'gugs par byed pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /skem par byed pa dang /'jig par byed pa dang /rlig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad
144b4(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'o//na maH sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha ta shU sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM brAh+ma brah+ma bA ra tsa sa shAn+ting ku ru swA hA//sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po
144b5(rgyud): ste byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin//'byung pos zhi gyur rab tu thob//skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur//phyag rgya gtsug pud lnga sbyar na//myur du dge
144b6(rgyud): legs thob par 'gyur//mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la//srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod //'di ni mdor bsdus bstan pa ste//'di yi cho ga bsdus pa yin//na
144b7(rgyud): maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nI/a pra tau ta ta shA sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM ga ra Ta bA ha no tsakra pA Ni/tsa tud+d+ha dza hUM hU~M sa ma ya ma nu smA ra/bo d+hi satwa oMdz+nyA pa ya ti swAh+na/
145a1(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' sprul pa/zhi ba'i don ni m+WAr byed yin//'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig cing //khyab 'jug gzugs rgya/
145a2(rgyud): lus can yin//phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum sbyar na//las rnams kun byed brtan pa yon//gang dge khyab 'jug rgyud lngas ni//bya ba rgya cher bstan pa dag
145a3(rgyud): thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la//'dzam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin//na muHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pra tI ha ta shU so nA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM ma
145a4(rgyud): hA ma he shwa ra b+hu tA d+ho pa ti pra ShA b+ha d+hA dzA pra laM ba dza nA mu ku To d+hA ra Ne/si ta b+hasma d+hu sa riT murti hUM hUM phaT phaT/bo d+hi sa twA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA//sems can rnams la
145a5(rgyud): phan 'dod pas//sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste//phyag rgya mdung rtse gsum sbyar ni//'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o//bdag gis sngon na gang bstan pa
145a6(rgyud): 'di yi cho ga ston byung ba//sems can sa stong gnas pa la//zhi ba pa zhes brjod pa ste//yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba//zhi ba'i rgyud lasnga nga yis bstan//nA ma
145a7(rgyud): sa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM shA ku na ma hA shA ku na/pad ma bi dA ta pik+Sha sarba pI nA shI ga kha kha khI hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hI tiSh+Tha
145b1(rgyud): bod+h+wa~M satwA Adz+nyA pA ya ti swAhA//sngags 'di mthu ni chen po ste//na mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags//gdul dka' 'dul spyod rnams kyi mchog/gdungs kan+dan rgyu/
145b2(rgyud): dug rnams 'joms//phyag rgya che dang slar byas na//phung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms//gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni//goso bir byed par the tshom med//sems
145b3(rgyud): can gdul bya'i thabs ni//byang chub sems dpa'i yang dge bka'//na mkha' lding gzugs sa la spyod//'dab chags dbang po 'od tshon ldan//ji srid na mkha' lding
145b4(rgyud): rgyud du//cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste//byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' lding //gdul ba'i
145b5(rgyud): don du 'di bstan to//gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir//'dab tshogs tshul gyis rnam par rgyu//'jig rte ni sngags ni ji srid pa//cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na//
145b6(rgyud): sems can gdul bya'i don du ni//de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu//gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang //rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang //nga yis cho ga rab 'byam
145b7(rgyud): dang /mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin//ji ltar ma mo mang po ni//'bad pas byis pa rnam srung ba//de bzhini byis pa blo can la//sngags kyi tshul gyis nga yis
146a1(rgyud): bshwad//sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan//dA ni nga yis bstan pa yin//sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa//'od chen gzhon nus
146a2(rgyud): bstan pa yin//rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang //stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang //rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis//'jam dbyangs kyis
146a3(rgyud): gsungs de dag go/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po
146a4(rgyud): la gzigs nas dam tshig yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//gang du ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can
146a5(rgyud): mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i
146a6(rgyud): gunas gtsang ma'i gzhol med khang nor bu chen po sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub
146a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang /sa bcu'i
146b1(rgyud): dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor do bro ba 'am/'dror 'jug par mi nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos//'phags/
146b2(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
146b3(rgyud): cad dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgyal chib tu dbang bskur ba
146b4(rgyud): thams cad dang /spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs
146b5(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /tinge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la
146b6(rgyud): zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to//sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na/bri ba 'am 'drir 'jug pa
146b7(rgyud): lha spos kyang ci dgos/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/grogs
147a1(rgyud): po dag nyon cig/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na/sems
147a2(rgyud): tsun gzhan 'phags pa dang /'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngo gsang ba pa'i bdag
147a3(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to//mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya
147a4(rgyud): ste ro de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams yong su mya ngan las 'das na yang sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las

147a6(rgyud): sras gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig/gsungs shig/shAkya seng ge mgon po ni//yongasu mya ngan 'das 'og na//sems can rnams kyis
147a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid//sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed//mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na//sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//mi shes cho ga nyams pa 'am
147b1(rgyud): dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na//bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang //sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyuraro//sngags la dad pa med pas ni//'bad pa du ma byas gyur
147b2(rgyud): kyang //sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas//ma rungs dam tshig mi bsten+di to//dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni//rab 'byam brgya byin yin na yang //
147b3(rgyud): sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur na//mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos//dam tshig bstan bac+doM so de nyid shes//las kyi spyod pa slob pa la//'jig rten
147b4(rgyud): 'dzeg rten 'das pa yi//sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//'jam pa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni//las kun byud la rab zhugs na//bstan pa
147b5(rgyud): la ni gzhon nu bzhin//sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin//de nas gsung ba pa'i bdag po lhag na rdo rjes sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa/
147b6(rgyud): sems can chen po sems can gyi don gyi phyir ma dor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ceso//gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam
147b7(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/re shig dang po cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/dpyid zla 'bring po 'am/dpyid zla
148a1(rgyud): tha chungs sam/zla ba ya rA ngo 'am/nyin zhag dge ba dang /gza' bzang po bltas te/rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yar ngo'i chos
148a2(rgyud): gcig dang /zla ba nya ba dang /dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus sbyangs la/snga dro sa byin gyis brlab par bya ste/gang du grong khyer chen po la rten pa 'am/dkyil
148a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o//rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas som/rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyog su ha cang
148a4(rgyud): yang mi ring /ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste/lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam/zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas
148a5(rgyud): par bya ste/glang gnas de dag tu yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/gyo mo dong /thal ba dang /sol ba dang /phub mo dang /rus pa spangs pa/shin tu/
148a6(rgyud): gtsa dro ba/shin tu yongasu sbyangs pa'i sa phyogs srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga 'am/tsan dan dang /ga bur dang /gur gum gyi chus bsres pa khro bo
148a7(rgyud): gshin rje gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang steng dang /'og dang /
148b1(rgyud): phrad ka dang /phyogs mtshams thams cad du ba snang gtor bya'o//de nas phyogs der+ya kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gram/khru bcu gnyis sam/khru brgyad pa byas
148b2(rgyud): te/de la chen po ni khru bcu drug pa'o//'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o//chung ngu ni khri brgyad pa'o//dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum//thams cad gzigs
148b3(rgyud): pAs gsungs pa yin//rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste//'bring ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa//chung ngu dam tshig yang dge srung //las rnams kun byed zhi ba
148b4(rgyud): yin dude dag las yid lo gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/der rdo ba dang /sol ba dang /thal ba dang /rus pa

148b6(rgyud): med par 'gyu ro//ri bo'i rtse mo dang /chu bo'i ngogs dang /rgya mtsho'i 'gramo dang /chu bo chen po'i ngogasu bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu
148b7(rgyud): so sor brtags te/shin tu gtsang ba dang /srog chags med par byas la bri bar bya'o//sa phyogs de yang srog chags med pa'i chul ba'i rnaM pa lnga bsres te
149a1(rgyud): narma ba'i klung gis klutsad ma Sh+Tam/srog mkhar gyi sgra gang du sgrog chags med pa'i sa smA dgang+gA b+hAr bya'o//bukAng nas kyang yin /
149a2(rgyud): par brdungs te kun nas mnyam por byas la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o//seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la khro ba'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun
149a3(rgyud): bran+d+ha zhing phyogs bzhir gdag/tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khri bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nus bskor bar bya'o/
149a4(rgyud): de bzhin du dbus kyis gnas nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o//dbus na klanas pan+de daMkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsi ba'i sngags spyong rtsa brgyad

149a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/dkyil 'khor de la g.ya su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogasu brgyu sA te ku sha'i stan la 'dog par bya'i//sangs rgyas dang /
149a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpe'i thams cad yid la byas te/dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o//de nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang ba rnams
149b1(rgyud): zhug gcig glanas pAs bsngalnga zhing du byung bar bya'o//de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkhas pa dang /
149b2(rgyud): sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang /zhag gi cig bsrung bar byas pa dang /grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /bstan bcos
149b3(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis las mthong bas tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs par sbyor ba byas la/yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma
149b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu bzhag par bya'o//phyi rol tu yang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan sgreng po dang /rta babs bzhis rgyan pa/chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis

149b6(rgyud): la bshad par bya'o//phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogasu/
149b7(rgyud): 'aklag par bya'o//'phags pa zla ba sgrol ma'i ting 'dzin nub phyogasu bklag par bya'o//'o phags pa sdong po rgyan pa byed phyog su bklag par bya'o//'phags pa

150a2(rgyud): chos mnyan pI lI bskul bar bya'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan dan+da dang /ge pur dang /gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa
150a3(rgyud): dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlos te/dkyil 'khor de thams ca chal par dgram par bya'o//mngon par bkram pa byas nas phyi rol tu byung ste/zhag
150a4(rgyud): bdun gyi bar 'dod pa'i khwa zas bstan pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam/gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa mkhas pa dag bcug
150a5(rgyud): sti rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug pud bcing ba byas la/de nas gser dang /dngu ba dang /zangs dang /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las tshon sna shin
150a6(rgyud): tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te/longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byis na
150a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin na/sngags sgrubs par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/shAkya'i skyes michog 'odas
150b1(rgyud): gyur nas//sems can bstod nams chung ba la//'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod//de bas cho ga 'di bstan bya//'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis//skye
150b2(rgyud): bo phongasu par gzigs nas ni//nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni//mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin//'bras sa yu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu
150b3(rgyud): zhib pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po dkar ba dang /ser ba dang /dmar ba dang /nag po dang /ljang ku dag gis bsgyur te/sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob
150b4(rgyud): dpon rang gris blangs nas glatsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te/rtsu ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phyi ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo //sgrub pa'i grogs
150b5(rgyud): mchog gi slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su cho ga mthong ba'i lasra kyis thab khung bya ste/rgyor khru dro la zeb su khru grang ba
150b6(rgyud): kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/phyi rol yang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/shishring pa la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar bor bya/shing bi la ba'i yam shing gis
150b7(rgyud): mtho gang tsam dron pa la zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa 'am/snying pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan
151a1(rgyud): drang bar bya//spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i snganas yi ge gcig pa'i spyod pos phyir yang brgyu rtsa brgyud sbyin pasreg bya
151a2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang /'tshog ches byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas skyon sreg byed du gzhug
151a3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la bya ste/sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugaso nas thal mo sbar nas/

151a5(rgyud): su bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyis yongasu rdzogs par bya'o//cho ga 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
151a6(rgyud): kyi mchog dang ldan pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khung na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
151a7(rgyud): ri mo 'dri ba la 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchig gis slob dpon bdag nyid srung ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma btang bar bya ste/
151b1(rgyud): phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang /steng dang /'og drug tu grator bar bya'o//de nas khrus byas te thab khung du lte bar song nas gos gtsang ma babros te/gtsang sbra dang /
151b2(rgyud): srung ba'i cho ga byas nas gur gum dang bsresra pa'i mar gyi sbyin srego stong rtsa brgyad bya'o//de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa byas te de nyid du gnas par
151b3(rgyud): bya'o//nyung dkar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nong du bzhag par bya'o//bges
151b4(rgyud): kyi rnam pa 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang /char dang /yul ngan gzhan dang /gzhan gong yang rung ba mthong nu khros pas nyung /
151b5(rgyud): kar chang bar bcas te/lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni bgegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro//mi'i bgegs la nI lan lnga chang ba nus sbyin sreg byas na
151b6(rgyud): skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/nus po med par 'gyur ba 'am/'chi bar 'gyur bu 'am/skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la
151b7(rgyud): noms kyang the tshom med brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na ma rungs pa'i sems can dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/khro bo gshin
152a1(rgyud): rjegashed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de du
152a2(rgyud): ku shwa'i khres la blanas nas/khro bo'i rgyal po bshin rje gshed kyi bzlas pa byed cing gnas par byi'o//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan

173b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la ni yul dngos kyi skyes bu ched dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/tshad ni 'dis tshod

174a5(rgyud): ldan na nI//mi yi skye ba tha ma la'ang //las rnams thams cad 'bad med par//myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed//rgyal ba rgyal mchog sras dag gis//lam
174a6(rgyud): 'di dag ni yang dag bstan//phongasra bya mgon med sdug bsngal ba'i//sems can kun la legs sbyin pa'o//byang chub lam ni ma lus kyang //de nyid gzigs/
174a7(rgyud): pas bstan pa ste//byang chub rgyu yi chos 'di ni//sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin//'jig rten dkyil 'khor ma lus dang //'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub
174b1(rgyud): 'gyur te//dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis//'bad pa med parla sngags rnams 'grub//gang zhig byang chub rgyu 'dod pas//de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur//'gro la
174b2(rgyud): phan sems rtag med pa//gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur//bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni//gzhon+da nur gyur pas khyad par du//byang chub 'jug pa'i khyad
174b3(rgyud): sems la//ras ris 'grub par gsungs pa yin//bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir//thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin//dri nas mthar gyis bzo bos ni//ras ni
174b4(rgyud): 'bad pas btag par bya//nyan zhag lnga dang brgyad dang ni//bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang ni//nyin zhag gcig gis myur du ni//myur bar ras kyi tha ga bya//grub pa
174b5(rgyud): mchog ni 'dod pa yis//nyon zhug gcig pa dge ba yin//gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs//bzo bro rtag tu byin rlabs ldan//gnas nas thag ring song nas
174b6(rgyud): ni/bshung dang gci ba yongasu dor//de nas gos bcas khrus byas te//gros gzhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing //glos dkar phreng ba ldan par 'chang //yang dung
174b7(rgyud): yang du nye reg bya//lus ni tsan dan dkar pos byugs//bzo bos lag pa gnyis kyang byug/legs 'jam rtag tu dri med pa//'bad pas kyang ni tha ga bya//de la sogs
175a1(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba 'am/gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang //rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad pa yis//ras ni ma lus thA ga bya//ras kyi
175a2(rgyud): ba gzin pa dang //sngar gsungs las kyis legs byas pa//tshad ldan nyams pa med pa ni//nyin zhag bzang la blta ba tu bzhag/yar ngo'i shin tu bzang po
175a3(rgyud): la de la sngags ni gzhug par bya//ras ni yongasu gsal byas pa//kha tshar mthar ni mdud mdzes bya//'od ma'i shing la btags nus ni//de nas ras ni
175a4(rgyud): blangs te 'gro/bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni//nor mang pos ni bgo ba shwa' bya//brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i//sngags pa ji ltar 'dod srong nas//
175a5(rgyud): ma tog dri zhim gyis mchode//gtsang ba'i phyogasu bzhag par bya//'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyisu//srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya//sngon ni ras bal gang de yis//lan
175a6(rgyud): mang du ni yongs sbyangs pa//bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la//de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba bya//dpa' bo chen po 'jam dpal gyis//sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa
175a7(rgyud): dang rar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang //ngas kyang da ltar gsungs pa yin//de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi//sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod//brtson
175b1(rgyud): 'grus che nyung gzi brjid rje//sngags kyi don kun sgrub byed pa//cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs byed//skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu//'jam gling gnas pa'i sems can//
175b2(rgyud): rlabs//rlangs pa spyod cing sems pa med//mu dang phyin ci log dri byed//longs spyod shin tu brkam tshigs kyis//rjes rnams mA lus pa dag dang /
175b3(rgyud): sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed//'khor ba'i mun pa'i brtson rang ni//de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur//gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing //dad ldan bkra shis
175b4(rgyud): dge la dga'//sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang //rtag tu 'dzin dang 'chang ba dang //bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod//spo bi che zhing gzi brjid che//rgyal bas
175b5(rgyud): gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni//'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//dad pa med pa'i skye bo la//dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste//sa bon tshwa rgor btab pa la//myu
175b6(rgyud): gu skye ba med pa bzhin//dad pa'i rtsa ba rtag tu chos//chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste//chos don spyod pa de dag la//sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par
175b7(rgyud): gsungs//de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo legs par bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang
176a1(rgyud): ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te/sngar ba ba pya lA byas pa'i tsho ji lta ba dany+dzad kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mau mkhan la sgyu ma
176a2(rgyud): bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/sbyar dzI ltar ba pra pa li byas pa de nyid kyis res la ri mo'i drir gzhug/yang naM bdag nyid bri bar bya'o//ga pur dang /tsan dan dang /gur
176a3(rgyud): gumya la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsi la bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsi brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la yang bzla ste/
176a4(rgyud): me tog na ga gi sar dang /pun nA ga na/ba ku la dang /pan+da tsa ka dang /dbyar gyi mi tog dang /d+hA nu sha ri dang /mA la ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de
176a5(rgyud): gtsul bkram pa byas la/shar du mngon por phyogs ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/blo legs pa ri gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la
176a6(rgyud): dmigs pa'i sems/phra mo lag par blangs nas 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o//dang por re shig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
176a7(rgyud): bri bar bya ste/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar
176b1(rgyud): mdzes pa/rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/kun nas 'od 'byur ba/sku 'od 'drom glang gis nye par mdzes pa/chos 'argyu bzhin bya/sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad//
176b2(rgyud): kyi mchog dang ldan pa/dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma baM Turma'i sdong bu can/'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyis gdan chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin ci de bzhin
176b3(rgyud): gshegs pa la lta ba/lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshalci ba/mdog dkar po/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/mi dang 'dre ba/phyed sbrul gyi gzugs can//
176b4(rgyud): dga' bo dang /nye dga' bri bar bya'o//kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i 'dub ma dang /me tog cung zad kha bye bya dang /rnam par khe bye ba dang /chu las skyes pa'i srog
176b5(rgyud): chags rnams dang /bya dang /nywa la sogs pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes paru skyes pa bri bar bya'o//gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu de las
176b6(rgyud): 'bros pa'i yal ga las pad+ma'i mu tog du ma mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o//g.yon gyi phyogasu pad+ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/pred+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen
176b7(rgyud): po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o//dang po la re shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad kha dog pad+ma'i ge sar bzhin du ser skya 'am/gur kum mam/
177a1(rgyud): gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/gzhon nu'i cha byad/byis pa dang /khye'u'i gzugs can/skra zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis
177a2(rgyud): brgyan pa/lag pa g.yon pa na ud pa la sngon po bsnams pa/leg pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyang byed pa/skye mdzes bzhi po'i cha byad
177a3(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/bzhin cung zad dpyod pa 'od 'bar ba dung ldan pas+ya dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab po bri'o//pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa
177a4(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o//gsum pa la ni nor bzangaso//bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o//lnga pa ni na mkha' mdzod
177a5(rgyud): do/drug pa la ni swa'i snying po'o//bdun pa la ni sdig medado//brgyad pa la ni spyan bzang yin te/de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can gzhon nu'i
177a6(rgyud): rgyun gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogasasu ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtogaso pa rgyan thams cad kyis
177a7(rgyud): brgyan pa/'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/mgo ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa
177b1(rgyud): mdzon dasor byu ba/kash+yA dmar po ston pa/dAl du mar de byung gA phyogs byas p+ta/la ba'i pig g+hu gsum gyis mtshan pa/ gas mdzes pa dang ldan pa//
177b2(rgyud): dbyeg pa dang b+h+yo rdzunasna 'dzin pa/skyu ra'i sngags pa zas maung+ge/yon+d+ra pi ro bgo smra ba/lag pa gnon pas phred pa 'dzin cing de bzhin ga shegs pa na
177b3(rgyud): bya/de de pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pan no//ng+gA gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu zang po myu gi m+me hU~Mg b+h+ya sa

177b7(rgyud): sngon pa ral pa'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cad pand du byas po/lag pa g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/sa
178a1(rgyud): spyod pa bsam tan la dmasmras pa rnams can/sras kun nas 'od kyis gusal bar byas pa'o//bats+tsha ba lan 'phags pa spyan na rdorje/

178a3(rgyud): pa/zhi ba'i lte ba dang ldan pa dang /dra ba dang drub byed pas lus nye bar du k+shis po/mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/cod pa na rin po che 'bar bas
178a4(rgyud): rnam par 'phro ba/blos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa/dAr la dkar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /kun tu bza
178a5(rgyud): po'i na bzang stod g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o//cha byad ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin bya'o//de bzhin pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po/drug pa la ni

178a7(rgyud): dang /glegs bam lag na thogs pa/rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/der las stod g.yogs byas pa/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/g.yo ba
178b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i blos bgos pa'o//de dag gi steng du yang rang sang+yas rgyas brgyud bri bar bya ste/dge slong gI cha byud 'dzin pA/lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/
178b2(rgyud): gos dmar po gyon pa/skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/rin po che'i ud pa la lo 'dug pa/cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab par me tog dri
178b3(rgyud): zhim pos gcal bkra mo pa la 'di lta ste/me tog ma li dang /dbyar gyi me tog dang /d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang /pun na ga dang /nu ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis
178b4(rgyud): ras ris kun nas gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che du mas nye bar spras pa

178b7(rgyud): nas 'od 'dom gang ba/rin po che pad+ma rA ga dang /in dra nI la dang /margad la sogs pa dang /bai DUR+Ya dang /asma gar b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po

179a2(rgyud): bla gos dang ldan pa/skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/na bza' ser po marabs pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa/dpe byad bzang
179a3(rgyud): po brgyad nus sku nye bar mdzes pa/zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor

179a7(rgyud): bar bya'o//'di dag thams cad kyang go ser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzug su bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi phyogasu
179b1(rgyud): g.yas g.yon nas sbyin gyi gsob nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog po char 'bebs pa zla bar byA ste/bAr snang la gnas nus sangs

179b7(rgyud): gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zhing yangs pa/shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams

180a4(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ba na klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogasu rin po che chen po'i ri bo

180a7(rgyud): gzugs can lag pa g.yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa/lag pa g.yon pa na gzhu thogs pa/bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa/bka' nyan cing 'phags pa
180b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal lnga phyogs to l+yA hA/gsus pa 'phyang ba sgra skyon du brdzes pa mig sman nug po dang /sprin nag po dang 'dra ba/kha spu sor ba/sen mo ring ba/mig dam

180b3(rgyud): po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bor ba khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya'o//ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa/lus sa la btu de spos kyi snod

180b5(rgyud): po bri bar bya'o//klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i graya sro ngosu pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin+da po che'i phyi'i
180b6(rgyud): rgyal po ji ltar star ri'o rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du b+hi bir bya'o//khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed med pa/lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o//
180b7(rgyud): ro de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o//ri de yang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin
181a1(rgyud): rtse mo myu gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o//de la rten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan rus gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma
181a2(rgyud): rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/dar la dmar pos stod g.yogs byas pa/kha dog rnam po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gros can/bud med kyi rgyan thams cad
181a3(rgyud): kyis lus brgyan pa/log pa g.yon pa na ud pa la thogs pa/gser gyi kha dog can rked pa phra ba/ha cang yang mi skem/ha cang yang mi sbom/hA cang
181a4(rgyud): yang mi rgan/sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongasu bskor ba/der yang bai nuR+Ya rin
181a5(rgyud): po che'i rtse mo la shing pun nA ga'i yal gas kun nas bskor ba/yal ga drag la yang me tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das
181a6(rgyud): mya sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa/yal ga mngon par 'dud pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogs pa/byi ru'i myu gu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i
181a7(rgyud): tshon 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o//lha mo bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms//'jig pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog
181b1(rgyud): sgrub pa po ni srung don du//des na dam pa sbyin zhing dge/stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rje ni//bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo yin//'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang //
181b2(rgyud): mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya//'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni//gzhon nu lha mo 'di la dgyes//bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir//sgrub pa pos
181b3(rgyud): kyang yang dag bkur//mi yi bdag po srung don dang //dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mor bri//khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin de//ri yi rtse mor gzhag bris pa//bgegs rnams
181b4(rgyud): thams cad bzhig pa'i phyir//rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs//mi bzad chen po 'khyil ba che//gtum chen 'od chen ldan pa po//ma rungs sems can
181b5(rgyud): tshar bcad phyir//sgrub po la ni rab tu brtags//sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang //bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed//mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can+da//sngags kyi
181b6(rgyud): lha dag 'gugs par byed//shin tu mi bzad drag po'i gzugs//brtse ba med pa thams cad 'dul//sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams//dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du
181b7(rgyud): byed//mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang //sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi//thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang //ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed//ras ni kun nas
182a1(rgyud): gru bzhi dang //zur bzhi dag tu bri ba yin//rus kyi 'og tu tha mar ni//chu bo rgya che'i gnas bya ste//klu yi gdongs klu yan lag can//
182a2(rgyud): gcig ni kun tu bya ba yin//yan lag bzang po dkar po dang //lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes//byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste//rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa//
182a3(rgyud): stobs chen gdengs ka bdun dang ldan//mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yin//de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta//nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes po//legs

182a6(rgyud): pa 'di//rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pas sngon grasungs pa//rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin//mkhas pa gang zhig

182b1(rgyud): 'byung bar byed//mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //tshul khrimasA nyams dang smad pa dang //sdig pa kun lnga 'jug pa dang //'khor ba'i mun par spyod pa dang //'gro
182b2(rgyud): ba'i skye gnas ngan pa dgra/der ni raswa ris bzhag mi bya//rIs ris mthong ba'ing don ldan zhes//thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin//mthong ba tsam gyis dag
182b3(rgyud): 'gyur te//de bas skad cig de tsam gyis//yid dag lus ni dag 'jug dang //rjesu bzlas pa byed pa dang //sngags brten nyid la rtag brtson pa'i//me rnams grub 'dod
182b4(rgyud): smos ci dgos//bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas la//mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa//sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi//sngags pas bsod nams de 'thob 'gyur//

183a7(rgyud): gtsang ma kun nas mdzes pa/rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu/mu tig dkar pos brgyan pa de'i dbusu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/

189b2(rgyud): go/yang na sla med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzhan steng dang 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang /bzhi dang /drug dang /bcu dang /brgyad pa'i ras blangs te ji ltar/

196a6(rgyud): nas gon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro//so shing la sngags na so nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur//ka ra bI ra dkar po'i so shing la lan bdun bdun bsngags te zos ni dron

196b1(rgyud): nod la 'brug sgrogs pa las skyes pa'i rtsa tsha trika zhes bya ba glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par byas la/rang gi lA ma'i nang du btums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu 'jam par/
196b2(rgyud): byas la/rgya ma~M tshwa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbrus te lon bdun bsngags pas rna ba dkong ba dang /skad cig rdo lji la rna ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur//bud med bu 'byung ba'i dusu/
196b3(rgyud): mngal nas mA thon tan zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing A Da rU sha ko'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i tshu la btags te lte ba'i phyogasu bskus na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur//mtshon nang
196b4(rgyud): du lus pa'i skyes bu le ni mar rnying pa la ldan pargyu rna brgyad mngon par bsngags te btung ba 'am/byugs na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rngu med par 'gyur//ma
196b5(rgyud): zhu ba dang /gsuste bruM dang /'khru ba'i nad la ni lan che nag po 'am/rgya ma tshwa'am/tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol bar
196b6(rgyud): gyur te/de nyid kyi nyin par+ya bde legasu 'gyuraro//ldan pa'i nad kyis tshad par 'khru ba 'am/khru ba la nI ma du lung ga'i rtsu ba btegs tAM/lan gcig gam
196b7(rgyud): gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur//bud med mo sham bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na a shwa gan dang
197a1(rgyud): rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig bskol la/ba'i 'o mA dang lhan cig bskol to/ba'i 'o ma dang bsros lnga lan nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas la/zla
197a2(rgyud): mtshan gyi dus thud la khrus byas pa'i 'og tu khyim bdag gzhan gyi chung ma spangs shing 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pas rang gi chung ma la mngon par song na rang gi
197a3(rgyud): khyo dang 'dra ba'i bu skye bar 'gyuraro//lo gsum mam mo lnga'i bAr du btsa' ba'i dusu khrag 'byung ba 'am/lo du ma'i bar du bum chags pa 'am/gzhan gyi sngags rgyud dang /
197a4(rgyud): sman dang /gzhan gyi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang /gzhan gyis ma rungs par byas pa 'am/bu zla ba ma ching bar 'byung ba 'am/nad las yang dag par byung ba 'am/

204a2(rgyud): po'i ri dang ni//de bzhin sA steng bsil ba'i tshal//grong mchog me tog ces bya dang //rtag tu de bzhin ka sha dang //bcom brlag kAn n+ya kub dza dang //sa steng grong

204a4(rgyud): bsngags bsod nams yul dag ni//de dag du ni bsgrub pa bya//de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang //grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang //gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni//
204a5(rgyud): bsod nams gnas la rab brten nas//der ni slong se mos rjes 'tsho zhing //bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang //gnas khang bla gab med pa dang //rtag tu khyim ni
204a6(rgyud): stong pa la//sngags rnams las ni thams cad la//bog ma nyid du bya ba yin//sngags pas rtag tu yul dbusu//sngags bzlas mngon par 'dod pas bya//bzlas
204a7(rgyud): la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson//sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms//tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu dben//'byung po kun la phan par dga'//sngags spyod pa la
204b1(rgyud): dga' ba yi//sdom brtson gyis ni sngags bzlas bya//gtsang zhing gtsang sbra yod phyogs dang //klu klo rkun ma rnam par spangs//sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa/
204b2(rgyud): spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod pa yin//'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan//dri med rab sngags chu yod par//sngags rig sngags ni bden byas na//sbyong ba thams cad
204b3(rgyud): rab tu 'grub//gzhan yang dur khrod chen po ni//der ni bzlas pa rtag tu bya//dri mingadra chu dang 'bab chu ni//srog chags dag kyang rnam par spangs//der ni de nyid bzla/
204b4(rgyud): bya ste//mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzla bya//'jig rten spyod pa'i bsod nams min//der ni cung zad mi mthong ste//'on kyang sngags ni bstan pa yis//cung
204b5(rgyud): zad dus ni bsten pa'o//dam tshig tshogs pa'i rgyu ldan na//de las gzhan du'ang 'gro bya ste//der ni dam tshig thob bsten pa//cung zad dus de gzhan du min//de nas
204b6(rgyud): gzhan du'ang myur du ni//sngags rig pas ni ci nus 'gro/bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi//sa steng dag la rtag tu brten//'jig rten mu stegs thams cad
204b7(rgyud): ni dad lta ba la ga por lhung ba dang //gzhan yang stegasu gyur pa rnams//sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang //rgyu ngan 'gro ba ngan yod par//sngags rig pas ni der mi
205a1(rgyud): bstan//gang du rgyal ba mchog bzhugs dang //sa stong ba sau ru rang rgyal dang //byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa che//nyan thos rgyal

205a3(rgyud): cho ga mthong ba yis//yang dang yang du sngags bzlas bya//lus can sdig pa ma lus dag/bzlas dang sbyin sreg dag gis sel//de bas 'bod pa kun gyis ni//
205a4(rgyud): mnyam gzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya//las thams cad la gnas 'di dge gsungs pa las sgrub pa mchog gi las kyi thabs sgrub pa la gnas 'di dag ma rnyed na
205a5(rgyud): gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gotsang sbra byas te/sngon du bsnyen pa byas la dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lamu dam pa brtsam par bya ste/drang por shig

205b1(rgyud): mamanyams pas byubs gtsang myur smyos pa 'khor mo'ogazugs b+h+ya s+t+wa~M/ras ris kyi mdun du ltab pa g.yas pas bzung zhing lagu ba g.yon pas rma byA bzung /

206a7(rgyud): lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin nam/grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/chu bo'i ngogs kyi sa las byas de dag thams cad rnam lngas bkrus pa 'am/chus gtor ba tsam byas la/
206b1(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du yongasu dag par byed pa'i sngags sam/yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags cho ga'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs kyi sngags mA

206b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i sngags dang /rgyud shes pa/sngar bstan pa'i gnas dag tu ras ris nub tu bltas pas bzhag la bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du byas te/ras ris la mchod pa chen
206b4(rgyud): po byas nas ras ris chen po la ga bur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/sngar bstan pa'i mtshon dang /yo byad dang /sems can gyi khyad par sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas
206b5(rgyud): pa la yar ngo'i zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo gong mo'i rdzas gang yang rung ba de dag blangs te/mtshan mo nyi mo shar ba'i dus kyi bar bzla bar bya'o//bar 'dir 'od chen po'i phreng

206b7(rgyud): khyad par ram/mtshon gyi khyad par de blangs pas de bcangs na/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin par 'gyur te/ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa
207a1(rgyud): dang /nyi ma shar bA dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /'od kyi phreng ba chen po dang ldan pa dang /lus shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /rig pa
207a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro//ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang /

207a7(rgyud): chen po dang /lus chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing leg so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad la spyi bo la

207b2(rgyud): skyil gyis gnon cing mchod par yang 'gyuraro//'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur//yang dge pa'i rgyud kyi mtha' gcod pa med par 'gyur ba dang /sa
207b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba dang /stobs bcu dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa nges par thob par 'gyur te/mdor na las dam pa thams cad gnas dam pa dag tu gnas nas/
207b4(rgyud): ras ris dam pa dag gi mdun du mchod pa dam pa la mngon par dga' bas las dam pa gzhan dag kho na bya'o//rig pa 'dzin pa nyid du na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
207b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rje su zhugs pa dang /mngon par shes par lnga nyid dang /sa dang /sngags thob pa nyid dang /lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag
207b6(rgyud): tu 'gro ba nyid dang /stobs bcu'i rgyu yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang /'bras bu yod par
207b7(rgyud): mthong ba'i chos ston pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang /sangs rgyas kyi gong rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjesu thob pa nyid kyi phyir
208a1(rgyud): dang /chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang /nyon mongs pa bskam pa dang /bdud rtsi'i char gyis
208a2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /'jig rten rje su bzung ba la rab tu 'jug par rjesu sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dang /de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung ba'i phyir dang /

208a5(rgyud): mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di ras ris chen po'i mdun du nye bar gnas la bsgrub par bya ste/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang
208a6(rgyud): sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi ste/mdor na 'dir cho ga gzhan du gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'dri bsgrub par bya ste/myur du de dag gi

208b1(rgyud): pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phabs pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu pa ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i khye'u rab 'byam rdzog so///de nas
208b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyi
208b3(rgyud): ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga yod/mdor bsdus nas bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad//de nas 'jam
208b4(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la bugs brtse ba dang /ston pa sems can thams cad la phan pa
208b5(rgyud): dgyes pa dang /bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang /ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas dri'i dus la byab par mkhyen na de bshad du gsol/de skad ces

209a1(rgyud): k+Sha spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'brus bu dang bcas shing don yod par 'gyur te/sngags thams cad sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur//dus brlud
209a2(rgyud): bde gang zhe na/gzhon nu na cog/dang por re shig rig pa dang /brtul zhugs dang /tshul khrims kyi yi dam dang po nyid du blang bar byas la/drang po re shig

209a7(rgyud): 'am/rmongs pa tsam gyis rnam par lta smos kyang ci dgos/dam bcas pa brtan pa dang //sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /snying rje dang
209b1(rgyud): ldan pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /sngon du spyad pa byas pa dang /khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjesu zlos pa dang /snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas pa dang /

209b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la sgrub pa po yang de dang mnyam pa ste/yan lag lhag pa 'am ma tshang ba cung zad kyang med pa'o//de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la

210a1(rgyud): dpon des sngar bstan pa'i tshogs slob ma la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du brtags nas rab tu gdug par bya ste/sngar ji ltar dbang bsgyur ba
210a2(rgyud): bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o//go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bstan to/gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang /rgyud dang /sngags dang /lus kyang dus ring po nyid
