210a6(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa po des sngags gang yang rung ba gzung ste/gcig pu dben par song nas sngar bstan pa gong ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te/de dag nyid kyis sngags
210a7(rgyud): dag gis ni spyan drang ba dang /gshegasu gsol ba dang /mar me dang /dri dang /bdug pa dang /gtor ma dang /lha bo shos dkyil 'khor la gsungasapa
210b1(rgyud): nyid kyi tsho gas rgya cher byas te/spyan drangs nas glad na dang /mchod yon phul la dus mtshams gsum du khrus ldan gsum phye zhing go sa gsum brje zhing nyinA ra bzhin
210b2(rgyud): du bzlas pa bya'o//de la dus gsum zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams pa yin te/zung tsam nus nyi ma 'char po'i bar 'dir dang po'i dusu brjod//nyi mal//
210b3(rgyud): gung ni nyi ma gnyi ga'i gung tsam gyi ched du na mkha' la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nyi ma gung gi dus zhes brjod//nyi ma nub pa'i du su lhag ma zung tsam lus pa'i dus
210b4(rgyud): gsum pa zhes brjod//tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan//slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dang //mthon po'i rigasu skyes pa dang //rnam pa kun tu brtson
210b5(rgyud): 'grus brtan//sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang //bya ba kun la blo gros dge/zhib cing mkhas la chog shes dang //chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin//spro ba che zhing
210b6(rgyud): gzi brjid che//'jig rten tshes la ltos pa med//thub mchog chos la dad pa dang //'jig rten na ni yongasu bsngags//dben pa shes shing bzlas pa byed//sngon du
210b7(rgyud): bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen byed//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes shing //mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed//sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams la//
211a1(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi sbyor ba shes//smyung byed rtswaT ni brtun pa dang //rtag tu gtsang skya'i spyod la dgal//sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lam lu ni//
211a2(rgyud): byams cad du ni 'jug par byed//rab bsngag so rgyal bas bstod po yi//spyugs bzlas bya lnga brtson par byed//las 'bras dag la rtog yid ches//'jig rten pa
211a3(rgyud): rol de bzhini//sdig pa kun la 'jigs byed pa//shin tu phra bre'ang de bzhino//gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med//yid gzhung sde blta na sdug pa dang //stobs bcu
211a4(rgyud): ldan pas sngags bshad dang //de bzhin rgyal ba'i skyes dang ni//gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang //rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag gis//de la rtag tu brtson byed dang //
211a5(rgyud): gzhung dang bstan bcos don klog pa//nad mod pa dang stobs ldan dang //rgas dang gzhon pa rnam par spangs//sdigs grub de bzhin shes nyen can//kun nas myur//
211a6(rgyud): du byed pa dang //las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung //zur tsam gyis go khyad par can+da//tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che//gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang //'jam
211a7(rgyud): dpal gyis gsungs rgyud dag la//dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang //bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang //de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang //sems dpa' che
211b1(rgyud): zhing 'jig rten shes//'gro ba'i de nyid rjes sems dang //legs pa'i lam nyid rab sbyar byed//sbyor byed 'byung po phan la dga'//khyad par can de slob dpon la//rtag
211b2(rgyud): tu don du \u0f7fny+dzar bar bya//dkyil 'khor des ni bris pa la//sngags rnams 'grub pa ster bar 'gyur//de nyid kyi ni dbang bskur na//'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur//grub
211b3(rgyud): pa 'dod pa'i slob mos kyang //thub mchog de ni rtag tu mchod//de yi bka' ni mi bgom par//slob mas 'bad nas bya ba yin//ji ltar 'byor pa yod pa bzhin//longs
211b4(rgyud): spyod de la sbyin par bya//nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung //gang gis dga' ba thob 'gyur ba//lus dang srog gi don phyir ni//nor ni ji ltar sbyin pa bzhin//slob ma chos
211b5(rgyud): rig de bzhin du//slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na//tshe dang nad med de bzhin du//grags pa thob par 'gyur ba yin//slob mas bla ma de mchod na//dag pa'i 'gro ba thob
211b6(rgyud): par 'gyur//lam ni sna tshogs nyer bstan pas//de la sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur//de la bsten dang bsnyen bkur byas//ri mo byas dang mchod pas ni//sangs rgyas
211b7(rgyud): rnams dang de bzhin du//rgyal ba'i sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur//bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na//lha rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba
212a1(rgyud): yis//de ltar thams cad bstan pa yin//sgrub pa po ni dang por yang //dam tshig lnga ni 'jug par bya//dma' ba'ang de dang mnyam pa'ang
212a2(rgyud): rung //gal te khyad par gyur na yang //rmongs pa 'am lhag pa yin yang rung //rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya//ji ltar de nyid rjes mthong la//sngags grub pa la bya
212a3(rgyud): ba yin//sngar bstan pa yA slob ma yis//de la phrag dreg bya ba min//lus can brtse ba 'phel byed pa'i//mig ni gang la yod gyur pa//de ni slob ma nying bya ste/
212a4(rgyud): slob dpon rgyur yang bya ba yin//gang du phan tshun rgyun la ni//brtse ba'i phyung ba yod pa dang //brtse ba'i rgyud ni 'dzin pa la//de la sngags ni sbyin par bya//slob
212a5(rgyud): dpon la ni slob ma 'am//bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung //rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba la//gnyi ga la ni grub pa gnas//de dag la ni rtag tu yong //sngags spyod
212a6(rgyud): lamra ni brtan par bya//gnyi gas pha dang bur shes la//sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin//sleb ma bla mas rtag tu ni//brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob/
212a7(rgyud): bu ni chos dang rjes 'thun la//'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya//de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos//rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur//gal te de med mgon bral la//
212b1(rgyud): sngags rnams ji skad gsungs pa sbyin//sems can dbul po rnams la ni//khyad par du yang snga/ byin na//sems can kun la'ang sbyin pa byas//sngags kyi spyod pa
212b2(rgyud): khyad par 'phags//mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni//dus rnams kun tu bya ba ste//rtag tu sems con kun la ni//rje su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o//'gro ba'ang skye gnas
212b3(rgyud): rnams btags nas//'dod pa dag la sbyin par bya//de ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags//slob mas de la blang bar bya//de nyid kyis bstan lam yin to//gzhan du
212b4(rgyud): de lta ma yino//'jig rten pha rol pha la ni//grub pa de las bslang bar bya//pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas//de nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro/de nas gcig
212b5(rgyud): pu 'gro byas nas//mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya//slongs mo slong bsna rjes 'tsho zhing //thub pa dus gsum bzlos par byed//sbur ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/
212b6(rgyud): lam du rab tu 'jug par byed//de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang //'dug pa dang ni gnas pa'o//dben pa chen po ri rtse dang //de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs gtsang dang //ba
212b7(rgyud): gnas dang mtsho chen dang //dben pa skye bo rnams spangs dang //lha khang stong dang shing dang ni//mtshan gcig ri ni mngon po dang //rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang //gling //
213a1(rgyud): rnams rnon po dag dang mo//rnam pa rlogs snar ba nA da//rnam na yod ba //dodas sa sa na gas zhan du/
213a2(rgyud): gzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya//grags po mtshan nyid ldan dri ni//sngags don lugs dang tshad mar ldan+da//zur gyi rnam pa de nyid shes//bdag dang de yang 'dra
213a3(rgyud): ba'o//dpe'i zhing g.yul los rnam rgyal dang //snying stobs che zhing bzod dang ldan//rgya lnga bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang //sngags kyi spyod pa la dad cing //sngags
213a4(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la//birjod dang ldan pa'i phyogs po la//de la 'byed pa med par ni//sngags kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur//tha~M rangs mal nas langs
213a5(rgyud): nus ni//mtsho chen+da les byung chu bo las//byung chu srog chags skyon med pa'i//bzang pos khrus ni rab tu bya//sa dang lci ba phye ma yis//sngags shes pas ni lus
213a6(rgyud): dril bya//sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'o//dri med gtsang smos byas pa'i chus//sngags ldan bdag nyid khrus bya zhing //ha cang rnying bar 'dug mi bya//de rnams
213a7(rgyud): langs nas chu ngogs 'dug/sa dag gos kyang lag gnyis bkru/bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ni//nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o//de bzhin du yang nye reg bya//so shing
213b1(rgyud): drug kyang yang dag spyad//so shing rnam par byor nas ni//de nas skyob la phyag kyang bya//'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal nas//mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya//rnam pa sna
213b2(rgyud): tshogs mchod pa stong dang //yang dag bstod pa yang yang bya//dri zhim me tog de bzhin du//ston la 'dod pas mchod yon dbul//sangs rgyas rnams dang de slob la//spyi
213b3(rgyud): bor rab btud phyag 'tshalo//'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/mdun du sdig pa bshags par bya//ras ris bar ma'i mdun du ni//bdag nyid dag kyang dbul bar bya//ku sho'i
213b4(rgyud): khres ni byas pa der//legs par mnyam gzhag 'dug nas ni//des ni phreng ba thogs na su//'bad pas bzlas pa bya ba yin//ji ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis byo//de
213b5(rgyud): sngags gzhan bzlas mi bya//ha cang ngan pa spyang bya ste//ha cang bzung po'ang de bzhi no//bar ma bar ma'i las dag la//sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla//ha cing skad mthon
213b6(rgyud): 'bad pas spang //tshig ni dma' ba'ang ma yino//bar mA dbus kyi yul dag tu//rjes 'thun rgyal bas bsngags pa'o//ha cang skad mtho dma' ba'ang min//bar mas
213b7(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas pa bya//sangs rgyas snga ma kun gyis ni//tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs//rtag tu gzhan gyi rna lam dang /gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla'o//dben pa'i
214a1(rgyud): phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas//sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya//de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na//sngags ni glang yang myur du 'grub/
214a2(rgyud): bubar ma'i sngags ni 'grub 'dod na//yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya//de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang //sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos//dben zhing gdung ba med par ni//
214a3(rgyud): zlos pas sngags ni bzla bar bya//mtshan mo yi ni bzhi tshwa dang //de phyed de bzhin phyed nyid dang //skya reng dmar po zung tsam la//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba la//dang
214a4(rgyud): po bar ma nyid du ni//thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin//zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste//bar myur yongasu bsgrags pa yin//de nas nyi ma phyed shar na//sngags bzlas
214a5(rgyud): de tshe sbyang bar bya//sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na//sdom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol//de tshe bting ba'i lhag dus la//thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya//
214a6(rgyud): dam chos klag lnga sogs pa ni//shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs//glegs bam+b+ha sa bcu zhes bya ba//mchod dang klag pa rtag tu bya//de nas dus la bab gyur na//rang
214a7(rgyud): sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang //thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal nas//de nas 'tsho ba'i don du 'gro/dus dang spyod dang de bzhin ldan//dusu zas spyod dbang po thul//chos
214b1(rgyud): can sgrub lnga brtson pa dang //sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang //mI sgra grong gi nang du 'dug/rtag tu gtsang sgra spyod la dga'//chos ldan sems can khyim du ni//skyong dus rtag
214b2(rgyud): bzlog byed cing 'dug/srog chags med chos grub pa yi//zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang //yang dag lto ba'i khyim dag dang //sangs rgyas bstan la dang ba yi//de 'dra'i
214b3(rgyud): khyim la rtag tu ni//slong ba'i don du slongs mo blang //ji ltar dpa' bos go bgos te//nyam nga'i yul du 'jug pa na//rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed//dgra yis 'jams kyang
214b4(rgyud): mo nus pa//de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du//slongs mo'i 'tshe bas 'jug pa na//gzugs sgra la sogs bzung po ni//de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na//'dod chags
214b5(rgyud): zhi ba'i don gyi phyir//dge ba mi gtsang bsgom par bya//lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi//bud med gzugs ni mthong ba na//mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing //shin tu smad
214b6(rgyud): pa rnag dang gaN+DIn//srin pus zos drang dur khrod gnas//lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin//byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis//'gro ba lnga pa dag tu 'khar//las
214b7(rgyud): sdud pas bcings nas ni//yun ring dus mya ngan byed//mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni//dmus ling sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin//gang du blo ni phyin ci log/skye bo chags
215a1(rgyud): pas phongs par gyur//rnam pa sna tshogs lhas gyur gyi//rnam pa du mar chags byed pas//yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni//'gro
215a2(rgyud): 'ong bar spyod par byed//gar byed bzhin du spyod pa yis//bra ni bzhin du ni gtong bar byed//mi gtsang dga' ba'i sems can gang //yun ring lam du phangs par
215a3(rgyud): 'gyur//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung ba//zo chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin//'gro ba de dag mi bzad pa'i//sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yon//sangs rgyas kyis ni bung

215a5(rgyud): pa/rgya mtsho 'di ni skam par dga'//bud med sems kyis bslus pA sa ni//gang du sems can bying gyur nas//dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang //ma
215a6(rgyud): dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin//de bzhin ma yi 'jig rten dang //lha yi 'gro ba'i 'gro bar 'gro/bud med chags pasngo bslus pas nA//kun nas yongasu 'khor
215a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing //'dam chen nang du 'bying 'gyur la//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brtson ra yin//bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi/rul ba'i ro la wa bzhi no//gang du
215b1(rgyud): mI ni tshogs byed pa//shin tu mi bzang sdug bsngal bzod//dasar po'i chos ni nges nyams byeng //sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pus ni//sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsha
215b2(rgyud): nyid/thams cad yongasu bzlog byed cing //sngags zlos dga' zhing brtson pa dang //grogs pa che zhing chags dang bral//gzi brjid ldan zhing kun dang mdza'//de dag
215b3(rgyud): la ni sdug bsngal med//yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes//bla ma lha la mchod byed dang //ma dang pha la gus pa rnams//de dag la ni sdug bsngal med//dam pa'i/
215b4(rgyud): don la brtan nA ni//mA rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang //de bzhin dbyig dug zug rngu bzhin//bzlos pa bud med lus bsdam bya//blo ngan phung ba'i lcags kyus zan+de//
215b5(rgyud): 'khor ba las ni 'byung mi nus//rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa//de la grub pa ya ma yin//zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyams//de la grub pa mchog med cing //
215b6(rgyud): grub pa 'bring yang yang medade//grub pa tha ma'ang yod ma yin//tshul khrims 'tshal la thub dbang gis//sngags grub par ni ma gsungs te//mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba
215b7(rgyud): yi/yul dang phyogs kyang ma yino//byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni//sngags grub pa ni ga la yod//skye bo tshul khrims 'chal 'di la//de la bad 'gro ga la yod//mtho
216a1(rgyud): rasuM yad ma 'gyur zhing //bde ba mchog tu 'ang mi 'gyu nA//rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngagasmra rnams no//'grub par 'gyur ba smyos
216a2(rgyud): dgos//ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni//glang tshwa bcad par gyur pa na'ang //sngon po nyid kyi skal medran//myu gun me zhig 'byung bar 'gyur//de bzhin sngags grub
216a3(rgyud): rmongs pa dang //tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed//rtag tu bud med chags pa lnga//'dir ni rab tu bstan par yin//mi dge'i bshes gnyen bsten pa

216a7(rgyud): pa ni//grong du slong phyir rab tu 'jug/sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu//ji ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni//blo ldan pa dag pas bslang ba'i snod//gtsang ba'i phyogasu
216b1(rgyud): yang dag gzhag/phyi rol song nas rgung gnyis bkru/de nas yang ni yan lag ste//de tshe srog chags med pa'i chus//lag pa g.yas pas byin pa gla yas//lag pa g.yon
216b2(rgyud): pas byin pa g.yon//yang na gnyis ka dus gcig bkru/swa ni lag g.yon yang bzhag nas//sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi//bdug pa gcing ba'i sa dag gis//ldag pa
216b3(rgyud): gnyis ni rab tu bkru/de nas sngags kyis dag byas pa'i//dri med gtsang sbra dag snod la//ba ni ser skyes bor bu yis//lci ba sar pa blang bar bya//srog chags med pa'i chu

216b7(rgyud): ba'i sras//dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni//kun nas gru bzhir bru ba yin//khru gang ngam ni khru phyed du//nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin//sdig pa 'jig byed bzlas pa ni//
217a1(rgyud): dben pA'i phyogasu nyin ro bya//sngags pa de nas lungs na su ni//'bad byas lag gnyis rab tu bkru/gtsang ba'i chu yis nye rog bya//dag cing
217a2(rgyud): skyog chags spangs pa yi//dri med gtsang sgras 'bod nas no//gtsang ba'i snod ni de tshe blang //mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am//chu mig chu bo la gnas dung //gla tsang ba'i
217a3(rgyud): phyogs nas byung ba yi//sems can drag pa lag blangs la//gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang //sngags pas nye rig bya ba yin//de nas chu reg gdong dang ni//de bzhin
217a4(rgyud): du ni rna khung dag/mig dang sna dang lag gnyis dang //spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya//dge ba spyod pas ldan lnga 'amA bdun//cho ga ji bzhin thams cad bya//gtsang sbra'i

217a6(rgyud): du ni chu mig dang //chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la//rtag tu zas ni bkru bar byi//gtsug lag khung ngam gnas khang du//de nas longs nas 'gro bar bya//gang du sngon ni rten pa
217a7(rgyud): dang gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya//de nas zlos pas lhung bzed//song nas phyogs ni der bzhag bya//de nas nye reg myur byas nas//de bzhin yang ni lhung bzed blang //
217b1(rgyud): sbyang bzongs 'phru lo ma 'am//dngul dang g+ha saR+Wa mI snod dang ni//zangs ma shad shun dag pad+ma rlung //ston pa la ni dbul bar bya//ston pa la ni bshos phul nas//rang

218a1(rgyud): kyai lha dag ni//ting 'dzin 'bras bu la spyod pa'o//srid pa bar ma'i soms can rnams//dri y+r-i zas rab tu bsgrags//de bzhin 'dod
218a2(rgyud): khams sems can dag/sna tshogs zas la spyod pa yin//de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis//las kyi rgyu yis gsungs pa ni//sems can zas kyis gnas pa

218b5(rgyud): ciga'od srung 'od ni chen po pa//thub pa mchog gis de skad gsungs//nyan thos rnams ni yid dga' nas//khyab bdag la ni gsol ba 'debs//chos mkhyen sngags ni

219a1(rgyud): bkun nyon cig/rkang mong dang ni rkang mangs dang //rkang gnyis dang ni nang byin pa//mdor na sems can kun gyi phyir//bdo 'byung sngags na

219a3(rgyud): na mAHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/au ga ga na ga ga na gany+dzi A na ya sarba la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/yA kaR+Sha Ni/mA bi laM bi mA bA laM ba ya
219a4(rgyud): the bi s+t+waM me saM pU da ya swA hA//bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad gsungs nis cing mi gsung bar gyur to//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
219a5(rgyud): 'angs 'od srung gis bar der rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rgya cher gsungs pa na nA mkha' de thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongasu khebs par gyur to//
219a6(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi na mkha'i dkyil kun tu zas kyi sprin gyis khyab par snang bar gyur to//sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar
219a7(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba dang /ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas de dag la char bzhin du bab par gyur to//ji ltar 'dod pa'i zas dang bza' ba'i bya ba ni bkres pa'i sdug
219b1(rgyud): sngal no ba'i don dang /skom pa rnams kyis btung bar bya ba'i na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun yid la 'dod pa bzhin du drar babya bar gyur to//de'achade'i dus rgya
219b2(rgyud): skad cig de nyid la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /sgom pa thams cad dang drilwa bar gyur te//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang ngo mtshar dang rab tu dga'
219b3(rgyud): bu thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//rje su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du
219b4(rgyud): mi snang bar gyur te//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan su rnam par bzhug so//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de
219b5(rgyud): kyang de'i tshe de ltar bshad cing rje su yi rang bar byaso//sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don du bkres pa dang skom pa sel ba'i phyir dang /sngags
219b6(rgyud): thams cad zlos pa dag la yang khyad par du sel bar 'gyur//dang por shig zlos pas sngags 'di bsgrub par bya ste/galA ti bsod snyoms la 'gro bar skyo bar med na
219b7(rgyud): ri'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya zhing zas dkar gsum mam/'ama'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ras ris
220a1(rgyud): bar ma gong ma bzhin bzhug ste/mchod pa chen po byas nas shin tu rgya ba'i gtor ma phul te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
220a2(rgyud): rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid kyis gsungs pa'i sngags kyis sring ldeng gi yam shing gi mo rab tu sbar te/shing u dum ba ri'i yum shing la mar dang sbrang rtsis brtags
220a3(rgyud): pa'i shing rlan mtho gang tsam mAm/bilA ba'i 'bras bu'i yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas nam phyed kyi dus mtshamasu sprin nag po chen po dang //
220a4(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung na 'jigs par mi bya/langs te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya zhing /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis yi ge brgyad kyi snying pos bdag nyid srung
220a5(rgyud): ba dang /dkyil 'khor bcing ba yang /grogs srung ba yang byas na snga ma lta bu'i sprin nag po chen po dang /rlung nag po de yang mi snang bar gyur te/bud med kyang
220a6(rgyud): rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyogs thams cad snang bar khyab ste/sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug nas skye ba ni/kye sems can chen po
220a7(rgyud): longs shig/khyod kyi grub pa yi no zhes//de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog gis bsres pa'i dri zhim po'i chus mchod yon sbyin no//de nas de nyid du mi snang bar
220b1(rgyud): gyur to//gang de'i nya ma nas bdag nyid dang grogs po nyi shu lnga 'am/yang ci 'dod pa'i grogs po dag la co 'dod pa'i kha zas dang /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byung rnams

220b7(rgyud): nas mtshan phyed kyi dus sbyin sreg gi mthar 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur//'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar yang 'gyur//na mkha' la 'dra/

221a6(rgyud): gnas sam/gtsang ba'i sa phyogs sam+ba/chu bo'am/chu gling gi ngog su snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya ste/ras ris nub tu bstan te bzhag la bdag kyang shar

221b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang /dong kwa'i me tog la tsa na dan dkur po 'am/gur gum gyis bsgos pas snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o//de bzhin du me sbar nas sbyin
221b2(rgyud): skyeg gi mjug tu ras ris rab tu 'gul ba na ni blon po nyid thob par 'gyuraro//ras ri s+ya las rjod kyi snang bor byung na ni 'od las rgyol srid thob par 'gyuraro//rAs rIs
221b3(rgyud): 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun khyab na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro//ras ri sA las me stag byung na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug brgya byin nyid
221b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro//ras ris las chos 'chad pa'i sgra byung na ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyuraro//ras ris kyi phyag giso mgo la
221b5(rgyud): byug par mdzad na ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang /sa bdun pa thob pa dang /stobs bcu la gnas pa mthar gyis thob pA yino//de nas sgrub pa po la bcom ldan 'das
221b6(rgyud): 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te/bkres pa dang /sgom pa rab tu bsal ba'i don rje su thob pa de nyid kyi 'tshog chas sngags spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i
221b7(rgyud): thabs kyi chos la yang dag par rje su bsgrub par bya'o//gzhan du ni 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro//de ltar mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu 'jug cing mdor na nges par
222a1(rgyud): 'bad pa la ni rdzas dang /sman dang /yo byad kyi khyad par dang /nor bu rin po che sngar ji skad bshad pa rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro//sngags/

222a4(rgyud): la ni byin nas kyang //'byed pas snod ni bkru bar bya//de nas 'bad pa byas nas ni//sa yi snod kyang bsreg par bya//lhag ma lhung brjod bya ba ni//snum myed zas

226b7(rgyud): bsam gtan byas na su//sngags kyi lha ni gshegs gsol te//mchod yon gsol nas ci bde bar//chu gzhi de las byung nas ni//ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya//gnas
227a1(rgyud): kyang sngar ni bstan pa yi//chog legs dben mthong ba yi//sngags pas sngags ni de tshe bzla//ji bzhin lngas ni sngar bstan pa'o//rang gi
227a2(rgyud): lha ni spyan drangs pa//der ni sngags kyis gshegasu gsol//de nas rang nyid bsrung bya zhing //de bzhin grogs po dag kyang srung //dge ba'i las kyi de nyid shes//cho ga'i
227a3(rgyud): las lo dga' zhing 'dod//bstod pa'i rnam pa mang pos mchod//gang zag mchog lo bstod nas ni//rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang //nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru
227a4(rgyud): dang rnabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//'jig rten gsum la rjes gzung mdzod//sngags zlos pa ni gnas de nas//de nas kyang ni langs nasu//gnas ni
227a5(rgyud): thag ring song nas ni//phyi rol rlung ni rnam spangs par//snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor//bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin te//nyen par byad du kha bltas te//mtshan
227a6(rgyud): mo lhar ni blta bar bya//der ni don rnams mi bskum ste//sngags zlos nam yang bya ba min//der ni sngags kyang mi bzla zhing //las brta so rigs kyang bshad ma yin//
227a7(rgyud): rab sngags 'gros dong mtshan sogs kyis//de tshe sa la 'dug par bya//gtsang phyir gos mtha' chur gzhug bya//chu gtsang gis ni nye reg bya/'bad pas rkang gnyis
227b1(rgyud): kru byu ste//sna ni khyor ba bdun blangs nas//ldan bdun sa de nyid kyis//bshad pa la ni sum cus bya//mchil ma dor dang de bzhin du//snabasu dor ba la re re'o//de nas
227b2(rgyud): nye reg bya ba yin//sgra med de bzhin song nas ni//lam la sogs pa spangs pa'o//de nas gzhan yang ci 'dod par//lho phyogs mtha' ni phyi rol tu//g.yang sa zhing dang
227b3(rgyud): sa rko dang //de bzhin phye mas khyab pa la//chu bo sbyangs shing ngogs kyang spangs//mi gtsang ba yang srung bar bya//rab tu bkab dang dben yid ches//bas mtha' skye bo rnam
227b4(rgyud): sbyangs pa//sngags pas de 'dra'i sra dag tu//mi gtsang ba ni dor bar bya//sngags zlos dus ni shes pa yis//ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min//de nas gtsang mtha'i
227b5(rgyud): phyogs song nas//bshang gci'i bya ba byas nas ni//de nas gan su ci bder gnas//gsal ba 'am dben pa 'am g.yogs pa 'am//skye bo med pa'i sa phyogasasu//
227b6(rgyud): mi smra lus reg spangs nas ni//rtag tu bo shang gci bya ba yin//bshad dang gci ba med byas nas//sdom can gtsang sbra rtag tu bya//reg na 'jam dang 'dod pa yi//srog
227b7(rgyud): chags rnam par spangs pa yi//sa gsum yongasu spangs na su//gcig gis bshang ba'i phyogasu bya//sa yi cha gnyis dag gis kyang //lag pa gnyis ni bkru bar bya//
228a1(rgyud): sngags pas sa dag rtag tu ni//sngar bskrun pa dgra blang bar bya//'bad pas rkang g.yon bkru byA ste//de nas g.yas pa bkru bar bya//phan tshun
228a2(rgyud): nyid du gzhibs nAs ni//zlos pas rkang pa bkru bar bya//sngags zlos pas ni gtsang sbra dag/swaR+Sha ni rgya chen bstan pa yin//dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra yang //thub pas
228a3(rgyud): sbar ni bstan pa yin//sngags zlos pa yi gtsang sgra ni//'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yi//dri ma bral ba'i gtsang sgra yi//gtsang sgra nyid ni rtag tu bya//rgyud rnams
228a4(rgyud): kun la snang ba zhes//thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin//de nas 'dod pas nye reg bya//sdom can gyis grub las kyang bya//sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis//yid
228a5(rgyud): ni rlung gi drag pa yin//rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yis//gtsang sbra lnga yi cho ga gsungs//lus kyi ngag dang ngag dag dang //yid kyi dag pa yin par bstan//
228a6(rgyud): bzhi pa bden pa'i dag pa ste//chu yi dag pa lnga par bshad//bden pa'i chos can khro ba thul//de nyid shes shing bstan bcos mthong //phra ba'i de nyid don la
228a7(rgyud): mkhas//sngags shes las la grags pa dang //phyi dang nang la mkhas pa dag/de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'//bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i//brdzun gyi tshig ni/
228b1(rgyud): sgyu mi bya//de nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa'i//ma rungs rab tu mya rungs dang //rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang //rtsub dang gnad rnams slu ba dang //badren pa'i chos ni
228b2(rgyud): rnam nyams pa//sems can gzhan la gnod byed pa//phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang //chos kun rnam par spangs pa dang //rtag tu 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dang //khrims
228b3(rgyud): 'chal chos min spyod pa dang //zlos pa'i sngags pas rtag tu spang //grong gi chos dang de bzhi no//khro ba log par byung ba yi//'jig rten pha rol 'jigs rnams la//sangs
228b4(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //blo ldan rnams kyis yongasu smad//rtag tu rang rgyal bse ru dang //nyan thos kyis kyang rtag tu smad//brdzun pa de bzhin 'jig rten na/
228b5(rgyud): sa steng grub pa 'dod rnams pa'o//brdzun pa nye bar smra ba dag/shin tu mi bzad dmyal brla 'gro//de bzhin dud 'gro yi dgas dang //gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtag tu 'gro/
228b6(rgyud): brdzun ni nye bar smra ba yis//der nA rtag tu gnas pa yin//blo ngan mi bzang ltung ba ni//thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang //yang sos ral gri'i lo ma dang //de bzhin shal ma
228b7(rgyud): yi nag su//brdzu ni smra ba yi gang zag ni//bskal pa mang por der gnaso//log par smra bar gyur pa dang //rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis//'byung po rnams las sku
229a1(rgyud): byed la//de lta sngags grub ga lnga yod//des na rmongs pa'i lngas de yis//sngags ni grub par ma mthong nas//'di skad kyi ni tshig smug
229a2(rgyud): sngags la grub pa medo zhes//de skad kyi ni tshi gri smra ba//gang gis stangs rgyas bstan pa 'di//sa skyeng 'dir ni spangs pa yin//bskal pa bye ba meng por yang //de la grub
229a3(rgyud): pa ga la yod//des na mi bzad dmyal bar 'tshed//mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang //yang spos dang ni thig nag dang //rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni//dam pa'i chos la
229a4(rgyud): brnyas pa yis//der ni bskal pa chen por gnas//gang yang dmyal ba mi bzad par//byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed byed pa//dam pa'i chos la brnyas byed dang //zhe sdang mun
229a5(rgyud): pas bsgribs pa'o//mi shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am//rmongs pa logs pa'i nga rgyal gyis//rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa//mi bzad dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin//
229a6(rgyud): de bas sdig pa mi bya zhing //log par smra ba'ang smad pa dang //dam pa'i chos kyang mi brnyas shing //lta ba log pa'ang smod par bya//de bas rtog tu dad gyur nas//sngags
229a7(rgyud): kyi cho ga rtag tu bstan//chos shes bden par skye ba dang //sems can rnams la phan par dga'//sngags dang sngags shes bsten gyur pa//nges par de la grub pa
229b1(rgyud): yin//mchog dang bAr ma tha ma las//rnam pa sna tshogs las byed//las ni byA byas byed pa ste//bya ba mi byed rtag tu ni//bya ba las ni ldan pa las//rtag tu de las grub
229b2(rgyud): par 'gyur//bya phyir las rnams thams cad phyir//las phyir rtag tu bya ba yin//bye ba'i don du bya ba min//bya ba la sngo la sbyar ba yin//don btsas nyid kyi bya ba la//
229b3(rgyud): bya ba nyid kyis rtag tu bya//bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid//bya ba las 'bras rtag tu bya//'bras med pa las 'bras 'byung zhing //'bras bu nyid kyang rtag 'bras 'gyur/
229b4(rgyud): 'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa yang //thams cad 'bras bu kho nar 'gyur//yang dag ldan pas sngags grub ste//yang dag ldan pas sngags grub pa'o//ldan pas
229b5(rgyud): rnam par bral ba ni//mi ldan ldan pa grub pa min//bsgrub bya sgrub pa med pa ni//de la grub pa mi 'gru'o//grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang //grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin//
229b6(rgyud): sngags pa ma grub sgrub byed pa//sngags ni sgrub par byed pa min//byed pa rab 'dod las yin te//las la 'dod pa bya bar 'dod//las min las ni thams cad la//las
229b7(rgyud): kyi rgyur ni mi bya'o//sdigs dang rgyud kyi do ni ldan pa'i//'bras bcas las ni btsam par bya//brtsams pa'i las ni brtsam par bya//las med nyid la brtsam mi bya//
230a1(rgyud): ma brtsams bya ba'i sngags rnams ni//lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur//sems can nA la thugs rtse bas//thub pa mchog gris sngon
230a2(rgyud): gsungs pa//sngags ni rgyu yi sgo dag nos//rgyal ba'i sras la dam tshig bshad //sgrub pa sngags ni kun shes shing //sngags kyi rgyal po mchob 'di ni//stegs
230a3(rgyud): kyi tshul du bstan pa yin//yang dag rdzogs lAm rgyud yin pas//gang du rigs pa rtags yod la//sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//dus ni ring po mi
230a4(rgyud): thobs par//mkhas pa'i grub pa thob pa yin//'byung po rnams la zho don du//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan//lam yang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni//
230a5(rgyud): mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin//de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam//lus don thams cad rdzogs par byed//de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni//dang po'i gnas ni sangs
230a6(rgyud): rgyas nyid//de bzhin 'bad med grub pa ni//'di las 'bras bcas thob pa yin//sna tshogs las dang las shes yin//sngags bzlas dag ni byed par 'gyur//
230a7(rgyud): tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams//mdor bsdus 'di yis thob pa ste//don kun sgrub byed grub pa ste//rgyal bu mchog gis gsungs pa yin//nor
230b1(rgyud): rnams rgyas par thob 'gyur te//dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang //de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin spyan//lha mi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur//mi lha lha min 'jig rten gyi//de
230b2(rgyud): bzhin bdag po thob gyur te//bdag po ma lus de dag gi/sngags pas thams cad thob pa dang //'bras bcos bya ba byed par 'gyur//gtsang sbra'i spyod dang ldan pa dang //
230b3(rgyud): tshul khrims bsdam gAtan+da rtag tu dga'//rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi//sngags pas rtag tu bzlas pa bya//sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis//lngas rnams
230b4(rgyud): sna tshogs bya ba ste//de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang //tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin//tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba'i gnas//'bring gis gong ma'i lus thob cing //mchog
230b5(rgyud): gyis rab tu 'gro ba ste//zlos pas rtag tu thob par 'gyur//sngags pas zlos mthar ngal bso zhing //ji srid du su bsdud par bya//zlos pas dus la bab pa na//der ni
230b6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba yin//de lta mod kyi de la sngags pas las rnams sgrub pa na der rtag tu bzlas na/skyes bu rnams kyi sdig pa zad par byed cing las rnam pa sna tshogs skye
230b7(rgyud): brgyud pa dag tu gang du gang byas pa de dag la grub pa gnas par nam zhig 'gyur zhe na/skyes bus ji srid tshogs pa rnyed pa na sngags pa'i ngo bos sngags bzlas pa ni sdig
231a1(rgyud): pa zad pa'i don dang /las bsrabs pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/de bzhin du mchog dang /bAr ma dang /tha ma dang /'jig rten
231a2(rgyud): gyis mchod pa dang /bzlas pas sdig pa mtha' dag zad par byed cing lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyad pa dag tu gang byas pa'i sdig pa dri thams cad 'jig par
231a3(rgyud): byed/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas na lus rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba
231a4(rgyud): dang /gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid dang /rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yino//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu
231a5(rgyud): rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam las sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa las bzlas pa dang /nges par sdom pa
231a6(rgyud): dang da sbyin sreg dang /bsam gtan dang /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang /las thams cad kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa rdzogs//
231a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
231b1(rgyud): stsal pa/'jam dpal nyan cig/khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rje su spyod pa/sems can+d+ra thams cad kyi don la d+he su brtson pa/sems can rnams gang zlos par byed
231b2(rgyud): pa dang /gang gis zlos par byed pa dang /de'i phreng ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi spyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
231b3(rgyud): shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das legs legaso//bdag la
231b4(rgyud): thugs brtse ba'i don dang /sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /dam tshig la zhugs pa rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi slad du de bshed du gsol/de skad ces gsol
231b5(rgyud): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal nyon cig/rnam par dbye ba rgya cher bshad par bya ste/
231b6(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa na sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed/dang po re shig sngag su 'gyur ba de gang zhe no/nu maHsarba bud d+hanA~M/
231b7(rgyud): e tsin t+yad b+hU ta rU pi NA~M/tad+ya thA/oM ku ru ku ru/sar+b+ba d+hAn sA d+ha ya/sarba dun+d+ho bi mo hi naM/ga ge nA ba lam+me bi sho d+ha ya swA hA//sngags 'dis 'breng ba tham
232a1(rgyud): cad la las bya'o//sbyang ba dang /dgug pa dang /blang ba dang /rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las bya'o//dang po phreng ba'i shring la ni//sngags
232a2(rgyud): kyis lar grangs nyi shu bdun//mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni//sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung ba bya//mtshan gcig dwer nI nyal byas na//rmi lam nang du dris
232a3(rgyud): mthong ba//mI ma yin gzugs grub pa ni//mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'o//sngags pa lA ni des smras pa//nor ni ci 'dod khyer cig ces//sgrub byed nang par langs
232a4(rgyud): nas ni//shing de las ni 'gro bar byed//sngags pas shring dri bor nas ni//gzhan dag tu ni 'phro byed na//mi sdug gzugs ni 'jigs byed pa//rmi lam du yang
232a5(rgyud): mthong mi 'gyur//dang bo ru drA DA yin te//in drAk+Sha ni gnyis pa yin//tha ma blo de co yin la//gzhan yang 'bras bu yod pa'o//shing la legs par 'dzeg
232a6(rgyud): mkhas pa'o//grogs dang lhan cig 'jog par bya//grogs po med par gyur na ni//rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya//steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gan su//sngams
232a7(rgyud): brtson yul bzhugs can 'jigs te//rtag tu de la bag yod pas//steng gi yal ga la byung nas//yal ga'i stong gi 'bras blangs te//steng gi las la
232b1(rgyud): sbyor bar bya//stong blo grub pa mchog tu ni//gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin//bar ma ba ra ma'i grub pu ste//grub pa tha mA'ang tha ma yin//rtag tu sreg
232b2(rgyud): tshogs ma zos pa'i//'bras bu yang dag zang bar bya//nub kyi ya lA ga las bobya pa//rdzas kyi rgyur ni grub pa yin//byung gri gnod sbyin la sogs dang //lho rnams
232b3(rgyud): rtag tu 'gugs par byed//skad cig 'gugs par byed bstan pa'i//'byung po thams cad zhi phyir dang //lha dang lha min dri za dang //mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams//
232b4(rgyud): dbang du bya ba'i las byed//'byung po kun yang rgyas par byed//don yod las ni byed pa ste//las rnams sna tshogs ma lus byed//shar phyogs yel gi la skyes
232b5(rgyud): shings rdo yang dag 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni//de tshe 'bad med byas gyur na//tshe ni ring ba'i rgyu yang yin//rtag tu sngags grub 'bras bu ni//rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa
232b6(rgyud): yin//gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi//ya lA ge lo mar rab ldan pa'i//sngags pas de ni 'bade spang //sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed//lhor snyan pa yi
232b7(rgyud): yal ga dang //'bras bu gang dag skyes pa ni//blangs na gdung byed dgra rnams kyis//srog ni 'jig par byed pa yin//zlos pas 'bad spang bar bya//bsod nams
233a1(rgyud): ma yin mang po'i rgyu//yal ga 'og tu 'phyang gnas la//'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa//lha men bu mo gnas pa yi//sa yi//
233a2(rgyud): 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur//de yi 'bras bu'i phreng ba ni//blangs nas 'og tu 'gro bstun pa//sa yi 'og tu gnas par ni//des na de ni 'gro bar byed//der zhugs
233a3(rgyud): lha yi bde ba ni//zlos pas thob par 'gyur ba yin//lha min bu mo chags bzhin du//bskal par de ni gnas par byed//me tog phreng ba kun blangs nas//de
233a4(rgyud): nas zlos pa slar log bya//grogs dang lhan cig srung byas nas//de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/gnas nas thag ring song nas ni//de bzhin gtsang phyogs cho ga
233a5(rgyud): bzhin//de nas sngags pa rtag tu 'dug/phreng ba yongasu sbyang bar bya//brtson pas phreng ba'i 'bras blangs te//kun nas yongasu dag byas nas//sngags pa bzang
233a6(rgyud): pos phreng ba dbug/gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig gam no//nyi shu dang ni rtsa gcig tu//sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bkru/snga mo'i sngags kyis rtag tu yang /
233a7(rgyud): bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa bya//de nas de dag dag par 'dod//de nas dag par yang dag 'dod//pad+ma'i rtsa lag dag las ni//bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa dag/
233b1(rgyud): gsum dang lnga lngab byas pa yi//sdom can gyis ni phred skud bya//sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgya//'bru ni phra zhing shin tu zlum//rtag tu srog chags bu ga med//lags/
233b2(rgyud): 'dzum smad pa'ang med pa yin//mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang //de bzhin gas med bu ga med//ru drAk+Sha dang po de tse//ai ni drA k+Sha yi 'bras bu nyid//rtag tu lung tang
233b3(rgyud): mdzes pa dang //gzhan yang 'bras bu 'dod pa dag/'bad pa yis ni phreng ba dag/sngags pas brtson byas de tshe brgyu//gser ram yang na dngul dag gam//nor bu shel
233b4(rgyud): lngas byas pa dang //dung dang mu sa ra dag dang //mu tig las kyang bya ba yin//byi ru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi//phreng ba dag kyang bya ba yin//gzhan yang rin tshan bzang po
233b5(rgyud): yis/phreng ba legs par rab tu bya//sa ni rab bzlums ril bu dag/mnyam par gzhag nas skud pas brgyu//gzhan yang ril bu cung zad gang //'bras bu 'byung khung
233b6(rgyud): dag las bya//ku sha'i rtse mo'i mdud pos kyang //sngags pas 'bade bya ba yin//brgya rtsa brgyad de ma nyi shu 'am//lnga bcu nyid ni bar ma yin//sngags pa mnyam par
233b7(rgyud): gzhag nas ni//tshad 'dis phreng ba brgyu ba yin//rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba ni//phreng ba'i mchog tu bya ba yin//phreng ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang //sngags pas rtag tu rgyu ba
234a1(rgyud): yon da lta brgya ba byas nas ni//rnam pa gsu mam ma gaN+Di d+d+ha//lcags blarba rang bzhin gdu dUr b+ha//de bzhin gsor das pa/
234a2(rgyud): dang ni//de bzhin zangs ma'i gdu bu yis//phreng po kun yang bcing bar bya//de nas yang mog kun mthar ni//kun la'adi de bzhin gdags par bya//'bad pas
234a3(rgyud): dam du bcings bya ste//ji ltar dam por 'gyur bar ro//yongasu gsal bar byas nas ni//dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin//de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar//
234a4(rgyud): yongasu 'khor ngos rgyun pa yin//mu tIg phreng ba 'dra ba yis//mgul pa brgyun pa lta bur bya//chu bo dag ni dri med pa'i//chug cing dag gis khrus bya zhing //
234a5(rgyud): ji ltar go rims khrus byas nas//chug ni las ni ljang nas//'bad pas de bzhin nye reg bya//phreng ba rjesu blangs nas ni//ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bklu/de bzhin//
234a6(rgyud): sa yaM bye ma dang //chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te//dri zhim dag gis rjes byug cing //rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang //tsan+d+ra dan dkar dang gur gu mo//de
234a7(rgyud): nas de bzhin gnyi ga 'gro/'bad pa yis ni rab tu bkru/de bzhin khrus byas song nas ni//gang na ras ris par ma de//rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni//shA
234b1(rgyud): so gre mi yi mchog/de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs//sa stong rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can//de yi mdun du thong ba ni//de dang nye bAr bzhag par bya//de dang nye bar bzhag
234b2(rgyud): nas ni//de yi mdun du nyer gnas ni//stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni//brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang //nyin zhag gi ci ga ni sbyang byas te//bdun pa thub la phreng ba
234b3(rgyud): dbul//lnga pa de bzhin bzlas byas nas//tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya//de nas phreng ba la bzlas nas//de yi mtshan mo nyal bar bya//ku sha biting ba'i sa la ni//
234b4(rgyud): sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya//gal te des ni rmi lam na//dge ba'i rmi lam mthong na ni//'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste//de la grub par bstun pa yin//spangs
234b5(rgyud): rgyas nyan thos bse ru ni//gal te 'di yis rmi lAm mthong //sngags pa de yi bya ba ni//'bras bcas nges par 'grub par 'gyur//gzhon nu'i gzugs can byis pa
234b6(rgyud): no rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba//gal te rmi lAm des mthong dang //phyeng po stsol ba'ang de bzhin te//don yod de ni 'grub 'gyur te//sngags kyi don rnams grub
234b7(rgyud): byed pa'o///byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las ris ris par
235a1(rgyud): ma'i chog rab 'byam las phreng ba'i cho ga rab 'brum+b+ha bcug nyis brdugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAts+tsha bung nga/
235a2(rgyud): gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsung ma'i gzhal med khang lnga gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod
235a3(rgyud): sngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod/me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga'i
235a4(rgyud): phyir/glang gis rig pa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur//de gang zhe na/gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi
235a5(rgyud): gzhi ni 'di lta ste/oM ut+tiSh+Tha ha ri ping+ga la lo hi tAN+Da/de hid d+hU pa yA hUM phaT sarba bin+ti bin+da sha mya swAhA/'jam dpal 'di ni me'i snying po'i mchog la sa thams
235a6(rgyud): tsAng byed pa/'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin te/dang po re shig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di la lan gcig bzlas pas sreg blugs gsum gyis me la
235a7(rgyud): sbyin sreb byas na me spyan drangs par 'gyuraro//de ltar rab tu sbyar na zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /drag po'i las dag la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/mya ngan med shing
235b1(rgyud): don du//rgan pa nyid ni rab tu bsngags//mtho gang dam ni khru gang tsam//sor gsum srid du bya ba yin//snum pa'i rnam par rab tu bsdugs//cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin//
235b2(rgyud): bu ga med cing nang stong man//de bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang //ljang dang dkarA ba'i kha dog gam//khe dog nag po spang bar bya//srin bu rnams kyis zos pa'ang sdang //bu ka yod
235b3(rgyud): pa'ang rnam par bzlog/gzhan yang kha dog rab bsngags min//tha ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs//ha cang skum min rlonr-i pa'ang min//tshig min las ni brtsam par bya//rul
235b4(rgyud): ba dang ni yo ba'ang min//shin tu ring ba'ang spang b.re bya//de nas me thab bya ba ni//kun nas gru bzhi bya ba ste//'og nyid du yang brko ba ni//'bad pas khru ni bzhi yo tshad//
235b5(rgyud): khru gsum drang ni khru gnyis dang //de bzhin khru gcig tshad du bya//rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dong //bye mas lags par sbyar ba gang //de nas pad+ma 'da'i lan kan ni
235b6(rgyud): kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o//yang ra 'bad pas zur bzhi yang //de bzhin lan kran dbyibasu bya//rdo rje'i rnam pa 'dra ba yi//rtse mo granyis su'ang rtse gsum bya//
235b7(rgyud): mi thab kyi ni tha ka la//khru gnyis thad kar bya ba yin//gtsang dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas//chu klung de bzhin chu dbus dang //shing gcig gi ni phyogs dag dang //
236a1(rgyud): dur khrod dang ni khang stong du//sbyin sreg logs par yang dag brtsam//de bzhin ri bo'i rtse dag tu'o//rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang /
236a2(rgyud): dgon pa chen po'ang de bzhino//gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs dag tu//gang zag mchog gis rab gsungs pa//sbyin sreg gnas ni thams cad la//gnas de dag ni
236a3(rgyud): thams cad gsungs//ku sha'i khres ni khru gang tsam//de la 'dug par byas nas ni//sngags shes der ni sbyin srog las//khyad par du'ang bya ba yin//gnas de dag
236a4(rgyud): la 'dug na ni//myur du 'grub par the tshom med//shar dang byang du bltas pas kyang //zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya//lhor bltas na ni drag po'i los//sngags pas de ni
236a5(rgyud): spang bar bya//shar du bltas pas zhi ba 'grub//byang du bltas pas rgyas pa'o//'di yis sngags pa dus rtag tu//sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brtsams//bil ba
236a6(rgyud): rmag sha n+ya gro d+ha swA//rgyas pa'i las ni yongasu bya//mngon spyod shing las bya ba ni//dkar dang tshwa dang skyur drang rno//de dag thams cad spang bya ste//thub pa rnams kyis
236a7(rgyud): drug tu bkog/zhi dang rgyas pa'i las la rmi/ shing rlon dag ni rab tu bsngags//drag po'i las l-i shing sram ste//thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs//yam
236b1(rgyud): shing dri dag mad na ni//tha mA la d+ha shing dag kun tu brtag/gnyi ga'i rtse mor bya ba ni//ku shas kun tu yang dag dkri/sngo dang snum pa 'dra ba dang //rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra ba dang //
236b2(rgyud): de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu ni//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya//margad rnam pa 'dra ba dang //rtswa skam gyis ni rtag tu yang //sdig pa'i las rnams bya ba yin//'dir ni thub pa
236b3(rgyud): mchog gis bkag/dri med chu ni yongs dag pa//srog chags drug gis rtag spangs pa//des ni kun nas gtor byas nas//g.yas phyog su ni bskor byas te//sdom
236b4(rgyud): brtson gyis ni me skar bya//cho ga ji bzhin te reg bya//gtsang ba'i rtsa yi rtsa bas ni//me sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas//de nas chang par bcings na ni//'bod pas mo ni
236b5(rgyud): spar bar bya//kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste//rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min//sham thabs bla gos rnam par spangs//gos gzhan dag ni bkag ma yin//shin tu drag
236b6(rgyud): bas de mi bya//gnod par dga' bas ma yin na//rlung yab gtsang dang de bzhin gos//lo mas kyang ni rlung ya ba bya//rlung gis khyad du mi gsod pa//myi ni rab tu sad
236b7(rgyud): byas nas//sngags shes pas ni me sbar te//sbyin sreg don du legs mnyam gzhag/lag pa de ni ga yon pa yis//lan gsum bar du chus gtor nas//de
237a1(rgyud): nI ba yi mar gyis ni//sngags byugs gsum ni des sbyin bya//de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste//sangs rgyas kun dang skyod pa dang //
237a2(rgyud): rang sngags sngags kyi 'gon po la//de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o//de tshe mo yi snying po yis//sngags kyis lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i//dri zhim me
237a3(rgyud): tog dag gis ni//sdom brtson me ni spyan drang bya//sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas//mkhas pas gan sa nI sbyin par bya//gdan dang gnas ni sbyin byed na'ang //
237a4(rgyud): dro nyid sngags yin gzhan pas min//zho dang mar gyis sbags pa dang //sbrang rtsi'i brtags pa'i yam shing gis//rgyasra pa'i lasA ni bya ba'i phyir//sngags
237a5(rgyud): kyis kun tu sbyin sreg bya//mur dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'am//yang nu zho dang ldan pa yi//yam shing rdzas dang ldan pa yis//gnyi ga la gnas de tshe bye//
237a6(rgyud): stong ngam yong na 'bum 'am ni//yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag/de tshe sngags pas sngags bzung nas//la ne ra bzlas shing me la dor//'bar ba'i mr-i yi
237a7(rgyud): phreng ba 'am//de bzhin me lce gcig gyur lo//zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya//dud pa med la rgyas pa'ang bya//dud bcas drag po'i las la bya//de ni rgyal
237b1(rgyud): bAs smad cing spangs//gal te me ni mdog ldan na//sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar//zhi la kha dog dkar po ni//rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags//gal te mo dkar
237b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas//der ni sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur//de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la//rgyas par grub par 'dod pa yin//nag dang du ba'i kha dog dang //ser skya
237b3(rgyud): lo ni sdeb ldan pas//kha dog rnam gsum bstan pas ni//rnam gsum grub pa 'di dag yin//mdog gzhan sbyin gyi kha dog gam//rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan po//
237b4(rgyud): sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni//grub pa yod pa ma yin no//de 'dra'i kha dog 'dra ba 'am//rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i//mi ni 'bar ba de mthong na//las kyi sbyor
237b5(rgyud): pa'ang brtsam par bya//gal te sngags ni grub 'dod na//phyi rol me ni spar bar bya//cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni//phyir yang sbyin sreg rab tu bya//me yi sngags ni
237b6(rgyud): zlos pa yis//gshegs gsol spyan drung nyid kyang bya//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni cho ga sbyin//sngar ni rab tu brtags pa yis//de nyid kyis ni skyon sdig bya//gshegs/
237b7(rgyud): gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang //de nyid kyi ni las dag gis//las rnams thams cad nyid kyang bya/me yi las dang de bzhin gzugs//ros ches mdun du brtsam
238a1(rgyud): byas na//dror ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur zhes//sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyi sku gsungs//rgyal bas sngags pa'i las rnams/
238a2(rgyud): dag/der ni rnam pa kun tu byas//sdig pa dag ni khyad par du//gang yang rgyal bas smad pa dang //'jig rten 'gro bas smad pa dag/gzhan gyis smad pa'ang bya ba
238a3(rgyud): min//'khor los bsgyur ba zang nyid dang ni//byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'tho ba dang //de bzhin mngon shes lnga 'thob dang //de nas lha nyid thob pa'o//ras ris la
238a4(rgyud): rtag brtson zhing shes//sbyin sreg las la 'jigs med dang //sa 'og gi ni bdag po'am//yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur//sa bdag lha dang gnod sbyin nyid//
238a5(rgyud): rtag tu gnod sbyin mo 'gugs byed//rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni//yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang //rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid//sems can thams cad dbang
238a6(rgyud): //bdug nyid tshe dang sems can tshe//'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje//sa ban+d+ha la ni yang dag gnas//sbyin
238a7(rgyud): sreg las kyi 'gugs byed na//sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos//sde dpon bdag dang de bzhin du//khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur//dbang 'gyur
238b1(rgyud): d+h+rigatsAr 'byung po kun//de bzhin mi yi dbang po nyid//sems can kun lnga dpung don dang //yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur//de bzhin rtag tu las kun la//sbyin sreg
238b2(rgyud): gris ni kun tu bya//thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid//las kun las ni bsten byas na//de ni nges par 'grub 'gyur te//las dge'i don ni dam pa yino//ber ma
238b3(rgyud): ljid kyang 'grub par 'gyur//tha ma'i las kyang de bzhin//rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du//grub dang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum//'bras dang bcas par grub snang ste/
238b4(rgyud): sbyin sreg las la rab tu bstan//phyag rgya gtsug bud lnga bcings nas//sngags kyang sgra can mas byas nas//las rnams kun ni bye ba dang //sngags pas bdag nyid
238b5(rgyud): bsrung ba bya//sbyin sreg laswa la rab 'jug pas//de nas sngags 'dri brjod par bya//bdun namA brgyad du bzlas pa yis//las 'di lnga ni rtag tu bya//na maHsarba
238b6(rgyud): bud d+ha pa d+hi sa twA nAM/a pra tI ha ta ga ti ga tA nAM/tad+yA thA/oM dz+wA la tiSh+Ta hUM ru ru biM shra saM b+ha ba saM b+ha be swA hA/sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni//yang dang yang du shing la bzla//
238b7(rgyud): gnyis sam bdun du bzlas pa yis//sngags rig des ni sbyin sreg bya//me tog bdug pa dri yang rung //ma lus thams cad dag dang ni//chu la sngags rnams bzlas pa la/
239a1(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya//las rnams kun gyi rgyu yi phyir//de nas cho ga brtsam par bya//lus rnams dag ni thams cad la//snga ma'i
239a2(rgyud): sbyor ba nyid kyis bya//snga ma'i gtsug pud lnga bcing sA ta//phyag rgya chen po brags ljon ma//snga ma'i gtsug pud lnga bcing bya//skra can ma nyid rab bzlas pas//
239a3(rgyud): dos na srung ba byas par 'gyur//grub pa'i rgyu la 'jigs myod pos//las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya//galA te la nye bzang po 'am//rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thos
239a4(rgyud): na/de la sngags ni don yod de//ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur//dang po'i las la rab sbyor dang //sngags kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na//thams cad 'bras bu bcas
239a5(rgyud): pa dang //de la grub par brjod pa yin//rgyal spa rnga nyid pa Ta ha//rnga bo che yi sgra dag ni//brtson byas grub pa ma lus 'gyur//sbyin sreg las la yang drug bstan//
239a6(rgyud): gzhan yang la nye bzang po dang //'dab chags dge ba'i sgra dag dang //rnam pa sna tshogs des po'i sgra//rgyal ba rnams kyis bsdogs pa dang //bkra shis bzang po
239a7(rgyud): rab sngags dang //rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra//gdugs dang rgyal mchin bdin dang //bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang //
239b1(rgyud): ma na thub pa'i rgyu rnams yin//rnam pa du ma'o kha dog gram+b+ha//'dzig rten gyis mchod phyu ba sngags pa//de da mthong na grub 'gyur ba//sngags rnams dA ma'i spang /
239b2(rgyud): yul yin//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thog pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtse ba'i cho ga bcu
239b3(rgyud): bsgrub po ste sbyin sreg gi cho ga rlob 'byam rdzog so///de nas bco ldan 'das ts+tshak+Shu thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khadral
239b4(rgyud): gzigs te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyi gse pA'i rig pa yod de/sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa po'i thabs de bzhin
239b5(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rje su gnang ba/chos kyi mdzod las byung ba/chos kyi sprin gyi rje su zhugs pa/man+dan pa'i ngo bo nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rte
239b6(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/shin tu gtso bor gyur pa/gzhon nu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod/
239b7(rgyud): shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la//lha dang mi rnams kyi skyes bu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin//gzhon nu de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di
240a1(rgyud): ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan+da cing shin tu gtso bo yin te/de bzhin gshogs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas
240a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa dag gis sngon gsungaso//de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba/kun nos bkra shis par 'dod
240a3(rgyud): pa rnga sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod pa/rab tu bsngags pa/sems can thams cad yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa/sdig pa thams
240a4(rgyud): cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa/re ba yongasu rdzogs par byed pa de yang gang zhe na/bar 'drir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
240a5(rgyud): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung bar gyur to//gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad
240a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas khyab par mdzadade/sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par mdzad nas slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
240a7(rgyud): dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa/sems can
240b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis mo thub pa/'od chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa/'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa/'kho/
240b2(rgyud): los bsgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to//byung n+das na mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang byar byas te/rig pa'i
240b3(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad kyis yongasu bskor ba/rig pa du ma bye ba khyi phrag brgya stong 'byin par byed pa/yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don cing 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'byin
240b4(rgyud): pa steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mngon du blta ba dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang me'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
240b5(rgyud): chen po yang snang bar byas na snga bar snang la gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba de bzhin
240b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las bcom
240b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rin chen tog gis yang dag par thob pa/sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /'od dpag med dang /bsnyen par dka' ba dang /spyan bzang dang /tog bzang dang /
241a1(rgyud): me tog dbang po dang /gnyid mthar phyin dang /'jig rten thub pa dang /gla ser thub la sogasnga pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
241a2(rgyud): gsungs shing rje su yi rang bA dang /'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba de yang gang zhe na/tAd+ya thA/
241a3(rgyud): oM b+hU/'jam dpal 'di ni snying po dam pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog/sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba yi ge gcig
241a4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po 'di yang dag par bsgrubs na sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/gzhon nu gang yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po'i mchog la sngags
241a5(rgyud): thams cad dang rjesu 'thun pa/mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog yang dag par rje su gnang ba/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa/dang po re shig
241a6(rgyud): sgrub pa pos nges par 'bum phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'dir gzhon nu khyod kyis cho go'i rgyal po la 'jig rten dang
241a7(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags dang rgyud rnams bsgrub par bya'o//'dis srung ba byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//'jig rten dang 'jig
241b1(rgyud): rten+da las 'das pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de gsungs ma thug tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
241b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang snang byas khyab cing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
241b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du 'khod par gyur to//sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
241b4(rgyud): thams cad dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang
241b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dang /rig pa'i rgyal po rnams 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas lhags par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
241b6(rgyud): mu med pa dag na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can mang po dbang du gyur to//dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas kyi ngan 'gro la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i
241b7(rgyud): snang bas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa yid shin tu bde bas tshim zhing skyo ba med par gyur te/nges par theg pa gsum la
242a1(rgyud): gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la gzigs nas 'dzum dpal gzhon
242a2(rgyud): nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpel nyon cig/rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rdzu 'phrul tsha ba/dpa' bo gcig pu las thams cad byed pa/rig pa thams cad
242a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba/sems can gyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa/cho ga zhi ba mo thams cad yongasu rgyas pa/khyod kyi sngags dang /
242a4(rgyud): rgyud dang /cho ga rab 'byam la yang dag par zhugs pa/sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa thun mong du gyur pa/grags pa che ba dang /spro ba che ba dang /sems
242a5(rgyud): can sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa/byang chub kyi lam thams cad yongasu sbyong bar byed pa/mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jug
242a6(rgyud): par byed pa/bdud zil gyis gnon par byed pa/byang chub kyi snying po la gnas par byed pa/dge ba'i tshogs yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'o//'di nyid
242a7(rgyud): mdor bsdus na/cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa ras ris kyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs sngon gyi sngags kyi spyad pa rjesu spyod pa gang la rab tu gnas na sems
242b1(rgyud): can gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'gyur te/rmad du byung ba chen po sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa/'od byed pa thams cad kyi bsam
242b2(rgyud): pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/rnam par 'dren pa/'gro ba thams cad la phan par byed pa/sangs rgyas bzhin du mngon sum du nye bar bzhugs pa rang byung du gyur pa/
242b3(rgyud): mchog dang /bar mA dang /bla ma'i las thams cad byed pa/shin tu bde ba dam pa/shis pa dang zhi bar byed pa/sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed
242b4(rgyud): pa'o/ lha rnams kyi yang lha nyid de//thub pa rnams kyi thub pa mchog/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa//dag pa 'jig rten rnam par grags//chos kun rang

251a5(rgyud): sun ring gnas te bar rjed med//bde ba la brten rtag tu mchod//rtag tu skyes bu ngom par ldan//byang chub sems kyis yang dag spyod//skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam
251a6(rgyud): par srungs//grub pa'i dbang phyug 'gyur ba s+ho//sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs//de la shi 'phos mying skye zhing //bde bya mod la rab tu gzhil//'gro bum
251a7(rgyud): lus sgo byas nas//byang chub yang dag gzhal par 'gyur//rnam pa sna tshogs las mtha' yas//mang po 'jog rten don mchod pa//sngags kyi rgyal po 'dir
251b1(rgyud): zlog/ d+hAn+dan k+Sha R+tha bAnas/ du r+b+ha n+da nga mo//nga mos bcu stod yang smras // 'dun mas dang da n+da smra
251b2(rgyud): byed//rnam po du mdong bo'am//las ni ga na 'digasungs pa//rnams cad sgrub pa sh+tha'i gyu te//sbubs pa legs b+he s+t+wa~Mng na/mA ni ma
251b3(rgyud): mang A~MtAM//man+tan dran smad bzlas byas na// ngas byu ba tho gyur //smai pa mAdun shes 'gyur//dur khrod dus 'drig nas ni//
251b4(rgyud): 'brem med sa d+hA b+h+r-i/m-i ni ni n+do ba den chenaH//thabs grub par 'dzud pa yin//rig pa'i rgyas brdzu byu //la tI dra khrod kun sa na skye ba nas/
251b5(rgyud): dru gis skye ba ba / myur 'dod pa'i 'bras zla bye //nga y-id+d+ha r+yA gA'i gnas drug tu//rdzu 'phrul chen po zlos byed na//de dag nas grub pa thob 'gyur
251b6(rgyud): sdigs pa lags par sbyor byed lnga'o//gdugasuM dAkA/ro de bzhin ral gri dang //nor bu'i ldum dang gdub dkor drung //mu tog phreng ba dpung rgyun dang //gang bu dang ni sa
251b7(rgyud): bgro dang //ga pa gdang ni de bzhin nas//so shing dang ni spre'u thugs dang //mchod phyir thogs de shwe dang ni//khro bo dang go cha nyid ding no//gesang gzhi dang ni ril ba dang /
252a1(rgyud): phreng ba dang ni mchil lham dang //'jig rten gnyis na 'dod pa yi//rgyun gyis gtso bo thams cad do//lha dang mi dang de bzhin du//gzhan
252a2(rgyud): yang rgyan 'gyur 'di la brgyan//de dag thams cad thob 'gyur te//res ris mdun du zlos byed la'o//rdzas rnams kun dang 'byung khung dang //rgyan dang nor bu rnams dang ni//
252a3(rgyud): mtshon cha thams cad du ma ni//ras ris mdun du bzhag nas ni//dag byas gcig cir bzlas bya ba//'bum phrag brgyad kyis g.yo ba dang //thams cad bcas te
252a4(rgyud): 'bar ba dang //zlos pa reg pas gyen du 'gro/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa//sems can rang bzhin yin yang rung //rgyan dang mtshon cha yin yang rung //
252a5(rgyud): ngo bo nyid dam sa rang bzhin//rang tshul sbyong dam bac+doMs mi dang //mdab chags sna tshogs tshogs kyang rung //gang dag 'byung po kun la grags//bcos ma 'am
252a6(rgyud): bcos ma min pa 'am//'du shes can nam 'du shes med//sngags pa mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur//rnam pa sna tshogs rdzas bzhag dang //rnam pa sna
252a7(rgyud): tshogs khams las byas//rang byas byed du bcug pa dang //'gro ba'i skye gnas dag na bsngags//sngar bstan cho ga bzhin du ni//ras ris mdun du rnam par bzhag
252b1(rgyud): smyani drug bram bdun dag gis//sngags pas reg nas bzla bar bya//byAzlas mthar de dag rab 'bar to//grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur//drin do la rog tsam gyis//
252b2(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur//'dir ni lha yul thob nas ni//ring du 'tsho zhing bde bar 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul tshon po rig rgyal la//ji lta ji ltar rab sbyor ba//de
252b3(rgyud): de ltar dga' 'gyur zhing //rtag tu mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur//gzhan yang las la rab sbyor ba//las rnams dus ni yun ring ba//rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul gyi
252b4(rgyud): de nyid kyis ni myur 'grub 'gyur//gtsang zhing sems ni gtsang ba dang //gtsang ba'i las la rtog tu dga'//getsang ba'i phyogs dang sngags shes po//gcing ba'i grub
252b5(rgyud): bathob par 'gyur//las gang byed pa de 'bras thob//mchog gi mchog tu 'gyur bya dang //'bring gi lus kyi 'bring du 'gyur//thams kyang ni bla mar ro//ma bsgrubs
252b6(rgyud): las kyis grub pa yang //cung zad tsam gyis 'bras 'byin te//bu mo 'am nor ni mang po dag/yang dag spyod pas byed par 'gyur//rtag tu bzlas pa tsAm gyis ni/
252b7(rgyud): longs spyod che zhing stobs kyang che//rgyal po dga' zhing blon po nyid//rtag tu bzlas pa byed par 'gyur//sngogs kyi rgyal po lan gcig bzlas//de yi sdig pa rab tu
253a1(rgyud): 'jig+sa/gnyi su brtas pa 'am bdun du rnas pas//bdag nyid srung nga chen por 'gyur//lan dargyad don bzlas pa skyes//phyogs
253a2(rgyud): ngams cad srung bar byed//gos la lan gnyis mngon bsngags na//spyugs pa dgan+thi rtag tu yang //nad rnams kun las shin tu grol//gos ni gnyis ka la sngags
253a3(rgyud): n+ya gos dag la ni rig byas na//lus can nang ni med par 'gyur//gdong dang mig gnyis dgu la ni//'ab pas mngon par rab bsngags na//khros pa rnamasakyi
253a4(rgyud): khro ba ni//sngags pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig/gang yang 'byung tshogs ma rungs pa//'tshe byed sdig pa'i las can la//sngags rgyal sum cu rab bzlas te/
253a5(rgyud): de dag gdong la blta ba 'am//rang lag nyid la yang dang yang //'don par bsngags pa byas nas ni//de dag thal mo brdebs na ni//lus can kun ni grol byar 'gyur//
253a6(rgyud): byis pa la ni rtag bya ba//khrus dang bza' dang btung ba la//sngags mchog drug cu bzlas nas ni//lha yi dam pa mchog byas na/sha za ma mo dag gi gdon//ma
253a7(rgyud): rungs kun las grol bar 'gyur//sngags kyi 'jigs pas 'jigs byed cing //rtag tu byis pa gtong bar byed//de ltar rnam pa du ma'i las//sa steng myur du
253b1(rgyud): zla 'jig na//mi rnams la ni de bzhin byed//gang+gA dag 'byung po sdub sbrum ni//rnam pa sna tshogs gnas 'gro ba//dug bcas drug ni med pa nyid//sngags kyu mthu
253b2(rgyud): yis 'jig par byed//gang dge sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang //gang dag tshor ba thams cing ni//sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas pa yis//myur du zhi bar rab tu 'gro//rnam
253b3(rgyud): bya sna tshogs gdon sdug bsngal//mang po'ichi ba 'gro ba'i nang//sngags kyi rgyul po drug brgya bzlas//myur ba nyid du sel bar 'gyur//sbyin sreg las ni bya ba la/
253b4(rgyud): smyo dang mar gyis thams ci bsre//ud pal sngon po'i dri bzang ni//rtse brgyad stong gis rgyas pa bye//zhi zhing 'byung po rnams song nas//'gro ba rnams ni bde gnas
253b5(rgyud): thob dad de ltar rnam pa du mA ni//mang po'i las ni yang dag 'byung //sngags pa legs par rab sbyor na//myur du thams cad byed par 'gyur//bzlas pa tsam gyis
253b6(rgyud): byed pa ni//dgra rnams kyi ni khro ba sel//sngags 'di don dam ldan gyur pa//cho ga mang po rgya che ba//de dag tshig mthong ba yi//de dag 'dir ni grub pa yin//'dir ni
253b7(rgyud): rnams bzlos byed pa//phran chags las kyang don yod 'gyur//thams cad las kyang bzlas pa yis//myur du don rnams rtag tu byed//'thung po rnams ni dbang byed
254a1(rgyud): 'dod//dus gsum du ni bzlas pa yin//rtag tu sna ma'i me tad gis//sbyin pa sreg las kyang bya ba yin//tsan+da dan dkar dang ga pur
254a2(rgyud): dang nga gur gum gyis kyang bya ba yin//bzlas nas sngags pa mchog sbyin zhing //rtag tu 'bras bcas byeng par 'gyur//rtag tu zlos pas sbyin sreg bya//yid la
254a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed//go pur la sogs ldan pa yis//rtag tu sbyin sreg rab tu brtag/ji ltar 'dod par yongs brtags pa'i//rnam pa sna tshogs cho ga sgrub//
254a4(rgyud): tha ma las ni tha ma dang //chen po las ni chen po 'byung //bar ma bor ma'i las dag las//rtag tu grub par bstan pa yin//de bas las rnams kun la ni//
254a5(rgyud): khyad par du ni sbyin sreg bya//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snong phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga
254a6(rgyud): las le'u bcu bzhi pa 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byam rdzog so///de nas byang chub
254a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang der 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te/'dug pa de stan las langs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te///
254b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lnga btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das logs lpags//logs par rab tu bstan pa dang /mchog tu legs
254b2(rgyud): par gsungs pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi sbyor ba chos chen po'i sprir las nges par byung ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/rig pa chen mo'i
254b3(rgyud): rgyal po/'khor los bsgyur ba/cho ga chen po rgya tsho ba/don thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/'bras bu dang bcas pa sgrub par byed pa/byang chub kyi lam b+hAn
254b4(rgyud): med pa bya ba'i bye brag yang dag par sdom pa dang /bzlas pa dang /sbyin sreg dang /rig pa dang /spyod pa'i rje su 'brang ba rnams kyi lam/'bras bu bstan pa'i las
254b5(rgyud): rkyen rnga bskyed pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma/rmed du byung ba'i stobs bcu/gnod par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed cing nges par pha rol du 'gro bar
254b6(rgyud): byed pa de bcom ldan 'das de ni leg so//sngags sgrub par byed pa dang rje su 'thun pa'i/rmi lam na mthong bar byed pa'i mtshan ma de ston pas bshad du gsol/gang gis
254b7(rgyud): reg pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rjesu spyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshan mo'i las rtsom par byed par 'gyur ba dang /'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi mtshan mar
256a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
256a2(rgyud): to/gnod sbyir gyi bdag po khyed skye bo mang pa la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dor dang /phan pa
256a3(rgyud): dang /bde ba dang /rig pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir legaso legaso//de legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig dang /ngas khyod
256a4(rgyud): la bsha do//dang por shig las thams cad kyi sngar 'du 'dzi med pa'i gan su song ste/ri bo'i rtse 'am/chu bo'i 'gram mam/phug gi nang ngam/gtsang ba'i
256a5(rgyud): phyogasu lo ma'i spyil po byas la de nyid kyi tshe ga snga me bzhin du ras ris bzhag cing mchod pa chen po byas la las thams cad la yang yar ngo'i zla ba phyed dam/tshe
256a6(rgyud): 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la nges par nyin zhag bzang po'i mchen mo'i thun dang po la tsan dan dkar po dang /gu dgum dang /ga pur gcig tu byas la tsan dan gyi
256a7(rgyud): shing gi ma rab tu sbar zhong ras ris kyi mdun du khru bzhi'i tshad tsam gyi me zab la du ba dang sel ba med pa'i me la sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o//
256b1(rgyud): de nas yang sbyin sreg gi mthar pad+ma'i me togra gi can dan dkar po'i chus bsrang gAtor byas pa'i stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o//sbyin sreg gi mthar yang bzang poSh+Ti gdan dang //
256b2(rgyud): dong bkab lo rang gi lha la rang gi sngags kyis spyan drang ba bya zhing sngags 'dis sbyin srog bya'o//na maHsar+b+ba bud d+he nI/a prA ti hI ta sha sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/oM kum+ba ra rU
256b3(rgyud): piN+DaM daR+sha ya daR+sha ya/At+ma no/b+hu me mung b+hA ba srob ni me nau bI da ya wa b+hU ti hU~M hUM phoT phaT swA hA//sngags 'dis srung ba byas shing sbyin sreg gri lis thams cad la las
256b4(rgyud): bya'o//de nas ku sha'i rtse mo ga te s+yA ka phyi rol du bstan te bting la ku shi'i khros kyi sngags byis te/mgo shar phyog su bstan la ros ris kyi mdun nas ha cang yang mi ring /
256b5(rgyud): hA cang yang me nye bar nyal bar bya'o//thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rje su brtson par byas nas/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnamasu lnga phyag byas nas
256b6(rgyud): sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te/sangs rgyas thams cad la badrag nyid phul la/de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o//dang po'i thun gyi rmi lam
256b7(rgyud): gang /ra bad kan las byung shes par bya//gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste//'jig rten la yod smad pa yin//gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya//bzhi pa bden
257a1(rgyud): par 'byung ba yin//bad kan rmi lam dang po ni//'di 'dra rtag tu mthong ba yin//nor bu sha lA gyi khang pa ni//kun nas mu tig phreng ba can//
257a2(rgyud): am pa'i shing tshog sde rab mang po//bdag nyid chu nang 'i'abyed bar mthong //kun nas 'bab chus khyab pa dang //rgya mtsho chen pos khyab pa dang //gong du bdag gi lus
257a3(rgyud): gnas pa//de nyid du ni mthong bar byed//gang du phyogs dor rdzing dag gis//kun nas yongasu khyab pa dang //gru dang chu ni 'thung ba dang //btung ba'i khang pa khang pa
257a4(rgyud): dang rnga'i kun nas yongasu 'khor ba ni//chu chen gyis ni khyer bar mthong //kha ba can ni byis pa dang //chu bo chen por shel gnas pa//shing dang ri yi rgyal po dang //
257a5(rgyud): shel gyis yongasu bcings pa dang //mu tigA dra bas logs g.yogs dang //mu tig phung po mthong ba dang //char chen 'bab pa chu yi tshogs//mthong na bad kan
257a6(rgyud): las gyur yin//gdugs ni dkar po dag dang ni//rgyan rnams kun kyang dkar ba dang //bran glang dag ni dkar po'i gzugs//bad kan rmi lam dag tu brjod//rngam
257a7(rgyud): dkar ram skyes bu 'am//yang na gos dag mthong ba 'am//lan tshwa la sogs reg pa ni//kun tu gsal te mthong ba ni//ras bal btso ma'i gos dag gam//ra
257b1(rgyud): kan dngulA dang a ga ru//reg dang za bar byed pa nyid//bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod//mon sran gre'u za ba dang //til btags bu rA ma 'dras can dang //mo na sran rnam
257b2(rgyud): mang za ba ni//bad kan rmi lam dag tu 'dod//srAsti ga dang u lo bi//kri sa ra dang 'o thug dang //de dag za byed rmi lam ni//bad kanau rmi lam bya ba yin//'breng bus
257b3(rgyud): bcud bza' ba sogs//rnam pa sna tshogs snum khur ni//reg dang za bar byed pa nyid//bad kan 'phel ba'i rmi lam yin//snum khur rnam pa du ma ni//bza' dang spyad
257b4(rgyud): par rjes 'dod dang //zos dang reg par byed de dag/bud kan rmi lam shes par bya//gnas dang gnas mal pheg pa dang //bzhon pa sems can las byung ba//reg
257b5(rgyud): dang 'dzeg par byed pa nyid//dang po'i thun la mthong ba nyid//gal te rmi lam snang gyur na//thams cad bad kan can du brjod//rnam pa de lta'i rmi lam dang //tshul 'byung
257b6(rgyud): dang spyod pa dang //rnam pa sna tshogs bza' la spyod//mthong na bad+mo kan can du brjod//de dag rmi lam dag tu mthong //bAdri kan can gyi spyod pa yin//rmi lam ma lus
257b7(rgyud): dum no//'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin//gnyis pa'i thun la lus can gyi//rmi lam mkhris pa can gyi yin//'bar po'i me'i gzugs mthong dang //
258a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rin chen mthong ba dang //mes tshig skar ma 'a ltung ba dang //ri dang phyogs ni rab 'bar ba//skye bo gang gis rab mthong ba/
258a2(rgyud): de ni mkhris par gyur pa yin//rin chen pad+ma rA ga dang //gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa//gang du rmi lam mthong na ni//lus can mokhris pa las gyur yin//
258a3(rgyud): me dang tsha ba bsten pa dang //reg dang za bar byed pa dang //rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog ser//rmi lam mkhris pa brgyal ba yin//rtag tu che ba'i nyi ma dang //nyi ma
258a4(rgyud): rtag tu 'de bar ni//gang gis rmi lam mthong gyur na//lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin//na mkha' gser gyi mdog gyur dang //sa yI steng ni kha dog sar//
258a5(rgyud): rmi lam na ni gang gis mthong //mkhris pa las gyur dra ba yin//me ni kun nas 'bar ba yis//na mkha'i ngos ni rab gsal bar//rmi lam dusu mthong ba ni//
258a6(rgyud): mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yin//sa dang de bzhin ri bo dang //brag ni mthon po'ang gser gyi mdog/shing chen de bzhin theg pa ni//rtag tu thams cad
258a7(rgyud): gser rang bzhin//rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na//mkhris pa las gyur rmi lam yin//theg pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang //snod rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang //
258b1(rgyud): rnams dA nA~M bad+hAs mul rnams//ga m+b+ha btsun sa//gdang 'bru d+hA b+hU Sh+Ta //tshul ma ma na na ma sa m+WAr yo/nga sa ba zhugs pa
258b2(rgyud): dang de ser po'i gis kyis nyer mdzes dang //ser po'i 'ang dang dri yis byugs//ser po'i mchod phyir thogs pa dang //bdag nyid ser po'i rnam pa dang //gang gis
258b3(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs sar bang snang //rmi la ma mchis las yang dag byung//mthus pa sno sus can dashAganan pa//gnyis pa'i dun la bstan pa yin//rnam+b+ha pa
258b4(rgyud): gzugs can ni//sngar por snang ba yang dag 'byung //'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni//rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung //gang yang rlung byung rme la ma ni//gsum
258b5(rgyud): thung du bsten pa yin//bair yug tu ni 'da'i brug//phyugs rnams kun tu rab tu snang //mamatha' la ni 'gro ba dang//namatsho dkyil du bang dring 'igro/bur snang rnam
258b6(rgyud): dkyil du ni//kun nas 'khor brtag tu 'gro/rlung byung rmel ma zhes bstan po//'di ste bu la bya ba men//rgal dang mchod dang de bzhin du//shing rnams pa ni mngon pa
260a1(rgyud): 'jug/bstan bcos ma lus 'don pa dang //khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang //bshad dang brjod par byed pa yang //phyal char yang
260a2(rgyud): ni rlung las gyur//shring rnams tsherA ma tsan 'jog dang //kha ba dag kyang za ba dang //bza' ba ma lus cha dang sbyar//zos pa rlung las gyur pa yin//btsor yang rlung ni
260a3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung //shing thog rlung ni rab bskyed pa//de dag za bar rmi lam mthong //rlung las byung ba yang dag bstan//dngos rnams rlung ni skyed pa yi//bza' da
260a4(rgyud): bca' ba khyad par ldan//de bzhin skye bo sems 'khrugs dang //rig par byed dang smra bar byed//'byung po rnams ni gar byed dang //badzin nyid dang ni gar byed pa//gang
260a5(rgyud): gis rmi lam mthong na ni//de 'dra rlung nad can du shes//rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa dang //rnam pa sna tshigs 'khrug dang sgra//rnam pa sna tshogs mi babang gzugs/
260a6(rgyud): rmi lam rlung nang rdzun gyis mthong //de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni//'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin//rnam gsum sbyar ba rab ldan pa//'dod chags zhe
260a7(rgyud): sdeng gto mug yin//chags can bdakan can zhes bya//zhe sdang las byung mkhris pa can//rmongs brlung las gyur pa yin//'dres pa'am rnam par 'dres pa'i//
260b1(rgyud): grong blo chos ni mthong ba las//rmi lam tshugs pas sa bon 'byung //dor na bud med la chags pa//pad+ma kan las byung rmi lam yin//rtsod bcas dang tshul zhe sdang can/
260b2(rgyud): mkhris pa las byung rmi lam+ba yin//ma rig las byung rmongs pa rnams//dran pa nyams par mthong ba yin//rnam 'dren rnam par 'dres pa ni//rmi lam na ni rtag tu mthong
260b3(rgyud): de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis//rmi lam zhes bya yod pa spangs//bya ba dus kyi rim pa nyid//de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin//sems can bad kan can gsungs
260b4(rgyud): pa/mdog ldan snyan par smra ba dang //tshe ring yid ni gzhungs pa dang //kha dog snum zhing 'jigs pa med//bong tshod ring zhing dkar ba drang //bud med la phrad rtag tu dga'
260b5(rgyud): chos ldan rtag tu dpa' ba dang //btung ba mngal rtag tu dga'//rgyal rig su ni bstun pa yin//ser sna ldan zhing mtshon pa me//de bzhin su yi bdag po dang //dmag
260b6(rgyud): dpon dron du gnas pa ste//longs spyod chen po sgyu 'gyur zhing //rang gi lus kyi nye bar 'tshe//rang gi las 'bras bstan pa ni//las kyi sngags ni spang ba min//
260b7(rgyud): las min sngags ni gtso bo zhes//rnam par 'dren pas gsungs pa yin//de bas sems can bad kan can//sa steng grub pa byed pa mi//sa bdag 'dod pa byed pa
261a1(rgyud): /las do la zlub pa b+h+yots+tsha par 'gyur//sa da /nAn+tan+tam+b+har+N+Nas//ma lus na b+hU mr-ib+h+yAM//ba m+b+ha sh-in+dad+hA oMn+da b+hU r+m+marmA//
261a2(rgyud): rmi lam don gyis stong 'gyur bas//grub pa'i don du ma brjod pas//sngags pas de tshe de mi bsten//mkhas pa rig pa ldan pa yis//de yi dusu gi nyid log
261a3(rgyud): min//mkhris pa can gyis sems can gyi//rtag tu spyod pa brjod par bya//zhe sdang gis ni rnam 'khrugs na//kha dog nag dang stobs chung dang //dag pa drag pa'i
261a4(rgyud): las dang ni//rtag tu yon por byed pa yin//dpa' dang bab chol rtag tu byed//stabs dang blo dang ldan pa dang //mang du smra zhing grogs po mang //bstan bcos ting
261a5(rgyud): 'dzin mang po rtogs//chos ldan las kyi mtha' brtan cing //zhe sdang slong ba brjod par byed//yid ldan dgra ni mang ba dang //zhe sdang mtshon pa skye bar 'gyur//
261a6(rgyud): nor mang dpa' bo la sdang dang //'jig rten shes shing mthong na dpa'//nges grol chags pa med pa dang //brten zhing sdug bsngal rtag tu bzod//nga rgyal phrag
261a7(rgyud): dog ma rungs pa//bud med rnams la dga' bar byed//spro che bstan dang blon po dang //longs spyod chen por skye bar 'gyur//shes bzhin las kyis nyer
