261b1(rgyud): spyod pa'o//sboms can zol gyis man+dar nus spyod//sngags ni srog la gnod byed pa//de ni de la myur 'grub 'gyur//mi bzang thub pas spangs pa'i don//myung du sgrung /
261b2(rgyud): bor byed pa yin//sems can gnod phyir byed po'i las//lus can de la grub par 'gyur//cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang //sdigs pas thams cadri ba sbyar na /
261b3(rgyud): spyod pa des ni 'grub 'gyur te//gzhan las sems can de las min//sngags ba zhi sdang can dgrol//sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang //de bzhin gzhan gyi
261b4(rgyud): rdzobs gcod pa//sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur//gzhan gyi rdzas ni 'phrog 'dod dang //gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la//khro ba'i sngags kyis grub 'gyur te/
261b5(rgyud): stegs gzhan dag lA sbyar mi bya//zhe sdang rigs kyis sems can 'di//bdag po nyid kyang byed par 'gyur//mdog nag pa 'am sngo bsengs sam//dkar ba 'am
261b6(rgyud): yid na 'dres pa yi//po ni khro ldan gser gyi mdog/rnam par spangs pa skye bar 'gyur//mi ni rtsub mdog du ba'i mdog/ser skya'i mdog tu'ang skye ba yin//dpa' dang
261b7(rgyud): de bzhin drag pa dang //chags ldan sdig pa'i khyim las skyes//gza' ni mgo dmar zhing bdang /gnas//bad kan can la phur bu'i bdag/skye 'byor nyung ngu za ba dang //
262a1(rgyud): tshe dang sgyur ba'i ro ston ci //de y-id+ha ni ring+ga 'gyur zhing //dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur//stod pa dang ni rjes spyod pa//rlung nad can gyi bshad
262a2(rgyud): par bya//mdog mi sdug drang chub mdog dang //bong tshad med cing shin tu rjud//blo nyams shes rab med pa dang //mI bstan granas pa med pa dang //lus ni 'gul
262a3(rgyud): dang 'khor ba dang //smyig cing ba shang gci mang du 'byung //mang du za zhing rtag par za//de dag gang phyir nad mang 'gyur//'jig rten rigs dang mi mthun zhing //dgra ni mang
262a4(rgyud): po skye bar 'gyur//de ni sa steng 'di dag tu//tshul 'chal sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te//mi snang ba yi sngags dag ni//de la 'grub par bstan pa yin//grang zhig rlung nang
262a5(rgyud): 'khrug byed pa'o//zas la de ni dga' bar 'gyur//zlos pa lis ni grub 'dod pas//de ni yongasu bsten mi bya//sems can rlung nang 'khrug pa la//gti mug nye bar zhi
262a6(rgyud): ba dang //rmongs pa'i rigs can la gsungs pa//rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa//rtag tu de dag rmongs pa la//rmongs pa dag ni grub par 'dod//rgyu skar khyim ni cha
262a7(rgyud): skyes dang //gza' ni bdag po spen par blta//rlung nad skyes pa'i sems can no//dge ba'i las la mi spyod//'byung po dbang dang 'gugs par byed//de bzhin rmongs /
262b1(rgyud): drang rengs pa'o//rlung nad can gyi sems can la//gti mug can de sdig par byed//rmi lam bden par mthong ba nI//mtshan nyid 'dri dag gsungs pa nI//sems can+da rnams/
262b2(rgyud): kyi don sgrub pa//thub pa rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa'o//lug glang dang ni sbyor ba dang //sbal pa seng ge nyid dang ni//srang dang bu mo sdig pa dang //de bzhin gzhu dang chu srin dang /
262b3(rgyud): bum pa nye dang glang po dang //lha dang spre'u lha ma yin//grub dang dri ze gnod skyon sogs//ma rnams gang gas rab bsgrags pa//sems can rnams kyi khyim mang po//gang
262b4(rgyud): zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin//rnam pa mang po sna tshogs don//rnam po sna tshogs las bstan pa//de dag lngas ni thams cad la//yon tan rgya chen smin par 'gyur///
262b5(rgyud): ltas las gol ba med par ni//lus can yon tan mi smin te//yon tan kho na las ldan pas//skye bar yang ni byed pa yin//yon tan chos dron ldan pa ni//sngags
262b6(rgyud): la 'grub pa skye bar 'gyur//zlos pa sems can yon tan shes//yon tan yon tan min las 'ching //yon tan med la bya min gang //de yi las ni bya ba min//
262b7(rgyud): gang phyir bya ba las byed//bya ba yon tan med pa yin//bya ba las dang yon tan nyid//yang dag ldan pa sgrub par 'gyur//cho ga sngon 'gro bye ba'i las//stobs bcu
263a1(rgyud): kun pasgra snron bskrun to//rtswasgra dang sems can spyod pa gzhan//b+hu ba la smra dang yon tan yin//rnam pa sna tshogs rgya la ma rgal//las d+ha/
263a2(rgyud): 'gyu bar snang ba yin//de bas rmi ldem mtshan ma yis//rgya che las la rab sbyar bya//rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dang //yid 'ong blta nA sdug pa dang //bgegs kyi
263a3(rgyud): gzugs dang gzugs med pa//rmi lam smad ni snang ba yin//mthu rje slo ba chi ba ni//mi ni grub pa 'dod pa yin//mchog dang tha mA 'bring dag ni//de dag la ni glu
263a4(rgyud): pa brtag/drag tsing las rnams ma rungs ni//rmi lam rtag tu 'phrul du mid//bzang po bstan pa las dag ni//yun ring dusu grub phyir//'jig rten 'jig
263a5(rgyud): 'das rnams kyi//yon+da tin bskyed par yang dag 'byung //rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs snang //zlos pas sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur//mi 'grub don du
263a6(rgyud): sngags rnams ni//gnyid dang snyoms pa rab tu brtag/bgegs 'joms byed pa'i sngags rnams ni//de yi dus rab tu brdeg/de tshe sngags ni rigs tshul
263a7(rgyud): gyis//zlos pas de tshe rab tu sbyar//khro bo chen po phyag drug dang //zham drug nyid du brtag par bya//sngags che ni yi ge bzhi pa ni//gzhon nur gzugs pa
263b1(rgyud): gnas pa yin//drag po'i gzugs ni gzugs chen po//pag gi rnam par yang dag 'byung //dgegs kun rnam par glu zhig bya'i phyir//dus man de ni lU yis rgyul/
263b2(rgyud): stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can//sbrul gyi gdengs ka rnam par 'phyang //lag nA ral gri sems dpa'i tshe//gzi brjid chen po gshin rje'i gzugs//bgags
263b3(rgyud): rnams kun la gtse bar byed//yog 'dren rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed//'byung po kun ni rab nyon cig/mi bzad sngags ni bshad par bya//cho 'phrul chen po bgegs
263b4(rgyud): rnams kun//ma rungs sems can 'jig par byed//sngags rnams kun+da ni sgrub byed pa//lha yi tshogs rnams nga la nyon//na mAHsa man+ta dud d+ha nAM/a pra ti hA
263b5(rgyud): taM sha sa nA nAM/tad+ya thA/he he mahA kro d+ha Sha Na mu khaSh+Ta tsa ra nA/sarba big+h+nAM bi b+h+re taM ka hrI hrI kiny+tsi ra ya si bi nA yA ke dzI bi tan+ta kA ra du srab ni me na sha yi/l-i hu la hu sA ma
263b6(rgyud): yAm nu s+phA ra phaT phaT sred//khro ba'i rgyal po chen pos 'di gsungs me thag tu bgags dang pog 'dren thams cad 'jigs shing nyam thag nas sgying gus te rid
263b7(rgyud): shin tu sgrog nas/becom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing dam tshig la gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom
265a1(rgyud): ldan 'dus shUt+tha thub pas thams cad da ldan pa'i gnas bla cang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la
265a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye kye lha'i tshogs chen po drag khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten lngas 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams 'dron par byed pa
265a3(rgyud): nagang zhig ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs can gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis ni rigs rgyud thams cad 'dul bar byed cing srog kyang
265a4(rgyud): 'dzin par mi byed/yongasu gdung bar byed cing yongasu skyem par byed pa'i rnam par bzhag par bya ba 'jog par byed cing zlos pa dag la yang srung ba dang /spo ba dang /
265a5(rgyud): sbed pa la gnas pa la 'jog par byed cing rjesu 'phel bar byed pa dang /gang zhig dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa dang /khro bo'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po srung bar byas pa
265a6(rgyud): la rnam par tho 'atsam par byed na mgro bo ardza ke'i dog pa bzhin du rnam pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyuraro//thub pa mchog gis legs gsungs nas//'jam pa'i dbyangs
265a7(rgyud): la de tshe gsungs//gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams la//ma lus don ni rgya che ni don//sngags rgyud don dang ldan pa dang //sgrub pa rnams la khyad par du//dbe gos
265b1(rgyud): rnams ma lus 'joms pa yi//rgyud la khro rgyal bstu bu yin//'dzin rnon mgon gyis skyon 'di ni//de bzhin du ni yang dag sbyar//mu lus bgegs rnams 'jig bya'i phyir//
265b2(rgyud): dgra rnams kyis ni khro ba sel//zlos pas rtag tu 'di da/ni//mtshan mo rtag tu gdon byas la//sems can rnams ni srung don dang //rmi lam dran pa sel bar byed//thugs
265b3(rgyud): rnams ma lus sgrub pa la//'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//skyes bu'i mtshan nyid bathung po yin//gang lo sngags rnams
265b4(rgyud): grub 'gyur ba//mchog drang tha ma bar ma'o//gzi brjid ldan dang shes ldan dang //gser mdog gsus pa tsho ba dang //dkyus ring mig drang snum pa dang //tshigs chung
265b5(rgyud): bla rnam par spungs//mig rtswa dmar zhing sbyin par smra//de la grub pa mchig 'gyur la//lhags pa srab cing sngo bsangs mdog/ha cang ring mon yan lag phra//spro ba
265b6(rgyud): che zhing gzi brjid che//chog shes kun nas dge ba byed//skye gnas bzang po dag pa dang //'dod pa chung zhing cung zad dge/las rnams kun la snang ba ni//de la nges
265b7(rgyud): par 'grub pa mchog/yan lag thams cad mtshang med//du ba sngo bsangs gzi brjid che//nyon mongs med sems shes pa can/rtag tu gtsang zhing tshangs pa
267a1(rgyud): spyo dang phra ba'i gos la rtag tu dgal//chos kyi ngang tshul 'jig rten shes//grogs mang rtag tu gtong ba dang //zas tshod dog dag d+hAg
267a2(rgyud): gtsang ldan//shes nyen tshul khrims spyod pa dang //gtsang ba'i spyod la rtag tu dga'//bden par smra zhing snying rje can//de wa grub pa mchog tu 'gyur//yor tan
267a3(rgyud): rgya che yan lag tshang //rigs ldan rtag tu chos dang ldan//pha dang ma la gus pa dang //bram ze l-i ni mchod pe byed//shin tu snying rje ldan zhing brtan//de la'i
267a4(rgyud): grub pa mchog tu 'gyur//sngo bsangs dkar dang snum pa dang //rtag tu gcong zhing nyung ngu smra//bsod pa'i kha zlas la dga' zhing //gtsang ba'i spyod pas mngon par
267a5(rgyud): 'gro dmang 'dod sems can 'jig rten shes//de la'ang grub pa mchog tu 'gyur//ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min//sku ni mig srin bzhin du gnog/mig dang mig
267a6(rgyud): 'bras rab tu snum//gtsang zhing rtag tu khrus la dga'//dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad //de yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur//mchog gi las ni rab ston
267a7(rgyud): cing /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes//bzod ldan snyan par smra ba dang //rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu dga'//de tshe 'jig rten 'das pa grub//de 'bras
267b1(rgyud): bcas pa grub par 'gyur//sems dpa' chu zhing brtson 'grus tshe//gardzi brjid rje zhing brtul zhugs tshe//longs spyod che zhing sngags rnams shos//skyugs
267b2(rgyud): rnams kun lnga de nyid rig/rigs kyi mA d+hAg ni rgyu la rigs sa so//bram ze shes dang ldan pa dang //zod med la sbyin de la tshogs//de bzhin gser gyi ma dag dad sngam//
267b3(rgyud): dIng tshod che zhing dkar ba dang //sna ni mtho zhing log pa che//dpa' zhing lag pa ring ba dang //rgyal po che la mngon par 'dod//rgyal ba'i sras la dad pa dang //bud me
267b4(rgyud): ming ldan lha lA mchod//dko ni mchog gsumA la gus pa dang //byang chub sems kyis rgyan pa yin//lhag par snying rje brtan pa drung //cung zad khro zhing cung zad rmongs//
267b5(rgyud): longs spyod che zhing gtong ba che//gzi brjid che zhing thul bar dka'//bud med rnams ni draga' dang dpa'//de yi grub pa mchog yin//shin tu btung dang dga' dang
267b6(rgyud): dpa'//rtag tu bud med la chags dang //gser gyi mdog dang byin pa phye//rked pa che zhing gtsang ba dang //brtse dang snying rje ldan mkhas pa//yon tan mang 'dod
267b7(rgyud): 'jig rten shes//rtag tu sngags rnams bzlos la gus//rgyal po la ni srog kyang gtong //de bzhin nyan thos sras rnams dang //bse ru la yang rtag tu gtong /
268a1(rgyud): stobs ldan 'jig rten gtso bo dang //rigs ni gnyis pa bzang po yin//yan lag thams cad ma chung mod//ma rungs rtag tu byab tshul byed//
268a2(rgyud): glatod ldan tshulnga ldan dgra lus rgyal//chos dang chos min rnam dpyod byed//ha cang sbom min rjud pa'ang min//ha cang ring min thung ba'ang min//bar ma'i mi ni mchog
268a3(rgyud): yin te//di yi grub pa mchog tu 'gyur//sen mo zangs mdog logs snum dang //lag mthil dmar dang gtsang ba dang //rkang pa'i mthil dmar snum pa dang /
268a4(rgyud): 'khor lo swasti kas rgyan dang //rgyal mtshan rta babs nya dang ni//bla dan pad+ma tho ba dang //mi gang rkang pa lag pa la//mtshan ni 'di dgra yod gyur pa//de 'dra'i skyes
268a5(rgyud): bu dram pa la//grub pa mchog tu brtag par bya//mche ba dkar zhing bzang bA dang //mtho ba'i ri bo dang 'dra dang //sna bzang mtho zhing mig dkyus ring //srin ma
268a6(rgyud): /sdug cing ko sgo bzung //pa yi rdzi ma 'jig rten mtshan//nag pa'i lta ba'i mI 'bras mtshan//dpral ba'i dbyes gang rgya che zhing //mgo bo gdugs 'dra'i rnam pa
268a7(rgyud): bzang //mgo bo gtsug tor 'dra ba dang //rna ba bzang ba dam pa yin//rtag tu seng ge'i 'bram 'dra dang //ma mchu bim pa smin 'dra'i mdog/gang gi spyi mi
268b1(rgyud): rab snang ba//pad+ma mdub ma dmar 'dra'i mdog/mgrin pa dum pa 'dra ba dang /thal gang rgyas shing yang dag 'phags//mchan khung thon ka bzang ba mchog/de bzhin brla ni
268b2(rgyud): rgya che dang //lte bI'i phyogs kyang chung ba dang //rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang //lte ba zab cing g.ya su 'khyil//kun nas dkar med pa spu drang //lag ring lag ni che ba dang //rkeng
268b3(rgyud): pa seng ge 'dra ba'i mtshan//gang gi bArla ni zlum pa dang //gru mor nyams meng zlum pa dang //byin pa e nI ya lta bur//zlum pa'i nang nA zlum pAr grags//rkang pa sha
268b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang //sor mo rnams kyis ring ba yin//dmar zhing sen dmar snum pa dang //sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin//nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas//
268b5(rgyud): dge zhing mthong na dga' ba dang //'jam zhing kha dog drug pa dang //rab bsags 'jig rten bkra shis dang //de dag gi ni snying dag tu//rtsa yi dra ba mngon pa med//bshung
268b6(rgyud): bA 'azung ba'i lam dag tu//ri mo zab cing g.ya su 'khyil//mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chung //rtag tu zlum zhing dge bla yin//ma 'brel dum bu ma yin deng //cig
268b7(rgyud): min nyid du bstan pa yin//gang tshe skyes dbang gtsang bya dang //rtse mo dmar la yang dag gnas//skye bo nya la kIr kha zas ni//ri yi rtsa ba byed pa za//bshang ba kha dog
269a1(rgyud): sa na pa d+hA sna spyod//mung dam ston m+b+ha bdang/dun rlom tshan sa n+dan du du su
269a2(rgyud): gang yin pa//grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin//lan gsum pa shing zhing sngags drug drung //ge cod sgra spyod du/ yongasu gcong //gang zhig dun ni b+h+ra mar ny+dzal/
269a3(rgyud): rangs ldang ba'i skye bo rnams//de yi grub pa rtag tu mchog/las kun byed par snang ba yi//'bras bu rnam po sna tshogs dang //phun tshogs rnam pa mang pA la//mi rnams
269a4(rgyud): rjesu 'dod pa yang //mtshan nyid kyis ni ston mtshan pa'o//rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni//rgyal dang nim gru gli po dang //mchu dang ltamatshams bdag dang ni//nag pa snang
269a5(rgyud): me snron drug dang //nus pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa//de dag la ni skyes mthong dang //nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ka ni//tho rangs dusu gang skyes dang //deng tshwa ma
269a6(rgyud): dusuM skye sa//de la grub par rab tu snang //nyin phyed dang ni bai rangs dang //nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzung ngo po//dkar ba zla ba pA ba sangs//ser ba gza' lhag phur bu yin/
269a7(rgyud): skye bo rnams kyis mthong na ni//'bras bu grub phyir nus pa yin//mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis//'di la skyes pa 'gyur ba yi//sngags don ma lus grub pa la//de dag
269b1(rgyud): ltung mod 'grub par 'gyur//nyim byed na 'das pa dang //rtag tu nyi ma nub pa dang //lus can rnams kyis rtag de la//ma rungs gzar mthong byung yin+d+ra pa//mA rungs nyi ma
269b2(rgyud): mig dmar dang //mjug ring sa s+tha gA ce ne spen pa dang //gang yang bza' ni gtso bo dang //lasa? ni desna 'joms skar mAda' can//skar ma shin tu mi bzang nyid//de bzhin
269b3(rgyud): nag po 'chi ltas dang //dus min 'chi bas la ni//mi bzad de tshe snang ba yin//nyi ma 'char ba'i dus ni//gza' ldeg gis nI sa rnams mthong //gnya' shing gang tsam nyim
269b4(rgyud): phyi nang dbur bris sa de mthong bar 'gyur//de nas pha rol many+dzuny+dza shing tsam//pa sangs nor spyan+da gyis de mthong //nyi ma phyed ni yongs rdzogs na//zla bas lus can mA lus
269b5(rgyud): mthong //gza' lcug du su rgyal thabs thog/phung bus nor drung longs spyod byed//pasangs nir ni des sgrub dang //rgyal srod tshe dang longs spyod ldan//zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhes
269b6(rgyud): dbang phyug dang ni 'bras bu bcas//de bzhin nyin byed nyi ma ni//nyi ma phyed du mnyam par mthong //rtag tu nyir phyed rnam 'dres na//nyi ma sngo phyogs ni mthong bar byed//thung
269b7(rgyud): gyur nyi ma gnya' shing tsam//byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni//sgra bcan sngon po nyid ngag yin//mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed//de nas par ni rdungs pa na//'chi ltos ska
270a1(rgyud): mda' sa 'gul byed//la kri tshogs kyis mdog dasgyur ba'o//nyi ma nub kar zangs ma'i mdog/bza' yi gtso bo gang yin de//byis pa
270a2(rgyud): grwazhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing //lag na mdung thogs ma rungs pa//mig dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin//de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das//dge ba'i gza' ni 'byung ba yin//
270a3(rgyud): nyi mas mthong ba las skyes pa//ma rungs bab col byed par 'gyur//spen pa mig dmar las skyes pa//khro ldan brkam zhing nga rgyal can//mdzub rings 'chi ltas dung
270a4(rgyud): rnams la//skyes pa nod ni yang dag 'byung //dbul zhing nad btab glen pa dang //de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs//dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang //skur mda' can dang
270a5(rgyud): gza' ngan dang //'gul byed sgra drag dmar ba'i mdog/gnam lcags nyid kyang rab rdung byed//de bzhin rdo rje 'chi bltas dang //gzhan yang khyim sogs rab tu
270a6(rgyud): mthong //skye bo kun gyi sgra gtsun ni//mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na//dbul zhing mgon med tshul khrims 'chal//mi ni rtag tu sdig pa spyod//mi ni sdug bsngal
270a7(rgyud): skye 'gyur to//nad kyi gzhi ni skye bar 'gyur//mdze can nad ni meng ba dang //long ba theng po shu bar bcas//za ma ma ning mo sham dang //bud meng mtshan ni ngan pa dang /
270b1(rgyud): skyes pa bud med de bzhin gzhan//gza' ni dran pa mthong ba yin//de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dag/'jig rten mung blo skye ba yin//dkar dang sor pa'i gza' mchog no//de dang /
270b2(rgyud): los skyes dge ba yin//mdog ni dkur dang ser ba dag/rgyal bas rab tu bsngags pos gsungs//gza' ni gtso bo bzhir be shadra pa//pa sangs zla ba tha ma lhags/zlos
270b3(rgyud): pa las rnams kun la ni//de dag mtho na grub pa'i dron//sems can byis pa rnams la yang //rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang //lo ni kun la'ang 'dod pa zhes//'jig rten
270b4(rgyud): mchog gis gsungs pa yin//skad cig tsam yang de bzhin du//mig 'byed mig 'dzums se grol tsog/'di ni mdor bsdus skye ba zhes//'jig rten mchog gis
270b5(rgyud): gsungs pa yin//'di tsam byi ni tshad dag tu//gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin//de dgra de bzhin rtag tu 'chur//'di dag dus kyi de nyid yin//'di drug dge dang
270b6(rgyud): sdig pa'i gza'//'khor lo bzhin du rtag tu 'khor//'jig rten dgra dang mi dge byed//de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin//des na de dag glang cung zad//sdig pa'i blo yang
270b7(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur//sems can dge dang mi dge 'bras//mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur//gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes//des na 'di ni mthong zhes gsungs//myur
271a1(rgyud): ldan myur bcas 'od 'gyur zhing //myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin//mig gis mthong dang ma mthong bya'i//so gol rtog pa'i myur 'bros
271a2(rgyud): yin 'di tsam gyi ni chad dag tu//blo mchog rnams kyis bstan pa yin//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya//yud tsam dang /
271a3(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis dang //dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu//grub pa'i rgyu 'am ma yin pa//'gro myin pa yang bshad par bya//'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang //char dang /
271a4(rgyud): char mo ni yang dang yang //yul 'khor 'jig dang mu go dang //l-i legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge/dus drang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu//skye bo rnams la rtag zhi
271a5(rgyud): byedabyed / mjug rings su 'gul nam gru dang //skar mda' dang ni lho bur dang //rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi//spyod pa dge bar mi dge ba//'byung po rnams kyi sbyong
271a6(rgyud): po ni d+ya dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa yin//sha za dang ni ma mo dang //drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed//sha za rnams kyi spyod pa na//de bzhin ma rungs sems
271a7(rgyud): can+da brjod//gang du lha la rab dang dang //rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang //dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan//byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang //legs/
271b1(rgyud): par spyod pa'i don ldan no//rArdzun+da gyi sdug bsngal dkal sems//sngags drung rig pa rnams kyis drangs//spyan b+hi dAn du khya zas spyod//gang du mtshan nyid ma
271b2(rgyud): pas dz+ha spyod pa rgya cher bstan pa yin//gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni//mi lus brten nas gnas pa yin//lha ni mchod pa zhes ba shad//lha min de rgyal
271b3(rgyud): can gyi rgyus//gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis//rim bzhin lha dang lha mya yin//dri yang der ni rnam gnyis te//grags pa dang ni thun mong yin//de yang
271b4(rgyud): dreng nI rnam gnyis 'gro/dge dang mi dge 'gro bra lnga//der gnas rnam gsum 'gro ba ste//nyi shu sum cu grungs med pa'o//lha dbang dang ni 'og rin par//go rims
271b5(rgyud): ji bzhin sa med pa'o//'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa//dge dang mi dge'i 'jig rten yin//'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang //'phags pa nyan thos
271b6(rgyud): snyed dang //sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //de yi thugs las skyes sras dang //byang chub sems dpa' sems chen blo/sa bcu la ni rab gnas dang //
271b7(rgyud): rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi//sems can skye gnas yang dag bsten//byes de'i skye bo thams cad kyi//'gro ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang //rtag tu
272a1(rgyud): 'phags rnams thams cad kyi//mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa dang //tshig dang brda' dang de nyid kyang //rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya//smra
272a2(rgyud): dang rgyud ni rigs bcas byas//'byung po kun ni dgug par bya//dbab dung dgug pa'i sngags shes pas//gzhan gyi lus la yang dag bsten//dge dang mi da
272a3(rgyud): lngas shes shing //bag yod rigs ni bzang ba dang //mi b+h+yon spyod pa'i sems can dang //tshar bcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang //'jig rten sa steng 'gugs byed pa//
272a4(rgyud): mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag/de dag grub pa'i mtshan ma ni//de nyid thams cad bshad par bya//mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdu na//de dag gi ni lus bzung nas//rtag
272a5(rgyud): tu shin tu chos don dang //thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag/ma rung sra rnams ni tshar bcad dang //rnam dag rnams ni mchid pa ste//tshar bcad rjes gzung nyid la
272a6(rgyud): nI//sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag/rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni//rnam gsum dag la spyod pa'ang gsum//de dag zhi bar rab brtag la//rnam gsum nyid/
272a7(rgyud): du rim par 'dod//mi rnams kyi ni gso ba la//sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya//'byung ba chen por rnam brtags pa//'byung dang 'byung min la sogs shes//
272b1(rgyud): 'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang //lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod//skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin//de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur//'byung dang 'byung min rnam po ni//rnam pa
272b2(rgyud): gnyisu rab tu brtag/rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che//sems can ma yin rab tu brtag/mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung //gang gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs byas//'byung
272b3(rgyud): ba chen po bzhi dang ni//lnga pa dag ni na mkha' brjod//chu dang me dang ldan pa dang //sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan//blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang //sems can min pa'o
272b4(rgyud): grangasu brtan//'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang //'dra chen ldan pas gsungs pa yin//sems can ma yin grangasu bstan//sems can grangs 'gro mi ma yin//
272b5(rgyud): blo mchog smra ba dam pa yis//mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs//mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang //rtag tu sems can grangs nyid//sems can rnams la
272b6(rgyud): drag don du//thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung yang yin//'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang //de bzhin du ltar byung rnams kyis//dge ba'i lus kyi las 'byung
272b7(rgyud): phyir/rdolas 'di dag ni yongasu gsungs//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs dag po//las ni don med mi byed//de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi//grub pa nyid du
273a1(rgyud): rab snang ste//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shos dang //bdo zhing zhi la rtag tu gcong //mthar thug dag dang bdag mod dang //don dam
273a2(rgyud): thar par 'dod pa sten//de nyid chos nI btsal bya'i phyir//rgyud 'di yongasu bshad pa yin//rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po//bka' ni yang dag gsungs
273a3(rgyud): pa yin//byung dang 'byung 'gyur de ltar gyi//bston bcos thams cad legs sngags dang //'jig rten mchog dang chos bdag med//rtag tu zhi dang shes pa'i
273a4(rgyud): gnas//'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung //de yi go 'phang mchog gnas pa//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung //ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin//
273a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang //sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga lnga//grub pa kun gyi bstan pa yin//des na 'di nyid thub
273a6(rgyud): dbang gis//cho ga'i rgyal por gsungs pa yin//lus can rnams kyi sngags tshul gyi//'di nyid kyi ni lam gyis 'gro//zhi ba chud med phun sum tshogs//mya
273a7(rgyud): ngan 'das grong phyin por 'gyur//mya ngan med dang rdul med dang //rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shes//gang 'di bstan pa dag la ni//sngags kun 'don par byed pa
273b1(rgyud): /kun mkhyen shos dang shos bya ste//las kyi rgyud ni 'brel pa dang //sngags zlos pa yi ched du ni//rgyu rnams mtha' dag sa stong gsungs//sngags rgyud ma lus/
273b2(rgyud): don dag ni//byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dag/cho ga 'dir ni rab tu bstan//sems can rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir//'jig
273b3(rgyud): rten kun la rab tu bskor//gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba//cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod//thub mchog phub pa'i sras dag gris//gzhon du cho ga gang bstan pa//sngags
273b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'dri la yod//des na cho ga rgya chen yin//de nyid phyir nu thub dbang gis//lus can kun la gsungs pa yin//gang du tsho gA'i rgyal po 'dis//deng
273b5(rgyud): 'gyur min dang bkug min pa//sa steng 'jig rton gsum 'di na//rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min//thub pa'i zla ba rab nub cing //sa yi dkyil 'khor ston+da pa ni//tshe
273b6(rgyud): ga 'jig rten 'di gnas pa//bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rtag tu dge/'byung po kun la gzhon nu ni//de tshe sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni//'dzin
273b7(rgyud): rten bstan la byed par 'gyur//cho ga'i rgyal po mthu la ni//yun ring dusu 'dod pa rnams//lan cin thos kyang grol 'gyur te//rtag tu de la grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyas
274a1(rgyud): kun gyi gsungs dag ni//rtag tu dge ba don yad 'gyur//sngags rnams kun la sngags pa ni//bzlas dang sbyin sreg rtag 'dod pa'o//
274a2(rgyud): dus gsum dag tu shes bya la//mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa//de bzhin 'di la 'jug byed pa//cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa
274a3(rgyud): ni sngagasu rab gnas de 'dir gsungs//sngags de rnam par mi rtog par//cho ga de 'diro gsungs pa yin//don dang don min sems can gyi//dge dang mi dge
274a4(rgyud): byed par 'gyur//de tshe 'gro ba blo bzhin du//'jig rten kun gyi dge mi dge/de nyid cho ga 'dir skyes pa//de bzhin gshegs pa smos pa med//'jig rten 'das
274a5(rgyud): ba rdzogs sangs rgyas//'jig rten phyir ni 'di gsungaso//las rnams kun las shin tu lhag/'jig rten las las rab tu 'das//chos rnams rno ba sna tshogs
274a6(rgyud): byedar 'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsdogs//sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed//de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan//gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni/
274a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur//de don yon tan ngeso grub dang //'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/bag med pa bskul ma yin te//bskul nas ngos ni chos
274b1(rgyud): bshad//sdoms can mA lus phan nyid phyir//sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin//'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang //bshad ci byangs kyang bshad pa yin//sangs
274b2(rgyud): rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir//bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin//sngags pa'i las rnams kun la ni//kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o//kun mkhyen ye shes rab
274b3(rgyud): 'jug la//las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin//'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te//de ni de ltar yongasu spyod//de bas las rnams rab tu bya//tshe 'dir dka' ba
274b4(rgyud): legs sbyad cing //las lhun tshe ni 'di la yang //'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub//las ni 'di la'ang snang gyur na//skyes pa 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur//de bas
274b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//las ni gcig pu rab tu sngags//las de che gar ldan pa ni//de ni 'di la myur du 'grub//sems can byis pa cho ga nyams//rab tu rmongs
274b6(rgyud): pa 'khor bar 'gyur//de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni//las ni gtsog pu rab bsngags yin//cho ga las ni yang dag ldan//sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya//de bzhin cho ga/
274b7(rgyud): nyams pa'i las//shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub//bsam gtan med par thar pa med//thar pa med par bsam gtan mod//de bas bsam gton thar pa ni//yang
275a1(rgyud): dag ldan pa byang chub brjod///'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thag pa
275a2(rgyud): chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las las thams cad kyi bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byam bco lnga pa rdzogaso////de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
275a3(rgyud): pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag
275a4(rgyud): na rdo rjes nga la dris nas 'jam dpal khyod kyi don thams cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byam 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yino//sngags kun
275a5(rgyud): don dang ldan pa yi//rmi lam dge dang mi dge yin//des na zhar la 'di kun ni//sngags kyi bzlas pa bstan pa yin//gnod sbyin bdag po yid dga' nas//thal
275a6(rgyud): sbyar skye bor byas nas ni//ston lnga mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas//de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus//'jig rten rje su bzung don du//blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa
275a7(rgyud): dang rdo bdag la'ang rje su thugs bertse dang //sems can rnams ni bde don du//zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la//rmi lam dag dang mi dge dang //sems
275b1(rgyud): can mchog dang tha ma yin//spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher bstan//bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang //rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod//'das dang na 'ongs shes pa dang //dge
275b2(rgyud): dang mi dge da ltar gyi//thams cad ku 'gro'i shes pa dang //kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang //snang med dmigs pa med pa dang //spos madra rab tu spros pa yin//rnam
275b3(rgyud): pa kun mchog ldan pa dang //shis pa zhi ba bstan pa yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni//blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin//khyad par du ni zlos pa la//sngags
275b4(rgyud): rnams don dang ldan par bshad//las dang lus 'bras sems can gyi//bya ba dus dang de bzhin du//de bzhin sdod dang ngan sa dang ni//cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs//
275b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin bdag pos thub mchog ni//de bzhin gshegs pa/bdun pa la//gang zhig skal bzang sangs rgyas pa//shAkya'i skye mchog bdun pa ni//shAkya'i seng ge dgra
275b6(rgyud): las rgyal//'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags//kun gyi tha mar rdzogs sangs rgyas//'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa//brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che//thub pa
275b7(rgyud): mthun chen po thob//lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag/byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas te//rang gi gnasu 'dug gyur nas//blo ldan de nas cang mi smra//de nas 'jam
276a1(rgyud): dpal shes rab tshe//de tshe thub pas dris pa ni//rdzogs srungs rgyas la bskul b+hA ni//thub mchog dam pa tha ma la//legaso bcom
276a2(rgyud): ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas//las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas//btsas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste//dge dang mi dge legs tshul bshad//lus dang shes pa rgyur
276a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i//sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs//mchogra dang tha ma'i spyod pa dang //dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang //zlos pa grub pa'i mtshan mu dang //
276a4(rgyud): bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags//'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du//'jigro rten dbang phyug longs spyod 'dod//rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang //rig pa 'dzin
276a5(rgyud): grub 'dod pa dang //thams cad kun 'gro ye shes kyis//mdor bsdus nus ni bya shad du gsol//rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab nas//thub pa mchog
276a6(rgyud): gis gsungs pa ni//blo ldan ka la bing ka'i sgrad//lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni//brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra//'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis//thub pa bdun
276a7(rgyud): pas tshigs bcad nas//sangs rgyas gsung ni dag pas gsungs//gzhon nu 'di ni dngos don khyab gyur cing //rgyum byung 'jig rten phan pa sgrub byed la//'gro ba kun la
276b1(rgyud): phan pa bde phyir ston//thar pa shes shing dag pa'i gan su 'dug/bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang //gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la dga'//de dag rtag tu
276b2(rgyud): grub pa thob par byed//kye ma gzhan la'ang grub pa yod mA yAn+da//rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dang dram//bstan dang 'khor lho 'dzin dang 'jam mchog dang //de ni bdud
276b3(rgyud): 'dul chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//'khor lo 'dzin par 'drir ni rigs pa yin//glang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing //rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rnam spangs yin//yid
276b4(rgyud): 'od bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang //dga' skyid snyan pa dang ni rje su 'thun//sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin//'jam zhing bya bar sangs rgyas yang dag gsungs//de dag
276b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis//gang gi mthu ni mkhyen par mi spyod de//de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa//'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin bcu yi grangs//
276b6(rgyud): khyod kyang lha'i dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis//thub bzang shes par nus pa ma yino//gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang //'dod ldan lha dang mi
276b7(rgyud): ni yid las skyes//rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten na//khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso//de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa//sems can gang de yod pa
277a1(rgyud): ma yin te//khyod kyi tshe ba 'di nin yongs shes pa//'jam zhes bya bar rab shes sangs rgyas yin//'jam dpal zhes byar yongasu brtags pa
277a2(rgyud): nI/khyod kyi ming ni sngon gyi rgyal bas mdzad//khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar brtags byas pa//'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyis//gzhan du mo yengs rtse gcig
277a3(rgyud): yid dag pas//khyod kyi ming ni 'khor gyi nang du thos//des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba 'thob//snying mthor byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob//sngags rnams ma lus
277a4(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ba dang //'gro ba'i skye gnas mchog ni rab 'thob cing //rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas//bgegs rnams rnam par spangs shing grub pa thob//
277a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par byed//byang chub shing dbang drung du myur du 'gro/song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed//srong nas sems can phar
277a6(rgyud): phyir der 'dug ste//sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor los rab tu bskor/de ltar rgya la blo tso bos yon tan gsungs//'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi mying dran pa//yon+da tan
277a7(rgyud): bsam mi khyab ces rgyal bas gsungs//rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis//rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni bstan pa yin//gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyis snga
277b1(rgyud): rtogs pa//bskal pa grangs mod rtog tu'ang skyon mi nus//'jam pA la khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod byano//sangs rgya sa ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad//gzhon ru 'di ni rnams/
277b2(rgyud): tsang kun tu 'gro/nga yi bstan+d+ha la khyod ni mi mchog bstan//dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams//'dir ni mA lus mabya' dag zhi bar 'gyur//khyod kyi sngags ni nam
277b3(rgyud): yang 'di' mgyur//khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang nyams ma gyur//'phrogs pa la ma dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che
277b4(rgyud): theg pa chen po shin tu rgyus pa'i mdo las tshig slo bcad pa l+le'u rlung 'brum bcu drug pardzogas+ho//de nas bcoMm ldan 'das shA thub po sa dri bzhin
277b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sbyin
277b6(rgyud): mtshams mi mdzod smra nas 'dri zer sngon pa dang /ser po dang /ra pa dang /leb rgan dang /shel gyi kha dog lta bu byu ste/sang+yas rgyus kyi zhing 'di thams cad yang
277b7(rgyud): snang bar byas shing 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud khyim gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to//
278a1(rgyud): /b+haklag nas kyang dang rang gi gan smra la yang dag par spyad nas/'khor ts+tshed 'khor dud+ya sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis bams kyis bgrung
278a2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du mi snang byar gyur to//gza' dang /rgyu skad dang /sker ma thams cad kyi 'od med par byas nas nyam thag pa dang /'jigs
278a3(rgyud): sa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyibasu 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par gyur te/de ltar rab tu 'dar zhing yang dung yong su'i steng du 'grel bar gyur to//
278a4(rgyud): de nas bcom sming+ge 'dres shAHthub pas glo d+hA dang /rgyu skar dang /sgyur ma thams cad la mkhas pa rnams dang /byis pa'i skye bo'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems can
278a5(rgyud): rjesu bzung ba'i phyir bka' stsal pa ni lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig/'jig rten sna tsho gros ni las nyid la sems can rnams
278a6(rgyud): rnam par rten par byed/gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sku yang mngon par grub pa la gang yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khong
278a7(rgyud): zhing 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs la 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus mngon par grub ste/thams cad kying las dag pa dang mi dge ba dang
278b1(rgyud): 'bres pa las skyes la dul spyod pa'i spyod pa po 'am/dbang phyug gam/gats+tsha bo 'am/skyes bu 'am/grangs cad kyis rab tu 'byid par byed pa ni gang yang med//mas
278b2(rgyud): las skyes pa nom gtogs te/de yi las kyi rkyen gyis bskyed pa rgyu la ltos pa yin te/de yang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa'o//dri bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
278b3(rgyud): rkyen phan tshun du byung ba nye bar 'brel pa yin te/lhag ma 'byung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/'byung ba chen po de yang ma 'ongs
278b4(rgyud): de'i phung po gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing /skyes nas kyang 'gro ba dang /yul gzhan rgya che ba'i rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/dus gzhan na
278b5(rgyud): lugs las bzlog ste 'gag na ye shes kyi se mes bskul te/lus kyis bas gus pa'i bag chags mtha' dgra mngon par bsregs nas thog pa rnam gsum mnyam
278b6(rgyud): zhing spros pa med par dag par sgrub par 'gyuraro//theb pa chen po ni dus ring por nye bar chags pa'i lus bdag gir byed pa dang /dus par ma ni rlung rgyal bas ru lta bu rang
278b7(rgyud): byung gi shes rab rab tu 'byung ba dang /gzhan gyis sgra'i rjesu 'jug pa nyan thos ni dus bung dus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o//chos gzhanal bu nyid 'jug par 'gyur
279a1(rgyud): ni ma yin te/byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa nyid dang /ci skye yang 'jig rten sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin
279a2(rgyud): tephyogs dang cha byad zhig na nad med pa'i go 'phang mya dran med pa rdul med pa las kyis 'jig rten grub pa la ltos pa yin te/dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol
279a3(rgyud): bar+Na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed/las gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing las dang las ma yin pa las rnam par grol te/
279a4(rgyud): spros pa med pa las nye bar gnas pa yin no//theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las//zhi ba gzhan yang yod min te//sngags kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//rnam
279a5(rgyud): gsum la su yang drag bsgrags//de las rnam zlos rnam gsum las//rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang //rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni//sngags rnams
279a6(rgyud): kun gyi gzhi yang yin//rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang //rgyud dag la ni rab tu snang //rnamyi pA gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste//sngags rnams kun gyi gnas
279a7(rgyud): kyang yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs//rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'das//yan lag so so de nyid las//sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan//'jig rten
279b1(rgyud): spyo ba pan man man//klung du d+hu nI b+hU r+b+ha ba gas//de nyid yan+ta lAg las yin //rnaM sman la ng+gAg pa 'ang+ka//dwes+yA sa su 'aM b+hA rnams na//myu n+d+har
279b2(rgyud): rnam par shes par byed//de bzhin sgrub pa'i rjes rnams ni//mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa she sa//ji ltar kha dog dkar po ni//bskyed kyis ni rnam par bar+N+Na//de bzhin skar
279b3(rgyud): myi ldan pas ni//tha snyad don du rab tu brtag/thams cad du ni thams cad ldan//las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags//las rnams med par mtshon pa med//glang na 'ang sus
279b4(rgyud): ni mid ma yin//rgyu mtshon dang ni spyod pa dang //skye ba dang ni rigs dang granas//rtag tu lwa nye sna tsho ga/ des ni ti da mig wa ni gang dung sus can min//nang na gnas shing mtshon
279b5(rgyud): pa med//kun nas skye bo zhes pa ni//rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs//de bzhin lus la brten nas ni/sgras ni lus can dbu la snad //'bras bu
279b6(rgyud): ngag dang mi dge'i rtogs//skye bar yang ni rab brjid dang //rnam pa sna tshogs la nye bzung //lngas rnams sna tshogs dag las b+hUng+tha//dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang //
279b7(rgyud): rnam pa sde tshogs srog chags sba//grub dang ma grub mtshan ma no//rkyen gyi don la spros pa yin//rgya mtshon spyod dang mtshan mo ni//rkyen la mngon par rab tu
280a1(rgyud): do sa ma na rgyas mo//snron sbya na pas byug smon//rna na nas rnams A nA~M//zlu pa la sa / na
280a2(rgyud): yin lag ni//las ni bdeg gir byed pas mtshon//mi mtshan sngags rnams thams cad ni//sdig snrelas shin tum bze 'gyur//debs 'di dag thams cad/
280a3(rgyud): sun lad tu ni thub pas gsungs//sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen//byang chub snying por ting 'dzin thog//sngags ni spyod sku gsungs pa na//bgegs rnams malus
280a4(rgyud): reb tu 'jig/rmi lam dun dang mtshan ma ngan//bzod par dad/'a ba'ang rnam par 'joms//kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi//de thugs byang chub la zhugs pa//ma
280a5(rgyud): rungs bdud kyi sems kyis ni//bgegs chen 'jig pa dag la 'gyur//de nas 'jigs pa chen po ni//des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang //rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs
280a6(rgyud): rnams//de la rgyu mtshan myed par byung //des ni bskyod rnams stobs kyi skyed pa//sman ring dus yongasu bsags//de yi sngags kyi sgribs kyis ni//dri tshe bdud ni bcom par
280a7(rgyud): 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che//de yi 'od chen ldan par 'gyur//de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni//byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur//rmi lamangon pa nyer
280b1(rgyud): 'dzag pa//sbubs de 'dir ni bshad par bya//gang dag su la spyod pa yi//'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon cig/rmi sa mngan pa bzod dka' dang //mA rungasu sems can bzlog byed pa/
280b2(rgyud): rgyal ba sa la dbang po yis//sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa//lha yi tshog su dang gzur rnams dang //rgyu sker skar mkhan rnams nyon cig/gza' dang rgyu skor skar
280b3(rgyud): ma rnams//ma rlungs tshar bcad don dang ni//'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang //zhi ba'i sems ni rab bskyed phyir//gang dag sa la spyod pa dag/rkang med rkang mangs dag dang na
280b4(rgyud): rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang //mdor ni sems can thams cad ni//'gro ba drang ni gnas pa ni//'byung ngo'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig/ne maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/a pra ti ha
280b5(rgyud): shA sA nA nAM/oM kha khA khA hi/hi hUM hUM dz+nyA pa dz+wA lA/pra dz+wA la pra dz+nyA lAM/tiSh+Tha ts+tshiSh+TiSh+Ti phaT paT swA hA//gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i//sngags 'dri sngags rnams
280b6(rgyud): kun gyi mchog/gang zhig las rnams stong phrag ni//dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni//kra shis thams cad 'dod pa yi//rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed//rmyi lam da ni dang
280b7(rgyud): mtshan ma ngan//lan gcig bzlas pas sel bar byed//las rnams gzhan yang byed pa ni//sngags rnams kun gyi bden po yin//'byung po kun lo dbang byed pa//
281a1(rgyud): da mnga' bdan sangs rgyas 'di//sbugs 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni//sngags rnams ma lus rab tu sol//rdzogs sangs rgyas pa lha y-i lhas//thu
281a2(rgyud): mchog gis ni de gsungs nas//yud tsam mi gsungs bzhugs nas ni//cung zad dus ni gzhes par mdzad//de tshe gnas gtsang gnas pa yi//lha yi tshogs kyang 'dug
281a3(rgyud): par 'gyur//lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni//rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams//gtsug tror sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis//'jigs shing dam tshig la gnas phyir//gtsug
281a4(rgyud): tor zhes bya mthu bo che//mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste//durgya phrag lnga 'am bzhi 'am ni//de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/gnyis dang drug dang lnga dang bdun//gtsug
281a5(rgyud): tor dbang po rab tu bsgrags//de ltar grangs dang grangs med ni//gtsug tor rgyalnga po dge ba yin//dri dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad//
281a6(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u ra
281a7(rgyud): 'byam las bcu bdun pa rdzog so///de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thung pas rgyu skar dang /gza' dang /skar ma dang /skar mkhan thams cad 'jig
281b1(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang /phyogs thams cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag khyod cag
281b2(rgyud): nyon cig/gza' dang /rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams cad bdag la ston cig/khyed kyi sngags bya ba'i don thams cad kyang sgrubs shig/khyod kyis dam tshig
281b3(rgyud): la yang gnas par gyis shig/sngags kyi rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa 'di grub na/de nas gzhan tsho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis
281b4(rgyud): shig ceso//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don du gsungs te/zlos pas thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dang /sngags
281b5(rgyud): kyi don yang rab tu bsgrubasra pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pos gsungaso//tha skar dang /bra nye dang /smin drug ni dang po'i rgyu skar te/rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag
281b6(rgyud): lad mig dmar gzo' ni bdag po yin//lug ni khyim du bstan pa ste//'di la grub pa yod ma yin//grub mchog bir ma tha ma nyid//grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin//las
281b7(rgyud): rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing //ma rungs gza' ni rnam par bzlog/snor ma mgo dang de bzhin du//lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin//rgyu skar nam so rgyal dang ni//skrag tu 'ang
282a1(rgyud): rab tu brjod pa yin//mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo//de bzhin me bzhi nab pa dang //sa ri sa ga lha mtshams dang //snron dang de bzhin sbubs dang
282a2(rgyud): ni/chu ni stod skad dge ba ste//zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags//rgyu skar glo zhin myon gru ni//drag po'i las la rab tu sngags//mon+da bre khrums ni stod slad gaN+DIs//rgyu
282a3(rgyud): skar grub pa'i rgyu yin//nam grul skyes dpal dang ldan//'thab la dga' zhing 'jigs pa med//rgyu skar lhag mA gtso bo ni//dus kyi tha mar 'byung ba ni//ji bzhin legs
282a4(rgyud): par spyod pa dang //grub dang bsod nams rab tu bsgrags//nye rgyal dang ni tha chungs dang //'dod pa dag ni nyid yino//yang dag bden dang 'jig rten dang //snang bar
282a5(rgyud): yang ni brjod pa min//longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin dang //ma 'gags pa dang 'gags pa nyid//grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang //de bzhin rgyal po 'jig rten dang /
282a6(rgyud): rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste//stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'o//dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni//'di dag gi ni nus pa yod//cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du//de tsam shes par
282a7(rgyud): gsungs pa yin//nga nyid 'odadi ldan sems can ni//de mi dusu rdzogs ldan yin//thams cad na mkha' la 'gro zhing //rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs//de yi dus rgya
282b1(rgyud): skar med//nyi ma zla ba skar ma med//lha dang lha min 'jig rten med//dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin//ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin//chos dang skye ba'i skar ma med/
282b2(rgyud): bsrung ba med cing sngags kyang med//dge dang mi dge'i las kyang med//'di dag rang dragar spyod pa ste/gza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med//'di dag nad med dag pa ste/
282b3(rgyud): rtag tu sems can rnam mang po//de nas dus ni 'bri ba na//'jig rten gnod min rab tu 'jug/sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni//de nas sa yi steng du 'gro/sa steng lha
282b4(rgyud): gnas gzhal med khang //lha dang lha min yang dag 'byung //bar mo'i dusu phyin gyur na//mi yi lus las yang dag rten//bya za'i dang btung la rkam chags pas//'od de
282b5(rgyud): dag ni rab tu nyams//lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing //dge dang mi dge rnam par spyod//de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang //gza' yi 'od ni 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas bzung nas gang
282b6(rgyud): cung zad//skar mo'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang //sems can rje su bzung bur brjod//ngas ni de dag bstan pa yin//ston ni drang srong cha byad 'gyur//blo ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad
282b7(rgyud): dang da dbang phyug chen po'i lus rten cing //yang na khyab 'jug cha byad kyis//ne mkha' lding gi lus spyad dang //gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang //sha za dag gi lus nyid gyur//
283a1(rgyud): skye dang skye bar bdag nyid skyes//byang chub sems dpas mkhas pa ni//de dang der ni skye ba la//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir//rtag tu skye ba'i
283a2(rgyud): dbang giso//bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu//sngon gyi byang chub sems dpar gyur//mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa yi//bdag ni de tshe byis par gyur//'jig rten ji snyed
283a3(rgyud): yod pa yi//khyab 'jug gis byas bzo spyad dang //lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi rabs//de bzhin rig byed bda' spyod pa//sdeb sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang //rtsis
283a4(rgyud): dang rgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang //log shes de bzhin gshegs pa dang //de bzhin log par spyod nyid dang //'jig rten brgyan bcos thoms cad ni//yun ring bdag gis
283a5(rgyud): stan bstan to//zhi ba thub bdag ji ltar bar// ye shes bdag gis thob ma yin//byang chubo rgyu ni grol don dang //de bzhin du ni thar pa'i phyir//'khor ba'i brtson rar rab
283a6(rgyud): bcings pas//las kyang las kyang bdag ma grol//zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs rgyas nyid//ma nyams go 'phang mya ngan 'das//yun ring don du mngon 'dod cing //legs
283a7(rgyud): par yongasu btsal bas thob//de sbyar bdag gis rab ldan pas//tshogs chung bya ngas thob pa yin//rgyas bas sngon ni bstan pas na//rang byung ye shes thob pa yin//
283b1(rgyud): de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba//phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin//byang chub rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas//'khor ba'i dpon par 'khyams pa yin//bdag gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba//
283b2(rgyud): shes bdag gis thob pa min//rig pa bzang po'i las dga' bas//dri na mya ngan 'das pa thob//bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni//bsdus pas 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/
283b3(rgyud): las las grol ba med par ni//grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed ma yin//'khor ba'i yun ring zhags pa 'dis//las kyi 'ching bsdu nges par bcings//de yi 'gro 'di bdag nyid che//
283b4(rgyud): dge dang mi dge 'ang smin par 'gyur//rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad//mtshon par byed pa kho nar zas//chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang //gzhan la rtags ni snang mi
283b5(rgyud): 'gyur//de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa//dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir//'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang //khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni//chu dang sa dang rlung dang me/
283b6(rgyud): na mkha' yongasu bstan pa yin//'byung ba yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir//'di dag 'byung ba chen po yon//sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir//brag med las kyis byas pa yin//
283b7(rgyud): de dag dus ni nges pa yis//sngags rnams grub par gyur pa yin//de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis//dge dang mi dge bsrung bar bya//rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso//lha
284a1(rgyud): dbang phyug brgya byin sogs//de yang de che de dusu//dus kyi mthar ni yongasu brtags//dus kyi tha ma dag la ni//sngags rnams grub pa nges
284a2(rgyud): pa yin//de nyid kyis na thub dbang gis//gzhon nu yongasu brtags pa ni//shes rab chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs//byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan//'jig rten 'dir ni
284a3(rgyud): kun tu rgyu//sems can rje su bzung bar bzod//de yi dusu grub pa ni//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong //rgyu skar skar ma'i dpyad shes pa//de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur//
284a4(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar dang //yud tsam dag tu rab tu bsgrags//dus kyi tha ma de la ni//bcu gnyis khyim yang yod pa yin//rgyu skar tshogs la brten nas ni//de dag
284a5(rgyud): gza' ni rnam par dbye//thams cad so sor gyur pa ni//'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad//skye ba dang ni spyod pa nyid//khyim rnams kun la rab tu gnas//skye bo rmongs pas
284a6(rgyud): khyab gyur la//dge dang mi dge 'bras bu 'byung //de nyid las kyi 'ching ba yis//de dag khyim ni yang dang yang //sems can rnams kyis grub pa tsam//dge dong mi dge
284a7(rgyud): rtog par byed//rgyu skar snar mar ldan par ni//skye bar yongasu rab brtags pa//dpal ldan bzod pa phun sum tshogs//tshe ring bu ni mang ba dang //rtag tu de tshe nor skal ldan//
284b1(rgyud): dani dpag gi bdun pa byung //'di ni mchog skye sor//rgyum chog nyid la yongasu mtsho//mgo nyid la ni 'jig rten shes//chos ldan mthong na dag par 'gyur//sbyin drug
284b2(rgyud): char hUMs rtag tu ni//sa bdag rgya lnga por snang ba ste//yang dag skye ba de la rten//rtag tu rgya mtsho gsum bdeg 'gyur//phyogs gcig skyes pa bgrod dka' bya//phyogs gtsug
284b3(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur ba yin//gza' ni tha mas mtshan pa yi//gal te skye bar 'byung gyur na//sa ni khAr yug ma lus par//rjesu spyod par 'gyur bya yin//lo ni bcu dang lha po nyid//
284b4(rgyud): de yi rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur//ba skar bra nye nyid dang ni//smin drug chal skyes gyur pa//khyim 'di dag gi nus pa ni//tshong gi don gyis nor 'grub 'gyur//gal te skyes pa/
284b5(rgyud): des 'byung na//dbang phyug longs spyod phun sum tshogs//rgyu snying 'di la skyes pa ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar bar 'gyur//de bzhin nyi mu nub pa na//de ni 'chi ba ro 'gyur/
284b6(rgyud): pa yin//ma rungs chematshom med po dang //bden par smra ba mo yin dang //lus kyi lcags sra dmar ba'i mdog/sa yi sbrang na de snang //'di yi 'gro ba skad cig ni//mig
284b7(rgyud): 'byed 'dzum su rab tu bstan//'di yi bar du gang skyes pa//rgya tshe ron tan de 'di yin//seM gol gtogs gnas tsam du ni//'di mi 'gro ba rab tu bsgyur//de ni de dag
285a1(rgyud): b+h+rany+dzams//gza' rnams kyis nI ma da ma sbyin//ste durnam par 'dres gyur pa'i//sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye//'dres pa'i 'gror/
285a2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs//'dres pa'i longs spyod ldan pa yin//de nyid kyis ni mi skye ste//skye ba nyid du brjod pa yin//skye ba'i skar mu sum cu ni//dag dang mi dge 'bras bu
285a3(rgyud): 'byung //gza' ni mig dmar gyis mtshon pa//'di nA ma rus skye bar 'gyur//gsus che lus ni sdum pa dang //mig dkyus ring zhing snyan par ste//gza' ni phur bus
285a4(rgyud): bAltas pa ni//rtag tu brtan ldan skye bar 'gyur//chu tshod zung tsam nyi ma dang //zla ba'i lha ni rab bshad pa//de bzhin rtag tu mtshan lnga//yang dag skye bar 'dod pa yin//
285a5(rgyud): phyin ci log pa'i skye ba gzhan//phyin ci ldog tu'ang brtags pa yin//gza' mi dge ba mthong ba dang //mi dge'i skye ba dge mi dge/mi dge'i 'bras bu grub pa dang /
285a6(rgyud): yang dag skye ba bzong po 'byung //'gro ba'i skye gnas la brten nas//khyim la skye bur rab tu gnas//gza' ni ngan spong bus mtshan pa//skyon byed sems dpa' che ba ste/
285a7(rgyud): ga dang rdob so dag dang ni//skrag gi cha la rab tu brjod//'di dag la skyes gtong ba che//g.yo sgyu can ni bab col byed//don dang don med 'byor pa la//rtag tu nam chags
285b1(rgyud): bud med chags//gzhan gyi bud meng mngon 'gro zhing //de nyid nag po la sbyong dang //dud pa'i mdog 'drar skye 'gyur te//dag cing 'a khrib pa la yang dga'//sbyor ba'i khyim la/
285b2(rgyud): rang rten nas//de ni spen pa drug la skye//nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang //der gnas spen pa rgyu bar byed//de los skyes pa nyi ma phyed //sems ni stobs dang ldan por 'gyur//da yi/
285b3(rgyud): dus la gang skyes pa//de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya//nor ni 'grub par 'gyur ba dang //dbang phyug gis ni legs mtshan pa'o//rgyu skar de bzhin rgyal dang ni//skrag la yang
285b4(rgyud): ni gang skyes po//'di ni sbal pa'i khyim yin te//drag dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che//mdog ni ser po dang ldan zhing //de ni skye ba mchog tu bstan//rtag tu de bzhin mtshan
285b5(rgyud): byed du//'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin//de yi dus kyi ched la ni//gal te sems can skye bar 'dod//cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis na//'di ni don rnams thams cad sgrub//da
285b6(rgyud): ni shin tu gzhon po nas//rgyal thabs byed cing nor rnams thob//mdog ni bsder dang sngo bsangs ni//khwa dog rgyas pa snang bar 'gyur//btsang sgra'i spyong la dga' bo dang /
285b7(rgyud): de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye//mchu dang de bzhin gre dang ni//de bzhin dpe yi cha dag ni//snang byed kyi ni zhing du 'gyur//sang ge'i khyim du bya ba yon//de la skyes pa dpal
286a1(rgyud): bo che//shu yi kha zas de la dga'//ri yI rdzong la rten nas ni//rgyal thabs dbang phyu byed par 'gyur//gal te de skyes por 'gyur na//zhing la
286a2(rgyud): gnas shing nges sdom rten//de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na//skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin//rgyu skar dngo yi cha dang ni//de bzhin me bzhi nag pa nyid//rgyu skar de la skye gnas pa//
286a3(rgyud): mi ni yongasu dpa' bar 'gyur//sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro/de ni dmyag dpon byed par 'gyur//gal te skye bar thob 'gyur na//nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur//
286a4(rgyud): glang du skur ma de dag gnas//'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur//'di yi badrag po gza' lhag skye//kha cig tu ni gzhon yang yin//'di skad skar ma mchog la ni//gza' ni
286a5(rgyud): mi bzang srung bar 'gyur//zla ba'ang yang ni bza' ba ste//yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin//nyin phyed rdzogs nA skye ba ni//'dri yi skye ba snang ba yin//nag pa'i chu dang sa ri
286a6(rgyud): dang rdzas ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa la//srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don//zla ba la spyod sems can gyi//'di ni mi bzang zhing yin te//sbrul med ma yin nor gyi gnas//
286a7(rgyud): mtshan mo yi ni thun gyur gnas//mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma'o//mi ni 'di la skyes gyur pa//rtag tu btung ba dag la dang //spyi mtshan ma yin ngo tsha med//mang pos bkur
286b1(rgyud): mchod pa dang //la s+yAd rgyas snyid yongs stod dang //nod rten thob pa n+d+ha ba ston//de snga med dbye ba yongs snar zhid//byis par mas ni spangs pa yin//gal te
286b2(rgyud): bathob gyur na//bu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur//rgyu skar lha mtshams la skyes pa//bzo yi las ni sgrub pa dang //byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po med//rtag tu dpar zhing
286b3(rgyud): rtul da //'jig rten ston po skyes /b+h+r-inA~M ya gnam bstan gyi yin//thug bsngal mi ba brjod pa da// ni ma rungs skye bar 'byur//khyim ni sdig par ba shing
286b4(rgyud): bar bya//rtag tu rno zhing bab col byed//'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa//skye bar yang dag brjod pa yin//de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la//gal te mi ni skyes gyur ni//drag cing
286b5(rgyud): glayul lngas rnam rgyal ba'i//rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur//byis pa bzhon nu gzugs yod pa'i//de yi skad cig gzus mthong 'gyur//sa yi lho mo bur 'gyur ba//dang
286b6(rgyud): yin de ni mig dmar gsungs//de nyid phyir na sa la spyod//rang bu nyid kyis gsod par byed//de las gzhan pa bzlog pas ni//dge dang mi dge skye ba nyid//tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa
286b7(rgyud): dang shes ldan nyid du rang skye bar 'gyur//lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa//shes rab gyi ning grogs la byams//mig dmer gyi ni zhing 'di yin//yang na rtag tu gzar
287a1(rgyud): yin rgyu skur skabs la skyes pa dang //de bzhin du ni chu rgyud dang //rmya slad kyin cha dag la//rA'u y-i khyim du rab tu bstan//de yi skye ba'i bya ba na//
287a2(rgyud): phur bu'i zhing der bstan pa yin//nyi ma byi dror gyur pa dang //zla ba nam smad gyur pa la//de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa//gang zhig skyes pa skye ba'i chu//sbubs la skyes pa
287a3(rgyud): rang ribs 'jig/tha mar bzang por 'gyur bya yin//skyes gnas par mi longs spyod ni//thob por de ni the tshom med//gzhan pa yong su 'das pa na//snang byed dkyil
287a4(rgyud): 'khor ji lta bar//rgas pas gyur na rgyal por 'gyur//longs spyod che zhing nor tshor 'gyur//dma' yi phyogasu lus 'gyur gyi//gzhan gyi phyogasasu ma yino//da
287a5(rgyud): las gzhan du bzlog par ni//rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang //chu smod kyi ni cha dag dang //gro zhan nyid du bston pa dang //man gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni//khyim 'di chu sran
287a6(rgyud): kho na yin//'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te//yang na gza' gzhan gyis mtshan pa'o//rtag tu 'di la skyes gnas pa//de yang sa snying 'di la snang //dang po'i mthu'i
287a7(rgyud): dang bar ma'i mtha'//mtshan mo'i cha ni 'das pa la//de dag las skyes longs spyod tsha//kun nas snod par 'gyur ba yin//mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing //
287b1(rgyud): dA dwag sa yi bdag par 'gyur//rab gtum kha dag rlag po 'am//ste bsangs mjug tu de dag 'gyur//mig mtha' dmyur zhing 'jam pa dang //rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang
287b2(rgyud): bod//de bzhin chu yis khyab pa yi//phyogasu rgyal po byang bar 'gyur//tshe ring bu ni med pa dang //sdug bsngal mang po bzod par 'gyur//de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la//
287b3(rgyud): skye /mu byur bzlog par snang //mon tshwa'i byed dang man gri dang //de bzhin khyams snyed byed dan ni//dri yi khyim du 'gyur ba ni//bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin//'di la da
287b4(rgyud): yi gtso bo ni//zheng du rtag tu brtan pa yin//de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang //blo ldan pa ba sangs nyid yin//'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni//mtshan mo'amanam ni langs
287b5(rgyud): byar snang //rtag tu sgyu 'di bzang po ste//'jig rten spyad pa dag pa yin//me nir+ya rungs las byed cing //blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin//longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum
287b6(rgyud): tshigs//sa snying rjesu spyod par 'gyur//de las gzhin du bzlog na ni//dbul zhing nad rnams snod du 'gyur//rgyu skar khrums slad nyid dang nI//nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang /
287b7(rgyud): khrums spyod kyi ni bzhi tshi la//khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags//skye ba de dag rtag gnas pa//kun tu ji sbyar snang zhen//mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang //nyir par nyi ma
288a1(rgyud): kha dang //nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa dang //nyin phyeng cung zad 'das pa dang //lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par//'di yi dus su'ang skyes pa ni//dag pa
288a2(rgyud): dang ni rab dag nyid//pa ba sangs kyi rab tu mchod//pa ba sangs kyi zhing zhes pa//lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod//ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi/gza' yis
288a3(rgyud): kyang ni rab tu bsten//des zhing rtag tu dge ba dang //chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin//mi ni de la skyes gyur pa//yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes//brtson 'grus/
288a4(rgyud): che zhing rgyal po 'dod//gnyen dang bshes ni brtan pa dang //tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang //dma' ba'i yul la yang dag bstan//shar gyi phyogs la brten nas ni//
288a5(rgyud): de dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur//de dag mya ngan phyogasu ni//rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te//nywa ni thang la yod spyod par//nam yang snang ba ma yino//drang srong rnams kyi chu
288a6(rgyud): gnas dang //chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur//de la skye ba rab brten pa//khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan//mi ni de dag la skyes pa//dma' ba'i yul du rnam par 'phel//
288a7(rgyud): rtag tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i//sa bdag skal pa chen por 'gyur//phur bu dang ni spen pa dag/gza' mchog gis ni mngon par bltas//shar gyi phyogs kyi
288b1(rgyud): dug pa byud//de dag las skyes the tshom med//khyim ni rnam pa mang po dang //rgyu sgyur du ma gsungs pa yang //rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang //sngon gyi dus yin da sbyang
288b2(rgyud): min//mi rnams de las skyes pa yang //de bzhin chos grangs bco lnga dang/ni dag sum cu ngag nyid//dus ni zla bla ri rab tu bstan//zla byed nyin mtshan bco lnga ste//
288b3(rgyud): phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod//des na zla ba bcu gnyis lnga//lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags//'di tsam dus kyi tshod la nI//dus kyi tha mar yong su brtags//rtsod pa'i dusu phyin
288b4(rgyud): pa na/'di yi grangasu rab tu bstan//mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du//lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin//de dag lo tshigs phyin pa na//drus ni drug tu rab tu brjod//dang po
288b5(rgyud): bar dang tha mar ni//de dag gsum du rab tu bstan//lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na//mi rnams 'dir tshe ring bar 'gyur//de dag mi yi 'jig rten 'dir//skye zhing 'phel
288b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba yin//mi ma yin pa 'jig rten 'dir//phan tshun du ni 'byer bar 'gyur//de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang //phan tshun du ni rnam par rgyu//lha dang /
288b7(rgyud): lha min gtso bo ni//gang tsha 'thab par rab 'jug pa//de tshe mi yi 'jig rten 'dir//nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin//mjug rings las dang skar mda' dang //gnam lcags
289a1(rgyud): du nI rdo rje dang //dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu//du mjug mi stsarab tu snang //zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la//mun nag gis ni khabs
289a2(rgyud): par gnas//nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //bug pa yod par snang ba dang //de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa//rnam mang yang ni snang 'gyur na//mu gi che ni nyams pa dang //
289a3(rgyud): de bzhin yul 'khor 'jig pa dang //mi yi bdag po 'chi ba dang //sdom brtson 'jigs pa chen po 'byung //'jig rten de ni ni thams cad la//der ni 'jig su rung
289a4(rgyud): 'byung //mchu dang tha skar drug dang ni//nub so la nIs 'grul na//de tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu//rkun mA ba be col byed la gnod//lho yi phyogs la gnas pa yi//
289a5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam par 'jig/bre nye sbyin drug nyid dang ni//gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo/'bul ni 'jig rten 'jigs pa che//de la ngogs pa rab tu 'byung //nub
289a6(rgyud): phyogs na ni glan sa pa yi//de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur//gang yang mtha' 'khob gnas pa yi//kla klo rku bas 'tsho byed dang //de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas
289a7(rgyud): dang dang nang du mi yi dbang phyug gnas//de yang de yi dus dag tu//nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur//de dag la ni dgra rnams 'byung //gcig la gcig ni
289b1(rgyud): yul 'phrog 'gyur//rgyu skar lug dang rgyal dang ni//skrag dang de bzhin bre dang dag//'di drug la nA sa 'bul na//mI bdag kun ni mi mthun nas//byin tshun gnod pa
289b2(rgyud): byed 'byung ga//bsad dang 'ching dang gnod de dang //mu~M ga dag gyu ri tu 'byung //yini dag pas ri dang //de bzhin l+h+wa mA che mi sbyin nyid la//snod
289b3(rgyud): po gyur pa//'di la gang tshe 'gul 'gyur na//khA ba can gnas kla k+ko dang //rkun makun nas gnas pa dang //bal yul rgyu ni bdag po dang //kha shrI l+r-ing par gan
289b4(rgyud): yid/der ni mi bdag mA lus pa//phan tshun du ni mi mthun nus//thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar//'dri dron the tshom med pa yin//rgyu skar gang yin sbubs dang
289b5(rgyud): ni du chu dri stong smad gnyi ga la//sa y-i snying du 'grul brnyani//'di dag la ni rab mthong na//shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang //bon drA o dr-i ka ma ru//bang ki la ba
289b6(rgyud): rgyal po ni/'chi bar 'di la hUM tsham med//kAr+b+he'i bdag po dpal dang ldan//yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ram//'phrul la nA bar gyur pa dang //
289b7(rgyud): yang na 'chi bar 'gyur//'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs gnas dang //gang ga'i 'gram du yang dag gnas//chu yis thams cad khyer ba 'am//nad rnams mang
290a1(rgyud): kun non da//bzhin dang ni mon gru dang //mon ze dang ni chu stod dang //de bzhin du ni chu skrad dang //rgal to nam gru las skyes pa//rang
290a2(rgyud): tu 'gul ba nyin byed la//snod kyi 'jig rten yang dag 'bul//sa rnams thams cad rab 'phul ba//ri bo dang ni gan su bcas//rtag tu na mkha' lo snang ba
290a3(rgyud): 'bar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed ni//byang phyogs kyi ni yul dag drang //nub phyogs la ni yang dge gnas//lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //phyogs rnams kun
290a4(rgyud): gnas byed pa'i//mo mchogs ni meng spyod pa//dran tshun du ni gnod pa byed//sems can rnams ni spyod chen ldan//mu ge yul 'khor 'bye bar 'gyur//
290a5(rgyud): rangs su ni 'gul gyur na//lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur//de la so cung zad phyi dus na//drag pa'i 'gul ba rab tu ste//de nas cung zad phyis 'gul nA/
290a6(rgyud): yul ni ma ge d+ha ra gnod dang //a gra'i yul du gnod 'gyur te//ma ga d+ha rgyal de bzhi no//de nas cung zad nyin phyed dam//phyi dro'i dusu gyur pa na//gal te sar+b+ba/
290a7(rgyud): 'gul bar gyur//sa steng me lus nyid dag gi/rab tu byung ba thams cad la//rtag tu nad ni 'byung ba thob//rims dang yi ge'i chus dang gzer//de bzhin nad ni
290b1(rgyud): 'brum bu yis//zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni//de nas de dug sos par 'gyur//de nas nyi ma yang 'das nas//sa ni gal te 'bul gyur na//rigs bzhi dpa gi mchog
290b2(rgyud): gyur pa//bram ze rtsa na so ma 'thung //nyon mongs rgyal po'i blon po ni//'chi bar 'gyur bar mtshom med//mdun na 'don ni chos dang ldan//blon po 'am zham 'bring byedapa
290b3(rgyud): na gzhan yang sdom can ga ba ni//sngags rgyud de na la mkhas pa dang //bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang //de bzhin dmangs rigs rje'u rigs//brtan pa mkhas pa
290b4(rgyud): dag dang ni//bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan//gsod dang rab tu nyams pa 'am//dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes//sngon byung ba ni snams pa dag/myur du nad kyis
290b5(rgyud): 'dzegs 'gyur te//glan ma lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhe na//de nas nyi ma nub pa na//de nas yang ni song ba na//phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni//bal tAM sa nI rab tu 'gul//
290b6(rgyud): de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang /dude 'gro dag gis 'gro ba dang //mi yi 'jig rten gtso bo dag/de tshe 'bul dang rnam par 'jig/mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po la//
290b7(rgyud): gal te sa ni 'gul 'a gyur na//sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang //dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnamasu na//mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnamasu//char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/
291a1(rgyud): cung zad thun du gyur la//sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin//dumartags de sAng d+hAr+ya na//rlung dang char pa'i 'jig rten 'byung //de nas dran/
291a2(rgyud): de zad pa'i mthar//'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa//nub phyogs mi yi bdag blo mi//pha rol dma'i tshogs 'byung bar shes//thun ni gnyis pa dang po'o//
291a3(rgyud): gal te sa ni 'gul 'byung gyur//gzhan gyi dmig tshogs nod drung 'chi//khong bya'i nang ni mi bzad 'thung //mkhris pa bud kan las gyur nad//skye bo rnams
291a4(rgyud): la 'byung bar 'gyur//'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing //de tshe phyogs dang phyogasu 'gro/de nas ge nyis bya'i blun dkyil du//sa ni rab tu 'gul byu na/
291a5(rgyud): rlung tshon 'byung por shes bya ste/shing dang lha khab 'grol byar 'gyur//yang thog gi rnams kyi//rtse mo 'jigs par the tshom med//gnas dang 'du
291a6(rgyud): gnas bzang po dang //khang pa dang ni rta babs dang //drud 'khor rnams kyi 'dug gnas kyang //sa la myur du ltung bar 'gyur//de nas mtshan phyed dus drug tu/
291a7(rgyud): gal te sa ni 'gul pa byung //de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag/mi mchog rga tso bo 'chi ba 'am//deru'ichi bar 'gyur ba 'am//mu ge 'byung por rab tu ston/
291b1(rgyud): bar ma'i thun na dri gyur nas//rnga mar nyo lu 'gul ba byung //sgra rnams du na mA lus bya//zhi zhing nad med nges par ston//de nas mtshan byed ma par gyur la//gal te san
291b2(rgyud): 'jal ba snang //shar ci yul gyi dang me natu//mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnod//pan+da rgyun mi mthun gyur nas ni//sdug bsgyur mi bzud 'ochi bar 'gyur/
291b3(rgyud): thun ni gsumi par phyin nas 'dul//byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung //sbrang bu sha sbrang phye ma leng dang //rkun po rnams ni 'jig par 'jug/tho rangs 'gul bar gyur
291b4(rgyud): na ni//tshe ring nAd med lo legs byed//grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dang /me yis tshigs par shes par bya//nyi mye 'char ba'i dus dag tu//sa ni rab tu 'gul pa byung //
291b5(rgyud): dbus kyi yul ni thams cad du//rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur//de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las//rgyal po 'chi bar snang ba yin//gang du stong sa ni rang che ba//sa
291b6(rgyud): ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin//de tshi gnas ni de dag tu//dge dang mi dge'i sbyor ba snang //skar mda' gnam grum sa 'bul ni//skar mda' dkar po 'bar 'gyur na/
291b7(rgyud): des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed//de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni//dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin//mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar//ma yis tshig par nye bor ston/
292a1(rgyud): dud ka'i mdog nad nag po ni//rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin//ser pa 'am yang nu ser skya 'am//'dres pa'i mchog ni snang gyur na//dra
292a2(rgyud): 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba//skar mnga' ltung bas rnam par ston//gnam brum nyid du bstan pa ni//bar 'byung de ni ston pa ste//bral te dbus na de tshe dbus//yul nyid
292a3(rgyud): du ni rab tu bstan//sgra snyun snyan pa byung na ni//bde zhing nad med ston par byed//ma rungs mi bzad 'jig rten du//rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin//'jigs drang 'jigs
292a4(rgyud): rung shin tu sgra//dor ni mu ge ston pa yin//de la sogs par sbyor ba ni//rtag tu gza' rnams 'dod pa yin//rgyu sker 'di dag mthong ba la//grub pa'i las ni de tshe//
292a5(rgyud): bya tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni//rgyal dang khrums ni stong smad gany+dzis//nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag/bzlas pa'i dusu rab tu bsngags//'di dag la ni sngags
292a6(rgyud): rnams 'grub//grub pa'i dron yang ster bar byed//skar ma dag ni 'di dag la//dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya//gza' yi res kyi gtso bo ni//sur dang dkar bar
292a7(rgyud): snang ba yin//ches ni 'di dag la dge ste//rtag tu zla ba nye ba yin//yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang //dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya//dang po gsum pa lnga pa
292b1(rgyud): dang /bcu pA dang na bdun pa dang //bcu gsum pa la ci bde b.ru//mri yi bdag po dgro bar brtag/skye bo kun pa dge ba sbyin//chags shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags//
292b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dang //sngags rnams thams cad mi 'dri'o//'di dag la ni sngags mi 'bru'o//bgegs kyi rgyu ni bstan pa yin//'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la/
292b3(rgyud): tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan//phur bu paM sangs zla ba dang //gze' lhag mchog ni las kun la//gza' mchog 'di dag rtag tu ni//bzhi po ches drong ldan pa ni//sa
292b4(rgyud): steng 'jig rten kun tu ni//'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed//ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba yi//nyi ma la ni brtag par bya//yud tsam bcu gnyis kho na ni//de yi dusu rab tu sbyar//
292b5(rgyud): dkar dang byams ldani nyid dang ni//mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan//drag po dbang chen dag pa dang //byi bzhin nyid dang legs mdzes dang //'khor dang 'khor bar byed pa
292b6(rgyud): nyid/dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin//zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid//'di dag bcu gnyis mtshan nyid yin//yud tsam dag tu bstan pa ni//nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o//
292b7(rgyud): bcu pa char ni 'dib 'gyur te//bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig/dargyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang //bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar bya//myur la sogs de'i grangs dang ldan//
293a1(rgyud): rgyu nu sla rgyu ShA rgyu su nasun du du du/na
293a2(rgyud): brgya yi tshogs dag la//rtswa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin//
293b1(rgyud): rtsis shes 'jog snga pa med par bstan//de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis//sgra gra tsun gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin//de nas zla ba bcu gnyis lnga//lo yAM sgrar ni rab tu bsgrags//
293b2(rgyud): de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la//lo rgyun zhes ni de la bya//gzing dang rgyu skar phyin ci log/lha mIn dbang po thamasna cid kyang //de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la//'dir ni dge da
293b3(rgyud): myi dge byed//gang tshe yar ngor lha min dang //skra grocan rab tu snang 'gyur zhing //zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni//ma lus rab tu zin gyur na//mAts+tshin gyi tshogs ni cheni
293b4(rgyud): po yang //sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur//de la sogs pa che ni po ni//dus dang dusu rab sbyor 'gyur//rnam pa du ma mang po yi//bgregs ni mi bzud snang bar
293b5(rgyud): 'gyur//dus kyi thu mar phye ni pA na//'jig rten snod ni chos min la//rgyu skar snams la gnas pa la//zla ba mA lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing //mtshan mo me lus 'dzin
293b6(rgyud): pa nyid//zla bya 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang //gal te nyi mo nyen par ni//nub bzhin du ni 'dzin gyur dang //nyi ma dang ni zla ba nyid//mtshon phyed dag tu bzung gyur nas//
293b7(rgyud): lha min dbang po'i brib ma yis//gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na//shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni//sdang bas gsod par the tshom med//rang nyid 'chi ba'i
294a1(rgyud): 'jigs pas sam//gzhan thos don gsod par 'gyur//kluk+ko sbyin bdag pa nyid//shar phyog+sa su gsod par byed//oM d+ha
294a2(rgyud): yul gyi mi rnams dang //de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang //gal te tha skar snar ma dang //de bzhin du ni bri nye dang //smin drug dag la nyi zla na//gang tshe 'dzin par snang
294a3(rgyud): gyur na//rnam pa sna tshogs pad+ma kan dang //mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang //de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni//gzhan yang lus can kun la 'byung //byis pi dgra
294a4(rgyud): ni thams cad la//rnam pa du ma'i rlung rnams 'byung //gal te rgyu skar mchu dang ni//gri dang de bzhin de bo nyid dang //me bzhi nag pa sa rI dang //sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni//
294a5(rgyud): de la nyi zla shwa ra ba na//'dzin par the tshom med 'gyur zhing //nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogasu//sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na//shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang //
294a6(rgyud): lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang //ang ga ma~M ga d+ha rgyal po//mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa 'am//bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am//de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs
294a7(rgyud): 'gyur//dgra rnams sdang ba'i sems ldan rnams//tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur//mgo dang lag dang nab so dang //de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang //
294b1(rgyud): nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la//sgra gcan gyis zin snang byur na//ma la d+ha rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing //de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod//blon po nad 'jigs shes par bya//'cha
294b2(rgyud): dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur//lha mtshamis dang ni snron dag lo//sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang //de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro//yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung //
294b3(rgyud): bsad dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang //gnod pa rnam pa du ma byung //'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ni//skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye//chu stod dang ni gro zhin dang //de bzhin///
294b4(rgyud): chu smad kho na la//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas dang //zla ba la ni dmar bar snang //gza' ni 'dzin par snong gyur pa//rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur//gro zhin mon
294b5(rgyud): gri rgyu skar dang //de bzhin du ni khrums stong dang //gang tshe mon gre dag la ni//gal te nyi zla gzas zin te//gza' ni byung bar shes gyur na//kha dog nag pa la brten
294b6(rgyud): nasamya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang //mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni//yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang //rgyal po rkun ma'i 'jigs tshun 'byung //nam glu rgyu ska
294b7(rgyud): nyid dang ni//gang tshe khyams spyang dag la ni//zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du//shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na//nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin//ma ga d+ha ni me yi bdag
295a1(rgyud): sems can rgyal po'i thabs nyams par//zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur//rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yin//mtshan ma 'dri dag bstan
295a2(rgyud): pa yin//zla bo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi//phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa//de dang de yi phyogs dag tu//dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur//gang nyid sa steng 'gul
295a3(rgyud): ba ni 'jog rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag/dge dang mi dge de dang dar//de bzhin gazlas zin shes par bya//khug rna ser ba mjug rings ni//nyi ma lnga yi bar du yang //
295a4(rgyud): de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung //ngogs las spyod cing gnas pa yin//yul mi thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing //nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin//byang phyogs gang
295a5(rgyud): ga'i 'gram gyi ni//rgyal po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur//de bzhi kha ba can gyi dbus//bgrod dgaka' khrad khrod la gnas dang //sa yi bdag po la gnas dang //khor
295a6(rgyud): yug ni rtse rje dang //byang phyogs gang ga'i 'gram dgu na//de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag/mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis//skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur//rgyu skar gang
295a7(rgyud): la sa 'gul ba//de la khug rna yang dag bstan//phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni//mi bzod 'od ni spangs pa dang //nyin zhog lnga yi bar du yang //rtag tu nyin zhag ma
295b1(rgyud): por ni//phan tshun chos ni mi mdzod dang //mi yi spyod yul mthong ba smin//mi rnams dbu ni phan tshun du//der ni mthong bar lnga 'gyur ma yin//der ni 'jig rten 'byung bar shes
295b2(rgyud): rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te 'jig/skar mda' khor yug dag tu ni//dang dge las kyis byung gyur pa//phyogs kyi mthar ni rab snang bya//gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzang yin/
295b3(rgyud): mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang //bya rog gral te mdab ma dkar//dkar ba 'am yang na kha dog nag/yAng na dkar dang nag par mthong //phyin ldog 'dab chags kha dog dang /
295b4(rgyud): phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang //phyin ci log gI byA rnams yod//gang du de ni 'jigs chen 'byung //rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyid dang //rkang mod dang ni rkang mangs dang //mdab
295b5(rgyud): chags dud 'phro srog chags rnams//phyin ni log 'gyur 'jigs tshon 'byung //khyi ni gyen du dadong bltas te//yang dang yang du zugs 'gyur ba//nyin par ram ni mtshan
295b6(rgyud): mo ru//glang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung //de sbyar rnam pa du ma dang //rnam mang gang du rab brtags pa//der ni chur mi 'bab par 'gyur//rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par
295b7(rgyud): 'jig/ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni//dag dang mi dge'i srog chags yin//de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa//dge dang mi dge'i byed pa yin//sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa//rgyu
296a1(rgyud): mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste//rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i//bgegs 'azung ba ni yod ma yin//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub
296a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes bya'i le'u rab 'byam las bco brgyad pa rdzog so///
296a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gza' dang /rgyu skar dang /skar mo dang /skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams lo bka' stsal pa/kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar gyi
296a4(rgyud): tshogs khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/sngags dang /rgyud dang /dbang bskur ba dang
296a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang /cho ga rnams dang /bzlas pa dang /nges par sdom pa dang /rig pa grub pa la 'jug pa dang /rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang /rgyu skar gyi spyod pa dang /rtsis
296a6(rgyud): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der glegs ma byed cig/bsnyen pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang
296a7(rgyud): de la srung ba gyis shig/sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig/bstan par gyis shig/thams cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig
296b1(rgyud): stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la rnam par bzhag par gyis shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog
