296b2(rgyud): po'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par
296b3(rgyud): par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal
296b4(rgyud): med khang na bzhugs pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur to//bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas nye bar lhags pa/rang rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis
296b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che//'jig rten rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir//sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar//sngags
296b6(rgyud): rnams kun pa rab 'jug phyir//rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che//sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi//gtso mchog yi ge gcig pa ni//dus nyams rtsod pa'i dus dag
296b7(rgyud): tung ra sngags rnams kun gyi rang mchog ni//sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs po yin//gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che//'byung po kun ni razlog par byed//bza' dang rgyu
297a1(rgyud): ska ma mo rnams//ma rungs sems ldan 'gogs par byed//'jig rtenu baphyogs rnams ji snyed dang //de bzhin gzhan yang gladug sems
297a2(rgyud): ldan /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang //rlo snga pa rnams ni bde bya'i phyir//bsten pa 'di la cho ga mchog/stobs chen 'khor los bsgyur ba yin//gtsug
297a3(rgyud): tor rgyal po mthu bo che//kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni//gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa//de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis gsungs//de skad gsungs nas sangs
297a4(rgyud): rgyas rnams//mi gsung bAr ni bzhugs par gyur//de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems
297a5(rgyud): can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur te/
297a6(rgyud): snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/
297a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /bcom ldan 'das/
297b1(rgyud): dang /'khor chen po 'dus pa la bkra'u sprul pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
297b2(rgyud): dgongasu gsol/yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba/de bzhin gsheblas pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas pa/bstan pa thogs pa
297b3(rgyud): med pa/dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor lo sra bsgyur ba'i cho ga yang ngas bshad par bya'o//bstan pa nub
297b4(rgyud): pa'i dus rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba de bstan pa 'di lnga srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/
297b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin tebastan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro//yi ge gcog pu 'di la bcom
297b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyuraro//kye lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad nyon cig/b+h+rUM/bcom ldan 'di ni thams
297b7(rgyud): cing mkhyen//sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas//ston pa thugs rje tshe dang ldan//sems can kun la rnam par spyod//sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan
298a1(rgyud): gtsug torar+ya las byung bstan pa yin//snying rje'i dbang la brten nas ni//'di ni yi gu ga cig tu gnas//chos kyi dbyings la brten nus ni//
298a2(rgyud): 'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas//ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni//skye bo rnams la su gdung gyur//'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcos//zang zing med pa'ang
298a3(rgyud): khyad par du//dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan//'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu//sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs//thub pa'i zla ba zag pa med//zang zing bcas dang
298a4(rgyud): zong zing med//'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin//chos kyi dbyings la bsten nas ni//thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la//'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa//sngags
298a5(rgyud): kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin//sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen//sa steng 'di la snang ba yin//sems can rnams kyi sngags grub pa//sangs rgyas
298a6(rgyud): rnams kyis gsungs pa yin//sngags 'di yongasu mdor bsdu na//rang gi cho gas 'di bzlas na//sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//rtag tu 'bras bcus byed
298a7(rgyud): par 'gyur//'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas//du su yang ni bshad par bya//dus mdzar thub mchog 'jig rten du//de bzhin gshegs po nub pa na//de yi du su
298b1(rgyud): cho ga 'grub//sngags 'grub par ni gsungs pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyi sbyor ba rnam par
298b2(rgyud): 'jig par byed pa/ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/sngags thams cad kyi bdes po//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis don du gnyer ba/gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
298b3(rgyud): cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas/yang mdor na re shig dang por bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las dpag tshad d+hA'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad 'byer
298b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro//sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang /
298b5(rgyud): gnas par mi 'gyuraro//'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyi grub pa 'phrog par byed cing gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang /
298b6(rgyud): bcom pa dang /phur bus btab pa yang thar bar byed//bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gtsid par 'dod na rtswa ku sha sngon po chang po gang blangs pa len brgya rtsa brgyad
298b7(rgyud): mngon par sngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad ni rig pa gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa de gcod par 'gyur ro//gzugs brnyan byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi phu ro pas
299a1(rgyud): snying la btab na band la bab par 'gyuraro//leb nan du btsos pa'i spyad pa la lhun bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bor na bcings par
299a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//bam phor kha sbyar gyi rlung du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha bklub pa byas n+ya rengs par 'gyuraro//mtshon chas snying dum bu gnyi su byas na gnyi su 'bras par
299a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//rke rtse la dug dang khrag gis btab pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyu ro//ka ra bi ri'i lcug mas kun tu rdebs nA gnod par 'gyu ro//gzhan gyi rig pa
299a4(rgyud): thams cad la mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo //sngor gsungs pa'i las thams cad la'i mas khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas ni zhi bar 'gyuraro//mAr gyi
299a5(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams brten pa byas par yang 'gyur ro//khu tshur bcings pas sngags thoms cad rengs par 'gyur ro//yid kyis
299a6(rgyud): nor grol bar bsam pas dgrol bar 'gyuraro//sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o//cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang
299a7(rgyud): de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o//sngags sgrub pa dang /'odi nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang ba bya ba yang /yang slar gshogasu gsol bar bya ba yi no//gang 'od
299b1(rgyud): nyid kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyuraro//glang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam ldan ma thob na 'di nyid dang lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na myur du 'grub bam lan thob
299b2(rgyud): cing del te mo grub bam lan ma byin na de ring po mi thobs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro//sngags blang la dmigs te/zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis til la btags
299b3(rgyud): te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di dbang du 'gyur zhing gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba'i ngan thob par 'gyur ro//lha dpung du bya bar 'dod
299b4(rgyud): na thung shing gi ya mo shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro//klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyis sbyin bsreg bya'o//dri ba dang dri
299b5(rgyud): za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shong mya ngan med pa dang /pri yang ku'i yam shing ngam/me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro//gnod sbyin mo dang /klu mo'i
299b6(rgyud): gdon rnams la ni skye ces bya'o//rgyal po rnams la ni yungs kar gyis bo'o//bram ze rnams la ni me tog gyis ston bskyeg bya'o//rje'u rigasA la nI zho dang /'o ma dang
299b7(rgyud): mar gyis bya'o//rmongs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyis bya'o//bud med la ni lan tshwa'i sbyin bsreg bya'o//gdol pa la ni men srin gre'u de dza bu li ka'i sbyin bsreg bya'o//
300a1(rgyud): bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni 'brus yas kyis sbyin bsreg bya'o//sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbyung du byed//
300a2(rgyud): thams cad du yang dus gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs ni sla rgyal po'i mchog cang mi gsung bar gyur to//thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni//de tshe
300a3(rgyud): lha yi tshogs la gsungs//'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang //de tshe de ni chags bral blos//de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni//sangs rgyas sras po thu bo lha//byang
300a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//'jam dpal la ni dri tshe gsungs//lha yi lha ni blo ldan pa//mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag po yi//cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas//gang
300a5(rgyud): gri bskal pa'i tshad du yang //rgyalnga bas kyang ni bshad mi nus//mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir//cho ga yis ni phyogs gcig tsam//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa
300a6(rgyud): yin//de tshe de skad gsungs nas ni//dpral ldan 'jam dbyangs rdzu 'phrul che//gtsang mo'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i//sangs rgyas de la bskur bar byed//
300a7(rgyud): gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che//rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//dus mthar 'jigs pa'i dusu ni//mi rnams bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir/
300b1(rgyud): mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste//gzi brjed chen po 'di yi ni//rus ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur//myur du ras ris 'grub pa gsungs//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa
300b2(rgyud): ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las yi ge gcig pa 'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byam las bcu
300b3(rgyud): dgu pa rdzog so////de nas bcom ldan 'daso shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
300b4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal nyon cig/mdor na yi ge gcig pa 'khor los bsgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to//de ni dus
300b5(rgyud): kyi tha ma'i du su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing shes rab chung ba dang /yid gzhungs pa dman pa'i phyir ras ris kyi tshod rgya che ba'i sbyor ba sgrub pa nyams
300b6(rgyud): par 'gyur bas sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste/sgrub pa mchog byed
300b7(rgyud): par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa/kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'drir gzhug par bya ste/chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor
301a1(rgyud): danaskyo cu sa /'a rten mas das kyi skyes spyod pa d+ma dag sa rnams mchog du na/shegs da rgyan
301a2(rgyud): ng+tha duN+Dal ba'i mcho chos rgyud pa kun nas T+TA 'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o// ni tshangs pa dang /gas pa phyugan rdo /
301a3(rgyud): phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis/'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ga ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o//de nas la su bya ba ni da
301a4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bAcu gnyis pa'i 'khor mo byas te/tshe 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
301a5(rgyud): sngar dus ba sgrim du oM ga zu dud pas gdug rnying 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o//ba ma zla bA nya ba la mchod pargya chen po byis nus log pas bzung ste/ji skye
301a6(rgyud): tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de btsud na rig bya 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur//gang gis mthong ba de dang lhun cig na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyu ma
301a7(rgyud): de nas gdugs sgrub par 'dod na gdugs khe dag sna tshogs pa sar pa byas la/gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa/ka shi ki gos 'phyang ba de nyid kyi tshogs med
301b1(rgyud): sa brdung ba byas te/bzlas pa byas na rig pa rang nyid nye bar bzhugs par 'gyuraro//'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i drad pas bdugs
301b2(rgyud): te/'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas la tha mar zla ba nye ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o//de thogs
301b3(rgyud): na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro//zla ba re re zhing zla bo nya ba dang /cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro//'di grub pa tsam gyis chos
301b4(rgyud): thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dgyes pa dang /
301b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjesu bsngags pa 'grub par 'gyuraro//'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi 'khor los bsgyur ba stong gi g.yog 'khor
301b6(rgyud): drang ldan par 'gyuraro//de nas gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba sgrub par 'dod na gser dang /dngul dang zangs ma dang /nor bu'i rang bzhin gyi dbyig pa khru gang tsam byas la/
301b7(rgyud): ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas nas de blangs na na mkha' la 'gro ste/thams cad la chos ston par 'gyuraro//bskal pa chen po ro 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//ci ste dum
302a1(rgyud): pa bzang po sgrub par 'dod na gser gyi bum pa bzang po byas la 'bru thams cad dang /rin po che dang /sman gyis yongasu bkang la ras dkar
302a2(rgyud): pos bcings te/de la sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur//de la lhag pa rab tu bcug na ci
302a3(rgyud): 'dod pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyuraro//ci ste nor bu rin po tsha sgrub por 'dod na gser gyi dbyig pa 'am/nor bu bzang po dang /shel gyi nor bu byas te/gos
302a4(rgyud): 'phyang bar byas la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs na gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/lha dang mi'i nang du thogs pa med cing stobs dang pha rol gnon
302a5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//ci ste bcom ldan 'das la bzlas pa bye ba byas na rang gi lus kyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro//lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar
302a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro//gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po lnga sogs pa de yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na las rnams
302a7(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro//de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog pa'i tshogs ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi
302b1(rgyud): thogs par 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor las bskur ba'i rgyal po la 'dum phrag bcu bzlas na thams cad la 'grub par 'gyur ba rig
302b2(rgyud): pa dang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur//TI ste rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na tsan dan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'am/yang na lcags bzang po
302b3(rgyud): la byas te/ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i bcwo lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing ma rA gyi mAr me brgya spar la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/sangs
302b4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dul nas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram/gzi brjid phung po 'am/gtsug ter gdugs dkar po'i
302b5(rgyud): sngags 'dis srung ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la yang srung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pa la nye
302b6(rgyud): bar 'dug ste/sems rtse gcig pas ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o//skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin thams cad 'dus
302b7(rgyud): te/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad 'ong bar 'gyuraro//de dag reg pa 'dzin pa'i bstong pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar 'gyuraro//rig pa 'dzin po'i 'khor los bskye
303a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur//lus phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag nan dang 'dra bar mgyogs pac+doM mtshan nyid du 'gyur//skad cig gis 'og myin gyi skya'i kun du
303a2(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyuraro//bskal parar+ya gnas par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos tan bIr 'gyur//shi nas gang du 'dod par der skye ba
303a3(rgyud): 'gyuro//gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du yang skye bar 'gyur//tsaM skye ral gri sgrub par 'dod na skyon med pa'i ral gyi blangs nas nyin zhag gcig bsgreng bar bya m+b+ha/

303a5(rgyud): rnacha gdu'i skor dang 'dra bar 'khyi la ba dat+taM/lo bcu drug pa'i tshe byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang bar rgyu

303b2(rgyud): rnam gsum thob pa de ji srid du bzlas pa byas te/dro ba dang /du ba 'thul ba dang /'bar pos sngar gang po sems pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te/dro bar gyur pas dpral bar
303b3(rgyud): thig le byas na lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /'byung po thams cad dang /sha za la sogs pa dang /dzaM m+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can bran du 'gyur zhing gang
303b4(rgyud): cung zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyuraro//lo skyong gi bAr du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/gal te 'dod
303b5(rgyud): na lha rnams kyis kyang myi mthong bar 'gyuraro//skad cig thang cig yud tsam la snang zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing lo sum stong
303b6(rgyud): gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/g.yog 'khor dang bcis pA na mapa' la 'gro bar 'gyu ro//reg pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/
303b7(rgyud): lha gzhon nu'i lusu 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thub par 'gyur na rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur/

304b2(rgyud): steng ldeng gi phur pa bzhis btab la/byang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gau tor cing mchod na de'i lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po che snang bar 'gyur te/de blangs na rig pa

305b7(rgyud): ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur//dbang phyug chen pa'i rig pa thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang /mchog gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur te/

308a7(rgyud): 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o//des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs dang /mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por

308b2(rgyud): ba byas la/ral gri lag pa brayas pas bzung ste/ji srid 'od 'phro ba dang /'byur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na gal to 'od 'phro na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig
308b3(rgyud): bur 'gyuraro//'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /stobs dang /pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa dang /gang gis mthong ba dang /da

308b5(rgyud): gsum pa tsan don dmar pos byugs la/cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing tshes nas nyi ma re re

312a1(rgyud): 'ongs nas mchog dang /rgyal srod kyang sbyin par byed//ce ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'bum phrag gsum dor nas kun la dbang ba'i rgyal

312b1(rgyud): /rgyam 'ongagasungs su rlub b+h+yas bstan te bzhug la chu shung mo d+ha smyan nas mtshas dmigs nas k+Sha shing gi mr-i tAka gis skyon srog 'bum b+hAs n+nan+d+ha mAtsho'i rlung/

315a5(rgyud): gyis kyang nges par che dang ye shes dadag tu med pa rnam par ngos pa'i dbang po'i rgyal pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bya 'di la deng por dag gis kyang
315a6(rgyud): byas te/bcom ldan 'das rgyud du ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dpyong po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bya
315a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas de la phye ba 'tsha'o//de bzhin du de nas 'od dag ming dang /rin cheni tog la phyag bya'o//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas nas ci 'dzi
315b1(rgyud): snrugs gazlas pa b+hasan+na mAr du 'grub pa stsal ba la d+ho/gang gi sbyor non/de bzhon pashegs pa gangam momatshan yang su bsgrugs pa dang /phyug 'tshal da /
315b2(rgyud): nI bsad rnams chen po 'dril ci'i phyir dang /de bzhin ga shogs pa thams cad la yang phyig tshol byas na nges pa bya chub la ni zhal ba dang /dge ba'i chags 'a

315b4(rgyud): pa'i dbang ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsangs te/de bzhin gshegs
315b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po dang sngags dang /rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal
315b6(rgyud): po mchog tu gtsang ba dang /gtsang ba dam pa dang /'jig rter rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyang bar bya'o//slob ma ma yin pa dang /chos dang mi ldan pa dang /
315b7(rgyud): bzhin du ston pa dang /bstan pa la ma dad pa dang /gzhan gyis pham pa dang /ma rungs pa dang /de rgyal can dang /ston pa dang /bstan pa la nyes pa tshol ba la ni nam
316a1(rgyud): ya ba sgyur bar ts+tshad+d+ha//rgyum+b+ha 'i sras la ra tu myo dang / swA dang /rasangs rgyas rnams pa yang mchod pa dang /
316a2(rgyud): rje su bzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi byan//de la ni sngags 'grub pa ma snang ste/dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang /sangs rgyas bstan la ru cu dang //

316a7(rgyud): gcig por rtag par gnas//ther zug tu yang 'di ba 'jug/'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te//'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas yin//chos kyi tshul /
316b1(rgyud): yang dag gnas//'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin//sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub//rgyal po ma rungs bzlog byed yin//las ni sna tshogs byung ba yin//las kun ma
316b2(rgyud): sus sgrub pa'o//lAs ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams//nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur//cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni//phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster//'jam dpal

316b5(rgyud): bya mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni//myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur//tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas//rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin//der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te/

316b7(rgyud): des 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang //rdzu 'phrul che 'di de bzhin gshegs//des ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin//sangs rgyas sras po bro dang ldan//sras
317a1(rgyud): kyi grots+tsha b+h+r-i dam+bu p+tA nI//rdzu 'phrul tshe zhi au/sgyu myu tshe//de nas smras pa de nyid kyis//'di ni kAn+d+ha tu bzang la sbyor//de nas sangs rgyas sras

320b7(rgyud): nyin par ram mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o//ci ste mi 'dod na thal ba la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyog su bslus na zhog bdun

321a2(rgyud): zla ba gzas zin cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzin pa no shing a ra ka'i me rab tu ster la/ras ris med kyang shar du mngon par bltas te mar gyi sregs blugs
321a3(rgyud): stong phrag bcus sbyin bsreg bya'o//rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye ba chu bos bar ma bcad pa/lha'i gnas sum byas pa phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin

321a5(rgyud): 'am/srams g.yeng ba thob par 'gyur na phyir yang bzlog par bya ste/'o ma'i sregs blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na/gang de'i dus de nas brtsams

321b3(rgyud): brgyad byas na tho rang yul gyi bdag po'i rgyal po spyan drangs par 'gyur ro//de dang lhan cig gros byas na bsam pa bden pa nye bar ston par 'gyur te/de la bstan dag byas

321b6(rgyud): dang 'dra ba'i grong da mi/yang na gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la yang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te/gal te dgra yod na yang las rnams byas te zla ba gzas zin pa na
321b7(rgyud): shing a pa margas ma rab tu sbar la/shing pa lo shA'i yam shing le zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyis btags pas bremi ze'i sgo la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad

322b1(rgyud): gzugs dang /ras ris sam/dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam/sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gosra gtsang ma bgos shing nyin zhag gcig bskung ba byas te/

322b5(rgyud): dang /rje'u rigs la ni steng ldeng gi yama? shed dang /dmangs rigs la ni a pa marga'i yam shring ngam/de las gzhan ji snyed pas mar gyi sbyin bsreg bya'o//de bzhin

322b7(rgyud): kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o//gang gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogasu gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yo ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings

323a3(rgyud): 'amadze 'di dag dang /gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur//glos la mngon par bsngags te bgos na skal pa bzung por 'gyur//mig
323a4(rgyud): ma mngoni pa sngags te mo la bsgras ni skye ba thams cad dge' bar 'i/mig dang gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa zlas la khros pa'i gdungs bltas

323a7(rgyud): bzlas pa byas la chu dron mos khrus byas na bde leg su gnas par 'gyur te/las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin//sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad dang /
323b1(rgyud): mgon med par gyur pa dang /sgren pa dang /bstan pa 'di'i brtul zhugs can dang /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o//bud med la yang las
323b2(rgyud): mi bya'o//de bzhin du byis pa dang /rgan po dang /nad pa dang /dbul po dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /sems can phra mo dang /skyes nas ngan+da par skyes pa 'di dag la yang mi
323b3(rgyud): bya ste/las 'di dag ni sems can chen po dag la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//dpa' zhing brkam chags bab chol med//phyogs chen nor ni che ba dang //mngon pa'i nga rgyal
323b4(rgyud): rab gtum la//las ni 'di 'dra bya ba yin//bstan la zho sdang khro ba dang //gzhan gyi nor ni 'phrog byed dang //sngags rnams kun dang sman rnams dang //rnal 'byor
323b5(rgyud): ldan la ma dad dang //spyis brtsa mo gdug pa'i sems ldan dang //'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste//'di dag la ni las sbyar bya//chos dang ldan la rnam par spongs//
323b6(rgyud): las rnams gzhan yang 'di skad brjod//blo yis de ni yongasu spangs//de nyid khros pas thol ba ni//bzlas pas phyogasu gtor byas na//de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang ///
323b7(rgyud): rgyal po dag kyang rnam 'jig 'gyur//nges par skye bo de dag kyang //yun ring nad kyis thebs par 'gyur//de dag phyogasu 'chi ba mang //'gro ba'i nad kyang rab tu snang //shin
324a1(rgyud): tu nyon mongs cher gyur kyang //las rnams 'di dag bya min to//der ni skye bo'i bdag po kun//zhag bdun gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur//
324a2(rgyud): las rnams brtsams nas sngon du ni//bdun phrag gnyis la yang dag 'dul//bdun pa dang pos sems rnams ga yang //zhag bdun gnyis pas nad kyis 'debs//
324a3(rgyud): bdun pa gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur//de bas de ni yongasu spangs//dang po 'di dag rnam par 'byed//gnyis par phyogasu rnam par 'khyam//zhag bdun gsum pa
324a4(rgyud): rnam par 'jog/de bas las ni bya ba min//sems can gdul bya'i don nyid la//'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yon//sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis//
324a5(rgyud): gdug pa'i las 'di gsung mi 'gyur//srog la gnod par byed pa'i las//sangs rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin//grub pa mchog ni rab 'dod pa'i//zlos pas
324a6(rgyud): de dag bya ba min//dmyal ba dag tu skye ba'i las//'di dag nyid la rab tu snang //dkar nag 'bras bur 'byung byed pa//'di dag kho n+da bstan pa yin//las rnams
324a7(rgyud): sna tshogs bdag nyid tshe//ngaganyi so mchog gis ji bzhin gzigs//rtag tu dkar las dkar ba 'byung //nag las nag pa rab tu sbyin//'dres las 'dres pa'i
324b1(rgyud): las rnams ni//'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin//de bzhin las 'di sna tshogasu//de nyid sangs rgyas gzigs pa yin//thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o//de las zlos pa
324b2(rgyud): spang bya ba//nAg dang 'dres pa'i las nyid//dge byed dkar po bsten pa bya//dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byung //srog gcod pas ni zlas pa dag/yang dang yang du dmyal bar
324b3(rgyud): 'gro/de bzhin de las log pa'i chos//'tshe mod las ni dam pa yin//dge ba'i blos ni sngags rnams dang //de bzhin mtho ris thar grub pa//legs byas las kyis
324b4(rgyud): thob pa yin//'gal ba'i las kyis 'gal bar gsungs//ji ltar chos dang chos min gsungs//thams cad mkhyen nyid spyod pa yin//zlos pa grub pa 'dod pa yin//
324b5(rgyud): dge ba'i las ni brtsams par bya//zlos pa dge la gnas pa la//de yi sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur//dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la//de yi thar pa mi ldog
324b6(rgyud): 'gyur//sngags kyis dge ba 'grub 'gyur zhes//de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs//las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni//sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin//
324b7(rgyud): ci 'dod la na stong phrag brgyad//phra mo'i las ni byed pa na/sgrub pa po ni mi 'grub ste//grub pa mchog ni mi 'tho'o//'bad pas bzlas dang sbyin bsreg bya//grub pa

329b6(rgyud): ni snga ma'i me togr-i gis sbyin sreg byas na byed par 'gyur te/me tog ci 'dru ba'i kha tog gis tshul nyi ma shwa ra ba'i dusu sbyir skyeg byas na da dang /kha drog 'dra ba'i gos thob

330a7(rgyud): gsum du rkyen sreg bya'o//rje'u rigs dbang du byed par 'dod na nas chan khyer gang bur ma dang ldan pas/zhag bdun la dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas ni dbang du

330b2(rgyud): nga gcog pa dag tu gtor ma btang na na do pa de de los rnam par grol bar 'gyur//gdong la bltas te bzlas pa byos na nod drang bral bar 'gyur//'argyaHbzlas
330b3(rgyud): nas gtsug bud bcings na nad thams cad las yongasu gri lo//nad rnams cad las ni skud pa la mdud pa byi zhing gtsug phud bcing ba byas te bzlas pa byos na nad thams cad
330b4(rgyud): las grol bar 'gyuraro//nad kyis btab pa la ni bzlas pa tsa pra gyis yongasu thar bar 'gyur//mabu la pa'i nad la ni grog mkhar gyi so lnga bzlas pa byas te 'de gus byug pa

330b7(rgyud): du'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/g.yas ngosu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/g.yon ngosu kun tu bzang po/'phags pa 'jam dpal las

331b4(rgyud): bzlas te zhabs kyi drung du bzhag na rtag tu bde bar gyur//shing A shwad tha'i yam shing gis me rab tu ster la sha ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar
331b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyuraro//gi wa dril sngags mngon par bris te spyi bol bcings nas g.yul du 'jug na mtshon gyis reg par mi 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhan

339a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//sman de skyugs na ni snang bar 'gyur ro//l-i shi dri zhim po khar bcug la bzlas pa 'bum byas na gang dang smra ba de dbang du 'gyuraro//'o ma dang nas chan khyor gang
339a5(rgyud): za zhing bzlas pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis byas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//slongs mo'i zas kyis 'tsho la shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub byed cing /bzlas pa

339b1(rgyud): gu gul gyi ril bu rgyu shug gi tshig pu'i tshod tsam mAr gyis btags pas brgya phrag stong gri sbyin srog byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyuraro//til la zho dang mar gyis btags pas spyan/

340a4(rgyud): de yang mdor na byang phyug su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur te/rgyu dang rgya ni che nyid la//'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab grub

343a1(rgyud): dkar po//rgyal blas mang blo gsungs pa ni//de la sogs pa'i gtsug tor ni//de yi tshe ni 'grub par 'gyur//rang gi 'khor lho su bsgyur ba ni//

345b1(rgyud): lhun du'i sgyung ba dang //de las dman pa na ba'i rtags//chog nyid n-i shin tu sbyar//de nas sa la gnas pa dang //gzhal med dang gnas lha rnams kyi//rgyob ni kA shA
345b2(rgyud): grong khyer ma chungaste//me ge d+hA yi gnod sbyin tshig/de bzhin spang ga'i yus g+hi tshig+sa/lha'i d+he n+da b+h+yo rab tu bstun//gzi brjid chen po na mkha' lding //de dag shar phyogs tshig tu

345b5(rgyud): yul tshig mA bA d+hi//gang yang hA shi li'i tshig/mi gasngal mi dong nyid dang nI//yi ge Da la shin tu rten//la yi yi ge mang ba'i tshig/sha za'i tshig tu brjod pa yin//las
345b6(rgyud): tshon zhes bya'i gling dang ni//rA li ker 'byung ba'i gnas//gling ni rtsub par byed nyid dang //brjer du stobs ldan bu gnas kyang //sems can dag byed gnus pa dag/de bzhin
345b7(rgyud): 'di dge slong las byung //yi ge la mang tshig dag dang //tshi ga ni gsal ba'i rnam pa med//mi gsol bsre ba mad nyid dang //khro bcas yi dge skye gnas tshig/lho phyogs pa
346a1(rgyud): yi tshig drug dang //a dra ka ra na dra bin//sems can ko las 'brog gnas dang //sing ga la yi gling drug ra//yi ge ga dang rang bcas pa//de
346a2(rgyud): na srin po'i tshig tu shes//de dag gling la gnas pa de'i//mes ni gang zhig brjod pa yang //ma mo rnams ni gzi brjed che//de yi tshig 'dir gsungs pa yin//tshig ni
346a3(rgyud): nub phyogs phyogs mtshams dang //ma la bA yi tshig dag dang //be'u nya dang rgya mtsho'i tshig/shu ra sa yi rnam brtags dang //rgya mtsho bcu 'dus chu bo 'dus//dpal mgrin/
346a4(rgyud): dang kau dza ri//'di dag tshig ldan 'jug pa ni//nyi ma la sogs gza' mchog gdon//dr-i lan gzhan don gci ba no//yul ni ba r-i ya tra'i tshog/yul ni ar pu ta sa h+ya//
346a5(rgyud): ri ni ma la yar gnas dang //lung pa'i yul du yang dag skyes//tshig ni ci 'dra yod pa yi//de 'dra'i tshig tu smra ba ni//grul bum skye gnas 'dzin pa yin//yi go sha Sha
346a6(rgyud): sa dang ni//ra lA bA las yang dag 'byung //yi ge g+ha dang ldan pa'i tshig/lha ma yin du nges par bstan//kha che'i yul las 'byung ba dang //skye ba'i gnas ni ka bi sha
346a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin rgyal po'i rigs las byung //phyag na rdo rje'i rigasu bstan//de dag lnga yi gtso bo ni//kun gyi tshig tu 'dod pa yin//de bzhin dbus kyi phyogs gnas dag
346b1(rgyud): pad+mo'i rigs kyi skye gnas rten//tshig dang 'gros dang mtshan ma dang //pad+ma'i rigasu snang ba yon+da//rgyal ba'i sras kyis rnam brtabs pa//snga ma nyid du bstan pa yin//'dod
346b2(rgyud): chags bral ba'i mtshan ma gang //rgyal ba'i mtshan mar rab tu 'byung //yul phyogs gang gi tshigs smra ba//dor gnas 'gros dang spyod pa yin//ngor bstan sems can nyid dang
346b3(rgyud): ni/'gros dang mtshan ma'ang kun tu bstan//kha ba can gyi nang gnas pa//dri za drang sreng skye bo'i tshig/gang bla'i ngogs kyi byang phyogs pa//gnod sbyin tshig tu rab tu snang //
346b4(rgyud): ri ni 'bigs byed la gnas pa//gang gA'i 'gram gyi lho phyogs dang //dpal gyi ri bor skyes gyur dang //gang yang skye bo rnams dag ni//srin po skar ma yi dgas dang //mi mo
346b5(rgyud): cha lugs dran pa dang //mi bzang gzugs can bgegs tshon po//bladon ni shin tu ma rungs pa//brkam shing gzhon gyi srog 'phrog byed//de yi tshig ni yang dag 'byung //gang
346b6(rgyud): dag yul ni de dag rtags//de dag yul gyi 'gros dang spyod//de dag tshig tu smra ba rno//ma rungs gdon 'jug rnam sbyong yin//'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni//gang gi spyod
346b7(rgyud): 'gros spyod pa dang //rnam pa sna tshogs tshul dang ni//rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid dang //rnam pa sna tshogs sems can gtso//rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas 'dod//de
347a1(rgyud): sbyar gdan 'jug mtshan ma ni//mAtshan nyid 'gros dang spyod pa yin//mi rnams kyi nI bde skyed pa//sems can du yang bya ba ste//ga non nu sa
347a2(rgyud): tshogs yang dag 'byung //bskyang ba'i don du rab skyer gyi/yi ge drug pas bya ban+ti/phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o//sngags nyid kho na bzlas byas no//srung ba chen po
347a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i chog byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mad las gdon 'jug pa'i spyod
347a4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las nyi shurtsalnga pa rdzogaso///de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal mdo
347a5(rgyud): la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags rnams rgyud thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa rig pa thams
347a6(rgyud): cadul 'os pa/dus dpag tu meng pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i 'bras bu byung ba yang rjes 'brel ba'i mtshan ma'i tshad me/de grub par bya ba'i rgyud bshad pa ni
347a7(rgyud): ste/skye ba gzhan gyis 'brub pa nyid//dus kyi rgyu ni 'grub pa med//de mi tshad dang sbyor dzim//sngon byung rgyu las byung ba yin//rtse gcig bangan gor byed pas 'brun/
347b1(rgyud): grub pa rig pa rnams dpyod pa'o//rigs pa gzha nu khyod bston na//lus can kun la rab tu snangad//mthar gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni//rigs pa zhes ni bya ba ni//dpa' ngan
347b2(rgyud): rigs ldan de sbyor bas//grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur//grub med bsgrub bya'i las rnams med//las rnams med par 'grub pa'ang med//las dang byed par yang dag ldan///
347b3(rgyud): yang dag ldan pas grub pa 'thob//cho ga ldan pa'i rgyu yis ni//gnas pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur//sngags pa sngags ni mi sgrogs na//sngags min pa yang sngags par
347b4(rgyud): 'gyur//thub pa'i las ni yang dag spyod//grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur//rigs kyi sa bon la brten na//blo yi mchog la gnas par 'gyur//gnas mchog dam par
347b5(rgyud): nges sdom na//dang po bgrod pa thob par 'gyur//blo dong bsam pa legs gnas la//nad med go 'phang thob par 'gyur//gang gis dus dang mtshan mA las//dus min grub
347b6(rgyud): par 'dod pa ni//mdor na brgya byin yin na yang //de yi sngogs rnams mi 'grub//'byung po skye bo mi phan dang //dus min par yang tsam pa yang //bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa
347b7(rgyud): yang /dzad la grub pa mi snang //snyom dang sred dang yang dag ldan//dregs dang nga rgyal ldan pa dang //lhod dang yun ring 'thab la dga'//grong gi skye bo la rtag dga'//le lo
348a1(rgyud): na rgyun sto ba la//'dul rtsub pa la //snang m+b+ha sa m+b+ha dang //rlud ya ba N+ya m+b+ha mU Ta//sngags rnams da nga thos /
348a2(rgyud): kyang /cho ga spangs na nus med yin//de bzhin cho ga'i las nyams na//sems ni rnam par rmongs par byed//de bas sngags ni rna mi bye//tshig med par rigs pa min//
348a3(rgyud): byis pa rnams kyi mthong ba rmongs//dri lta bus ni skyed par 'gyur//de byas byis pa rmongs pa yang //shin tu dka' ba'i 'gro bar lhung //de nas de dag sngags spyod pa//
348a4(rgyud): de las de dag drang ba yang //mthar gyis de dag grub pa ni//dge ba 'gro ba rab tu thob//de las zlos pa'i sngags pas ni//mi g.yo zhi ba'i gnasu 'jog/de bzhin
348a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sngags bzlas pa//de ltar sngags rnams don yod//sems can mig zur gyis bltas pa'ang //rje su gzung ba nyid du 'gyur//de dag dge ba'i bshes
348a6(rgyud): gnyen te//'di dag sems can mnyes gshin pa'o//'di dag grub byar bstan pa ste//thag gsum mnyam pa nyid zhi ba//dra bas rnam kun rab 'bad nas//mnyam par
348a7(rgyud): gzhag cing sngags zlos bya//sngags zlos rab tu sbyor byed pa//sngags ni cho ga med par sbyor//yun ring du su 'khor ba na//nam zhib cig na grub par 'dod//shin tu yun
348b1(rgyud): rong dus so nas//sngags rnams thub par snang ba'o//tsho ga ldan pa'i sngags pas na//myur du grub pa rab tu 'thob//'bras bu grub par mthong ba ste//'bras mod sngags na/
348b2(rgyud): gsung ba min//gsang sngags 'bras bu ldan pa ni//tshe 'di nyid la grub par gsungs//grub med 'bras bu las ma yin//las med pA yA 'bras mi 'dod//'bras bu las
348b3(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan//'bras bcus lus bsten pa yin//de bas skye drang rga spangs pa//de ltar yung drag 'byung 'gyur ba//'jig rten zhi bar gsungs pa skye//zhi ba srid las rnam
348b4(rgyud): grol yin//bdag nyid chen po de 'gror rtogs//sangs rgyas chos ni rje su rten//'jig rten phyin ci log du su//de la'ang grub par rab tu snang //tshe 'di nyid lnga'ang grub 'gyur
348b5(rgyud): te/tshe rabs gzhan du'ang 'byung bar 'gyur//zhi ba'i lam ni 'dus ma byas//mthar thug zhi ba'i bar du 'gyur//gang du 'jig rten rnam bstan pa//zhi ba'i gnas ni dri med
348b6(rgyud): bzang //sangs rgyas nyid ni legs bstan pa//rgyal bas kun tu bstun pa yin//de la mthar ni de dag phyin//sngags grub par ni gsungs pa yin//rang rig so so
348b7(rgyud): rgyal ba yis//sngags 'di bstan pa ma yin te//thub pa rdzu 'phrul chen po yis//'jig rten dag la sngags bstan to//tshe 'dar lus can rnams la ni//mngon sum
349a1(rgyud): du ni grub pa bstar//de nyid stong pa rig pa yis//sngabs ni sangs rgyas tid du ston//rtsod dus tha ma dus dag tu//zhi ba'i de nyid khyad par du//
349a2(rgyud): sngags 'grub par ni me 'gro zhing //myur ba'i las lnga'ang 'grub pa med//de yi dusu sbyor ba ni//cho ga mthong ba'i las dag gis//sngags rgyud shes pa slu po zhes/
349a3(rgyud): bstan pa 'di la thub pas gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa ni//grub mchog myur du grub par 'dod//de bzhin par ma'i dus dag tu//bar ma'i grub pa
349a4(rgyud): bar bstan//tha ma'i dus la brten nas ni//pha ma'i grub par gsungs pa yin//bzang po yi nAM dus dag la//de bzhin na mkhar 'gro ba dang //sngags rnams kun ni
349a5(rgyud): rab grub pa raM//'jig rten 'drin pas bstan pa yin//de dus rgyal ba'i dbang po ni//rigs kyi mchog ste rab tu 'grub/pad+ma'i rigs ni bar mar 'grub//dus kyi mthar
349a6(rgyud): la rdo rje'i rigs//khwa cig smon lam dbang gis ni//thams cad du ni sngags rnams 'grub//stan ras+tha gzigs dang 'jam dpal dang //sgrol ma khro gnyer gnod sbyin
349a7(rgyud): rgyal rin chen rigs spyod gnod sbyin ni//dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur//lha rnams kun gyi sngags gzhan ni//gang yang chags can gyis rab sbyar//rtsod
349b1(rgyud): bya'i dusu 'grub 'gyur zhing //'jig rten pa yi bstan pa'ang 'grub//lha dang mi dang lha min gyi//dbang po gnod sbyin srin po dang //drang srong nA mkha' lding dang ni//sha zla 'byung
349b2(rgyud): po gza'i tshogs dang //mi dang mi ma yin pa dang //'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi//bsod nams ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che//ma rungs las ni mi zad ldan//brgya byin tshangs pa
349b3(rgyud): drag po dang //dbang ldan de bzhin gzhan dag kyang //khyab 'jug 'byung po thams cad dang //rdzu 'phrul chen pos bsngags bstan pa//de dag dus kyi tha ma la//bzlas pas 'grub
349b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba yin//de dus 'jigs pa chen po la//sdang ba'i lus ni de bzhin 'grub//'byung po dbang dang dgug bya ba//sa steng sha za'i las dag 'grug/don med grub par snang
349b5(rgyud): ba ste//'jig rten pha rol dag tu spyod//de na rgyal ba'i dbang po yis//de dus 'jigs pa chen po la//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag bstan//kun la rjes gzung gtsor byis
349b6(rgyud): nas/bzlos pa la ni sngags gzugs kyi//zlos pa bstan pa la dad cing //dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed la//de tshe sems can sngags gzugs kyis//gdul bar byed par
349b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpe'i sde snod bal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las tshig nges par sdom pa'i dus kyi le'u
350a1(rgyud): rang 'byam las ny+tsi shurtsa drug pa rdzogs//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAk+Sha thub byas bzhan sna mas nA dang ldan
350a2(rgyud): pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal me dro/nga la gzigs nas 'jamA dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal ba/'dzem dpal khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings
350a3(rgyud): mdzod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po//chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rjesu spyod pa/mdo chen po'i mchog/rin po che'i le'u de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i
350a4(rgyud): rjesu gnang ba/sngags kyi mchog sgrub pa la rgyu mtshon shes pa dang /rtags dang /dus gzhan shes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnams nges par bstan cing yang dag par
350a5(rgyud): bstan+do//'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang /sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i ming gi sgrar 'gyur ba ni sgra las byung ba'i ming du shes pa dang /sgra las byung
350a6(rgyud): ba ma yin par bstan pa dang /de bzhin du 'dren ma dang ldan pa'i sngags rnams ni rnam pa gsum du bya ba yin te/sku bzang yang dag ldan pa dang //rtag tu don dang
350a7(rgyud): 'brel//zung chag tshig dang rtag tu bral//legs par sbyar don gyis brgyan pa//phyi rol grub mtha' yod ma yin//'phags pa'i sdigasu rab tu sgrags//rtag tu
350b1(rgyud): don pa ste//rnam pa gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur//ring dang thung dang de bzhin du//bar ma'i yi ges brgyan pa 'dra yin//sngags kyi lha mer gyur pa ni//dbyangs yig sngob sbyor gyis/
350b2(rgyud): brgyan pa//ngag ni legs sbyar logs sbyar min//ci ste don dang don med min//don ldan tshig dang don med tshig/sngags dron rnam par gsungs pa yin//rnam rtog mang po'i
350b3(rgyud): tshig dag ni//'jig rten pa rnams kun gyi sngags//gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dag/sdeb sbyor dbyangs yig bzang po bzhi//gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug/de bzhin bdun
350b4(rgyud): pa brgyad pa yin//dgu pa bcu pa de bzhin du//yi ge dag ni grub par 'dod//yi ge bcu dang yang dag ldan//yi ge rnams kyi gnas pa mnyan//ji srid 'di dag bcu 'gyur ni//
350b5(rgyud): sa steng 'di la yi ge mthong //yi ge drug dang ny+dzi shu dang //yi ge gcig gi bar du 'gyur//'di tsam tshad kyi yi ge ni//sngags kyi tshig ni rtag tu sbyar//rkang pa bzhi dang yang dag
350b6(rgyud): ldan//sngags ni don kun sgrub pa'o//mchog ni rab mchog don ldan pa//sngags ni gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs//de sras rgyal ba'i sras dgra gis//gsungs pa dag ni bar
350b7(rgyud): ma yin//'jig rten kun gyi bstan pa yi//sngags ni tha mar gyur pa yin//bden bral gyis bstan ngan pa'ang yin//bco brgyad bdun nam nyi shu 'am//brgya dang lnga bcu dag
351a1(rgyud): grI bar//'di tsam chod kyi sngags rnams ni//rgyal ba 'phags pas bsgyangs pa yin//gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dang //lbu brgyu'i yi de'i
351a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur pa//de tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni//byang chub sems dpas rab tu gsungs//de nang tshig ni dgod pa dang //sngags dang ldan par brjod pa yin//sdeb sbyor
351a3(rgyud): ldan zhing dbyangs yig ldan//skad byings don gyi rnam par brgyan//tshig dang legs par rab ldan dang //rgyud dang rigs par ldan pa dang //sgra dang dbyangs yig rnam bral
351a4(rgyud): nam zhig na ni grub par 'gyur//legs par rab ldan sgra rnams kyang //spyi bo drod gA nas nan dang ni//so mchu lkog ma'i sgra dag ni//sbyar ba bzhin du rim gyis 'byung
351a5(rgyud): mi gsal brjod pas ldog gyur pa//legs par rab ldan brjod pa yin//yongs rdzogasra tshig dang sgra dag dang //yang dag ldan pas grub par 'gyur//sgrub pa nyams dang
351a6(rgyud): bya ba nyams//sgra dang den dang rnam bral na//myur du sngags rnams mi 'grub ste//yun rings du su 'dor ba yin//de la grub pa yod med min//log par yang ni de mi
351a7(rgyud): byed pa skye ba gzhan du'ang snang ba ste//sngags grub mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur//yun rengs dusu bzlas pa yis//de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni//sngags rig skye bo'i snga/
351b1(rgyud): de ni/don med las ni byed ma yin//sngags rnams kun gyi tha ma ni//mi ma yin pa'i 'jibye rten pa//'byung po kun ni ser snar bcas//gang yin des ni sngags bstan pa'o//yaM
351b2(rgyud): ge gang dang /nges bstan pa//gcig drang gnyis kyi grangs dag dang //rnam pa sna tshogs kla klo'i skad//yul gyi skad du dAsta ni pa ste//phreng du bsdebs dang ldan pa dang //sgra ni 'dres
351b3(rgyud): par gyur pa yin//de dag yi ge gcig pa nas//rtsa brgyad stong gi bar du'o//tshig rkang bzhi dang rkang med dang //rkang pa tshig su sbyar nges bstan//tshigs bcad rgyun chags che
351b4(rgyud): dag dang //tshigs bcang tshig su brjod pa yin//yang dang yang ni brjod don ldan//gsal ba'i don gyis brgyan pa yin//zur chag legs sbyar sgra nyams kyang //don ni
351b5(rgyud): rab tu brtag pa yin//mi gsal gsal ba med pa dang //yi ge nyams kyang 'dod pa yin//'gro ba yul dang rnam bral ba//de la'ang sngags ni 'grub par brjod//de ltar
351b6(rgyud): sngags rnams kun la ni//rtag tu phan pas rigs par gsungs//zag med zag bcas thams cad kyi//sngags rnams 'di yi mtshan nyid yin//gang la yi ge swa
351b7(rgyud): mang zhing //oM ni ta yis rgyan pa ni//de lag de yi mod la ni//de dag la ni nges grub 'gyur//dang po sngags ni yi ge au//mtha' na yi ge ma yod la//yi ge sa ni
352a1(rgyud): chu rkang par ldan//de bzhin ta yosra bar mdzes shing //trA yI rnam pa zur bzhir ldan//mtha' blo nas yi go rnam par spangs//ra gnyis ldan pa la
352a2(rgyud): ga terar sngags rnams kyi ni grub pa byed//dang por ra gnyis mang ba dang //yi ho hUM gi yon tan+da yang//yi ge tsa ni gru bzhir snang //de dag yi ge sgrub par brjod//yi geH
352a3(rgyud): ni dar ldan zhing //yig mthir ma dang yi ge gnas//dang por mA dang ma yaM ge/de ni sngags kyi mchog tu bstan//gang yang yi ge na meng zhing //rgyud rnams kun la snang
352a4(rgyud): ba yin//sngags de dag ni zhi bar gsungs//gshin rje hUM gis rgyan pa yis//yi gr-i b+ha ni mang ba ste//dbang po rlung gi phyogasu gsungs//yi ge ba ni chu lhar gsungs//
352a5(rgyud): 'jig rten phan zhing rgyas byed yin//sngags grang yi ge e mang ba//dbang chen de ni rab tu snang //dang po dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro//gang yin sngags ni de bzhin//
352a6(rgyud): du/phyag 'tshal ba la rab 'jug dang //zhi ba'i rgyu dang bde ba byed//de lngas gzhan pa'i lha rnams la'ang //phyag 'tshal don du rab tu sbyar//sngags dang rgyud la rang gi span/
352a7(rgyud): rang sngags la ni thams cad pa//gang la yi ger mang zhing //mtha' na yi ge phaT hU~M bcas//'di dag sngags ni gdug pa tshe//gzi brjid ldan zhing gzi mdangs che//
352b1(rgyud): myi zhig srog gcod byed pa ste//gdug pa'i sems can dag la sbyar//khyad par du na sdig yod pas//de bas las de mi d+ya'o//rgyug tu thub pas spangs pas nA//'dod rjes
352b2(rgyud): pos spang bar bya//sngags ni zhe dang rgyas pa dag/gnyis kyi don ni 'grub 'gyur te//las lnga ji srid gsungs pa dag/skad ci ga gis ni thams cad 'grub//'di dag sngags na
352b3(rgyud): legs bzlas ni//gze rji ldan zhing rdzu 'phrumache//rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags kyis ni//zhi ba'i las ni bya ba yin//rin chen rigs kyis bye ba n+de//rgyas pa'i las ni
352b4(rgyud): thams cad//gang dag sgrib pa'i las rnams kun//mngon spyod pa la ni rtab tu sbyar//mngon par spyod pa'i las rnams ni//rdo rje'i rigs kyis bya ba yin//'jig rten
352b5(rgyud): mgon gyis bkag na yang //gnod sbyin dab la rab tu bstod//sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir//sngags kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs//reg gsum nyid kyis
352b6(rgyud): thams cad du//rnam pa gsum du bsten pa yin//thub pa nyid kyis rigs dag ni//gang yid brgyad du yang dge bstan//grub pa de dag rnam gsum 'gyur//rnam pa bsu
352b7(rgyud): du yang dag bstan//mchog da shar ma bam ni//de dag rnam pa gsum 'byung ba//hrI dang rgyas pa dag dang ri//mngon spyod par ni 'dod pa yin//sngags dang ldan pa nyid
353a1(rgyud): dran dang //rgyud dang ldan pa kho nar ldan//sngags kyi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid rgya//mngon par spyod la sbyar ba yin//'di dgra lngas ni mi 'dod do//
353a2(rgyud): thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin//shin tu nyams dur gyur kyang ni//srog la gnod las mi bya'o//mdor bsdu na ni ma 'dres por//las kyi bdag nyid chen por bstan//
353a3(rgyud): der ni rigs dang cho gar bsngags//las ni rgya che rgya che ba//cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la gsungs//rgyud gzhan dag la'ang snang ba yin//las nyams rnams ni mi sten cing
353a4(rgyud): sngags rnams kun la rig par ldan//'jig rten sngogs rnams ji snyed pa//de bzhin cha bcas cha med pa'o//'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang //'di 'dra'i yon tan
353a5(rgyud): shes par bya//sngags grub grangs ni med gyur kyang //de grangs yongasu brjod par bya//dang po grangs cig 'byung ba ste//de bzhin nyi shung ldan par 'byung //de nas mdor
353a6(rgyud): na sum cu ste//da las gzhan yang bzhi bcu yin//de phyed bsnan na drug cu ste//de bzhin bcus bsnun bdun cu yin//de steng bcu ni bsnun pa la//brgyad cu'i grangasu
353a7(rgyud): gsungs pa yin//de la bcus bsnan dgu bcur gsungs//bcu gzhan gyis bsnan brgya yin te//brgya yi grangs kyis bgrang ba yin//de dag bcu la stong phrag gcig/
353b1(rgyud): stong phrag bcu la khri yin te//khri bcu la ni 'dum phrag gtsik+Sha/'bum phrag 'tshul sa ya to//sa ya bcu lnga bye ba yin//bye ba bcul dung phyur te//dud phyur brdul tshor
353b2(rgyud): 'dzum yin//de bcu ther 'dzum chen por b+hAstan//detshul ni shug rdog ste/shu rngog bcul mchog nyal yin//mchig nyol bcu la kyang phyi rgya chen po de bcu
353b3(rgyud): yin//de bcu la ni khyad phyin yin//khyad phyin chen po de bcu yin//de dag bcu la sgyu mar brjod//sgyu mchen po de bcu yin//de bcu la ni mtsho yAs zhes//'jig rten
353b4(rgyud): 'dren pas gsungs pa yin//mtsho yis chen po de dag bcu//mtsha yas chen po de bcu la//dun tshon pa yi rgya mtsho yin//de dag nyi shu'i phyed la ni//dug chen rgyum
353b5(rgyud): chen po yin//dug chen rgya mtsho bcu la ni//mchog byas zhes ni brjod pa yin//mchog byas bcu zhes bstan pa yin//ban+da bun dag tu rab tu bstan//ban bun de dag
353b6(rgyud): bcu la ni//de ni me lus pa zhes brjod//dri dag nye shu byed la ni//ma lus chen po na su brjod//de tshe grangs kyi tshad du ni//'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin//
353b7(rgyud): bcu yi grangs kyis bcur byas na//grangs ni grangs med ce su brjod//grangs med bcur ni bsgyur byas na//de las gzhan du dpag med yin//dpag med stong du bsgyur
354a1(rgyud): byas na//'jig rten zhes ni yongasu bstan//'jig rten de bcu 'jig rten tshe//'jig rten chen po bsgre byas na//de 'og mun pa zhe su brjod//mun
354a2(rgyud): pa las ni snang bar brjod//snang ba chen po de dag bcu//de bcu la ni phung por brjod//phung po de bcu bsgres na ni//phung po chen por du brjod//phung po chen po de bcu la//'di
354a3(rgyud): ni zab pa zhes brjod//zab pa lngas ni brtan par brjod//brtan pa las ni rab brtan 'gro/de nas grong du mang ldan zhing //mang por 'dod pa gan su brjod//rtsis shes dam pas
354a4(rgyud): gan su brjod//de nas gnas ni chen por 'gro/chen po'i gnas shes 'dod pa yin//dpag dang dpag med mnyam byas nas//de don chen por yongasu bsgrags//don
354a5(rgyud): chen rab 'byor gnas dang ni//de las rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/dang po rgya mtsho chen por bstan//dang po'i dang por phan pa dang //dang po mchog ces bya bar bstan//mchog las
354a6(rgyud): gtso bor brjod pa ste//gtso las khyim gyi ming yino//de ni bsam mi khyab par brjod//bsam mi khyab las mi bzad gzugs//mi bzad gzugs las rgyal thabs
354a7(rgyud): 'dod//rgyal thabs gzhan las gter yin te//de yi 'og ma dge ba yin//dge ba'i pha rol sems las byung //de las gzhan pa'i sems byung che//sems las
354b1(rgyud): krorlos ni rnam par g.yeng //brjod pa zhes ni de la bya//brjod pa lngas ni brjod med nas//ngaskad yA su yang brjod pa yin//bskyung yas las gzhan bsnyad yas ches//de tshe byar
354b2(rgyud): slar zhes che brjod//phyar phyur las ni phyar phyar rje//shu rngog de bzhin shu rngog che//rtsis kyi pha rol phyin pa'i gnas//dge zhing zhi ba zhesu bstan//de nas bgegs chen mthong ba ste//
354b3(rgyud): chu 'byung zhes ni de las brjod//chu 'byung de las sems 'khrug gnas//de las gzhan pa dam pa yin//de las pha rol sangs rgyas yul//de las gzhan ni 'phel byed sa//'jig/
354b4(rgyud): rten mo yis rtsis drag ni//ba brang bar yang ni mi nuso//de las gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi//gro 'phang dang ni spyod yul yin//sangs rgyaso zhing ni gang+gA'i klung //bye ma snyed du brjod par ni//
354b5(rgyud): brdzus nas rdul gyi tshogs dag ni//'dren pas ston pa mdzad pa yin//'di dag dper ni byas pa ste//tshad ma shes pa'i spyod yul min//rgyu yis dngas po bsgrub bya ste//rtsis kyi
354b6(rgyud): pha rol phyin mi nus//'di tsam rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga//sngon ni nga yis bsnyen bkur byas//dpag med bskal pa dag tu ni//de dag la ni mnyes byas nas//de tsam dus kyi
354b7(rgyud): mthar thug par//nga ni byang chub sems dpar gyur//sems can don ni bsgrub bya'i phyir//sangs rgyas nyid du'ang yang dag bstan//de dang der ni bdag gis bsngags//cho ga
355a1(rgyud): rgya chen bstan pa yin//cho ga yi ni rab mchog 'di//sangs rgyas 'di dag kun gyis gsungs//'di rjem tshad kyi sangs rgyas kyis//sngon chad 'ang/
355a2(rgyud): ni gsungs pa yin//dus kyi tha ma'i skye bo la//gzhon nu yang nga yis bstan//ji snyed 'jig rten sngags rnams dang //cho ga'i rgyal po'i snod dang ni//de bzhin 'jig rten
355a3(rgyud): 'das pa dang //myi dang lha dang lha min dang //thams cad kun gyi sngags rnams ni//rgyu dang rigs par rab tu bstan//cho ga'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul tshe//gang du kun gyis yongasu
355a4(rgyud): bkur//de dag cho ga zhib mo yis//'jam pa'i drag ni 'grub par 'gyur//'jam dpal dbyangs kyi cho ga ni//'di nyid kyi ni zhib mo zhes//de dag 'grub par gsungs pa ste//
355a5(rgyud): thams cad kun pas mthu ldan 'gyur//pang yang mi yi 'jig rten dang //gang gzhan sngags kyi lha myo dang //'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags kun dang //'jig rten rdzu 'phrul che dang
355a6(rgyud): bcas//'di nyid tshul gyi cho ga yis//cho ga'i rgyal pos 'grub pa nyid//sngags rnams kun dang cho ga kun//'di yi dbang du 'gyur bar bstan//
355a7(rgyud): cho ga'i rgyal po bla med 'di//gang du 'jam dpal gyis rab bzhed//gang yang bzo ni rnam par shes//'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod//rgyu mtshan shes dang la nye bzang //
355b1(rgyud): skar ma'i spyad kyi rtags drang ni//rgyu mtshon shes dang spyod pa dang //sgra skad dge dang myi dge dang //'byung blo kun gyi skad shes dang //spyod dang sems kyi spyod pa dang //zur gyi shes pa
355b2(rgyud): dag kyang bshad//de bzhin gte re lta nor sgyur byed//rtsi dang brda'i sprod bstan bcos dang //gos kyi rim pa'i cho ga dang //nang rig giso ba rig pa dang //de nyid thams cad phran dang
355b3(rgyud): bded gtan tshigs lugs kyi bstan bcos dang //gzhan yang skra yi bstan bcos bstan//sdeb sbyor rig byed dri za'i glu/spos sbyor dag kyang bstan pa yin//bdag gis byang
355b4(rgyud): chub sems kyis ni//sems can don phyir bshad pa yin//bdag ni byang chub sems sngon gyur//'khor ba'i rgya mtshor sngar gnas tshe//sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//
355b5(rgyud): bdag gisu ni bshad pa yin//'khor ba'i dgon pa tshang tshing du//bdag ni yun ring du su glanas//ji ltar gdul bya'i sems can la//de ltar bdag gis dri bzhin byas//ji lta
355b6(rgyud): ji ltar sems can rnams//phan pa'i las ni len pa dag/phan don las kyi dge ba'i gzhi//de lta de ltar 'di dag byas//sna tshogs lus kyis bsgyur ba yi//sems can 'gro
355b7(rgyud): ba'i skye gnas dag/'di dag bya ba sna tshogs byas//sna tshogs skye gnas rab tu bstan//las rnams sna tshogs ldan pa yis//sna tshogs don gyi bstan bcos bstan//rnam
356a1(rgyud): ba sna tshogs gzugs ldan pas//'di la de bzhin byas pa bzhin//sna tshogs 'gro ba'i skye gnas//bdag gis de bzhin cha byad byas//phan pa
356a2(rgyud): bsam pas sems can la//sna tshogs gzugs ni bdag gis sbrul//dbang phyug brgya byin tshangs pa sogs//khyab 'jug nor sbyin bden bral dang //sna tshogs gza' yi
356a3(rgyud): gzugs sogs kyang //de tshe sngon ni nga yis skal//thugs rje chen po'i dbang gyur thugs//sems can bsam pa'i spyod yul con//de dag la ni rim gyi su//zhi ba'i
356a4(rgyud): gnas la bzhag pa yin//'khor bar phan tshun 'gro ba na//yun ring du su thogs pa ni//sems naR+Ya rnams kyi don sgrub phyir//sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin//
356a5(rgyud): yun ring 'khor ba'i skye bar ngas//sangs rgyas rigs la brtan nas ni//ye shes sngags dang cho ga ni//mthar gyis bstan par byas pa yin//byed pa dang ni bdag po'ang
356a6(rgyud): rung rnga nga la gang yang yod min te//nges pa'i rigs la brten nas ni//nga yi sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/bde ba nad mod yang dag zhi//dri med mya ngan med zhi ba//ngas
356a7(rgyud): thob mya ngan 'das zhi ba//skye ba'o 'ching las nga rab grol//yang na 'khor lo rab bskor zhing //yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni//sngags kyi tshig ni rgya chen dang //cho ga
356b1(rgyud): 'di ni de yis bstan//las dang chog rgya chog//zas pas don med ma bya'o//'dzag rten ji snod sngags rnams dang //cho ga dag kyang rang bstan pa//de kun mchod cing ri mar bya//
356b2(rgyud): dad lnga ni brnyas pa spang //cho ga rgya chen de dag kyang //des ni sngags byas brnyas mi bya//rgyu mtshan shes dang rigs pa dang //skar ma'i spyad shes skad shes pa//'di dag dran
356b3(rgyud): med mi bya ste//bkra shis don du bstan pa yin//mthong ba'i chos kyi don du yang //grub pa'i rjes sogs sman dang ni//zung zang bcas par smig sman 'grub//de las bkra shis
356b4(rgyud): 'grub po yin//rab bsngags rgyal po'i tshigs bcud dang //bde legs tshigs bcad kyis rgyun pa//rab gi sngags zhag ni bzang po dag/yar dri dag gso legs mtshan pa/
356b5(rgyud): bza' mchog dkar ba dag ldan la//sngags sgrub pa ni brtsam par bya//de la sogs pa'i dge dang ldan//mi dag dag kyang spang bya ba//nga nyid kyis ni sngon bstan te//de bas zlos
356b6(rgyud): pas gzung bar bya//'jig rten ji snyed gang su dge/skar ma'i spyod lo mkhas pa dang //gzhan gyi rgyud la mkhas pa dang //lugs kyi bstan chos gtan tshigs bcas//rigs
356b7(rgyud): pa'i brtson bcos legs 'bri ba 'o//sems can rnams la phan byed yang //de dun pa yis sngon gsungs te//sngags zlos pas ni gzung bar bya//lam 'di grub pa'i rgyu yin
357a1(rgyud): brlang 'de nyid dazigs pas bsnun pa yin//zung pa'i mtha' ni mtha' dag kun//gang yin thar pa'i rgyur gsungs pa//sngags kyi lam gyis
357a2(rgyud): grub pa'i rgyur//nga nyid kyis ni byas pa yin//sngags kyi rigs pa mtha' dag ni//zlos pas don med mi bya'o//'jig rten pa yi sngags thun dang //dam par yang ni ra
357a3(rgyud): bstan dang //de bzhin 'jig rten bzlas bzang po//thams cad kun la rab sbyar bya//sems ni log par mi bya ste//yid kyi nam yang su ni me dbyung //sngags rnams kun la
357a4(rgyud): mchod byed pa//dam tshig shes par rab tu bstan//sangs rgyas dgongs shing phan+da pa yin//de bzhin ston pa'i bsten pa la//rab zhugs rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyang //
357a5(rgyud): zhugs par rab tu shes pa yi//thub zlar dkyil 'khor dag la ni//'di ni dam tshig shes par gsungs//rtag tu sngags rnams don yod//yang dag bsdam pa thob
357a6(rgyud): yin/gzhan dbang ngas ni ma byas te//brnyas pa dag kyang sbyang ma yin//sngags rnams 'phags pa ma yin pa'ang //de dag don med byas min brjod//'jig rten
357a7(rgyud): srid sngags rnams sam//yang na gzugs byung ba'ang rung //kur nas nyon mongs mthong lam mtha'//de dag 'bras bu yod par bstan//khros dang zhe sdang ldan pa yin//
357b1(rgyud): don med par ni mi bya'o//mi 'dod bus pa med pa yis//lngas ni mi bya 'bras bu med//de dang 'brel pa'i sems la ni//nam yang de la sbyin mi bya//rtag tu mnyam par gzhag nas/
357b2(rgyud): ni/sngags tshiglo ldan par bzlas byas shing //cho ga ji bzhin gsungs byas na//'byes bu mtha' dag thob par 'gyur//yid ni g.yo med byas nas kyang //sngags gcig de ni bzlas
357b3(rgyud): par bya//sngags ni don kun srub pa ste//rtse gcig sems kyis sgrub par 'gyur//rmongs pa'i bdag nyid g.yeng ba'i sems//de la 'grub pa 'grub mi 'gyur//gang la yid ni dag/
357b4(rgyud): pa dang //bstan pa la ni rab dad pa//'bras bu mtha' dag 'grub pa ste//'gro ba dam pa 'thob par 'gyur//dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni//'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang
357b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las las dang bya ba dang /cho ga dang /rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam las nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs
357b6(rgyud): so//tra de nis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gau zhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
357b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgya dang /sngags rab 'byam mchog tu shin tu gsang ba nyon cig/ma dad pa'i sems can dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mngon par dang ba
358a1(rgyud): med pa dang /dam tshig med pa dang /gnang ba med pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gcod par byed pa dang /mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/
358a2(rgyud): yongasu zin pa dang /bsod nams mi 'dod pa dang /skye bo sdang ba dang 'grogs shing 'dres pa dang /sdig pa'i grogs pos yongasu zin pa dang /sangs rgyas dang chos
358a3(rgyud): las thag ring du gyur pa dang /cho ga 'di la 'bras bu med par gyur pa dang /slob dpon gyis man ngag med pa dang /gzho nu khyod kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbang ma bskur
358a4(rgyud): ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dam tshig ma mthong ba dang /skye bo mngon par mi 'dod pa dang /snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la bstan par mi bya'o//
358a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas chos la ma dad dang //byang chub lam ni rang gyur la//de la phyog rgya mi sbyin zhing //rgyud nyid kyang ni bstan mi bya//bag med rmongs par gyur pa 'am//yang na
358a6(rgyud): gral te chags pas byin//zlos pa phyin ci log byed la//du la sngags ni mi 'bru'o//phyag rgya nye bar mi 'gyur zhing //sngags nyid kyang ni gzhan du 'gyur//myur du grub pa
358a7(rgyud): mi 'thob cing //de yi lus kyang nyams par 'gyur//zhi zhing dang pa'i sems ldan dang //der ni dam tshig mthong ba dang //rgyud dang sngags la rab zhugs la//phyag rgya rgyud/
358b1(rgyud): ni bstan par bya//dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang //rgyal ba'i bstan la bro dad dang //cho ga'i sbyor ba mthong ba dag/de dag la nI phyag rgya bstan//byang chub sems kyi chog shes/
358b2(rgyud): byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan//rtag tu byang chub lam lo gnas//de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan//ba sngags dang rgyud la rab brtson zhing //phan tshun brgyud pas dam tshig mthong //
358b3(rgyud): byang chub chen por dam bcas pa//de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan//rgyal ba'i sras po dag dang ni//de bzhin nyen thos rang rgyal dang //mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bros thob kyang //de la phyag rgya/
358b4(rgyud): rab tu bstan//chos rnams la ni rnam rtog med//dad cing ser sna bral ba dang //ston pa'i bka' la rigs par shes//de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan//rtse brgyad brgya yi chang do na
358b5(rgyud): 'di dag phyag rgya phyag rgyas btab//lhag dang nyung ba ma yin pa ri//mngon sum sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad//'jam dpal gong gi tshwa ga la//sngags kyang de dang mnyam pa yi//
358b6(rgyud): brgyad bcos bad+mo zhes gsungs pa dang //sngags rnams de dang mnyam par bstan//phyag rgya'ang brgya ni rtsa brgyad du//thub pa mchog gi sngon gsungaso//'di tsam tshad du cho ga la//
358b7(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags ni yang dag 'byung //sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod 'di ni//sngabs kyi mdzod du nye bar bstan//phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na//yang dag ldan pas las myur bya
359a1(rgyud): 'khor lo med pa'i shing rta ni//rigs par 'gro bar mi 'byung ste//de bzhin sngags rnams ma lus pa//phyag rgyu med par las mi byed//sngags dang /
359a2(rgyud): phyag rgya mnyam ldan zhing //yang dag ldan pas myur las byed//lha dang lha min bcas pa yis//'jig rten gsum kun 'bugs byed no//las gzhan dag gis legs sbyar
359a3(rgyud): ba'i jir mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos//mthong chos 'bras bu 'di dag gi/phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yis//gnyi ga ldan zhing dag pa dang //cho ga ldan pa'i don bstan na//
359a4(rgyud): rgyal ba mchog dang sras rnams dang //'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed//sngags dang phyag rgya dka' thub nyid//rnam gsum las ni lag gnas dang //ci 'dod phun sum
359a5(rgyud): tshogs pa kun//de bzhin zos pas thob par 'gyur//sngags rnams phyag rgya phyag rgya btab//sngags kyis kyang ni de rgyab btab//sngags ni phyag rgya med pas min//sngags dang //
359a6(rgyud): phyag rgya spangs pas min//phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan ni//yang dag ljon pos las kun byed//'di dag phan tshun 'bras bu ste//phan tshun 'bras bu 'byung ba yin//sgrub
359a7(rgyud): pos rigs ldan sbyar byas na//bsgrub bya min pa'i las rnams med//phyag rgya ldan pa'i zlos pa pos//sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur//cho ga mthong bas rab
359b1(rgyud): brtson zhing//sngags dang phyag rgya kun byas na//glang du 'gug 'gyur mi 'grub pa//don+da de ni yod ma yin//srid rtse mnar mud bur dang //'jig rten khams kyi 'gro ba gzhan/
359b2(rgyud): gang du mi 'bebs me 'bugs dang //bsgrub bye ma yin gang yang med//sems can skye gnas las skyes dang //byang chub sems dpe' mi snang ba'ang //cho gas bskul nas mi
359b3(rgyud): 'gugs pa//de ni gang yang yod ma yin//srung ba'i cho glu'i rgyud dag gam//las grub bzlog par bya ba la//sa bcu la ni gnas pa yi//byang chub sems dpas kyang mi nus//
359b4(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas la//'byung po kun gyis mi tshogs//dka' thub zlos pa cho ga'i lam//sbyin sreg las la rab sbyar na//'di las skyes shing de las grub/
359b5(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags lo snang ba yin//zlos pa rtag tu 'bad brtson zhing //rtag tu de dag lA glanas na//sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba ste//don yod 'gyur ba'i thub pa'i dka'
359b6(rgyud): song sa rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni//de dag gis ni gzhan du byas//sngags dang rgyud ni rigs pa la//gang zhig rtag tu mi 'jug pa'o//sngags dang phyag rgya mthu'i dag gi/
359b7(rgyud): gang zhig cho ga ldan byed pa'o//'jam dpal gzhonu 'di dag ni//yang dang ying du bstan pa yin//sngags kyi rigs pa mtha' dag ni//phyag rgyas sngags ni phan pa 'gyur//
360a1(rgyud): de spyod las la cho ga'i rtswa lnga//dris ni 'bras pa d+ha smin dbyung //jig rten gas ngo mchog ldan pa dang //sngags dang phyag rgyas dam bcas pa/
360a2(rgyud): nas rigs ldan 'jam dpal de//khyab par byed po byis pa'i gzugs//cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyur gnas//gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung //byang chub sems
360a3(rgyud): dpar shA nu 'grus che//sa bcu la ni gnas pa yis//sangs rgyas nyi me'i gnyer gyur pa//thub pa mchog la rab tu sa//bcom ldan sngags kyi rgyud dag ni//gang
360a4(rgyud): yin 'di ni 'jig rten bstan//sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang //de yang bdag la gsungs pa yin//de ltar rAshAm+b+hi'i seng ge yis//ci yo phyir na rab tu gsungs//
360a5(rgyud): bdag ni de ltar the tshom 'tshal//thub pa mchog gis bdag la gsungs//blo ldanu ka la baud+ma'i skad//tshangs pa yi ni gsung dbyangs kyi//sa bAcu la ni rab ga rnas pa'i/
360a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dashA la gsungs pa//sngon ni bskal pa mang po rI//nga ni 'khror bar 'khor ban+de//thub dbang me ta~M gu kun stes las//cho ga'i rgyul ba'ang nga yis
360a7(rgyud): thog//de dang der ni sems can la//phan po med pa byas pa yin//thugs rje'i dbang du song nas ni//de che bdag gi smon lam byas//sangs rgyas mchog tu
360b1(rgyud): bang //dus kyi mthar ni yang dag byung //chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ni//bstan pa'i don ni byas pa yin//phyi ma sr-i ni dus drug tu//de tsho d+ha ni mya ngan 'da'//dros na cho ga'o rgyas
360b2(rgyud): dbang po//khyod kyi drung du nga yis bstan//nga yang 'jig rten mya ngan 'das//dzam+bu'i gling ni rab stangs shing //de bzhin sbyin pa'i chos kyi mdzod//rtsod dus thag ring gyur pa no//
360b3(rgyud): sems can rnams la bstan pa'i don//cho ga'i rgyalnga po gcig byed 'gyur//cho ga'i rgyal po rgya chen la//de bzhin 'di ni yang dag 'jug/sems can rnams ni don la brtson//de
360b4(rgyud): sI tshen 'byung bar 'gyur//de dus 'jig su rung ba yi//de tshe sems can chos ldan min//rtag tu lus la mi gnas shing //rgyal po rnams ni ma rungs yod//mI dang mim
360b5(rgyud): yin rnams ni//kun kyang bstan la rnam par sdang //ngas bya shad chos kyi mdzod rnams ni//de yis thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur//de dag gdul ba'i don gyi phyir//snga
360b6(rgyud): kyi mdzod ni nye bar bstan//bskal pa bsam gyi khyab par sngon//gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di//sangs rgyas ji snyed gang su dag/'jig rten gnyen gyur mya ngan 'das/
360b7(rgyud): dag bstan pa'i don du ni//dus dang dusu bya'o zhes//bdagon byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs//dus kun du ni rnam par spyod//sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la//de dang /
361a1(rgyud): dri ni rnam par 'dul//ga nu khyud kyi smon nam 'ang //ston ca du rnas pa yin//don sa p+pa'i gzugs byo shur+ya//de sun khyod pa bshA/
361a2(rgyud): par bya//skye bo skyabs ni med pa dang //spangs rgyas zhing ni sbyongs pa na//sngags kyi gzugs kyi sems can la//byis pa'i tshul gyis yang dag shod//sems can mang po
361a3(rgyud): 'dul byed cing //phun sum tshogs pa sbyin byed pa//dus kyi ba ma de la ni//sems can kun la mchog sbyin byed//klu 'jig rten nga ni mya ngan 'das//sa yi steng ni stongs gyur
361a4(rgyud): nar khyod nyid byis pa'i gzugs kyis ni//sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur//de tshe dgon chen rob dga' ba//khwa bA tsun nang yod pa yIs//chu bo gA ser dang ldan
361a5(rgyud): 'gram du//nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag rgya
361a6(rgyud): bskul ba'i cho ga 'jam dpal gyis yongasu zhus shing bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam las nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs///de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
361a7(rgyud): gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzod yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
361b1(rgyud): so//snyoms par zhugs mu thag tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong grangs myong pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa byung ste//'od zer gyi dra
361b2(rgyud): ba du ma dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma gsal bar byas nas sangs rgyas thams cad la yung dgro pAr du skul nus phyir yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spur zhugs
361b3(rgyud): par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ma thag tu na mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi na mkha'i
361b4(rgyud): dkyil du bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam
361b5(rgyud): dpal phyag rgya'i be'u cho ga'i mdzod sa bya thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bshad kyi nyon cig/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhabs la
361b6(rgyud): btu de phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gang yin
361b7(rgyud): pa de du sa la bab par mkhyen na/bcom ldan 'das de ni legs te bshad du gsol//skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bod pa dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang //
362a1(rgyud): skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir dang /lha dang /mi rnams dang /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /
362a2(rgyud): badre ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gsol ba btab nas/phyag rgya thams cad la
362a3(rgyud): gzigs shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mkhyen par byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa/'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs
362a4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/'phags pa'i sngags rnams la yid brtson par byed pa la gzeng stod pa/ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/
362a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa/'khor bar gnas pa dag la bde ba dang /shes pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/sems
362a6(rgyud): can sdug bsngal pa thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi phyir phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga ngas bshad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyon cig/dang po gtsug pud lnga pa ni//de ni phyag
362a7(rgyud): rgya chen por 'dod//gnyis pa gtsug pung gsum pa yin//ral pa gcig pa gsum pa ste//bzhi pa ut+pa lar gsungs pa//rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//
362b1(rgyud): lnga pa bkra shis ldan du brjod//drug pa rgyal mtshan zhesu brjod//bdun pa gang ba zhes bstan to//sngags shes dag la legs mdzes shing //brgyad pa srog shing zhes
362b2(rgyud): brjod pa//sngags shes dag la legs mdzes yin//dgu pa gdugs shes bstan pa ste//bcu pa mdud du brjod pa yin//de bzhin bcu gcig sangs rgyas kyis//kha sbyar
362b3(rgyud): zhes ni yang dge bstan//bcu gnyis pa ni phub ces gsungs//bcu gsum pa ni da pus yin//bcu bzhi pa ni ral grir bshad//de bzhin dril bu bcoM lnga pa//bcu drug
362b4(rgyud): pa ni zhags par bstan//bcu bdun pa ni lcags kyur shes//bco brgyad pa ni bzang po'i gdan//bcu dgu pa ni gdan du brjod//nyi shur bstan pa rma bya'i gdan//nyi shu
362b5(rgyud): gcig pa paT+Ti sam//rtags gcig nyi shu gnyis pa ste//rtags gnyis nyi shu gsum pA yin//de bzhin phreng ba nyi shu bzhi//nyi shu lnga pa gzhu yin te/nyi shu drug par
362b6(rgyud): gsungs pa n+do//lcags mda' drag tu rnam par brtags//nyi shu bdun par gsungs pa ni//rtagras kun dag tu rab tu bstan//nyi shu brgyad pa gsal shing ste//nyi shu
362b7(rgyud): dgu pa tho ba yin//sum cu pa ni mda' bo che//sum cu gcig pa mche bar bstan//sum cu gnyis pa de bzhin kha//sum cu gsum pa ras kyi gos//sum cu bzhi pa
363a1(rgyud): bum pa ste//sum cu lnga pa 'khar som smin//snyam cu drug pa sgyum dum//sum cu bdun phyug d+hAn shing ste//sum nu brgyud pa skyil glang yin//
363a2(rgyud): sum cu dgu pa pan+d+ha ha//ba ni bcu par ni rab bstan pa//chos kyi dung zhes nye bar bston//bzhi po cu dag ni gcig pa yang //lcags theg ces ni yongasu bsgrags
363a3(rgyud): gnyis pa 'dod pa mang por gsungs//gsum pa yid la re ba rdzogs//bzhi pa skye byed snang ba ste//shes rab pha rol phyin par 'ad//lnga pa ma mo zhes bshad
363a4(rgyud): pabadzad rkang gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//drug pa rta babs zhes byar gsungs//bdun pa rta babs bzang po yin//brgyad pa sgra skad dag tu bstun//
363a5(rgyud): dgu pabargyal ba'i sgo yang yin//kye bcu pa ni rnga bo che//lnga bcu gcig pa chos kyi rdo//lnga bcu gnyis pa la'ang bshad//gsum pa lag pa mchog yin te/
363a6(rgyud): lnga po nu bzhi par shes bya ba//phyag rgya de ni 'khrul med yin//lnga bcu lnga la 'jug rings yin//lnga bcu drug pa mda' yin te//bdun pa dag ni dgra star stan//
363a7(rgyud): pa'ajig rten gyis mchod yin//lnga bcu rtsa dgur shes bya ba//mdor na mtsho ni rtse gcig yin//drug cu par ni gyur pa yang //mdor na gshol du shes par /
363b1(rgyud): d+hA d+hu rkaHbA na//rgyug dag sa pa/ bya shad//rgyus rgyal da dag/ rgyun na ma par gsungs//rgyu rkun par shos byug/nga
363b2(rgyud): ba yin/ ba shes b+hu y-i/chog sbyi dam pa na//den su drug tu rtog pa//gau pa'i d+hA N+yai sa~M si sa~M gsu sa//
363b3(rgyud): par 'jig rten du//mkhas pa skye mdung du bstan pa yin//drug tu 'i rnyed par bya ba ni//rdo dbyin pa'i phyag tu gsungs//drug rngu rtswa dgur 'gyur ba ni//dge 'jim byed/
363b4(rgyud): pa rab tu bstan//bdun nu par ni shes bye ba//mdor na klu yi phyag rgya yin//bdun nu gcig par gsungs pa ni//ke zhal med phyug rgya mchog bzung yin//bdun cu gnyis

364a1(rgyud): mar me brgyad cu gcig par shes//thal sbyar brgyad cu gnyis par 'dod//gsum pa phreng ba zhes bya'o//bzhi pa gdan zhes gsungs pa yin//
364a2(rgyud): lnga pa gnas kyi phyag rgyar bstan//drug pa rab gnas gsungs pa ste//bdun pa dbang gi phyag rgyar brjod//brgyad cu brgyad pa mchog tu 'dod//dgu dang dgu bcu'i grangs
364a3(rgyud): dge ni//phyag rgya gnyis ni dge ba mchog/khwa sbyar zung gi phyag rgya ste//mu sum pa rtag tu spos kyi yin//bzhi pa dr-i yi phyag rgya ste//lnga pa mar mir shes par bya//drug pa sbyor
