384a1(rgyud): 'os bsgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste//srid pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa/sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/tshe dang /nad med pa dang /dbang
384a2(rgyud): phyugA dang /bsam pa thams cad yongasu tshogs par byed pa/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad song su rdzogs par byed pa/sems can thams cad yongasu dge bar byed la/son pa/
384a3(rgyud): kyi yid la mngon par 'dod pa 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/les thams cad byed pa/sngags thams cad rab tu sgrib par byed pa/phyag rgya dang /sngags thams cad dang ldan pa
384a4(rgyud): yin te/'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa khyod de nyon cig/dang po re shig gtsug d+har gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa ni lag pa gnyis mnyam paM bkan zhing brkyang bar bya'o//mthe bong dang sbyin
384a5(rgyud): lag gnyis lag pa'i dkyil du sen mos gzung zhing mthe bo'i rtse mos sbyar bar bya'o//mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gtug cing sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo dang rtse mo
384a6(rgyud): gnyis sbyar bar bya zhing /mdzub mo dang mdzub maM yang sbyar bar bya'o//kun tu snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/'dir sngags ni u m+ba haM/mdzub mo
384a7(rgyud): de nyid yod dag par bkug ste/sen mo dang sen mo'i rtsomo dkyil 'khor lhor spyir bas ni lte ba ngan pa'i zug rngu'i byin ci lo gsol ba zhes bya ba chos kyi 'kha rol chen po'i phyag rgya'i/
384b1(rgyud): sngagasu 'gyur ba ni oM badz+ra sha ni hU~M phaT/'di ni skyil krung gi phyag rgya ste/sngags dang yang drag par ldan na las thams cad byed pa/ji ltar ston ka'i sprin bzhin du bgegs zed 'jigs par byed
384b2(rgyud): pa/gang yang bdud bzhis byas pa dang /gang yang lho dang lha ma yin gyi bgegs rnams ni skyil krung gis phyag rgya dam pa mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur//'og ma gnyis kyang rtse mo
384b3(rgyud): mnyam par gshibs na khro tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyuraro//sngags kyang 'di dag gang yang rung po dang /phyag rgya log pa gnyis kyis bcings te//sgrub pa'i dus sam/sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su 'dug pa//
384b4(rgyud): 'am langs te lan cig gam ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bzlas pa'o//de ltar byas na bgegs dang los 'dren thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon du 'gyuraro//mdzub mo
384b5(rgyud): de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la/kun sa zlum por bya zhing /gung mo gnyis sbyar te bung mo'i gsum po'i 'og tu sbyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/
384b6(rgyud): 'dir snying po ni a~M a pau rA dzi te d+h+r-i ka/gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid la gzhan gang yang rung ba dang /lhan cig gis spyod pas bkad na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//de las mthe bo'i
384b7(rgyud): /rtse mo bteg la srin lag gi rtse mor gtugs nas yang dang yang bteg pa ni bod pa'i phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags nan mo b+ha go wa te a pa ti ha toSh+NI Sha ya/e h+yaM hi b+ha ga wAn d+harmA rA dza pra tI ts+tshe da
385a1(rgyud): sad+d+hi/gan+d+ha/TaSh+ma/d+hU paM ba li/d+hUmUn+d+ha bIr+yAk+ShA/ba lA pA rAk+Sha ma ya swAt+ma/me tog da/ byos spyan dang bur bya'o//rang gi gzugs kyis mchod yon dang /zha/
385a2(rgyud): bsil ba dbul bar bya'o//gdon dang bzhugasu gsol ba yang bya'o//de la 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /sngags kyis phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams dang /steng 'ogro bcing bar bya'o//de nyid
385a3(rgyud): kyi srin lag dang mthe bo'i rtse mo gtug cing smad pa byas lnga/tshigs bar ma la mthe bos gtug cing yid drang yang byeteg par byas nas mchod yon phul nas rang gi lha gshegasu gsol
385a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//phyag rgya g.yon phyog suM bskor ni phyogs bcings pa las grol bar 'gyuraro//'dir sngags ni/na mo a prAt+ti tISh+ThaShA yA/gar+b+ha gan+d+ha thA ga bA d+hAr+m+ma rA dza pratIts+tshe at+taM/gar+b+ha/
385a5(rgyud): puSh+pa/d+hU ba ma~M tsa~M oM b+hi rAk+Sha/oM pr-i ta~M ta ta ba la pa ra kra mA ya/phyag rgya dang sngags gshegasu gsol ba ni mchod yon gyiso//mdzub mo de nyid gung mo'i tshigasu gsum pa'i 'og tu bzhag
385a6(rgyud): gung mo yang dag par sbyar la mthe bong tshe gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun mnan cing khu tshur du bya'o//'dir sngags ni/na mo b+ha ga bi taM a pra tita toSh+NISh+Ta ya/oM drA ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/
385a7(rgyud): a pra ti ta toSh+NISh+Tha ya bi ki ri Ni/d+hu na d+hu na d+hu/rnam par 'jigs par byed pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug tor gyi sngags bgegs dang lag 'dren tha~Md kyis zin pa
385b1(rgyud): dag dang /dbang bskur ba dang /bdag srung ba dang /phyogs bcing ba dang /dkyil 'khor btsong ba la sogs te/las thams cad rab tu sbyararo//mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo bkug cing /yang dang ya
385b2(rgyud): brkyang ba ni me lha spyan drang ba'o//de nas sbyin bsrog gi las bya ste/'di nyid kyis slar gshagasu gsol ba ni bzlog pa'o//mdzub mo gnyis kyang 'bar ba'i phreng bar bas mo//gtsug tor
385b3(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya 'di ni las thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o//'dir sngags ni/na mo b+ha ga ba ti/a pra ti ha teSh+NISh+Ta yu/e d+h+ye ti te tsa mA pi ni ag+na yAM swA hA/mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis
385b4(rgyud): cung zad bkug par bya zhing /gung mo sbyar la gung mo'i tshogs gsum pa'i nang du sbyar bar bya'o//gtsug torI gyi stobs shin tu drug pa'i phyag rgya yin no//'dir sngags ni/na mo b+ha ga ba ni
385b5(rgyud): a pra ti ha tauSh+NISh+Ta yau/i maM/g+han+taM/d+hU paM/puSh+paM ba li d+hI tsi pyA tI ts+tsha ta ra sar+b+ba bud+d+ho aSh+NI tAM/d+har+m+ma rA dza a pra tI ta ta ya s+yAt+ma/d+yai la sogs pa'i sngag so//srin lag gnyis bzlog to tshigs
385b6(rgyud): gsum pa la mithe bong gnyis yang dag par sbyar zhing /mdzub mo gnyis kyang sbyar ba ni gzi brjid gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/log 'dren thams cad kyis 'joms par myi nuso//phyag rgya 'i
385b7(rgyud): ni bsrung ba dang /bzlas pa'i dus dang /sgrub pa'i dus dang /dkyil 'khor dong //las thams cad la yang bya ba yin//'dir sngags ni/na mo b+ha ga ba ti a pra ti ta toSh+ThASh+TA ya/sarba
386a1(rgyud): bi d+h+waM san ka rA ya kro d+hA ya swAhA/sbyin lag gnyis kyi rtsa bar mthe bong gnyis gtugs te/de bzhin du gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyis nang stong pa'i rnam
386a2(rgyud): bya'o//'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin no//'dir sngags na/na mo b+ha ga ba taM/a pr-i ta ha toSh+NI ShA ya/sarba tra a pa rA dzi tA
386a3(rgyud): ya/sha ma ya sha ma ya/shAn+taM dan+te/d+harma rA dza bi sha te ma hAM ba d+ye sar+b+bar+tha sa d+hi na swAhA/mar gyi sbyin sreg la sogs pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o//srin lag gnyis
386a4(rgyud): kyis gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzung mo'i rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni thogs pa med pa'i bde byed kyi grwatsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//'dir ni sngags ni/nu mo b+ha ga ba tAM a pra tI ta toSh+ThiSh+ThA ya/oM
386a5(rgyud): ka re swAhA/las thams cad srung bar byed pa'o//mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyis gsum pa'i tshogs la mnan la/de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtse mo yang rdo'i
386a6(rgyud): rtse dang 'dra bar bya'o//'di ni da ma tshigau thogs pa med pa'i spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya ste/dam tshig thams cad kyi thun mong ngo //'dir sngags ni/na mo b+ha ga ba te/a pra ti hA toSh+NI Sh+Ta ya/
386a7(rgyud): oM shaM ka res mo yaM swA hA/mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mos srin log gnyis kyi bar ma'i tshogs la bcar la/gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug par bya zhing gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang
386b1(rgyud): rgyaphyogs par mya sbyar bad ma chag thogs pa med pag drug tor gyi phyag rgya yin te/lha dang l+h+wa ma yin la sbyar na dmachog la 'jog par byed do//'dir sngags ni/na mo b+ha ga ba te sa drAd+ha
386b2(rgyud): toSh+NISh+TA ya/mo shrI ka raM me hA sa ma yaM swAhA/'dris dkyil 'khor btsang ba byas nas bzlas na 'khor los bsgyur ba yang dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur zhing /'khor los bsgyur ba gzhan
386b3(rgyud): yid zil gyis gnon par 'gyur//ga nas de nyid du bzlas pa byas na rigs pa'i mthu sto bas kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyis phan tshun gnod par
386b4(rgyud): byed par nus pa ma yin//bzlas pa ni gan su gcig tu rnam pa thams cad du bya'o//de la sogs pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po glangs med pa yod de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
386b5(rgyud): saud+h+ye cher bya'o//'jame dpa'i tsha da'i rgyal po 'di la ni sdigs tshad med pa yid de/phyag rgya yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ngas 'di mdor bsdus nas bshad pa yin//ngas gal te rgyu cher bya shing ni/
386b6(rgyud): ni mau dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bskal ba stong gi tshad du yang 'dzin pa'am/'chang bar nus pa ma yi no//'jam dpal de lta byas na mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yis mdor
386b7(rgyud): mid la nye bar bzung bar gyis shig/dang pa thub pa'i phyag rgya mchog/'dir ni rab tu gsungs pa yin//lha yi lha ni de nas kyang //'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya dang //byang chub sems dpa'
387a1(rgyud): blo ldan ni//spyan ras gzigs ni zla ba dang //de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rgyu//gnod sbyin dbang po'i bstan pa yin//de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni//dpag med chen po'i gzi
387a2(rgyud): brjid ldan//po nya pho nya ma tshogs kun//bran po bran ma'i de bzhin gzhan//de bzhin gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo//klu dang klu mo de bzhin gzhan//mngag gzhug mngag gzhug mo dag dang //
387a3(rgyud): 'phrul chen po sha za mo//de bzhin gzhan yang srin mo dang //lha dang lha min bu mo dang //grub dang rig pa 'dzin rnams dang //mi rnams ma lus pa dag dang //skye bo thams cad dag gis ni//so sos
387a4(rgyud): sor phyag rgya bstan//sngags kyang rnam pa sna tshogs dang //las dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs dang //glang po nor bu'i rigs ngag dang //de dag so so'i phyag rgya dang //dgra bcom dang ni rang rtul dang /
387a5(rgyud): legs byung phyag rgya de nyid dang //sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi//phyag rgya snying po sngags dag gi/gcig pa nyi du yongasu bsgrags//lha dang gnod sbyin rigs
387a6(rgyud): bstan//gzhan yang bde gshegs dka' dag gis//rgyud rnams dag ni so so dang //'jig rten pa yi yang 'dir gzung //phyag rgya ldan pa'i sngags dag no//las rnams la ni gsol bar
387a7(rgyud): 'gyur//phyag rgya 'chings la sogs mkhas na//log 'dri na dag gis gnod mi 'gyur//de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i mchin nyid bshad par bya ste//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
387b1(rgyud): kyi snying pa'i phyang rgya'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phan tshun bsdams la mthe bong gnyis bstan par bya'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs kyi phyag rgya'o//'di nyi
387b2(rgyud): la ni mthe bong g.yas pa gcig bstan pa ni pad+ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyuraro//lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rab tu phyung zhing brkyang bar byas la
387b3(rgyud): gcig tu byas shing rdo rje'i rtse mo 'dra ba 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o//de las gcig bkug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o//yang de nyid brkyang nas gung mo gnyis
387b4(rgyud): gdub kor ltar byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis po thams cad bsdus te khu tshur du byas pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o//nor bu la spyad
387b5(rgyud): ba thams cad dang /dzam+b+ha la chu dbang la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o//mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug nas sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad po 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi
387b6(rgyud): ris lngas rgyan la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin rdzu 'phral chen po'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcing ba byas la mthe bo'i sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad cing steng du bzhag la/
387b7(rgyud): gung po gnyis ka'i rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni lha thams cad/lha'i rigs 'og min la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yin//lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bsdams la khu tshur bcangs nas ma
388a1(rgyud): bong gnyis bstan pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /'phags pa nyan thos kyi phyag rgya'o//khu rgyur bcang ba 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o//rgya la thA//
388a2(rgyud): sras thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni gcig tu brjod par bya ste/thal mo brkyang ba sbyar nas cung zad rtse mo bkum par byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpar grags pa'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin//nor
388a3(rgyud): bu rin po che dang /mkhar bsil dang /snam sbyar dang /lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /mche ba dang /mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa ste bdun po de dag na thub pa'i phyag rgya'o//spyan dang /byams
388a4(rgyud): pa dang /'od kyi dra ba dang /chos ston pa dang /mdzad spu'i nir bu dang /gnas pa dang /phyag rgya bdun po 'di dag kyang rgyal ba'i sku nyid las skyes pa'o//bdun gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis po 'di
388a5(rgyud): rAg dang /phyag rgya lnga ngas bshad pa dang /thub pa'i snying po dang ldan pa nyi shu ni dang ngo'i rang byung gis kyang bstan pa yin te/'khor los basbyor ba nyi shu'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya yang bstan to//phyag
388a6(rgyud): rgya dang sngogs byung ba 'di grangs kyi mthar yang byas pa yi no//thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gdub koR+Sha byas pa ni nor bu rin po che'i phyag rgya'o//skyil mo klung gi g.yas g.yon brla'i nyi'i phyogs
388a7(rgyud): khu tshur rgyal mtshan du 'dzin pa ni mkhar bsil gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur//log pa thal mo sbyar lo phan tshun du mngon par phyogs pa ni snom sbyar gyi phyag rgyar 'gyuraro//lag pa thal mo
388b1(rgyud): sbyor ba las bzod pa ltar ba ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o//chos gos ni lag pa g.yon paso//thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhin du g.yon pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yas pa
388b2(rgyud): ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /g.yon pas chos gos la 'dzin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa'o//thal mo sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la de'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis cung //
388b3(rgyud): zad bkug cing bzhog la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro//'di nyid kyi gung mo'i tshigs bcug la mdzub mo gnyis gcog tu byas pa 'di ni sa ng+yas
388b4(rgyud): byams pa'i phyag rgya'o//thal mo sbyar ba yangs par byas la mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la rdo rje rtse gsum du byas pa 'di ni mA ma ki'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro//thal mo sbyar bar byas nas
388b5(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshogs gsum pa la bcug nas bzhag la mthe bong gnyis so sor brgyad nas/thal mo'i rnam par bya ba 'di ni longs spyod ldan pa zhes bya'i phyag rgya yino//
388b6(rgyud): lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje rtse mo ltar byas la/rked pa'i phyogasuM brten pa'i don
388b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o//de ltar bdag nyid kyi mgo bor rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang /phyag rgya chen po brgyad bcings la las thams cad bye zhing dam tshig gzung ba 'am/dkyil 'khor bya//
389a1(rgyud): bdug pang me tog gtor bar gyu//yang na sngar bstan pa'i tshig ji lta ba bzhin du byas na ci 'dod pa'i lus thams cad byed par 'gyur//sngags dang phyug+sa rgyu
389a2(rgyud): dang rig pa brjod pas ni/dmi tshigs thams cad du 'gyur ro//legs par phyag rgya bcings na ni phyag rgya'i mthu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/gang phyug rgya babacol du byas pa dang /gnas mi yin
389a3(rgyud): par bcas pa des ni 'dir dam tshig nyams par 'gyur//gang rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid ni mdung rtsi'i phyag rgya yun mod kyi/rtse gsum dang rdo rje ni khyad pa yod de/gang gyen du bstan pa de ni rdo
389a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur la/'og tu bltas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yino//bar du bzhag pi ni sprin gran su 'os pa'i slob dpon dang /bla ma la ni phyag rgya dbusu bzung bar bya'o//
389a5(rgyud): mi thams cad la ni sor mo gcig bdag par bya'o//mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /rkang gnyis dang /rkang bzhi dang /rkang mangs dang /srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i seMn rnams kyi phya
389a6(rgyud): rgyur 'gyur ba ra sor mo gnyis sgreng ba'o//gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gsum sbyang ba'o//rig pa 'dzin pa dang /rig pa 'dzin ma thams cad kyi
389a7(rgyud): phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo bani sgreng ba'o//lha dang lha ma yin thams cad kyi bu mo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa'o mthil mnyam par gzhag pa'o//thal mo sbyar ba lags par
389b1(rgyud): byas te bzhag pa ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//thal mo de nyid legs par byas pa las khu tshur bcing ba byas pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i
389b2(rgyud): khams na gnas pa thams cad kyi yin//dmyal ba dang /dud 'phro dang /yi dgas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni de nyid las sor mo gcig
389b3(rgyud): yang dag par sgreng ba'o//sha za dang /sha za mo la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis sgreng ba'o//srin po dang /srin mo rnams kyi ni gsum sgreng ba'o//sha chen za ba tha~Md
389b4(rgyud): dang /gdon dang /ma mo dang /grul bum la sogs pa dang /sha za rnams dang /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang /sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad la ni sor mo bzhi sgreng ba'o//sdig
389b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo thams cad bsdus pa'o//lag sor bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni dgug pa'o//lag sor brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o//las tha~Md ni rang gi
389b6(rgyud): sems kyis bya'o//ci 'dod pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag la rang rang gi sngags sbyar bar bya'o//gzhan gyis phyag rgya gzhan gyi las ni mi bya'o//gang gi sngagasra gang la yod pa de dang de'i phyag rgya
389b7(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o//phyag rgya 'di dag ni ring thung mnyam pa med pa yin te/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/sems can thams cad kyis phyag rgya mthong nas khro bor byed
390a1(rgyud): mi nus//phyag rgyu las 'da' bar byed pa ni rnam par nyams pa thob par 'gyuraro//phyag rgyu nyams pa las ni dam tshig nyams pa dang /rig pa thaMd las rnam par
390a2(rgyud): 'das par 'gyuraro//mthar yang du 'bod kyi 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro//dmyal ba chen po mnar med par yang shin tu bstan par skye ba thob par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya la gegs byed paso///
390a3(rgyud): gang yang phyag rgya dang /dam tshig la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po mi nyung bar bde bar 'gyur te/lha'i gnas chen po'i 'gro bar skye bar 'gyuraro//mthar yang nges par byang chub la
390a4(rgyud): gzhol bar 'gyuraro//mdor na dang po'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis phyag rgya rnam pa mang po rab tu gsungs//sems can thams cad kyis kyang
390a5(rgyud): 'di'i mthar rtogs par ram/bzung bar ram/grangs rtsi bar byed par mi nus//mdor na rgyal ba'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa de'i phyag rgyar
390a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur du byas la/gung mo gnyis phyir phyung la brkyang ste gcig tu rtse spyad la/gnyi ga'i yong rtse mo'i tshigs bkug lo mdzub mo
390a7(rgyud): gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug cing sen mo gnyis phan tshun rtsi spra de mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du bzhag pa 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya ste/las thams cad byed pa//
390b1(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi rab mchog/'jig rten gyi skyob pa rnams kyis gsungs pa/'khor los bsgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//'dis bsgrubs/
390b2(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags grub par 'gyuraro//'dis bzlas pa byas na sngags tha~Md bzlas par 'gyur//
390b3(rgyud): sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa'i sngags kyis mchog brgyad stong bzlas par bya'o//de ltar byas na rig pa 'di thams cad mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du grub
390b4(rgyud): pa rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro//myur du mchog kyang ster bar 'gyuraro//nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro//pad+ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang /spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang
390b5(rgyud): ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//yang na gos dkar mo'i rig pa phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na yid de bzhin du lus thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//rdo rje 'chang gi phyag rgya
390b6(rgyud): dang /de nyid kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na yang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//yang na mA ma kI'i rig pa chen mo dang ldan par byas na yang las thod byed
390b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du glang po'i rigs kyi yi ge gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi snying po dang /de bzhin du de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /rin po che'i rigs dang /gnod
391a1(rgyud): sbyin gyi rigs dang /lha dang /'phags pa dang 'di dag la yang 'dir snying po yi ge gcig pa nyid la phyag rgya dang /sngags thams cad dang ldan par byas na las thad bya ba yin/
391a2(rgyud): ji ltar rigs par rig pa dang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa mtha' dag bya'o//de bzhin du drang srong rnams la ni dmod pa 'debs pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du dra za dang /lha dang /
391a3(rgyud): lha ma yin dang bcas pa rnams la ni lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug pa byas pa'o//gru la bstan pa'i khu tshur du gnas pa'i rgyo ni gzhon nu ma bzhi'i phyag rgya dang /de nyid kyi
391a4(rgyud): sngag so//de bzhin du smin drug gi bu la ni mdung gi phyag rgya so//de bzhin du gshin rje dang /chu lha dang /lus ngan dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /sha za dang /lto 'phye chen
391a5(rgyud): bo la sogs pa sems can srid pa gsum la yang dag par gnas pa thams cad dang /'gro ba thams cad du gtogs pa dang /khams thams cad na gnas pa dang /sems can thad
391a6(rgyud): kyi don dang /ma mo dang /sha rje na za ba dang /sdig pa can gyi sems can thams cad dang /thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /sngags kyang thams cad du gsungs pa yino//rim gyis sbyar
391a7(rgyud): shing mthar gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin//dang po raM shig sgrub pa des cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po dang //
391b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dang yan lag tu gyur pa las byung ba dang /'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /mthu chen thob dang /dri ma med par grags pa dang /'jam dpal khyod kyis ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang /byang chub sa dang 'di
391b2(rgyud): drag gi phyag rgya shar du mngon par bltas te gnas pa dang /nyi ma la mngon du bltas te/gnas nas tho rangs langs la gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gnas la gnas nas sgrub pa pos nges par 'di dag
391b3(rgyud): gi phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcings la rang gi spyi bo'i steng du bzhag par bya'o//'di dag gang yang rung ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na nad thams cad las rnam par 'gyuraro//tshe ring ba dang /
391b4(rgyud): bgegs thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//myur du grub pa ster bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis
391b5(rgyud): brlabs par 'gyuraro//nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyuraro//byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyuraro//snying po dang phyag rgyar
391b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba de yang gang zhe na/dang pore shig dpa' bo chen po'i phyag rgya bca' bar bya ste/lag pa gnyis sbyar bar byas la sor mo rnams nang du bsdus te/mthe bong gnyis btag la tshigs gsum
391b7(rgyud): ba'i cha bkug pa 'di ni dpa' bo chen po'i phyag rgyar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungaso//'dor sngags ni/a bI ra hUM ba/sngags 'di dang yang dag par ldan na phyag rgya 'di ni las thad
392a1(rgyud): byed pa yin mo//'ag pa gnyis de bzhin du yang dag par sbyar ba byas la/phyir yang rnam par b+h+yo kun nas sor mo rnams pad+ma kha bye bA ltar byas pa 'di ni kha phyob zhes bya/
392a2(rgyud): dU'i phyug rgya mchog yin te/phu po'i sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan to//'dir sngags ni/oM go gan swAs+thA bodadz+nyA daH/dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ye/s+yA d+d+hi ad+hItI bik+Sho sa ya sar+b+ba b+hu d+h+r-in/
392a3(rgyud): bekA sinA~M phaT phaT swAt+ma/'di ni pad+ma kha bye ba'i sngags te/phyag rgya 'di dang yang dge par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur//gang na zhugs pa laM sogs pa yang rab Sh+Ti shrIs pa'i nA~M/
392a4(rgyud): smra bar byed par 'gyur//gdon gyis zin pa rnams dang /sha za sdig pa dang ldan pas zin pa dang /dug gis brgyal ba rnams la ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar de thod bye //'di ni
392a5(rgyud): mdor ni rig pa me tog kha bye ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na/gdon thams cad sgrub par byed//ma grub pa nyid kyang myur du grub par 'gyur//lag pa gnyis sbyar ba byas la sor mo rnams
392a6(rgyud): nang du mnyem por bya ba te bcug pa ni stong po'i phyag rgya ste/snying po lan bdun mngon par bsngags la bkrol bar bya ste/de bzhin du thams cad du yang bya'o//'dir sngags ni oM ga~M da ro b+hI
392a7(rgyud): swAhA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnying ba'o//lag po de nyid khu tshur du byaste sor mo rnams brkyang la/sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad cing nang du stong pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//'di
392b1(rgyud): /sngags ni/oM oM bi d+ha sAt+ma/'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste/lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong bteg la khu tshur bcangs pa ni khar bsil gyi phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags nI/oM d+ha na tsi ta ra NaM naM hA phaT/
392b2(rgyud): mkhar bsil gyi sngags ni las thams cad pa'o//'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas lag pa g.yan pa chos gas la 'dzin par byas pa ni tshos gos kyi phyag rgya'o//oM rAk+Sha rak+Sha sar+b+ba bud d+hA aM d+hiSh+Ta
392b3(rgyud): tad ma tsI ba ra swA hA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi sngags//'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//gos la mngon po r-i bisdigs la gos bgos/
392b4(rgyud): srung ba chen po byis par 'gyuraro//gdon thams cad dang /ma mo dang sha za dang /sha rlon za ba dang /sdig pa can rnams dang /bgegs thams cad kyang mthong ba tsam gyis rab tu 'bye ro//mtha
392b5(rgyud): bong g.yas g.yon dang mthe'u chung phan tshun sprad pa byas la lag pa'i kha sbyar thur du bstan pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags ni/oM lo ka bA la a d+hiSh+Thi taM ba ra d+ha ra ya/ma hA nu b+ha ba nu/
392b6(rgyud): d+ha pra tA swA dA/phyag rgya 'di dang /sngags 'di yang dag par ldan par byas na los thams cad byed//kha zas za ba'i dus su dran par byas na sbyar ba'i dug thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro//lag pa gi
392b7(rgyud): khu tshur btsongs lo mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo bkug pa 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nar bu'i phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags ni/oM te dzo dz+wA la sar+b+bA nA sa d+ha ka sid+d+ha tsi tA ma Na rat+na hUM/nor bu rin po che'i snga
393a1(rgyud): /byug rgyu de nyid dang yang dag byur ldan na las thams cad pyod cing de/bu yin//rgyun gyi khyad par thams cad ma da ny-id kyis mngon par bsdugs spyod rgyu rngu
393a2(rgyud): byas na bdag nyid la srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro//mchog tu skal pa bzang po dang ldan par 'gyuraro//go che la mngon par bsngags te/rang nyid kyis bgo bar byas nas g.yul du 'jug ni
393a3(rgyud): 'di ni lus la mtshon gyis mi 'phog cing mi tshugs par 'gyu ro//dgra thams cad kyi rang gi dpung 'byor bar byed cing pha rol gyi sde yang rab tu gnon par byed/de la sogs pa tshad med
393a4(rgyud): pa'i las ma grub pa nyid kyang grub par byed//rin po che pad+ma reg dang /me rgad ta la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rin po che'i khyad par blangs la/brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas
393a5(rgyud): nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am/rang gi mgo bo 'am/glang po che'i tshogs mar bcing ba byas nas g.yul gyi thog mar zhugs na nges par pha rol gyi dpung dang 'thab pa med par kho nar mthong
393a6(rgyud): bas 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/rmugs pa chen po nyid du 'gyur ba 'am/bdag po dpung dang bcas pad+ma dag rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro//sror mo rnams phan tshun bsdus nas khu tshur byas la
393a7(rgyud): sor mo gung mo'i gnas kyi gsum pa'i tshogs kyi chal mdzub ma'i rtse mo bkug pa 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags ni/oM tshin+na tshin+na ha na daM ha/tsikra dIp+ta hU~M/ches kyi
393b1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i sngagaso//rkang pa g.yon pa btag la/rkang pa g.yas pa sa la bzhag ste/grwayon pa'i rkang pa'i bol gyis grayas pa brkyang ba'i brlal bzhag la/lag pa g.yas pas bsnun pa'i tshul du nga
393b2(rgyud): /rgyal gyis bstan par bya ba 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags ni/oM hu lu hu lu tsaN+Da la me ti ga~M swA hA/gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags//chos kyi 'khor lo dang gzhan gyis pa
393b3(rgyud): thub pa'i sngags 'di dag nyid dang yang dag par ldan pas sngags thams cad par 'gyur ro//mdor na sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod par byed/ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbar ba de lta de ltar lga thaMd
393b4(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro//lag pa g.yen pa brla'i steng du dkur bstan la lag pa g.yas pas chos ston pa'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung gi phyag rgya yi no//'dir sngags ni/oM bi dza ye ma hA
393b5(rgyud): shak+ti d+hu ra d+ha ri hUM phaT/bi dza yi ni phaT/maM ga la phaT/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o//'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyuraro//bgegs rbad dang /
393b6(rgyud): ma rus pa thams cad dang /dgra thams cad dang /lha dang bcas pa yang rangs par byed//'di'i yon tan ni mtha' yas te/ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//
393b7(rgyud): lag pa'i sor mo rnams phan tshun de bzhin du byas la lag pa gnyis bkan te/mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo sbyar la de nyid bzlog la zung ngu bstan te dngul bar bzhag pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bac+doMs
394a1(rgyud): dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad du'i byag rgyar gsung so//'dir sngags ni/na maHsarba ta b+hA ba te b+h+yaHan ta b+h+yaHsamyak+saM bud d+he b+h+yaHhe haM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya/ni run+d+ha nI//
394a2(rgyud): run+ta/ur+d+ha ma Ni swAhA/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad bu'i sngags//'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan ni las thams cad par 'gyur//gi wang gi 'di gus dpral ba la thag khor byas pa/
394a3(rgyud): sngags bzlas na dad+ma'i nang du zhugs kyang na tshugs par 'gyur//ma rungs pa thams cad kyis kyang ma 'tshe bar 'gyuraro//g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na yang mthong ba tsam gyis gzhan maste 'jig
394a4(rgyud): bapar byed//ma mthong yang las tshad med pa byed par 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pas kyang gsung so//rgyun mi 'chad par phan tshun thal mo sbyar ba byas la mdzub mo gnyis
394a5(rgyud): phan tshun rtswa sprang la tshigs bar ma bkug cing mthe bong gnyis kyang bkug cing mthe bang gnyis kyang bkug pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags ni/i ru ru sU ru
394a6(rgyud): dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha la tsa ne sar+b+ban+da sa d+ha ni swA hA/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi sngag so//'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan pas las thams cad byed par 'gyur//mig gnyis la
394a7(rgyud): par bsngags te/dgra'i nang du zhugs ni dgra rnams mthong ba tum gyis byams pa'i sems dang /pan+d+ha pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro//bshes gnyen nyid du yang ldog par 'gyurate/gron
394b1(rgyud): du'ang rab tu sgrub par bye'o//yang na garul gyi chog mar mob gnyis la mngon par bsngags nas pha rol gyi dadung la bltas nA ni nga'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mtshon brdog par rab tu nus pa ma
394b2(rgyud): yin//'thab pa med pa nyid du'ang ldog par 'gyur te//grogs nyid du'ang rab tu sgrub par byed//lad pa gtos kyi sor mo de bzhin du glags b+h+ra ma lte bur phyin tshun gyi rtse mo sbyar la thad kar bzhog pa 'din
394b3(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o//'dir sngags nI/na ma b+ha ga ba ti tsi rud R+sha na oM tha/'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdig so//de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag
394b4(rgyud): pa ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur//sngags 'di bzlas nas snying la byugs shing myangs na dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur//dgra ma rurus pa'i nang du bzlas pa byas na de dag gi sems 'phrog par
394b5(rgyud): 'byu /yang na g.yul gyi nang du rkang gnyis dang /rkang bzhi la sogs pa phyir rgal ba thams cad rnam par rmongs par byed pa'am/sems rnam par g.yengs par byed par 'gyur//mdor na bac+doMs 'di
394b6(rgyud): nidzaM lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de ste de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//mdor na yon tan mtha' yas pa dang /'di'i las mtha' yas par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya dang
394b7(rgyud): sngags ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i le'ur gsus pa de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad la yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//yang na
395a1(rgyud): /zlug na tum ma ga tu mdon nanams na maSh+Ta / //da bzhin du sa nan/
395a2(rgyud): sngag su 'gyur te/oM rje rje nA ga ti ti ni swA t+ma/sngags 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag rgyu dang yang dag par ldan ni las thams cid por 'gyuraro//'di
395a3(rgyud): bzlas na pad+ma'i rigs thams cad bzlas pa yin//'di grub na pad+ma'i rigs thams cad grub par 'gyuraro//de nas gos dkar mo'i rig pa chen mo gang yin pa de'i sngags ni/oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka
395a4(rgyud): Tikit+taM ka Te s+t+raitA/rang gi phyag rgya'am/pad+ma'i phyug rgya sbyar ni las thams cad par 'gyur//dur khrod thams cad du song nas bsrung bar bya'o//de bzhin du sgrol me dang /khro gnyer can dang /
395a5(rgyud): bskul byed mi dang /rta mthun la yang sbyar bar byi'o//reg pa 'dus pa'i le'ur gang gsungs pa'i blad+ma'i rigs grangs myod pa thams cad kyang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o//phyag rgyu dang sngags kyi chog rgya rgyu
395a6(rgyud): pad+mo dag kyang sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa yino//'dir yang sngags ni/oM ku la ba ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/'di ni mA ma ki zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen mo la
395a7(rgyud): thams cad byed par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan to//sngar rab tu sbyar ba'i phyag rgya dang /rig pa chen mo mA ma ki dang yang dag par ldan na sgrub pa po 'dod pa bzhin du las thaMd byed
395b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//glang gzhi'i le'ur sngar bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor rdo rje'i rigs ma lus 'a thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang sngags dang ldan pa yang 'dir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du glang
395b2(rgyud): tshelo gyes la byung po'i spos kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sngagasu 'gyur ba ni/oM ga dza a hA ye hU~M khaM tsa ra swA hA/sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur te/snga ma de bzhin/
395b3(rgyud): du thams cad glang po'i rigs la grub par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du kun tu bzang po'i sdugs nI/oM sa ma ye sa mya dzi na su ra ta mi pi laM ba hUM phaT/mthu chen thob kyi sngags ni/oM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA s+thA ma ga
395b4(rgyud): bo d+hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM phaT phaT swA hA/dri ma med par grags pa'i sngags ni/oM bi ma le bi la mArti/oM d+ha ka d+ha ka sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/na mkha' mdzod kyi sngags ni byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md
395b5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dang ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du ngan seng kun spong dang /rtag tu ngu dang /sa'i snying po dang /rin chen lag pa dang /byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu rab tu thob pa rnam dang /
395b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang grangs med cing phyag rgya dang sngags kyang grangs med par 'gyur te/de dag kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la rab tu sbyar bar bya
395b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi shin tu rgya che ba dang bcas pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgya chen po dang /dam tshig chen po dang /dam chog la rab tu
396a1(rgyud): zhugs pa cho ga dang cho ga'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bye brag tsho ka'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs te/sngags thams cad kyang 'di la bsgrub bo byar rung ba yino//de bzhin du rin po che'i rig+sa dang //
396a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi rigs dang /lha'i rigs dag la yang sngags dang /rgyud dang /phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar ba 'dir brten pa yino//rigs gcig kho nar 'gyur zhing gzhan du ma yin pa ni 'di lta ste/de bzhi/
396a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs te/de yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu blta bar bya ste/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs
396a4(rgyud): dang /'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang /zag pa dang /bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /cho ga dang /cho ga'i rnam pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du
396a5(rgyud): gtogaso zhes gzung bar gyis shig/'jam dpal rig pa dang /rgyud thams cad dang /sngags kyi gsal ba gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la ma chud pa de ni gang yang med/'jam dpal gzhon
396a6(rgyud): rab tu gtogs pa nyi du zung shig/gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu gsung ste/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyang mchog nyi du brjod//'jam dpal gzhonu de ltar na cho ga'i rgyal
396a7(rgyud): 'di yang rigs kyi mchog rin po che dang dang po dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan pa dang /ston pa dang /rab tu bzhag pa dang /rnam par 'grel par mdzad pa ni bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes
396b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal ba dang /bcom ldan 'das sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas skyes pa'i dri mchog rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog dang /bcom ldan 'das 'a'od bag tu med
396b2(rgyud): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi 'od dang /me tog dam pa dang /yang dag pa'i me tog dang /me tog bzang po dang /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang /gser
396b3(rgyud): /thub dang /'od srung dang /'khor ba 'jog dang /gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyob dang /da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas rab tu bstan te/de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgya de 'ongs pa
396b4(rgyud): 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon cho ga'i rgyal po'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mochog rin po cher gyur pa/phan yon che ba nges par chos kyi dbyings la rten po bskal pa stong du 'di'i phan yon bstan pa/
396b5(rgyud): ni mi nuso//yon tan chen po rgya che ba'i yon tan 'byung ba ni mthong ba'i chos dang 'jig rten pha rol du yang yino//dad pa gang zhig gis the tsom med par 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /the tshom med par rgyud 'di la
396b6(rgyud): brtson pa byed cing sngags sgrub pa dang /zlos pa dang /phyag rgya 'ching ba dang rtag tu mngon par brtson par byed pa de la ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la yon tan gyi phan yon brgyad rab tu 'thob ste/'khrul pa med pa/
396b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /dgra'i 'jigs pa 'di la mi 'byung ba dang /'di'i lus la dug mi 'byung ba dang /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di la byin gyis brlabs par
397a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang /tshe ring ba dang /bde ba sten par 'gyur ba dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ba dang /mtshan mo yang 'di la nyin re zhing rmi lam du
397a2(rgyud): mthong ba stsol ba dang /sngags thams cad kyang 'di la srung bar 'gyuraro//phyag rgya yang 'di la rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro//rgyal po ma rungs pa dang /sems can ma rungs pa dang /mi phan pa 'dod pa rnams kyis
397a3(rgyud): kyang gnod pa med par 'gyur/nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro//dad cing the tsom med la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon na brgyad po 'di dag yin te/khyim pa 'am/rab tu byung ba 'am/bud med/
397a4(rgyud): skyes pa 'am/sems can chen po bstan pa la phan par byed pa rnams kyi yin gyi/sdig pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin te/de las bzlog pa de'i 'gro ba ni ngu 'bod la sogs par skye bar 'gyur//
397a5(rgyud): phyag rgya snga dro bcing bar byas nas tshe ring bar 'gyur ro//zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags dang /'khor gyi snying po dang /gtsug tor la sogs pa'i sngags dang /spyan la sogs pa gzhan gyi phyag rgya
397a6(rgyud): de bcing bar bya'o//yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod kyi phyag rgya ba ste/'di dag ni brtson 'grus dang /stobs mnyam pa yino//gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gnasu 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni gnas gtsang ba'i phyogs
397a7(rgyud): zug rngu med pa'i gnas la ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas byugs la me tog dkar po dri zhim po dag gis bcal bkram pa der 'dug la sngags bzlas shing phyag rgya bcing bar bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no//
397b1(rgyud): gzhan dag tu ni phyag rgya dang lhan cig bzlas pa gcig kyang mi bya'o//gtsang zhing gtsang bzhes gang gsungs ni nyi ma nub pa na/srog chags med pa'i chu gtsang bas khrus byas te/gos sar pa dgos la
397b2(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis srung ba byas la//grong gi chos rnam par spangs shing gtsang sbra la dga' zhing dge ba/sko rags dkar pos bcings pa de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms la thun cig 'dra ba dang
397b3(rgyud): der nyal bar bya'o//bram ze'i bu mo gtsang bas bskal pa'iri skud pa blangs la sngags 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags par bya'o//oM a ra ha ra ban+d+ha ne shu kra d+hA ra NI sid+d+han+te swA hA/mA ma ke'i phyag rgya dang //
397b4(rgyud): bzlas pa bya'o//de nas skud pa rked pa la lan gsum dkris nas bcing ba byas na sa bon bcing ba byas par 'gyur te/'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis kyang rmi lam du yid la gnod pa skyed par mi nus na rmi lam
397b5(rgyud): du log 'dron rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/de bzhin du cho ga 'dres 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang mi nus na 'dod chags dang bral bas lta smos kyang ci dgos/'dod pa'i dbang phyug dag/
397b6(rgyud): ldan gyi bu mo gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba'i 'dod chags can gyis kyang yid la gnod pa skyed par mi nus na de las gzhan pa'i mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bud med kyis kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos/de
397b7(rgyud): lta bu'i tshogs nang par langs la so shing bcas shing gdong rab tu bkrus la/cho ga snga ma bzhin du srog chags med cing dri ma med pa'i chus khrus byas te/shar phyogasu bltas la phyag rgya bcing zhing
398a1(rgyud): /sngags bzla ba byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur shing las thams cad la nus pa dang /nad chen po las grol te skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro//dgra rnams kyang bshes gnyen nyid 'byung
398a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur//mthong ba tsam gyis gdon thams cad dang /sha rjen tha ba dang /sdigs can la sogs pa rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro//dgra rnams rengs par 'gyur//mthong ba tsam gyis gtsang ba 'am/mi gtsang
398a3(rgyud): ba'i cho ga las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du cho ga'i rgyal po 'di'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshogs kyi 'khor 'di yang gangs med pa yin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pas gsungs/
398a4(rgyud): pa dang /gsung ba yin te/shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsungs te/'jam dpal
398a5(rgyud): gzhonu khyod la yang bstan pa yongasu srung ba'i phyir dang /chos kyi dbyings yun ring du yang dag par srung ba'i phyir 'di khyod la yongasu gtad//nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das te chos kyi de nyid la brten cing yA
398a6(rgyud): dag pa'i mtha'i tha mar gyur te zhi bar gyur pa na/sems can snying rje chen po dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa la phan pa'i phyir gsungs shing /dus kyi mtha' 'jigs pa chen po'i dus la bab pa na/dkon
398a7(rgyud): mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang bzlog pa'i don dang /gdul ba'i don gyi phyir cho ga'i rgyal po 'dings gsungs la/rgya cher rnam par dbye bar byas na sems can thaMd don gyi/
398b1(rgyud): phyir yin//phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thag pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las sngags dang /phyag rgya dang /nges par sdom pa dang /las dang /
398b2(rgyud): cho ba'i le'u rab 'byam las sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzog so////de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs
398b3(rgyud): nas 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa lo bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal mdor na nyon cig/phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid dang /sngags rnams kyi rgya che ba dang /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mdor bsdus pa dang /
398b4(rgyud): dam tshig la rjesu 'jug cing phyag rgya'i gnas dang /sngags thams cad dang /rgyud de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/rdzu 'phrul che kun sangs rgyas kyis//'di kun
398b5(rgyud): sngar ni gsungs pa yin//sngags shes bdag nyid chen po dang //ston kun kyang bstan pa yin//dang po'i sangs rgyas dag gis sngar//sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//sngags kyi 'khor
398b6(rgyud): lo dgra dang ni//chos kyi 'khar lo bla med bskor//yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni//zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i rjesu song //'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tsha//sangs rgyas de kun zhi bar gshegs//dang b+h+yo//
398b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi//'di kun sngon ni bstan pa yin//ngas kyang phyi ma'i dus dag tu//'jam po'i blo ldan khyod la bstan//sangs rgyas 'od can de yi bka'//de tshe 'di ni thos nas kyang //
399a1(rgyud): la myu 'o byungs ni gzhonu dang //thul mo sbyor byas spyan snar 'du//nang pa sas rgyas pa la//smra ba'i mchog des rgyus zhus//'jig rten rnams la ban
399a2(rgyud): phyir//shes rab chen pos chos gsungs shig/mdor bsdus rgyu ni mche byer//ston bdag nyid che 'bras 'byung //'jam dpal gyis ni de skad gsol//de nas cad ma smra bar gnas/de
399a3(rgyud): dang ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs//ka la pid+ma'i sgra skud kyis//dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni//de dag kun ni ston pa yin//gnas gtsang steng du gnas pa'i dus//de tshe sngags dang rgyud dgani/
399a4(rgyud): shAkya sing+ge mi mchog no//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yang dag gsungs//phyag rgya'i cho ga 'byung ba dang //phyag rgya rgyud dang ldan pa yi//ston bdag nyid rgya che ba//'jam dpal gzhon khyod nyin gyi
399a5(rgyud): sems can sems can ma yin pa'ang //dang po rtags mtshan bzhin du bya//rnam pa spyad dang spyad pa dang //zur gyis thams cad smra ba dang //lag gnyis rkang gnyis spyi bo dang //lag ci/
399a6(rgyud): sor mo'i sbyor ba dag/sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag gis//de kun phyag rgya na su gsungs//bya bum gdugs dang de bzhin du//pad+ma rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //nya dang rdo rje dung dang ni//de
399a7(rgyud): bur pa 'khor lo dang //'jig rten sna tshogs mtshon cha ni//ji srid yongasu bstan pa dang //ut+pal 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang //de kun phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dgod//de dag go rims ga
399b1(rgyud): pa dang //cho ga ldan par bstan pa yin//rtag tu de dag nyid la ni//rang gzugs 'dra bar bro bar bya//dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsungs pa ni//thams cad du ni spyir gsungs pa'o//de dag phyag rgya
399b2(rgyud): yongs bstan pa//gnas ni ji bzhin dag la dgod//dkyil 'khor dag ni kun la yang //rang dang 'dra ba nyi du sbyar//'khor los bsgyur la 'khor lo dang //gtsug tor gdugs dkar nyid la ni//
399b3(rgyud): gtso bor gdugs ni dkar po yin//dkyil 'khor la ni rtag tu bri//chos kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas la//pad+ma pad+ma'i rigs dag la//rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs la gsungs//glang po glang po'i rigs zhes bya//
399b4(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs la bum pa ste//dkyil 'khor kun la rab tu sbyar//lha gzhan gyi ni rigs dag la//dpal be'u bkri shis ldan pa bri//tshangs pa che la dang pa bri//brgya byin la yang rdo rje dang //dbang //
399b5(rgyud): phyug che la bri ba ni//rtse gsum khyu mchog yang dag bya//skem byed rtse gsum paT+Ti sa//mdung dang bcas pa nyid kyang yin//khyab 'jug 'khor lo bri ba ste//lha ma yin la dbus dang //rnam pa/
399b6(rgyud): sna tshogs brgya phrag ni//lha yi mtshon cha sna tshogs dang //de dag gzhan yang bzhon pa ni//rnam pa sna tshogs de tshe bri//gzugs brnyani ji ltar gnas pa ni//rang gzugs 'phos pa bzhin du bri//
399b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du//gang yang rung ba 'di cig bri//gcig dang gnyis dang yang dag ldan//grangs med gsum la sogs pa bya//dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gsungs pa//len/
400a1(rgyud): kun blang ni dI dang man+t+ram//gang gi tshudu dkyil 'khor gsungs//de ni dbu sla sa da/p+lu/rgyul ba /sa na nang du //nang ga dbusu 'ad sangs rgyas te//de tshe nang du nga gzu
400a2(rgyud): brnyan ni//stan pa yi ni kun tu bri//gnyis par pad+ma'i rigs dgod cing //gsum par rdo rje'i rigs kyong bri//mthar gyis lha dang lha ma yin//de bzhin de tshe thams cad ni//de nas saM kun la
400a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i//gnod sbyin srin po ma dang bcas//mthar gyis ji ltar gnas pa yi//mu stegs rnams kyang de nas bri//mog bzhin du thams cad kyang //phyogs skyong de bzhin b+hA bar bya//mdor ni gzu
400a4(rgyud): brtan gcig dang ni//gnyis dang gsum sogs grangs med pa//mtha' yas phyogs la gnas pa yi//dkyil 'khor ji srid kun tu bri//ma mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid dag ni//tshad med de tshe bri ba
400a5(rgyud): bya//gzugs brnyan gcig la sogs pa ni//mtha' yas sa yi steng dag tu//dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa ni//rnam po gsum du nges bstan pa//mchog dang bar ma de bzhin du//rnam
400a6(rgyud): nyid du'ang bstan pa yin//mchog la mchog dag grub pa dang //'bring la 'bring du nye bar bstan//tha mas phran tshegs grub par ni//rgyal ba mtshig gis sngon gsungaso//sems can yid ni
400a7(rgyud): rnam gsum gyis//rgyal ba'i mchog gis grub par gsungs//sems can chen pos chen por 'grub//sems can 'bring gis 'bring dang ni//gsum pa skye bo phra mo yi//las ni phra mo
400b1(rgyud): ra na//sa sa rgyus nyid du sam pa dang la//rgyun sum tshogs pa dam pa ni//nges par thod bar tu byung ba ste//sems can dkyil 'khor mtho bas so//de dus sam sman par ma yas//rang rgya
400b2(rgyud): byang chub thob par byed//gus po med pas nyan thos nyid//thams nges par zab par byed//bdag nyid chen po don bcas 'bras//zhi ba'i 'gro ba nye bar bsten//dkyil 'khor mthong ngas man
400b3(rgyud): s+ho//nges par doni 'gro bar 'gyur//de bzhin phyag rgya mchog kun dang //sngags rnams dang ni rgya cher bcas//rnam gsum nyid kyang rab sbyar ba//rnam gsum bde ba rab tu byed//
400b4(rgyud): dkyil la bar gsungs pa dang //sngags rnams bstan pa'ang phan po'i don//de dag rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//sngags kyang rnam gsum mnyam par bstan//dI myur dkyil 'khor bstan pa/
400b5(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags kyang de bzhin du//'odadi dge tshe gar yang dag ldan//'jig rten 'dren pas nges par bstan//de bzhin de yang rnam gsum 'gro/stong phrag dag ni du ma yi//rnam gsum rje
400b6(rgyud): gsum dag kyang //rnam pa gnyis dang grangs med pa'o//gang phyir sngags ni sems la ltos//sngags ni sems can snang mi bya//sems dang sngags ni yang dag ldan//lhan cig tu ni bsgrib par bya//de
400b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs kyi rig sngags dang //gang yang pad+ma rigs dge dang //gang yang rdo rje'i rigs gsungs dang //mi yi rigs ni nyid dag dang //'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kun//de dag ma
401a1(rgyud): /'di las byung //gang zhig rgyal dang rgyal sras sngags//snyoms can phyir na gsungs du rnams//glang zhig de zlos mngon brtson pa'ang //de ni ngas par sangs rgyas 'gyur//gang yang
401a2(rgyud): sngags ni bar ma dag/gang zhig zlos pa de zla byed//rang sangs rgya sa yang dag bstan//nges par de yu rags kyang yin//sngags ni tha mar rab zhugs pa//nyan thos dgra bcom gyis bshad dang /
401a3(rgyud): 'jig rten ma lus kun la yang //sngags zlos pa la mngon brtson pa//nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po yi//nges par rig sa de gnas yin//mchog dang tha ma bar ma ni//der yang las ni rab sgyu
401a4(rgyud): bya//zhi bas sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur//rgyas pa yis ni rang rgyal 'gyur//gzhan pa phran tshegs kyis ni//nyan thos kyis na byang chub brjod//de ni rnam gsum dbye ba ste//der yang sem
401a5(rgyud): ni blta bar bya//mang por yang ni dbye bya ste//grangs med par yang dbye bas so//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che thog pa chen po shin tu rgyas
401a6(rgyud): ba'i mdo las phyag rgya dang //sngags dong /las thams cad dang /nges par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byam las sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rtseg so////de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon phyug na
401a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs nas bla gos breg pa gcig tu gzer te pus me goyas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das gale ba de log tu
401b1(rgyud): thal mo sbyar to//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyo bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshad ces b+ha bya bshad pa de chob rgyuH
401b2(rgyud): babacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' ma stsal pas/bcom ldan 'das bdag dang phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/
401b3(rgyud): bstan pa nub pa'i dus la bab te/'jigs pa chen po rtsod pa'i dus tha ma la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag med pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par srung ba'i phyir
401b4(rgyud): chos kyi khams yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /rgyal po ma rung ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir dang /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag tshar bcad pa'i phyir dang /gdul bya'i son la
401b5(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa bstan pa'i phyir dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can yongasu smin pa mngon par sgrub
401b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir dang /bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i dus dang /phyi mo'i dusu bsten pa rnam par 'jig por 'gyur ba na/gang 'di khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gsungs pa rab tu sbyar na de tshe
401b7(rgyud): brub por 'gyur te/ngen par rgyal po ma rungs pa bston pa la gnad pa dang /sems can phyogs chen po dang spro ba chen po dang ldan pa rnams tshar bcad pa dang /rje su gzung ba la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
402a1(rgyud): snying rje chen po dang bral ba de dag la khro bo'i rgyal po 'di rab tu sbyar bar bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa'o//
402a2(rgyud): byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//'jam dpal gzhi nur gyur pa yang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to//thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul//
402a3(rgyud): bar gyur to//lha tshogs dag kyang 'jigs par gyur//byis pa kun kyang rab tu sngangs//lha rnams kun dang klu dag dang //lha min dbang dang ma mor bcas//gza' rnams kun gyi gtso bo dang //lha tshogs mi dang
402a4(rgyud): bcas pa dang //ma rungs sems ldan srul po dang //rab 'bul yid ni mi brtan 'gyur//mi yi bdag po gdug ldan sems//de dag mnyam thag 'jigs par 'gyur//chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la//de tshe de
402a5(rgyud): dag skyabasu song //gnod sbyin gsang ba'i bdag pa ni//'od chen phyag na rdo rje dang //gzhanur gyur pa'i sngags rgyal dang //'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang de 'jigs nas//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi drung du ni//de tsha de dag dri
402a6(rgyud): tshig blangs//ma mus sngags ni mi bzad pas//kye ma bdag cag ngas sag cing //de ring khri bos brgyal 'gyur zhing //sa yi steng du 'gyel 'gyur bas//sems can thugs la thugs brtsabs//yongasu bskyab cing
402a7(rgyud): srung du gsol//de nas 'dod chen byis pa'i gzugs//byang chub sems dpa' des smras pa//lha dang gnod sbyin srin po dang //lha min thams cad ma 'jigs shig/mi dang ma ma yin pa dang //'byung po ma lu
402b1(rgyud): lha rnams kun//khyed kyis dam tshig ngas bshad srung //rtag tu byams sems gyur nas ni//rtag tu rang gi sngags kyang dran//shAkya sing+ge mi yi mchog/rkang gnyis mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas//de nyid kyis gsungs sngags
402b2(rgyud): da ni/gtsug tor spyan la sogs pa'o//'jig rten gsum las 'khor lo rgyul//gzi brjid phung po dam pa rgyal//rnam sbyar gtsug tor gsang sngags dang //phyag na pad+me rnam gzigs dang //kun tu gzigs pa'i
402b3(rgyud): mgon po dang //khro gnyer sgrol ma grags ldan ma//lha mo gos dkar mo dang ni//dkar chen ma dang snyan ldan ma//rig ma longs spyod ldan ma dang //rta mgrin sngags kyi rgyal po dang //'di dag pad+ma'i rigs sngags dang /
402b4(rgyud): gtser ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang //yi ge gcig dang 'khor los bsgyuraro//sngags rnams bdag po mnga' bdag dang //'od chen snga gos kyis mgon po ni//'di dag de bzhin dran par gyis//gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi//
402b5(rgyud): khro bo'i gtso bo de yang dran/mgon po spyan ras gzigs pa yi//thugs ni thugs rje 'byung ba dang //thugs rje chen pos thugs brlan par//sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs pa'ang dran//sgrol ma skye bo sgrol bar no//spyan rwa
402b6(rgyud): gzigs kyis gsungs pa dang //rtag dang ting 'dzin skyes 'phags pa//ming gis gzugs ni brtan pa'ang yin//byang chub sems bzhin spyod pa ste//byang chub spyod pa dam pa'ang //'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu//
402b7(rgyud): grangs me rnam pa mang por yang //sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//de che lha mo rgyu bar byed//bud med gzugs na gzung nas kyang //sngags kyi tshul gyis las can la//de tshe sems can 'dus byed ci
403a1(rgyud): byang chub theg par sbyar bar byed//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni//bsam zhing brtan par mi nus//phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo ni//sngags rnams kun gyi bdag po'ang dran//bdag ma rigs 'dzin
403a2(rgyud): lha mo ni//'jig rten gsum gyis rab mchod dang //lu gu rgyu de dang 'od dpag mo//rdo rje khu tshur snyan ldan ma//khro dbang thig la dkar mo dang //dbyig sngon 'jigs par byed dang bcas//'di dag khro mo
403a3(rgyud): pho nya'i tshogs//rig ma'i spyan du rab tu bstan//rdo rje'i rigs la gtso bo ste//gang zhig dran na phan zhing srung //byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//'jig rten dag ni spos glang dang //byang chub seMda'
403a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul che//blo dang mthu tshon thob dang ni//sras kyi mthu bo gtso bo ni//kun tu bzang po dge ba ste//de tshe gang gis dran gyur pa//de la 'jigs pa yod ma yin//rtag tu de tshe nor bzang dang //
403a5(rgyud): gran de sbyin dam pa dzam+b+ha la//nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus pa//dran na 'jigs pa ga la yang //kun nas de dag mchod byas na//srung ba chen por rab tu bstan//de tshe 'bras bu che lha dang //bsod nams/
403a6(rgyud): skyes dang 'du shes med//gzugs med gzugs can lha dag dang //rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral//dkon mchog gsum le mched byed dang //rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dang ba//sngags dang dgra
403a7(rgyud): lo rtags 'jigs pa//de dag la ni cung zad med//de ltar dam tshig rjes gsungs pa//sngags pa kun gyis bsgoms min te//'di ni khro rgyal mchog ces pa//gshin rje gshed kyis brjod pa yin//
403b1(rgyud): sems can dam tshig la gnas nas//mi na ma lus gnad ma nus//lha dang lha min thams cad da//de nas yid ni dga'agyur nas//rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab bskul nas//thams cad dam tshig bstan gnas/
403b2(rgyud): 'gyur//gnod sbyin bdag po khro ldan pas//khyad du gsal tshig brjod par byed//'jig rten khams ni grangs med pa//de tshe thams cad rab tu 'gul//den med khro bo'i rgyal po yis//ci yi phyir na
403b3(rgyud): 'di bstan byas//sems can rnams ni gdul don du//da tshe sngon ni rgyal po'i sras//khro bo'i rgyal po'i nus pa ni//sngon chad bstan pa ma yin nam//rdo rje can gyis de smras nas//rdo rje sa la dor zhing gnas//
403b4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po byis pa'i gzugs//bla dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs//gzhonu rab tu bzhad gyur nas//tshig 'di dag ni smras pa ste//lag nA rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//gnod sbyin chen po sdang ma byed//khro na//
403b5(rgyud): rgyal po rdzu 'phrul tshe//'di ni nga yos rab du bstan//de bzhin rje su sbyin par bya//ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab tu ston//khyod kyis khro ba'i mthu dag ni/yongasu bstan par mi nus te//lus 'di gnos shing sna
403b6(rgyud): ba yin//de nyid khyod kyis drangs pa ste//khyod nyid kyi ni steng la dris//khro bo'i mthu ni khugs pa dang //'dir ni bzlog por nus pa min//ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyod la bstan//gzhan du dam tshig btang ba
403b7(rgyud): yin//khrus byed rab tu nyal ba dang //grong gis chos la rjes 'jug dang //til mar gyis byugs srung med dang //rtag tu gdug pa'i sems ldan dang //sngags mchog thams cad spangs pa dang //bstan pa
404a1(rgyud): la nI mazhugs dang //de bzhin min tho tsom dang //dad pa med cing 'gyod par gnas//dam chos tho tsom thob pa dang //de spong mnyam par ma bzhag dang //gtsor bu rtag par lhag mar/
404a2(rgyud): ldan/mi gtsang skyed pa'i spyod yul dang //mi brtson sngags dang mi ldan dang //rtag tu brtse med lhag mar ldan//lha yi gnas dang mchod rten dang //lha gang 'khor sa dkyil 'khor du//'khrig pa la ni
404a3(rgyud): mngon dga' ba// bos de dag rnam par 'jig/dam tshig nyams dang dad med dang //sngags kyi rigs pa mi shes dang //cung zad shes pa 'khrul pa dang //spyod pa 'khrul pa de dag la//khro bos rnir
404a4(rgyud): 'jig par byed//mi yi 'jig rten rnam kun tu//bag yod pa ni med pa dang //bag med shin tu 'dod chags can//dmi tshig nyams shing skyon ldan la//sngags rnams legs par sbyar ba yis//
404a5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal por 'joms par byed//bag med rigs min 'gro ba yi//byis pas rnam kun thams cad dang //rtag tu 'dod chags bral gyur pa'i//rang rgyal dgra bcom nyan thos kun//khro bo yi//
404a6(rgyud): ni rgyal po yis//thams cad du ni 'ching dang gcod//de skad smras nas 'jam dpal ni//snying rje yi ni brlan sems kyis//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi//rdzu 'phrul spyod pa bas mi khyab
404a7(rgyud): de skad smras nas de dag kun//cang mi smra bar gyur nas gnas//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //phyi yang rdo rje rab tu blangs//de tshe rdo rje blangs nas kyang //khro rgyal mthun shes nas dga'/'od
404b1(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las gshin rje gshed kyi yongasu bsngags pa dang sngags kyi bdag nyid chen po'i nges par sdom
404b2(rgyud): pa'i le'u rab 'byam las sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogaso///de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor chen po la bltas te gnas gtsang ma'i steng
404b3(rgyud): na 'dug par gyur pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/dang po re shig grogs po khyed cag khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi stobs dang pha rol gnod pa dpag tu med pa/gdul dka' gdul bar byed pa/gshin
404b4(rgyud): rje'i 'tsho ba mthar byed pa/sems can ma rungs pa tshar gcod gtsor byed pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/de'i ras ris kyi cho ga yod nyon shig/tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang /
404b5(rgyud): bsrung ba dag kyang mau bya ste//dgra yi 'jigs pa byung ba na//ras ris 'di ni bri bar bya//mar ngo'i zla phyed dag gnas te//chos grangs bcu bzhi 'am brgyad dag la//bram ze dam pa mchog dag gi/dur khrod shi ba'i ra
404b6(rgyud): snyed na//de ni mtshan mo mun par blangs//de yis khrag gis mtshon rtsi bya//ras ni chu yis lan gsum bkru//de nas de ni bskam par bya//'dri byed gdug sems khro ldan zhing //'jigs par byed pas bri bar bya/
404b7(rgyud): mar ngo'i zla phyed dur khrod du//zhag ni gsum mam bdun du bri//tshes brgyad cu bzhi'i nub mor ni//zhag chen mar mes sbar ba la//der gnas ri mor byed pa ni//rtag tu g.yas kyi phyogasu blto//mi yi thod pas
405a1(rgyud): gdan byas shing//mnyam par de zhig ste bsrung ba bya//dgra yi sdug bsngal gyis nyen na//yang na sngags pa rang gis bri//dang po'i mtshan mor rtsam pa na//dgra rnams lus la cha ba
405a2(rgyud): 'byung //gnyis par che ba chen po yis//dgra rnams brgyal bas gnod par 'gyur//gsum pa'i mtshan mor srog 'dor zhing //'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur//sngags pa rab tu ma dang ni//
405a3(rgyud): de la zhi bgo la yod//dgra yi lus ni skams 'gyur zhing //khyim la 'jigs pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur//gshin rje gshed ni 'jigs tshan gyi//ras ris 'di ni bros tsam gyis//zhal drug zhab pa
405a4(rgyud): drug phyag drug bri//kha dog sngo zhing gsus pa 'byung //khri ldan thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang //stug gi lpags pa rab tu brlabs//mtshon cha sna tshogs mi bzad ldan//lag na dbyig tho 'jigs par byad/
405a5(rgyud): spyan ni dmar zhing khro dang bcas//spyan gsum dag gis rnam par mtshan//skya 'bar gyon du brdzes pa ni//de bzhin la lar du ba'i mngag/mig sman nag po mi bzad dang //dbyar gyi sprin dang
405a6(rgyud): 'dra ba'i mdog/gshin rje'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi//ma he la zhon yang dag bri//gdug pa'i las can 'jigs pa che//drag cing drag po 'joms byed pa//sems can 'jig par byed pa yi//
405a7(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'cha ba 'jigs byed brjod//shin tu gdug pa'i las can dang //'jigs shing shin tu mi bzad pa//lus can thams cad gsong byed pa//'jigs pa'ang 'jigs shing sngangs
405b1(rgyud): byedag//bdag gis khrad gi chags dang /gros//khro ba mchog 'ang bri bar bya//zhag chen po yi zug dang ni//shin tu dmar bang chen bsres bris//ma na r+g+ha'i snod du thod pa bya//ma yi rus pas pi ba
405b2(rgyud): bya//shi ba'i sgra las byas pa yis//pir dang pir ni bcing nga'ang bya//rang ngam ri mo mkhan gyis kyang //de nas zas mi bza' bar bri//gtor ma me tog ming po sogs//phreng bu dmar dang can
405b3(rgyud): dmar//sha chen tshil gyi spos dang ni//zhag gi spros kyis mchod pa bya//ras ris dam po de la ni//dang po bar mtha' mchod par bya//ras ris yongasu rdzogs byas nas//ri mo mkhan lo sbyin
405b4(rgyud): ba'ang bya//nar ni rab tu mang po 'am//yang na gang gis dge ba'ang sbyin//las kyang 'jigs pa chen po bas//de yi don med mi bya'o//mdor na dpa' bo'i rin du ni//ji ltar 'dod pa de la bya//bzla
405b5(rgyud): bo'i las ni 'bras bcas bya//kha zas med nga'ang rnam par spang //ji ltar de ni yang dag dga'//de lta de ltar rab tu sbyar//srung ba chen po'ang rab tu bya//gzhan du de ni 'chi 'gyur zhing //gzo//
405b6(rgyud): po bza' dang bcas 'jigs pas//bdag gis kyang ni mngon par srung //rig pa bzlas nas bya ba ste//gzhan du cho gar brjid pa min//ras ris yongasu gsal byas pa'am//yid la 'dod pa//
405b7(rgyud): byas mthong na//gdug pa'i dgra rnams 'joms byed pa'i//las ni thams cad byed par 'gyur//ras ris mchog blangs 'gro ba ni//ji ltar 'dod pa'am gar 'dod pa'o//phyogs chen rgyal po//
406a1(rgyud): chen po dang //sems chen de ni dregs bcus dang //mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal che//gdug dang gdug pa'i las rnams dang //dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //chad
406a2(rgyud): pa smra dang sngags spangs dang //sngags rnams mchod par mi byed dang //de la dad rten smod pa dang //gang yang zlos pa smod byed dang //de bzhin mchod rten khyed du gsod//cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi//
406a3(rgyud): ni/de dag le ni sbyor bar bya//sems can kun dang skyob pa la//rtag tu de bzhin chos mi ldan//de dag la ni las rab sbyar//'phral du srog ni 'gag par byed//lung tang 'bras bu sngags bzlas
406a4(rgyud): blabrang /rtsa ba dang no shun pa'ang blang //'bras bu'i rang sbyor yang dag ldan//mi yi rus phye legs btags dang //nyungs mor dang ni dug nyid dang //ltar bu dang ni lang tang tshe//skye tshe dang yang khrag
406a5(rgyud): nyid kyang //mi las yang dag byung ba dag/thams cad blangs nas yang dag ldan//ras ris dben pa'i phyogasu bzhag/sgrub po lho phyogs mngon bltas nas//ras ris kyang ni byang du bstan//me thab cing
406a6(rgyud): 'dod byas nas ni//tsha zhing skam pa'i shing ngag gis//me thab de la mnyam gzhag nas//dur khrod me yis sbar bar bya//thams cad ldan pas srog byas nas//cho gar bstan pa'i sbyin sreg yin//
406a7(rgyud): khro dro'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis ni//me lha dag ni spyan dang bya//las rnams dag ni kun la'ang 'dir//mdung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya//me thab la ni khror bcas pa//rtsa brgyad stong gi bsregs blugs
406b1(rgyud): sbyin//dang por bu dag 'chi ba ni//sems can zhugs nas de bzhin 'gyur//gnyis pa la ni chung ma dang //'khor dang gtso bor bcas pa'ang yin//de la gsum par 'chi ba na//gang gi ched du byas pa'o///
406b2(rgyud): gong tshe mtshan phyed bzlas pa ni//ras ris mdun du byed pa'ang //dgra rnams bsad par bya phyir te//de ni de dang 'thun par 'gyur//de ni yul 'khor 'jigs par 'gyur//dpung dang 'chi bar 'gyur
406b3(rgyud): ba ste//mes tshig rlung na chen po dang //char chen dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur//thams cod bsdus pa'i tshogs dag ni//pha rol tshogs kyis gnon par 'gyur//de la gnod pa sna tshogs dang //nad
406b4(rgyud): chen dag gi yang dag khyab//rgyal po de yi lus kun kyang //skam par 'di la the tshom med//de yi khyim ni thams cad kyang //mi ma yin pas yang dag bkrus//mal du brtan pa mi rnyed cing //sa yi//
406b5(rgyud): steng du'ang 'khyor bar 'gyur//srin bu yi dgas sha rjen zas//de yi khyim ni yongasu bskor//thams cad du ni nyam thag 'jigs//sdug bsngal drag pas sdug bsngal 'gyur//sa steng lha yi
406b6(rgyud): dbang phyug sogs//de yi srung ba byed mi nus//'jig rten skyong ba tshangs tshogs dang //brgya byin sogs pa sum cu'i dbang //sngags kun lha dang bcas pa dang //'jig rten kun las byung ba'ang
406b7(rgyud): rung dang rgyal gyis 'khrugs mo rungs dgra/de yi 'tsho bo de mthar byed//mtshan phyed nyi mo gung dag la//gang du khros nas zlos byed pa//gshin rje khros pa mngon sum ltar//srung bar yang ni nus
407a1(rgyud): mngon// rbA 'du ba pa/s+thAs sbyangs bzhag nas/DUr na mdzud pa/ na sa dang /shong nacig do na zlu sa da //
407a2(rgyud): ma /d+hA pa /DU ts+tsha su rnams nga /na chen yin pa da / skye pa dang / spyod de
407a3(rgyud): 'gram la rten pa dang //gleng kyang dad ltar ni//de gnas na da //dang ga chadatshad nam+ban sa/d+d+ha rgyulas rnams d+ha ba maM//gtsang ba yul ni bad+ma dang
407a4(rgyud): sa du gnas pa du bya//sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khya//zlos pa'i grub pa sa ma mo khyab//las ni bsam mi khyi pa sted//grus byung bsnum mi hU~M dakl-i
407a5(rgyud): ni bdag nyid che//khro ba'i rgyal po bas mi mi khyab//las dang rdzu'i dul yuli dang nI//rnam por 'dul pa che 'byung ba//bsam myos mo khye zlas pa yi//sa stong 'di la grub pa sgripa
407a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rdzu 'dul che//kun gyis spong bar yong mi so+o/'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang //gza' dang ma mo smras te dgos//dang lan dang ni lA~M ba 'jug gis//skye mabyud
407a7(rgyud): dang ni brgya byin dang //rgya la dang rgyal ba'i sras dag ni//dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa dang //sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rtse//gang zhig dgra bcom
407b1(rgyud): rgyal dang //rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba//dam chog sngon byas de dag gis//srung bar yang na mi nus//mdor bsdus nas na bshad par bya//'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par gyis//zlos pa sems nam
407b2(rgyud): dang na//gzhan gyis nus par mi 'gyur ro//sngags pa mchog ni mi dga' na//de 'dir zhi ba ga la yod//bdag nyid chen po gshin rje gshed//khro bo'i rgyal po zlos pa po//gang tshe yid ni dang ba dang //gang tshe//
407b3(rgyud): snying rjes brlan gyur pa//de tshe de ni zhi thob pa'am//brtan pa'am 'tsho ba 'dzin par 'gyur//bi nu mar d+ha nyungs mar dang //rang sbyar dug dang ldan pa ni//khrag dang mi yi sha dang ni//lan tshwa che ba gsum
407b4(rgyud): dang ni//ske tshe dung gri phye ma dang //sta ra phu dang ni sram gyi sha/lang tang tshe yi rtsa ba dang //de bzhin ko sha ta ka'i dang //e ran+da rtsa nas tshig thal//lib rgan NI dang gze ma dang //bo son tsa yo rtsa ba dang //de
407b5(rgyud): bzhin sgog skyo kye'u dang //gzhan gyi zhag dang chu dang ni//kun dong tshang ni btung rab bcas//'di kun cha mnyam byas nas ni//ras ris nye bar sbyin pasreg bya//sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na//zla ba phyed kyi nang du/
407b6(rgyud): ni//bu dang gnyen sdug bcas pa yi//dgra rnams rtsad nas 'jig 'gyur te//'khor kun ma lus 'joms par byed//gnyis pa'i nang du sbyin sreg bya//de yi rtsad nas 'byin par byed//zlos pas me nang sbyin//
407b7(rgyud): sreg byas//gsum pa'i dusu phyin pa na//de yi grong rdal bcas de la//mu ge dgon 'byung ba dang //char mi 'bab cing 'chi ba mang //srin pos kun tu khyab pa dang //mes tshi go rdo yis char 'bab dang //
408a1(rgyud): nan du na rdzu du na su su na du tu r+m+ma smra du na
408a2(rgyud): duched ni//dum ming po dag kyang 'byung //dpal mon mang por bstan pa//rnam ste tshigs 'byung bar 'gyur//lang tang rtsabs sbyin sreg b+h+yas//de la rims ni 'byung bar 'gyur//tshang
408a3(rgyud): rtag tu sbyin sregs byas//tsha ba chen po skye bar 'gyur//shin tu sbyar bas sbyin sreg byas//gang ba'i rims na yang dag 'byung //ma rungs rgyal po stobs kyis dregs//de yi lus la de dag 'bru
408a4(rgyud): phyogs tshon nor dang ldan pa dang //gdug cing dpung che yang dag gnas//de yo 'tsho ba tha ma ni//nub gnyis yang na bdun gyiso//gang zhig gang la dang lha 'am//skyes pa'i skur ma ming yang rung //
408a5(rgyud): ras ris mdun du gzugs bya ba//dur khrod sol bas bris pa la//mgo la rdog pas mnan nas ni//khro bas bzlas pa brtsam par bya//blo bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i//mi yi bdag po
408a6(rgyud): zug gzer 'byung //nang chen pos ni thabs 'gyur te//de yi mod la'ang 'chi bar 'gyur//yang na dbye stas gcod pa'am//yan lag dag kyang mi ching 'gyur//sdig can mi ma yin
408a7(rgyud): pa yi/srin po gdug pas za bar 'gyur//bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag/sha rngon za dang srul po dang //sha za yi dgas ma mo yis//de yi mod la'ang gsod par byed//de nas dang ldan
408b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang //de tshe 'khor ni de skad skyes//sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas//de nas cang mi smra bar gnas//'jog rten rnams la phan 'dod phyir//'di skad du na yang smras pa//gnad rten man thams cad dang /
408b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin kun tshogs bos nas ni//de tshe gnod sbyin bdag po ste//byang chub sems dpas smras pa ni//gnod sbyin rnams kyis ras ris smras//'dod pa kun dang nye bar ldan//'gugs par byed dang drab
408b3(rgyud): byed kun//zug rngu ma lus yang dag 'byin//sngags pa gang tshe 'khrig pa 'dod//'dod chags mdongs pa 'o ma rmongs pa'i blos//bde gshegs bkas kyang bzlog pa dang //gnyen pos kyang ni
408b4(rgyud): mi nus//thog med pa yi 'khor ba nas//shin tu sdug bsngal rgyu sngon byas//de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal bar//snying rje chen pos 'gro ba gdungs//tshangs spyod dbang po dul bas ni//bde 'gro dag ni
408b5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//bzang po shis par bstan pa dang //mthar ni zhi ba thob par 'gyur//theg pa gsum la brten nas ni//mya ngan 'das pa legs par thob/bzlog pa blo ngan gyis zin pa//'dod chags kyi
408b6(rgyud): mdangs da//'thub med//'khor ba mi bzad tshang tshing gi/'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur//de dag sdug bsngal ldan don du//'dod pa'i longs spyod brjod par bya'o//khro bo 'di ni mnyes byas na//sdig pa
408b7(rgyud): kun las zlog par 'gyur//'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i rje snod ril po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mad las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi mngon
409a1(rgyud): /spyod pa dang logs par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byam las sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdug so////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bzha pa zla gros zhes bya ba 'khor ra/
409a2(rgyud): nyid du 'dres shing 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum
409a3(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la bany-id gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la brnyas nas tshig 'di sa so//phyag na rdo rje gang khyod sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa dang /'dod
409a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i sngags dang rgyud bshad na//kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nges par chos 'di ni ma yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
409a5(rgyud): ni gang gi phyir snying rje chen por rab tu phye zhing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs na 'khor ba'i 'ching ba la/
409a6(rgyud): grol bar 'gyuraro//kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang sems can la gnod par byed pa'i chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub ste//
409a7(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi che du gsungs pa ma yin te/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thaMd la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs pa yino//de nas byang chub sa
409b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la smras pa/ji ltar khyod lnga pa dang /ji ltar khyod rab tu ston pa de bzhin du zhi ba'i//blo gros byang chub sems dpas bslob par bya/
409b2(rgyud): bzhin du bsgrub par bya/ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin du bdog gis kyang bstan par bgyi'o//don dam par ni yang dag pa'i mtha' las yang dag pa'i
409b3(rgyud): mtha' la yang dag par brten nas chos kyi mtha' las grol pa thob par 'gyur ro//sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyag rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab//sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab//byang chub spyod//
409b4(rgyud): pa'ang bsapa me khyab//gdul ba'i sems can la brten nas//phan pa'i spyod pa bsam me khyab//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams//bsam mi khyab par yongasu bstan//rgyud rnams kun la rgyud 'di y-i/
409b5(rgyud): mthu ni bsam mi khyab pa yin//gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che//khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags dag dang //yul gsum dag kyang bsam mi khyab//rtogs pa'i bdag nyid bsam mi khyab//zhi ba'i blo gros byang/
409b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khrab ste/chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba'i sgrub pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab//zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sngags
409b7(rgyud): zlos pa na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can 'dod pa la lhag par chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa shin tu rab tu mang po 'phel bas ramyal ba chen por skye zhing
410a1(rgyud): sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang po 'di 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro//sems can 'di dag byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis skal pa med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/
410a2(rgyud): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pas sems nye bar bzhag par bya zhing thabs mkhas pa 'di la mngon spyod kyis las rab tu sbyar bar bya'o//las thad la yang mtshan ma/
410a3(rgyud): 'dzin par mi bya'o//mi dge bar 'dzin par mi bya zhing snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis sems can gdul ba'i thabs la yang bslab par bya'o//kye rgyal po'i sras gzhan yang chos dang chos ma
410a4(rgyud): yin pa dang /dkar po dang /nag po dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /'gro ba'i bdag nyid chen po sems can gdul ba'i thabs sgrub pa dang /chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
410a5(rgyud): rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/de nyid chos ston pas sems can smin pa'i thabs kyang rab tu sgrub par byed//kye rgyal ba'i skyes de bzhin du bdag cag gis bslab par bya zhing 'di lta ste/se ni gdul
410a6(rgyud): ba dang /sems can smin pa dang /bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang /de la rgyal ba'i sras khyed cag gang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig chen po la zhugs pa de thams cad kyis mnyan par bya//
410a7(rgyud): da par bya/de nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba tshol ba nyid du bya ste/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
410b1(rgyud): bad+d+haH gros kyis gnad sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la na rdo rje la rnam par bltas nas cang mo smra bar gyur to//sangs rgyas chos rnams ni ngasam gyis mi khye zhes yod la byas nas sangs rgyas pa
410b2(rgyud): lha bzhin du rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pa phyogan rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan shi kho da la rnam par bltas nas zhu ba'i rgyal ngo'i tshig yad smras pa/gang dag
410b3(rgyud): tshigs dang/sems ban+d+ha kyai khams mi nyon pa'i 'thung ba'i tshogs khyod cig rten cig/dang badz+ra shig snang ba byam+b+ha lA de'i rmyil ba'i seM sa de langasu ngas la/gnas dben par ma nas da
