475b1(rgyud): klob pa dang /mchod pa dang //'dzin pa dang /kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur//dam tshig gi spyod pa la rnga su ma zhugs pa dang /

477b6(rgyud): mgo la ngas bcing snganas//yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na//de la rgan pos mo gnod cing //mtshan gyis de'i 'phog mi 'gyur//gozhon nu'i gzugs yang dag byung //rme byi'i gang ni la legs bkod pa/
477b7(rgyud): glang ngo'i tshogs ma'i steng bzhag nas//g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na//skye bo rnam sdang de dag kun//mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed//byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni//gzhon nu'i rgyan rgya
478a1(rgyud): yongasu brgyan//gser dang dngul dpar gan gyis//rgyal mtshan yu ba sbed pa la//rgyal mtshan ba dan btags nas ni//legs dgod legs par mnyam par bzhag/g.yul du dgras ni
478a2(rgyud): legs gang ba//mtshon cha sna tshogs thog byed pa//thams cad g.yul du 'dus pa la//de yi tshen 'jug par bya//rgyal mtshan sbrang la gnas pa yi//gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa//rnam pa du ma ri//
478a3(rgyud): gzugs dang ldan//bdag nyid chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs//sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni//mthong ba tsam gyis 'jog par byed//rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni//'jig rten sa srungs gnas pa

478a6(rgyud): mchog snga ma grongs med pas//sa yi steng gi mi rnams la'ang //chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin//lha dang lha min sngon g.yul 'thab//pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na//gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa//
478a7(rgyud): dang ni pham byas zhe sdang bas//de tshe gcig tu song nas ni//sa steng rnam par du bar gyur//rgyal mchog 'od srung de la ni//thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus//ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni//bde sogs bdag/
478b1(rgyud): bos rnam par smras//mi bzad lha mun gyis pham nas//bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags//de skad bcom ldan dasol nas ni//lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis//de tshe thub mchog zhabs gnyis la//spyi ro

478b3(rgyud): skad du//rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs pa//gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung //bdag nyid chen po 'dzum dpapa ni//rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa//yang dag mtha' la gnas de ni//zab mo'i don
478b4(rgyud): bye don ston byed//spros med rnam pa med pa dang //gnas med pa la gzugs byas nas//shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston//lha yi dbang phyug de ni drin//de nas de ni de dran des//byang chub sems dpa
478b5(rgyud): dran tsam gyis//gzho nu sna tshogs gzugs can ni//der ni de yi mod la lhag so//de ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni//bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas//lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i des//de tshe rgyal ba/
478b6(rgyud): mchog la btud //rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas//'od chen 'od srung la yang bdud//de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas//sngags kyi tshig na 'di smra so//na maHsarba bud+d+ha bi d+hi sang+ge thAHma pra ti twA ta shA sa ne b+hA/
478b7(rgyud): oM ha na ha na/sarba b+ha yod sA dA ya d+hA sA ya/mo Ta ya/tshin+d+ra/b+hin+da/dz+wa li dz+wa la hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras mnaM/
479a1(rgyud): thag tus chen po 'dir dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams
479a2(rgyud): kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlab so//de nas lha'i
479a3(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs te ngo mcher smad du byung ba thob nas/mig gnyis bye ste stan las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan
479a4(rgyud): gsum bskor ba byas shing /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag gzung ste yid la byas nas phyir yang shing rta la zhon nas lha ma yin gang yin pa
479a5(rgyud): de logasu phyin par gyur to//de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa de ro mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/sems zhum zhing nyams
479a6(rgyud): la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin

479b1(rgyud): mthus lha ma yin las bdag cagangs par rgyal bas rang gi kun su 'gro bar bya'o//rang rang gi gnas ji lta bu bzhin du song nas khyed cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongasu spyod par gyis shAg/de nas lha dro dag
479b2(rgyud): thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gan su log par gyur to//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/gang bdag gris gzhon nu'i gzugs can skye
479b3(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gyi rnams de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang rtags na des na gong gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs po mi 'byung ngo zhes bstan to//de nus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la
479b4(rgyud): 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ljon zhing gsal ba'i phreng ba blangs nas gzhon nu'i tsha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/steng gi khang bzangasu grong khyer chen po blta na sdug po'i dbus na lha rnams

481a1(rgyud): 'og nas rtog tu de tshe 'gro//bskal pa rnams mang gsum gyi grangs//de tshe bsod nams yongs bstsags nas//de tshe byang chub thong nas ni//bdag dang rgyal ba mchog

485a1(rgyud): sogs pa rengs par byed cing nags kyi ba mun la sogs pa nA can rnams dang /mche ba can rnams rnyongs par byed//gyo mA la lan bzlas te chur bcug na chu gnas/

485b7(rgyud): na sbrul gyi zil gyis non par mi 'gyur//yang sngags rdo leb la gzong bus brkos te dris pa spris na ri rigs dang sprul gdug pa rnams khyim 'am/grong ngam grong khyer du ji srid 'dod
486a1(rgyud): kya bar du mche ba 'ching bar byed//phyung bas bral bar 'gyuraro//sngags 'di ma bsgrub su zin na yang las thams cad byed par 'gyur//gshag ma la sogs pa la
486a2(rgyud): yongasu bzlas te gtor na mche ba can thams cad kyi mche ba 'ching bar byed//de dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis khyab pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbusu bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags
486a3(rgyud): thad bri bar bya'o//dur khrod kyi ro bsregs pa'i shing gi phur bu la la ni bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sgo'i steng du sbas na skyed kyis 'tsho ba tha~Md kyi spyod mod par byed//phyung bas grol bar 'gyu'o//
486a4(rgyud): aM ni he nan+t+r-i le a b+hi ya b+ha yaM ka ri aM tsu le lu sha la ya Da i dza ha ye lu A ga sa pa ke ra te i e tum+bA ri khol+la mo hi ni d+hi bi dza kA raM dza hi dza ka r-i Ni hi dzaHtraHswA hA//sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis
486a5(rgyud): sngar smos pa'i las rnams ma sgrub su zin kyang byed par 'gyuraro//de las gzhan pa mngon par 'dod pa'i las thams cad byed pa the tshom mod/lan tshwa dang skye tshe'i spyan sreg gam phug ma'i sbyin
486a6(rgyud): sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rnams 'byer bar byed//oM aM b+hA sham+b+hi kap+pa su dza me phe dud+b+ha su/sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ma bsgrub su zin kyang rtag tu bzlas ni 'jigs pa thaMd bzlog par
486a7(rgyud): byed//rdo rje chu'i thig les dgra bo thams cad rmongs par byed cing khro bi rab tu dang bar byed//bcings pa la bzlas na bcings pa grol bar byed//phongs pas 'gyur bas bzlas na rnyed pa
486b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyuraro//e shron thi ho ha lu hu dz+wa lA dz+ra twe hu lu ru tre ba pra ti rAts+tsha tu hu lu swAhA//sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis 'thad pa dang /'thab mo dang /rnam par rtsod par thaMd la bzlas pa byas na zhi bar
486b2(rgyud): 'gyur//phub ma'i sprin sreg gis kyang thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro//ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog la bzlas te chu la bskur na dzad du zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par rgyal ba thob par the tsom medo//grong khyer tshig/
486b3(rgyud): pa'i me la mngon par phyogs te 'dug la mngon par bsngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun khyim gang srung bar 'dod pa'i khyim de srung bar byed cing mos tshig pa'i me'i kha las thar bar byed//rkang gnyis dang
486b4(rgyud): rkang bzhi'i mche ba la phub mi'i sbyin sreg gis zhi bar byed//oM pad+me pad+ma ak+She pad+ma suM b+ha ge phu/sngags kyi rgyal po 'di thal ba la bzlas te bskus pas mig gsos par 'gyuraro//byabs pas mig
486b5(rgyud): rengs par byed//lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i mig gis khros pa mthong mi thag tu rab tu dang bar byed//lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus na/skye bo thaMd dga' bar byed//
486b6(rgyud): rtsig po la ming smos pa'i sngags rdo rgyus kyis bris na mig gi nad thams cad 'joms par byed//dben par 'dug ste sems rtsa gcig pas skyes bu'i mig gnyis la mngon par sngags pa byas
486b7(rgyud): na gang gi tshe g.yon pa 'dul bar gyur pa de'i tshe bsam pa'i dngos po 'grub par ston pa yin//g.yas pa 'bul bar byed na mi dge ba'i dgos pa ston par byed//oM mo tsa ni ya mok+Sha Ni mok+Sha ya dzi
487a1(rgyud): ba bar de swA hA//di mngon par bsngags pa'i rtol mar gyis bud med kyi skye ba'i rgol bskus na sgyum ma bde bar bcas par byed//brnyings pa la phyogs par byed pas
487a2(rgyud): ldan 'dun mngon par sbubs pa'i chu snyim pa bdun mngon par gtor ba dus gsum du byas pa sna bcings pa rnams grol bar byed//gur gum mau gi wang gis gro ga lo mngon par bris te
487a3(rgyud): bcings pa'i mgo ba li mngon par btags na bcings pa las mngon par grol bar bye//oM ha rim ka TA nAm sa ha sa ha sro b+hA hud de ba da te ta~M bi d+ha nI mok+Sha ya swA hA//rdo rgyus la mngon par
487a4(rgyud): bsngags pas sa'i steng du yang dang yang du bris te lugs las bzlog pas phyos nu bcings pa las grol bar byed//le ma la ming dang /sngagasu bcas te mngon par bris te mgo
487a5(rgyud): bo le btags na bcings pa thams cad grol bar 'gyu ro//oM tA ri Ni tA ra ya mo tsi ni mo tsa ya mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha ya dzi ba~M bai ra de swA hA//sngags kyi rgyal po 'od legs par bzlas na las thaMd byed/
487a6(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing /lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i til mar gyi skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur//lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs na mngal
487a7(rgyud): khyim pa bde bar btsa' bar byed//rtag tu bzlas na bdag dang gzhan 'tshong ba la se thar bar byed//skye 'am dpung pa la srung ba btags pas sdig pa thams cad las srung bar bdo//
487b1(rgyud): oM tA re tA re tut+tA re tA raM mo k+Sha ya dzi bA swA hA//sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sngar smos pa'i lus thaMd byed par 'gyuraro//gur bum gyis grog la gang gis ming smos pa'o sngags mngon par bris la swa
487b2(rgyud): tshal du btums te dri chus bkang ba'i bum par res ras pa'i nang du bcug ste/me tog dri zhim po la sogs pas dus gsum du mchod pa byas na 'thab pa dang /'thab mo dang /rtsed pa zad las rnam
487b3(rgyud): pang rgyal bar 'gyur//gur gum gyis gro ga la gang gis ming smos pa/i e ra Na R+Sha s+ya ba ne kA kro ri gA tI ra mu s+thi taHyi ba tu drA ta yA ni yaM bai sha l+yA b+ha ba tu gurbi NI//lan bdun mngon par bsngags
487b4(rgyud): pa'i chu khyod pa gsum po nyar 'ongs pas 'thungs na sbrum ma bde bar bca' bar byed//oM a ma ra Ni dzi ben+te yi swa hA//sngags kyi rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//
487b5(rgyud): mngon par bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs na 'brum bu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro//lus las skyes pa'i dug mi bzad pa dang /spre'u'i dug mi bzad pa dang /sbrul gdug pa la sogs pa'i rma la yungs pa dang /a
487b6(rgyud): rur dang /ru ti la sogs pa la yongasu bzlas te bskus na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur//nad dang rnam par 'tshe ba tha~Md la sngags mdud bcings pos zhi bar byed//rtag tu bzlas na tshe zad pa lo brgya
487b7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//mang dang til mar gyi sbyin sreg gis tha da zhi bar byed//mngon par bsngags pa'i sman gyi btung ba thams cad las thar bar byed//lan brkyang bkrus pa'i mar la mngon par bsngags pa

488a2(rgyud): la chu la sngags nas gtor bas sos par 'gyur ro//skran nad la be dang la sogs pa mtshon gyis btubs na sri hasta bcad par 'gyuraro//nir kun di dang nim pa'i rtsa ba rma bya'i mjug sgro dang
488a3(rgyud): bcas pa gcig tu sbar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i dud pas bdugs na rims nyin gcig pa dang /rims nyin gnyis pa dang /nyin gsum pa dang /nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa
488a4(rgyud): sel bar byed cing /'byung po dang /sha za dang /tshangs pa srin po la sogs pa sal bar byedado//bud med bu shi bas brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsags pa'i bum pas khrus byas na gson pa/
488a5(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gro ga la bris pa'i sngags ske 'am dpung pa la btags na mngal srung bar pado//sngags rjes dran pas g.yul ngogasu 'jug na rgyal ba bsres par 'gyur zhing babru
488a6(rgyud): pas nad thams cad sel bar byed//oM pa de tsa la no swA hA//sngags kyi rgyal po'ang sngon du bsnyen po'i cho gas legs par bsgrubs pas las thaMd byed par 'gyu ro//phol mig gis 'jigs

488b1(rgyud): pa'i trail gyis sbyin sreg ni srung ba chen po yino//khwa'i sgo lag pas brdung ste bzlas pa khri byas pa gang gis khang pa'i steng ngos su sbas pas de 'byer bar byed//oM pi shA tsi par+d+ha sha wa ri sarbo pa dra paR+Sha
488b2(rgyud): sha nI swA hA//rig pa chen mo 'di ma bsgrub su zin kyang rkang gnyis dang /rkang bzhi pa thaMd kyi rnam par 'tshe ba sel bar byed cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur/sbyin sreg gam bzlas pa 'am/khrus

488b7(rgyud): kyo rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pas sdig pa tha~Md las srung bar byed//'byung po la sogs pa'i gnod kyis 'jigs pa la nyungs kar gyis brdegs pas gdon tha~Md 'byer bar bye do//kham phol
489a1(rgyud): lardo rgyus kyis bris te sku la btags pas gsar du bcas pa'i byis pa srung bar byed//sgra tshal gyis sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas pa'i snying khar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bas

489a3(rgyud): na khros pa 'joms par byed//mi'i rje rang gi rus pa'i phur bu 'am lcags kyis phub bus gdab par bya'o//ming nas bzung zhing yan lag gang dang gang la phur bu btab pa de dang de 'jig par
489a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dgra bo'i sgor khar sbas na 'byer bar byed//dur khrod kyi thal ba la mngon par bsngags pas sgo'i ya them la gtor na 'byora'o//ral gri la mngon par bsngags te g.yul du 'jug

489b1(rgyud): da mngon par sngags la ngos so la bas sa na bud med pa ma su cad yod par ba rdzogs par byed//rgyal la kha zur du ltas pa'i mu tog gI rtsa ba dang /shari kha nad dag sbyar la brgya rtsa brgyad ma

489b3(rgyud): byed//oM stam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ni dzam+b+ha ya mo ha ya rak+Sha ni ya rak+Shi ya maM ba ra te sid+d+ha lo tsa ne swA hA//sangs rgyas spyan gyi snying po 'dis 'jigs pa thaMd sel bar byed//dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i rgyud

491b7(rgyud): swA hA/pa la sha'i me tog gam ya mi shing gis sbyin sreg 'dum phrag gcig byas na gser srang 'bum rnyed par 'gyur zhing bu mo don du gnyer bar 'dod pa'i bu mau rnyed par 'gyuraro//oM ka ma le bA

492a5(rgyud): rdzogs par byed//oM ba su d+hA ri Ni swA hA/oM shrI ba su swAhA/oM ba su shrI yai swAhA/oM shrI ba su mu khi swA hA//oM shrI ba su me te shri ye swA hA//bdag nyid dzam+b+ha la'i gzugasu bsgos
492a6(rgyud): la rang gi skyong kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su baM sud+hA ra gser gyi mdog can phywa gnyis pa rgyani tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/shwar la sogs pa'i phyogs lha mo bzhis bskor ba/g.yas kyis
492a7(rgyud): mchog smin pa/g.yon gyis 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa bsgoms na yid la ri ba rdzogs par byed//ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi po khru de'i tshad du byas la dus gsum du me tog
492b1(rgyud): dri zhim pos mcho de stong phrag bzhi bzlas pa byas na zla ba drug na yid la ra ba dzad rdzogs par byed//ji lta ba bzhin rnyed pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bzhi byas na dpal chen por 'gyur zhing
492b2(rgyud): yi ge 'bum bzlas naM dpal chen po 'grub par 'gyuraro//gu bul gyi ril bu'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas ni yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//oM ba suM d+hA ri Ni oM mu ka nAM de hi dA pa ya swAhA/sdug
492b3(rgyud): 'di chu'i nang zhugs nas khrus byas te 'bum phrag bzhi nges par sbyin sreg byas ni mngon par 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed par 'gyuraro//mtshan mo'o ma can gyi ye shing gis grong gi ming nas smos nas sbyin sri

499a5(rgyud): thad dga' bar 'gyuraro//e ma la/bi ma le/ku ma ku ma sa ma ye nA/b+had d+hi se b+ha ni du na/id tsha ya de bo bar sha ti b+hu b+h+yo ta ya ti grA dza tAM pasmA ya mo hA ra dz+re/sa ma d+hi b+ha ra tA yaM tu/

499b1(rgyud): bsreg byas na 'dod pa'i skyes pa dang bud med 'gugs par 'gyur zhes mkhas pas da ltar shes par byas la gus par bya'o//dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las lan
499b2(rgyud): bzhi pa rdzog so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+hi pr-i ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /lo ts+tsha ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur/dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bac+doMs shing bsgyur ba'o//
499b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal rnon po la bstod pa/'thing nag modzes pas 'jam par 'tsher ba'i dbu//lci nga lo rdzangs bskyed 'theng gi mtsho ltar g.yo//dge ba'i spyi gtsug mtshan
499b4(rgyud): mchog g.ya su 'khyil//gtsug tor 'phags pas skye bos bltar mi mthong //srid pa'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhom pa dang //mthu chen byin gyis rgal ba gzhom pa'i phyir//dbu rgyan cod pan//
499b5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i mchog gsang zhing //chos kyi rgyal thabs dbang gi pha rol phyin//rin chen spug dang ud pa la 'dra ba yi//shin du dngas par dkar nag phyed pa'i spyan//smin chu DiDoM mdzes pas zla ba chos/
499b6(rgyud): ltar 'byug/mig 'dzums zur gyis lta bas byams pa'i rtags//sil snyan rnaM dag mtshan rab 'dru chags pa//rin chen ma lus rnam pa du mas spras//rgyal ba'i zhing mang rnam pa sna tshogasu/
499b7(rgyud): rnam thar dpag yas chos sgo grangs med gnas//shangs kyi dbyings legs skye bo yongs pas 'phags//mtho la yid tsam rur la legs pa'i mtshan//drang la chu bran 'dra bar mdzes pa
500a1(rgyud): tshul rta bzang legs bskul pa brgyar yang bltar mo ngoms//pad+ma leb rgan tshan ltar dmar ba'i sgos//yid gzhungs 'phel ba 'khyol ba bzang legs sku//mdog
500a2(rgyud): sdug chu skyes snang ba mtsho lo bzhin//shin tu dang ba'i yid kyis 'dzum pa mdzad//zhal ras zla 'dra gser gyi mdog gis rgyas//'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser phreng du mas spras//gsal ba'i 'od//
500a3(rgyud): thing nyi mo brgya pas lhag/'od zer sna tshogs sbyin phung bzhin du 'phro chos dbyings 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra sgrogs pa//ka la bing kA lta bur yid 'phrog mdzad//sang srang dbyangs rab gsung
500a4(rgyud): dbyangs rab sgrags pa//seng ge'i nga ri gser gyi dril ltar 'khrul//skyes mchog mdzad pa rgam par mdzod pa'i sku//cha lugs bzhin 'chang gzi brjid 'phags pa'i sku//gzhon nu'i tshul
500a5(rgyud): tshogs shin du gzhon par gda'//gdul bya'i skye bo gzhon nu gzugs kyis gdul//dbu rgyan rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //mu tig do shal gser gyi rgyan du bkod//pad+ma lha yin bza'
500a6(rgyud): sil ma bsnams//g.yas na mtshon mchog bsnams pa thabs kyis 'dul//dpe med rna ba shes rab nyid du nges//chos dbyings tshul nyid yang dag brjod pa dang //mi shigs rdo rje
500a7(rgyud): gtan nas 'bigs pa'i tshul//g.yon pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //glang ngor gnyis med bsam gyis mi khyab dbyings//zab ma'i tshe sa nyid thugasu chud pa'i don//bac+doMs kyis
500b1(rgyud): jam dpal rnon po la bstod pa rdzog s+ho///'jam dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa/gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po//ye shes sgron mes rab brgyan nying //'a
500b2(rgyud): rten gti mug mun sel ba//'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//zla ba rgyas bzil gnon zhing //ma rig rnam par bsal gyur pa//'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal//ma bgyis zur dung
500b3(rgyud): gsal ba la rkor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' zhing //nyid ni kun tu dga'i ba'i sku//'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab//yid 'ong gsung gi sgra sgrog pa//dam pa'i
500b4(rgyud): chos kyi rin cheni mdzad//'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//gang gA'i chu thigs ltar grangs mod//'jig rten khams kun ma lus par//nyon mongs dri ma ma lus pa//'jam dpal
500b5(rgyud): khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod//mche ba gtsigs zhing bsgrims pa yi//'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni//gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa//'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal
500b6(rgyud): stod//rang gi sprin dang mdangs 'dra ba'i//ud pa la sngon pos rab mdzes pa//lhung bzed phyag na bsnams pa yi//'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshalo//phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i

506a1(rgyud): pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/bod skad du/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
506a2(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
506a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs ste/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka'
506a4(rgyud): stsol pa/ko'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya/gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/
506a5(rgyud): mtshan mar ma yin/mtshan ma ma yin par yang mo yin/blang bar ma yin/dor bar ma yin/bsnon par ma yin bsnun pa med par ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs par ma
506a6(rgyud): yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/spang bar ma yin/spang bar ma yin par yang ma
506a7(rgyud): yin/gnas su ma yin/gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin/sbyor bar ma yin/sbyor bar ma yin par yang ma yin/'brel bar ma yin/'brel par ma yin par
506b1(rgyud): yang ma yin/rkyen du ma yin/rten du ma yin par yang ma yin/chosu ma yin//chos ma yin par yang ma yin/de bzhin nyid ma yin/de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yang mu yin/yang dag pa'i mtha'
506b2(rgyud): yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin/kau shi ka de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di lta ste/chos thaMd mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam//
506b3(rgyud): chos thaMd zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za'o//chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpe no//chos thaMd g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin paga'o//
506b4(rgyud): bamed pa'o//chos thams cad rlom sem med pa'i phyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems medo//chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shras rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa mdo//chos tha~Md drag
506b5(rgyud): tsha ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do//chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go/chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i
506b6(rgyud): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do//chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phrog pa med do//chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i
506b7(rgyud): phyir/shes raba'i pha rol tu phyin pa na mkha' lta bu'o//gzugs mu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu mdo//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
507a1(rgyud): shes pa mu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do//sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po mu med do//de bzhin du
507a2(rgyud): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do//rgya mtsho mu
507a3(rgyud): med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do//rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo//chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
507a4(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do//chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do//chos thams cad gsal ba med par mnyam
507a5(rgyud): pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsal ba med par mnyam mo//chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do//chos thams cad bsam
507a6(rgyud): gyis mi khyer ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab po//de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol
507a7(rgyud): tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /smon lam
507b1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do//shes rab
507b2(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/'di lta ste/stong pa nyid bco brgyad 'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po
507b3(rgyud): stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
507b4(rgyud): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med
507b5(rgyud): pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//skar ma rab rib mar me dang /sgyu
507b6(rgyud): mthil pa chu bur dang //rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur//'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya//na mo b+ha ga ba te ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi ti ye/oM d+hIHhrIHshrI shru ti smi tI ma ti ga ti
507b7(rgyud): ye swA hA/'gag pa med cing skye med la//chad pa med cing rtag pa med//tha dad don mod don gcig min//'ong ba med cing 'gro med la//spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yi//rten cing
508a1(rgyud): 'brel byur 'byung ston pa//rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa//sgra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das a de skad ces paka
508a2(rgyud): stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar
508a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'jigs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ko'u shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
